story:
sterling silver, wolf dimensions approximately 5x5x5mm, Made in USA

Hello!

REALM + WILD is a heart-centered venture fueled by a love for nature and the everlasting quest to find meaningful work. Sparked with a conscious spirit, the REALM + WILD business model was formulated to support a responsible and sustainable supply chain while splitting profits with Mother Nature herself. Our practice is simple:

  • Design product with the intention to inspire and inform
  • Produce product responsibly
  • Sell product to wonderful customers who will, in turn, spread the message
  • Tally up profits annually and contribute 50% to wildlife conservation

To be clear, this is indeed a for profit endeavor in which wildlife ultimately has a 50% stake. Activities in which the $15,000 will support include:

  • Fulfillment of Indiegogo fees and backer rewards
  • Obtaining the necessary resources to produce creative and content for website and related marketing. Building a solid presentation that will get the brand noticed and the word out
  • Production of Spring 2016 product line

If our goal of $15,000 is not met, 100% of collected contributions will still be allocated towards the above activities :)


Thank you!

Your contribution to help REALM + WILD launch for Spring 2016 will go a huge way to getting us where we need to be to meet our commitment to wildlife conservation. For that, we are releasing Logan (wolf stud earrings) to our Indiegogo supporters! Be the first to score one of the most anticipated pieces from the REALM + WILD product line before our launch.

Please visit www.realmandwild.com to learn more! Word of mouth is our biggest support - please make sure to be social and share!


The Impact

The mission of REALM + WILD is to promote mindfulness in 3 key facets:

PARTNERING

Sadly, harmful production methods in the product supply chain often go unnoticed to the greater consumer market. We see the pretty end-product but not the cost it has had both socially and economically.

Luckily, there is a growing trend in businesses and suppliers that are investing in better ways to produce and deliver product. REALM + WILD aims to be part of this trend through cultivating working relationships with service providers that are in line with our mission. Through sharing in and supporting each other's commitment to sustainable and responsible business practices, it is our goal to continue to raise the bar in how consumer goods are produced.

INFORMING

Through strategic distribution , the goal is to not only inspire our audience with meaningful pieces, but to also share the importance of conservation. Whether it's a friendly smile of a rhinoceros or the concerned visage of a wolf, our pieces are designed to communicate the love and intelligence of all lifeforms of this planet. The commercial aspect of REALM + WILD is to not only support our business structure, but to also elevate awareness among our customers and their collective circles

SUPPORTING

The third facet of the REALM + WILD business model is to provide support to individuals and organizations that have dedicated their mission to wildlife conservation. There is certainly enough in the bottom line to go around and we have dedicated a 50% share of the company to Mother Nature.


Risks & Challenges

The one risk REALM + WILD faces with meeting goals for the Spring 2016 launch would be a lack of funding for the anticipated production run. We have our design direction completed and our partners aligned - the only drawback would be less product quantities available for our customers. The show will still go on!


Spread the Word!

Please visit www.realmandwild.com to learn more! Word of mouth is our biggest support - please make sure to be social and share as these small acts will go a long way to ensuring our success!

story:
Oh, the struggles of toddlers dressing themselves.

Hi! I'm Andrea Olson, owner of Go Diaper Free and Tiny Undies. Both of my older kids (and all of my worldwide EC clients' kiddos) have had a hard time learning how to self-dress...especially when it comes to undies!

It's heartbreaking to watch your toddler try so hard to put on their hard-earned underwear, after being toilet trained or graduating elimination communication, and totally lose their marbles when they can't get their feet into the right holes.

Major tantrum moment.

Or the bittersweet moment when they do get those undies on, only to see that they've gotten them on backward...and have a huge baby wedgie.

Oh so cute, but oh so wrong.

We adults know what a tag means - it is our guide to putting on our clothing right side front. But when it comes to babies, toddlers, and even kindergartners, it's a bit more complicated.

Tiny Undies are already made for smaller 6 month to 3 year old children...and the new LEARN Collection takes it one step further (and a size or two larger).

It is SO important for our children to feel the success of being able to dress themselves, especially after reaching potty independence (or being encouraged during the potty training process)...and I am committed to getting this new product to market.

Let's walk through how awesome using the LEARN Undies is for your kiddo...

We will start with Bear (he's the star of Tiny Potty, the board book I funded here on Indiegogo not too long ago). He is upside down. But not to your child!

The first time my daughter saw Bear she said, "Bear's lookin' at me!" and proceeded to turn the undies to face her...which happens to be the correct starting point. Bear is upside down to you, but right-side-up to your child.

Then your child will automagically grab the orange "grabs" to pull the waistband toward them. That's what they're there for...with no tricky loops or handles to get in the way of their awesome gross motor skills!

Next, watch in wonder as your child puts one foot into the teal hole, and the other foot into the grey hole. Success!

Your kiddo then pulls up the undies, and the deed is done.

How LEARN Undies are life-changing

LEARN Undies:

  • Cut your child's undie-pull-on time in half or more
  • Decrease tantrums
  • Increase self-esteem + success
  • Guarantee self-dressing improvements
  • Free you (the parent) up to do other things
  • Enhance your toilet training efforts (or EC completion)
  • Are gender-neutral
  • Will be available in sizes ranging from 12 months to 5T
  • Feature Bear, the much-loved character from my board book (Tiny Potty: it teaches your kids the entire potty process, sans-diapers).

But I need your help to make this dream a reality!

What I Need & What You Get

I need $10,000 to pay for the initial manufacturing, shipping, and marketing of this product. These are going to sell on a much larger scale than Tiny Undies. They will also be made available in larger sizes. If enough money is raised, we will add more pattern options that are gender-specific, in addition to Bear.

  • $7,000 manufacturing
  • $2,000 shipping
  • $1,000 marketing
  • =$10,000
Some unique perks include options that pair LEARN Undies with my board book - giving your child a seamless experience of pottying with Bear, just like the child in the book does!

If I don't reach my goal, I will use what I've got to get an initial order out and your preorders to you!

The Cultural and Personal Impact of...Undies?!

The average age of potty independence in the US is currently 36-38 months. That's 3 years old, y'all. And if kids actually felt confident when pulling up their own undies? That average will certainly be reduced!!

Lets give our kids the best odds possible at feeling successful in toileting and self-dressing. The impact on their well-being is PRICELESS!

I've had success funding and bringing to market my board book, my line of Tiny Undies, and both of my EC and potty training books for parents. The sky's the limit y'all!

I want all children to have the chance to be diaper-free, and these undies will teach them the skills they need to wear their big kid undies, and dress themselves.

Risks & Challenges

I have lots of experience manufacturing at this point, and I know what can and will go wrong if one is not careful. So, my awesome sweatshop-free manufacturing team and I will get these made right the first time...once this project is funded with your preorders!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help. Please pitch in by:

  • sharing this campaign with your friends
  • donating a buck or two with that Perk on the sidebar.

Thanks so much! I appreciate your support...and I know your kiddo will LOVE these Undies...and LOVE her newfound freedom from you dressing her! (or him!)

xx Andrea Olson

Tiny Undies + Go Diaper Free

story:
Gearing up for your next festival? We've got you covered! Having the right gear can be the difference between a good experience observing, and a great experience participating.


BURNR BOX will inspire you to connect with others to share your unique expression of energy, passion, sensuality and untamed creativity with our hand selected accessories. We provide you with festival tips on how to use your accessories and share the journey with others. Spread your love like fire!




Our boxes cover a wide scope of functions from your basic survival needs (hydration, nutrition, first aid, phone charger) to your festival desires (Party apparel, lights, toys, and sensual goods).  We supply you with the ingredients to transform yourself into an action hero! 




We are a team of festival goers with a vision to provide the best tools for your festival experiences. The whole festival experience is about community, and we want to share what we love, so you can come back with lifetime memories that you also love, and will always make you smile. We are inspired to give back to the community what we have learned. We intend to provide an enhanced experience by sending some fun, fashion, and survival items straight to your door, while taking out some of the essential pre-planning steps for you. Our goal is to create a memorable experience for you. 


Festival admission along with bringing party supplies, favors, and accessories to thrive, does not come cheap. Let alone, time invested in preparation can amount to hours of sourcing and can be expensive after paying shipping costs. Vital to our mission is to provide the best products in the party-related industry and deliver it to you all in one place with no shipping cost. We have sourced the best items for your festival experiences! We need your help to supply enough boxes so everyone can have a great experience at their festivals! By funding our campaign you enable us to solve the problem of sourcing the best items you deserve and allowing us to reach and meet the needs of a larger community so everyone has access to our boxes!



Thank you for taking the time to checkout our campaign! Even if you can't contribute you can help in a big way by sharing our campaign with your friends. Hope to see you at the next festival!

story:
Short Summary

Hello there!

Do you always want to look your best? Or do you need to look fresh and tidy throughout your working day? Are you annoyed by wrinkles on your clothes, smell or dirt on them? 

If so then we have something supercool for you! We are very excited to present you HYDROP Smart. It is a nano-liquid that: 

  • eliminates wrinkles 
  • removes unpleasant odors
  • kills bacteria 
  • has an antistatic effect

How it works 

Hydrop Smart eliminates wrinkles by removing static electricity from the depth of fibers. 

Moreover it contains anti bacteria ingredients and manuka oil. It helps to kill bacteria. Another important feature of Hydrop Smart is the component that demolish rapic acid – the main reason of sweaty odor. 

Its stylish pocket-size package you can easily take it with you anywhere you go. Do not forget to take it with you to different trips and enjoy the perfect condition of your clothes without ironing!

It is Safe

Hydrop Smart consists of 93% water and 7% nano particles. This makes this innovative product 100% nontoxic and eco-friendly. Certificates are in the Gallery! 

Our team strongly believes that nano technology can make your life much easier and help you save a lot of time and efforts. 

What We Need & What You Get

Now all we need is your help to drive the product to the UK market. Our goal is to raise $5000 to cover the initial costs of our promotional campaign.

Our Perks are:____________________________________________________________________________

___________________________________________________________________________

The Impact

We want you not only to get an awesome product but help us start a promotional campaign.
By buying Hydrop Smart you help us achieve the target goal of $5000. 

Our internatioanl team is super passionate about nano technology and marketing and we really want to bring this product to the UK market. 


Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge is building brand awareness around Hydrop Smart and bringing the product to the market. 

Here, on the indiegogo platform, we meet awesome and forward thinking people like you! We would be incredibly happy if you give us your ideas/comments/critique. Feel free to tweet us @hydroplondon or email: hello@hydroplondon.com! #hydroplondon


Other Ways You Can Help

You can make a difference and support us and nano technology by buying Hydrop Smart via this platform. Or...

  • Donate directly (press a button "Contribute now" in the upper part of the page)
  • Share a link to Hydrop Smart campaign with your friends (help us to make a buzz) http://igg.me/at/hydroplondon
  • E-mail us your thoughts, opinions or any comments about the campaign. Help us be better! 

We really appreciate your time and efforts to have a look at Hydrop Smart campaigh and read this text. Thank you so much and have a Smart day! 

(And an unwrinkled and fresh shirt!) 

                                                    Hydrop Smart Team <3

story:
Other Ways You Can Help

  • Let your friends know about us and share the campaign on social media.
  • Please us the Indiegogo share tools! 

FAQ

  • When do I get my PERK? Unlike most campaigns where you wait months for your perk. We will be sending your perks right after the campaign closes and we receive your confirmed choice of colour. Those who back the project earlier in the campaign and get us their colour choice earlier will get the perk fastest.
  • How do I choose a colour? We will contact you when the campaign is over to confirm your choices.
  • I purchased multiple PERKS do I need to add the international shipping perk for each one? No you you do not. As long as you have added one international shipping perk.

story:
Short Summary

When I was a little girl, my mom had an incredible jewelry drawer with a pair of funky red sunglasses in it.  I remember pulling them out and playing with them almost daily.  Skip to years later.  After graduating from college, I landed in Los Angeles and started working in the fashion industry.  First in PR and then as a wholesale sales representative for accessories lines.  Several years ago, while visiting my mom, I found those funny red glasses from my childhood.  It was then that the idea to recreate this concept with a modern day twist, was born.  
I could see many accessories becoming multi-purpose and knew the marketplace was ready to receive such a unique product so I began to experiment!


It has been a year since I decided to launch myself fully into turning this idea into a brand.  In that time, I have focused my attention on product development (including filing trademarks and patents) and direct to consumer sales.  I wanted to see how people resonated with the product ' "You should go on shark tank" "They are genius" "It's been a while since I've seen something so creative" "These are dope" and "You are going to do very well with these" are phrases that I have heard over and over again.


The increasing sales figures and praise has kept me going - even through some tough moments.  I believe in the product, and so do my customers.  
I have come to a point where I would like to take the company to the next level.  It is a completely new way to wear sunglasses and I want to take this brand GLOBAL! 

What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for $10,000 from MYWILLOWS supporters, which will enable me to do the following:

The Tradeshow.  

There are a few tradeshows that I will be applying to in the next month.  They all take place in Januaray/February.  This is where boutique and department store buyers come to purchase clothing and accessories for Spring/Summer 2016. 

Being able to attend one of these shows would get the sunglasses in front of many buyers at one time.  It would allow me to take orders and have my product in stores around the US come March/April.  This will not only create brand awareness but a large order from a store such as Urban Outfitters could really put us on the map. 


Production. 

There are a few final details that I would like to add to MyWillows.  These pieces will brand the glasses and insure that we stand out.  I will meet with CAD drawers and mold casters Downtown Los Angeles in order to complete this project.  

If possible, I would like to get hard cases for the glasses (which have already been identified)  as well as branded sunglass wipes.  


WeeWillows. 

I would like to launch the WeWillows website and have the first collection up in the New Year.  Kids love MyWillows and they are always excited to try them on.  I believe a kids collection (especially for young girls that want their ears pierced but they are still too young) will be a huge hit since the sunglasses act as earrings as well.  



Everyone that donates will get a pair of MyWillows!  Depending on the amount of the donation, you will either get Feather MyWillows,  Silver chain,  Gold chain or a MyWillows Necklace.  




The perk is that they will be at a discount from what they are priced on our website and with the Holidays around the corner, they make the perfect gift! 

Donate a larger amount and get several pairs. Donate even more  and you get several MyWillows including a custom made pair that you can help design (if you wish) and have that style named after you. 

If we don't reach our entire goal (but we will because you guys are awesome!) your contribution would go towards attending a Tradeshow or alternatively rent space in a showroom for the LA Market.  The latter is a less expensive option but not as impactful.  Any additional funds would be allocated towards product development. 

Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing large quantities is my only foreseeable obstacle but I would figure that out very quickly. Los Angeles has a plethora of talent and the garment industry downtown is growing rapidly.  I have factors in place (factors act as gap financiers who will allow me to buy all of my materials once I have a purchase order) and am confident that I could work through this challenge with ease. 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't help by purchasing a pair of MyWillows, please spread the word!  Posting on your social media sites and telling all of your friends so that this campaign can spread, would be very much appreciated!
story_txt:
Short Summary



When I was a little girl, my mom had an incredible jewelry drawer with a pair of funky red sunglasses in it.  I remember pulling them out and playing with them almost daily.  Skip to years later.  After graduating from college, I landed in Los Angeles and started working in the fashion industry.  First in PR and then as a wholesale sales representative for accessories lines.  Several years ago, while visiting my mom, I found those funny red glasses from my childhood.  It was then that the idea to recreate this concept with a modern day twist, was born.  
I could see many accessories becoming multi-purpose and knew the marketplace was ready to receive such a unique product so I began to experiment!





It has been a year since I decided to launch myself fully into turning this idea into a brand.  In that time, I have focused my attention on product development (including filing trademarks and patents) and direct to consumer sales.  I wanted to see how people resonated with the product ' "You should go on shark tank" "They are genius" "It's been a while since I've seen something so creative" "These are dope" and "You are going to do very well with these" are phrases that I have heard over and over again.



The increasing sales figures and praise has kept me going - even through some tough moments.  I believe in the product, and so do my customers.  
I have come to a point where I would like to take the company to the next level.  It is a completely new way to wear sunglasses and I want to take this brand GLOBAL! 


What We Need & What You Get I am asking for $10,000 from MYWILLOWS supporters, which will enable me to do the following:
The Tradeshow.  
There are a few tradeshows that I will be applying to in the next month.  They all take place in Januaray/February.  This is where boutique and department store buyers come to purchase clothing and accessories for Spring/Summer 2016. 
Being able to attend one of these shows would get the sunglasses in front of many buyers at one time.  It would allow me to take orders and have my product in stores around the US come March/April.  This will not only create brand awareness but a large order from a store such as Urban Outfitters could really put us on the map. 


Production. 
There are a few final details that I would like to add to MyWillows.  These pieces will brand the glasses and insure that we stand out.  I will meet with CAD drawers and mold casters Downtown Los Angeles in order to complete this project.  
If possible, I would like to get hard cases for the glasses (which have already been identified)  as well as branded sunglass wipes.  



WeeWillows. 
I would like to launch the WeWillows website and have the first collection up in the New Year.  Kids love MyWillows and they are always excited to try them on.  I believe a kids collection (especially for young girls that want their ears pierced but they are still too young) will be a huge hit since the sunglasses act as earrings as well.  




Everyone that donates will get a pair of MyWillows!  Depending on the amount of the donation, you will either get Feather MyWillows,  Silver chain,  Gold chain or a MyWillows Necklace.  




The perk is that they will be at a discount from what they are priced on our website and with the Holidays around the corner, they make the perfect gift! 
Donate a larger amount and get several pairs. Donate even more  and you get several MyWillows including a custom made pair that you can help design (if you wish) and have that style named after you. 
If we don't reach our entire goal (but we will because you guys are awesome!) your contribution would go towards attending a Tradeshow or alternatively rent space in a showroom for the LA Market.  The latter is a less expensive option but not as impactful.  Any additional funds would be allocated towards product development. 

    Risks & Challenges
Manufacturing large quantities is my only foreseeable obstacle but I would figure that out very quickly. Los Angeles has a plethora of talent and the garment industry downtown is growing rapidly.  I have factors in place (factors act as gap financiers who will allow me to buy all of my materials once I have a purchase order) and am confident that I could work through this challenge with ease. 


Other Ways You Can Help


If you can't help by purchasing a pair of MyWillows, please spread the word!  Posting on your social media sites and telling all of your friends so that this campaign can spread, would be very much appreciated!

story:
Short Summary

They say the best way to live a good life is to merge things you like to do with what you are good at. We love golf and we know fashion.

This crowdfunding has been put together to raise funds for the expansion and development of male AND female golf apparel on MyGolfShirts.com, the online store that provides the most excellent quality and amazing fitting golf apparel for every type of golfer. 

I have been working in the apparel industry for over 38 years, in design, production and quality. I have also worked with many great amateur golfers and in the process I have learned how important the clothing is to a good game. 

During my time in the apparel industry I have learned how much the quality of a good golfing shirt can affect the improvement of a golfer's game, and that is why I came up with MyGolfShirts.com.

In passing my passion for golf to my children, I have been able to become even closer to them while also continuing to challenge them to excel at a precision level sport. This has been a catalyst to bridge the years spent away from home such that my entire family is behind this effort.

Our mission is to develop the brand and the style of golf apparel that will look good, feel good but also help the golfer to play well.


What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking a total of $30,000 in funding. The funding will be used to produce and bring to market a women's line of golf apparel. Additionally the funds would enhance our men's styles and will include the introduction of long sleeve, short sleeve, men's and women's varieties.

We have developed the following perks, incentives, rewards.. whatever you want to call giving you something for giving us something.

$25: For supporting our campaign you will receive one (1) Golf Shirt plus one (1) Golf Hat from our special limited edition collection.

$50: For supporting our campaign you will receive two (2) Golf Shirts of your choice plus two (2) Golf Hats of matching color from our special limited edition collection.

$100: For supporting our campaign you will receive four (4) Golf Shirts of your choice plus four (4) Golf Hats of matching colors.

$150: For supporting our campaign you will receive eight (8) Golf Shirts of your choice plus eight (8) Golf Hats of matching colors.

$500: For supporting our campaign you will receive twenty-four (24) Golf Shirts of your choice plus twenty-four (24) Golf Hats of matching colors. In this reward we will ship you two (2) Golf Shirts and two (2) Golf Hats of matching color each month for one (1) year.

$1000: For supporting our campaign you will receive sixty (60) Golf Shirts of your choice plus sixty (60) Golf Hats of matching colors. In this reward we will ship you one (1) Golf Shirt and one (1) Golf Hat of matching color each month for five (5) years.

If we do not reach our goal we will utilize what funds we are able to raise to continue the effort to bring to market the above plan. We will continue to be lean and agile as needed to ready our delivery.

The Impact

The mission at MyGolfShirts.com is to develop the brand and the style of golf apparel that will look good, feel good but also help the golfer to play well. All golf apparels are specifically designed for the activity. A golf game may take hours, and each player has to walk through the course quite often. In such situation, golf shirts play major role in determining whether or not you are always in perfect comfort to do every swing without distraction from any physical discomfort. MyGolfShirts.com wants to lead the industry in this important endevour.

MyGolfShirts began the business based on an understanding that golf apparels should be designed to serve two important purposes. First, golf shirts should offer maximum flexibility to allow every player’s possible movement required for the game. Second, a shirt is always an inseparable part of fashion a statement, so it has to be as stylish as it can be without affecting the quality of your swings. Therefore, good golf shirts allow you to perform at your full potential without sacrificing the importance of comfort and fashion.

MyGolfShirts.com brings you a standard fit to make sure you get enough flexibility and enough room for all the swings instead of the more restricting slim fit design. All shirts provided are made from lightweight material offering breathability as well as effective sweat absorption, which are important when you are exposed under hot weather continuously during the game. However they also design certain types of golf shirts to keep you warm during cooler weather. The dedicated staff at MyGolfShirts.com are continuously working with experienced professional golfers to get a better understanding of the ultimate golf shirts for all, and combine it with French­designing expertise to make a perfect blend between sport, comfort, and style.

Risks & Challenges

With over 38 years in the apparel industry I learned how to overcome many obstacles in design and production.

I have worked with over 32 garment factories in the U.S. and abroad. I have trained sewing operators and set up in-line quality systems which led to receiving recognition from many major retailers and manufacturers for delivering quality products.

My passion for golf started after being invited to play golf over 12 years ago. I developed a love of the game and also enjoyed the opportunities that golf presented to meet interesting people. I passed this love of golf to my children as they grew into golfing enthusiasts themselves. In doing this, I noticed that the apparel they wore during practice and tournaments was not comfortable and it affected their game performance negatively.

I started to design and manufacture shirts for my children to play golf with the idea that if they looked good, felt good then they would play well. This ideal was a proven success.

Now it is time for me to take all of my experience and expertise and put it into my own business so I can share the best quality, best fitting and best performing golf attire with other golf enthusiasts.

I understand all of the risks and challenges of running my own business and of working in the garment industry and I will make sure that I meet all of the challenges head on and that I am prepared for all of the risks that come with business.

However, I believe that merging life experience with a passionate hobby is the best path to the good life.

The biggest risk at this point is being able to fund the women's line of golf apparel. Similarly, we think that if we do not get your support though sales and crowdfunding. It will take us longer to produce a broader apparel offering.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but maybe you can still help us.

Please forward to a friend. 

Like our facebook.com/mygolfshirts page

Follow us on twitter.com/mygolfshirts

or on intagram.com/mygolfshirts

http://www.mygolfshirts.com

story:
About Royal Dyeness & Our Campaign

Founded in January 2015, Royal Dyeness is a business providing handmade and hand dyed clothing and accessories for women. This is truly a passion project driven by me, Malorie Melson. I began with one crop top pattern and through trial and error I have been able to add kimonos, headbands and this Spring jumpsuits and dresses. The last year has been a whirlwind but has essentially been an all around success. To view the shop click here.

This campaign was created to help pay for vendor fees and material costs in order to vend at Euphoria Festival 2016. If our goal is achieved, it will change the course of Royal Dyeness and propel us leaps and bounds towards a profitable and fulfilling future. The exposure alone that will come with participating in the festival will provide a stable platform on which to grow. If you want to learn more about Euphoria Fest check out their website here.

What We Need & What You Get

Let me break it down for you:

  • The cost to vend at the festival is $1500. I am hoping to raise enough for the vendor fee plus another $200 for legal and insurance purposes. In addition I'll need another $500 that will pay for bulk orders of fabric (silk, rayon lawn and cotton spandex) and dye. Total I am hoping to raise $2200.
  • There are tons of perks at different dollar amounts for you to choose from. All perks and gifts will be sent as soon as the campaign has ended.
  • If my goal has not been reached by the end of the campaign I plan to use the money to further grow my business.
  • Also, keep in mind that if I reach my goal I plan to donate 15% of the sales made from Euphoria Fest to Girls Empowerment Network of Austin.  Check out their website here.  
The Impact

Just wanted to let y'all know how your investment will truly benefit a small local business.

  • After a year of applying to be a vendor at music festivals and denial after denial, I have finally reached the point in by business where I am not only being accepted to vend but capable of providing the inventory and preparation it takes to have a weekend popup shop. Your contribution will help put my brand in front of thousands people. That amount of exposure will boost my small online, business into a thriving and empowered store.
  • Your contribution will also go toward supporting and sustaining a small, American made business. With the rise in fast fashion and sweatshop labor, much of the clothing we wear everyday has a hidden truth that many times goes unseen. You can guarantee that every Royal Dyeness garment will be made by my own two hands. 

Risks & Challenges

Since you are considering investing in my business, I want to be completely transparent.
Being a one women show, creating enough inventory to have a successful shop will not prove to be an easy task. Nonetheless, I have the education, experience and practice to make enough inventory to more than just succeed, but to thrive. After all, every piece was designed by me for you! I know the in's and out's of every garment like the back of my hand.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't provide a financial contribution but still want to help, here are some was to do it:

  • Share this campaign on your social media accounts! It will really help get the word out about Royal Dyeness
  • Follow me on social media! @royaldyeness on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter

story:
Hoodies 4 Hereos

Hi! My name is James Butler. I'm 19 and to say the least I've had a very interesting upbringing. From foster care to Los Angeles, I've been through a lot - like most of us! I want to use Hoodie4Heroes as a way for people to give back while still being fashionable. Two things I love is giving back an fashion so why not combine the two! 

Every hoodie is going to have a message behind the design and each design a portion of ever hoodie sold will go towards a different cause. It'll be a fun way to pay it froward while still rocking some cute loooooooks! 

Every penny helps and I think that we as a family can make this huge! If everyone that watches my videos donated just $1 we would surpass our goal and be able to do some much more! The money we raise will go towards manufacturing, distribution, prototype production, and more. It's going to take a team of people to make this come alive but once it's living - prepare to be shooketh! 

 

Donation Perks: 

I believe that you helping me bring a project I'm passion about to life by donating deserves recognition so, donation prizes!!! Everyone that donates $1 or more will get something based on their donation amount. Prizes listed below. 

$1 - follow from me on all your social media platforms

$5 - shoutout in one of my video

$10 - 10 minute phone call w/ me! 

$25 - 20 Minute FaceTime call w/ me! 

$50 - one signed sweatshirt! 

$100 - FREE signed sweatshirt before anyone else gets them and a FaceTime call with me (no time limit)

$100+ - we will discuss what you want as a prize! FREE Sweatshirt

story:
Short Summary

In 2015 I closed my daycare doors after 30 years to venture out into the office world.  I set out to change my wardrobe from in-home daycare owner to office professional.  I met road blocks trying to find quality plus-size professional slacks and tops at an affordable price.  It was hard shopping and not finding clothes that made me feel good about myself.  It took a toll on my self-esteem.  I decided to address this issue and pursue opening a business geared for plus-size clothing focusing on office attire.  

My youngest daughter, a fashion merchandiser, has agreed to be my buyer so I have a professional helping me with the product.  

What We Need & What You Get

   We need to license, register and trademark the business.  The funding will also go to simple office supplies, shipping material and initial product.  

The Impact

If you know a plus-size or are one yourself, you understand the struggle trying to find clothes that fit well and look good and the toll it takes on your self-esteem.  I want to make a difference for others.  I want to see others feel confident about themselves and stay within their budget. 

Risks & Challenges

There are a lot of risks and challenges starting a business like this.  I have a strong support system backing me up.  Starting with my daughter who is in the fashion industry.  She has been and will be a valuable asset to the success of this business.  I have a business adviser guiding me along the way.  He has 60 years of successful business experience.  


Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate any support you can give.  A $5 donation goes a long way.  I also understand that sometimes $5 is not doable.  I ask that you share my story and encourage others to give.

story:
We create high-tech sportswear that lasts longer than normal fitness apparel. We use strong fabric that is well crafted through the use of technical stitching, and quality manufacturing, thus creating a garment built for purpose.  Through creating products that are durable, functional, multipurpose (and fashionable!), we believe we can change your relationship with the garments you wear. Our clothes are made to grow with you through your active lifestyle, leaving behind consumerist fast-fashion for a more powerful long-lasting approach. We care about our environment and want to support it instead of destroying it.

By investing in our ideas and making League Collective clothing part of your everyday life, you have the potential to change consumerism as we know it, build meaning around the products you own, and protect the environment you love with quality garments that last a lifetime.

We are League Collective.

Forever searching for revolutionary ideas in everyday life to create exceptional clothing with innovative design, durability and support, not only for ourselves, but for the environment we live in. Join our movement

Watch the full action packed video here!:

 

With your funding we hope to raise £12,000 to pay for the final step which is production and shipping of the clothes. In addition, we’ll be able to put even more weight behind our continued research into more sustainable ways to manufacture the League Collective range.

We’re excited to be selling our products right here on this site. To celebrate our launch, ALL LEAGUE COLLECTIVE ITEMS ARE 30% OFF until the end of this campaign!

If our initial target is not reached, we will collect all donations made to create one item from our line of clothing. This will be chosen from the most backed item.

Check out the perks displayed. We will be adding a brand new perk EVERY week for the next month! Don't like what you see? Then re-visit in a few days for more exciting options we have to offer!

 

Click the photo below and find out how to claim your FREE League Collective apparel!

Watch our short Documentary about the production process and the factory where we are making the clothes below! Or read more about it on our Blog :

 
Check out our newest perk!:

A weeks worth of Evermore nutrition supplements, designed to help you get the most out of your daily life. "Our mission is to revolutionise the nutrition space. We develop lines of personalised meals and nutrition, starting with a bespoke natural supplements subscription. Our natural shots and supplements are tailored to you. We use data and machine learning to create your unique nutritional fingerprint. Evermore is here to get more out of your day."

 

Introducing Two Dots Jewellery - unique, elegant, silver pieces, beautifully handcrafted in Sri Lanka. The simplicity of the designs is inspired by the rich culture and tropical surroundings of the Sri Lankan lifestyle, all brought to life by our talented silversmiths.... Click the Icon below to receive your 10% discount!
 
 
Or Click here to view this amazing, once in a lifetime chance in Sri Lanka...:
 

Or why not grab yourself some Hot Yoga classes with these guys?:

 

Today's fashion world is filled with disposable fashion. An investment in LC may seem like a small step for a small startup, but it will be the beginning of something far bigger. We're on a mission to change the way we interact with clothing, to bring sustainability to what we do and to protect the world we live in. Our team lives and breathes active living, so every garment we create has these qualities rooted in its threads.

We’ve spent the last 2 years researching the best ways to produce League Collective clothes to make them a reality. Now we’re here, we’re confident that we’re positioned to make a real change in the world. We’re taking sports apparel in a whole new direction, and there are a lot of different people we are dependant on to make this really work. We want you to be part of our journey, and with your support we can make a difference.

To be a part of that journey, we need your help so that we can develop and fine-tune these garments to ensure we’re leading the way to a sustainable future at the heart of sports apparel. One stitch at a time.

Something in the fashion industry needs to change. Around 70% of all waste clothing goes into landfill. Production lines are overproducing, with the fast fashion lifestyle contributing to people over consuming and disposing at an ever increasing rate.

Change begins with an awareness of the problem. League Collective are here to cultivate awareness 

Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can still help by sharing our message with your friends. The more people we get on this wave the better!

We are here to make a difference. Our time is now!

Thank you for help,

League Collective
story_txt:
We create high-tech sportswear that lasts longer than normal fitness apparel. We use strong fabric that is well crafted through the use of technical stitching, and quality manufacturing, thus creating a garment built for purpose.  Through creating products that are durable, functional, multipurpose (and fashionable!), we believe we can change your relationship with the garments you wear. Our clothes are made to grow with you through your active lifestyle, leaving behind consumerist fast-fashion for a more powerful long-lasting approach. We care about our environment and want to support it instead of destroying it.
By investing in our ideas and making League Collective clothing part of your everyday life, you have the potential to change consumerism as we know it, build meaning around the products you own, and protect the environment you love with quality garments that last a lifetime.
We are League Collective.
Forever searching for revolutionary ideas in everyday life to create exceptional clothing with innovative design, durability and support, not only for ourselves, but for the environment we live in. Join our movement
Watch the full action packed video here!:

 
With your funding we hope to raise £12,000 to pay for the final step which is production and shipping of the clothes. In addition, we’ll be able to put even more weight behind our continued research into more sustainable ways to manufacture the League Collective range.
We’re excited to be selling our products right here on this site. To celebrate our launch, ALL LEAGUE COLLECTIVE ITEMS ARE 30% OFF until the end of this campaign!
If our initial target is not reached, we will collect all donations made to create one item from our line of clothing. This will be chosen from the most backed item.

story:
Our site :

http://fashtag.club

Short Summary

Today there are so many different jobs around the world. But it is undeniable that the number of people is bigger. The Fashtag will create a special service, which will provide a huge number of workplaces to a lot of people around the world. People will have a chance not only to earn some extra money (from 1000$ in one month) but also to unite their main job with the Fashtag’s one. As you may understand the timetable will be really flexible.

 

The Impact

Just imagine you are a user of Fashtag and you are absolutely unsatisfied with your style or may be body shapes. You can easily choose one of 3 programs, which will help you to find the way out from your problem quite fast. Contemporary experts will help you to create a day 24/7 schedule, which you will follow and make a step by step to beautiful and healthy future. Also, special fitness exercises will be held by professional coaches, who will concentrate their attention,especially on your body behavior. Some people don’t want to change anything in their bodies, however, they have a big problem with their “taste” in other words, they don’t know what fashionable is.  Contemporary fashion experts will help you to be aware of all new collections, brands,and styles.

What can we promice? 

 Moreover, a special internal connection will be added. Vide calls will allow people to communicate with their coaches and experts in the area of modern fashion. Also, every user will have a chance to communicate with each other using either typing or voice messages. We will create people more than unique, we will create them perfect…

About us 

Оur story 

The 21st century is a period of modern technology, scientific discoveries,and absolutely spectacular fashion. Nowadays, we have already had really beneficial social networks thanks to which we can independently communicate with each other around the world mostly for free. Also, we have totally innovative apps, which are believed to be the best resources to show our life in all it beautiful and breathtaking colors. However, what application do we have to be more aware,about contemporary fashion? Exactly this question has started to be the hugest inspiration for us to create the world first professional fashion network. Thanks to which a lot of people worldwide will have an opportunity to open not only modern styles and find out about new collections of their favorite brands, but also will have a chance to change themselves cardinally in all aspects.

Programs:

 

  • Body program -  this program will include a lot of facilities, which will improve your body and your lifestyle. As you can know if you want to look good, your body shapes  also have to be great or even perfect.  After the appearance of Fashatag   you will have a chance to develop your body. Moreover, our professional coaches will help you as much as they can. Fashtag is an international company that's why people around the world don't need to worry about that language which will be used during training

 

  • Fashion program - will provide people global awareness of new trends, new collections, and contemporary styles. Well-qualified fashion consultants will tell you about all these, also they will create new styles for you, and will help you to understand how to be a really fashionable person. 

 

  • Behavioral program - Modern Fashion is not only about clothes and styles, but also about right and worthly behavior. Our expert will do everything to make your behavior proper to the royal fashion. 

 

  • FRM program - This program will suit to people who want to connect their future life with the  world of fashion. Our project will provide people a lot of facilities for people who want EVERYTHING in one program. This is the best program for people who want  change or improve something in their body, style, and behavior. Moreover, our department of agents will choose fully ready members of this program and provide them work  as a professional model in magazines, brands, and videos. 
 
  • Design program - An ideal program for people who want to create their own brands and contemporary, stylish and fabulous clothes. Modern designers will help you to recognize that everyone can be a creator, using your imagination and creativity. A lot of fashion advice, recommendations and knowledge, which will assist you in following your dream of creating something spectacular. 

Price list of our programs:

  1. Body program - 100$ - 3 online lessons per week. 
  2. Fashion program - 100$ - 3 online lessons per week. 
  3. Behavior program - 50$ - 3 online lessons per week.
  4.  ONE lesson from 1 hour to 1.30

You can choose 2 programs as 1 only for 180$

Or 3 programs as 1 for 270$

5. FRM program - 400$ per 9 days (Body program,Fashion program,Behavior program, and work with agents). About 9-10 hours per week. ONLY FOR PEOPLE, WHO WANT TO WORK AS MODELS.

6. Design program - 100$ per 3 online lessons during week.

 

 

How can you invest in our project ?

story:
Our magnetic suspender belts come in all sizes!

The magnetic suspender belt has been featured in a number of national and regional media. 


By supporting this project and investing in the business (choose one or more perks on the right side of the screen) you will help the exciting and innovative Ella Vine lingerie brand off the ground! 

2% of all funds raised via crowdfunding will be donated by Ella to Women’s Aid charity. Let’s get pledging!


Recommendations: 

Jack Levene, former Head of Lingerie at Marks & Spencer UK: ‘’The magnetic fastening on this Suspender Belt will be a great boon to both the user and to their partners. This is the first innovation in years, it speeds up production and makes it far easier for the user when attaching or removing from Stockings’’.

The magnetic suspender belt excited the art, performer and model communities.

Helen Kitajewski, Finalist of Miss British Curve 2016 and Miss Pembrokeshire Curve 2016:‘’This product is unique and innovative - I can't wait to get my hands on the product itself! This new suspender belt also looks fabulous, in a range of sexy colours’’.

Khandie Khisses, one of UK’s top 20 burlesque performers: ‘’In burlesque you are always looking for new and novel ways to help with the tease of your performance, this marvel from Ella Vine lingerie has provided an ingenious way to help us. In our day to day stocking wearing, who doesn’t love a garment that makes it easier to be a sassy hosiery wearer?!’’

Lady Blue Phoenix, a burlesque dancer: ‘’I can't wait for it to come out! I and my colleagues think that this will change the burlesque world as we won't have to worry about the damage to our tights from the metal or plastic hooks that are used in the current suspenders. It will open up a door to wear different stockings and we will know they are more secure and will stay in place’’.


Why did we go magnetic?

For the past century women all over the world have had to put up with the hideous way a suspender belt attaches to stockings – it was difficult, time-consuming, not comfortable and worse – not always worked. We too, experienced stockings being detached from the suspender belt and the embarrassment of having them rolled down right to the ankles while trying to hide from the onlookers.

We changed that. We developed a suspender belt which attaches to the stockings – any type of stockings - via magnetic clip. It is easy, fast, safe and comfortable – we tried it, it takes just one second to attach a clip to the stockings. Long will be gone times when women were trying for 10 minutes to attach stockings to the suspender, bending and twisting their back, arms, hips in hideous ways, sweating with their hair dangling all over their face, rushing to get these two pieces attached together, and often completely resigning from this task! It wasn’t not only not practical but also it didn’t look the best during a hot date! It takes just a few seconds to attach our magnetic suspender belt to the stockings and be ready to go. It couldn’t be simpler.


Our magnetic suspender belt, which is patent pending, will revolutionise the lingerie industry – it is developed by women for women. Join our campaign to be a part of this marvellous movement - when women say ‘’no’’ to the uncomfortable, hideous ways the lingerie industry tell us how to wear our suspenders and where women take this into their own hands. The product’s inventor, Ella, was struggling for years with the way her medical stockings had to be attached to a suspender belt – to the point that she has given up altogether. But then a moment of eureka, of empowerment came – Ella talked to her friends and other women and all screamed in excitement on the thought that the process of attaching the stockings to a suspender belt can be made so simple.

And here we go, Ella developed the innovative product over the course of a year, making many prototypes, finally inventing the NeoMagTriple™ technology, trying it on in various situations, even dancing a can-can in this suspender belt – all to ensure that modern women will have modern lingerie pieces that will meet all their needs – including the need to put on their lingerie quickly and the need to feel comfortable.


It is more than a brand – it is an extraordinary movement of women’s empowerment!

Join this fantastic movement of women empowerment, where women say no to the uncomfortable products developed by lingerie giants and where they develop and support the products that will work for them. Pre-order this wonderful suspender belt now to receive it 3 months after this campaign will end! By participating you will help Ella manufacture this product and market it to make it mainstream.

Don’t wait, we have only 7 weeks to make this a reality, to make a history – women revolutionising the lingerie their wear, women owning the way they wear it.

Own it now! Buy it here:  click on your chosen pledge or pledges on the right hand side of the screen!

What we will do with the money raised

We will be able to produce the magnetic suspender belts in various types, shapes, colours and sizes; we will also be able to set up an e-shop and start selling our gorgeous products to the world! Apart from the fabulous magnetic suspender belts we will be selling all kinds of gorgeous luxury lingerie products from knickers to bras, from corsets to camis and everything in between! And make no mistake, the magnetic suspender belt is not the only innovative – first of this type - lingerie product that Ella will produce - she already has her sight on more innovative products.


Here is a breakdown of what we will do with the money if we will reach our £17,500 target:

£12,000 – the cost of making and shipping the pre-ordered magnetic suspender belts to our crowdfunders; this includes the 5% crowdfunding fee, 3% paypal fees, 2% donation to Women’s Aid, tax, labels, packaging, etc.

we will be able to purchase £4,000 worth of stock, materials and produce the first product range,

another £2,000 we will enable us to create a stunning and easy to navigate website

£1,000 for PR & marketing of the products and the brand to let people know about us after the crowdfunding campaign will end and to make the magnetic suspender belt mainstream.  

£1,000 for research and development so we will be able to provide women with more innovative and comfortable products that will suit their lifestyle and provide solutions to common issues with lingerie.

Support our innovative start up and at the same time – go on - get yourself a nice surprise! Choose a perk or two from the right hand side - there is something for everyone, men and women alike!

Enjoy investing in us and have fun! :-)

story:
The Life E-Bracelet Pitch

Did you know?

  • Heart disease is the leading cause of death for people of most ethnicities in the United States, including African Americans, Hispanics, and whites.
  • For American Indians or Alaska Natives and Asians or Pacific Islanders, heart disease is second only to cancer.
  • A heart attack, also called a myocardial infarction, happens because of decreased blood supply to your heart's muscle. Sudden cardiac arrest (SCA) occurs when your heart goes into a dangerous heart rhythm and suddenly stops working.
  • Heart attack is rarely fatal, but SCA is fatal in 95 percent of cases. Nearly half of all African-American adults have some form of cardiovascular disease, 48 percent of women and 46 percent of men.
  • Heart disease is the No. 1 cause of death in the world and the leading cause of death in the United States, killing over 375,000 Americans a year. About 5.7 million adults in the United States have heart failure. One in 9 deaths in 2009 included heart failure as contributing cause. About half of people who develop heart failure die within 5 years of diagnosis.
  • Heart failure costs the nation an estimated $30.7 billion each year. Heart disease is the No. 1 killer of women, and is more deadly than all forms of cancer combined. While 1 in 31 American women dies from breast cancer each year, 1 in 3 dies of heart disease.

  • Heart disease causes 1 in 3 women's deaths each year, killing approximately one woman every minute.

With this facts, you would agree with me that a gadget (super-handy) that would be able to keep us informed at all times of our current status in terms of blood readings and rating will be invaluable.

 

What is the Life E-Bracelet?

The Life-E Bracelet provides a wristband for monitoring vital signs to help alert users to a risk of an impending heart attack. The bracelet/wristband includes a digital display monitor and various sensors to monitor blood pressure, pulse, stress, and other heart related readings. One key feature of this design is the ability for the band to light up in various colors to indicate different levels of heart rate/blood pressure. The band illuminates in red, yellow, green, and blue in order to alert it’s user as to what they should do. The band is able to notify the user when their blood pressure is getting to a dangerous level and/or they are at risk of a heart attack. The device also includes a wireless notification system to alert family or emergency contacts of an urgent situation. The wristband is adjustable in size to accommodate different individuals.

Does it really work?

Listed below are few purposes and benefits of having the Life E-Bracelet;

  • Provides a health monitoring bracelet designed to help prevent heart attacks and assist users in reducing stress.
  • Monitors vital signs, including heart rate and blood pressure, and alerts users when nearing dangerous levels.
  • Helps individuals become more aware of their diet, health, and lifestyle choices.
  • Prompts users to take action to lower blood pressure and stress in order to prevent a heart attack or stroke.
  • Alerts emergency personnel on behalf of the user in the event of a heart attack, stroke, or dangerously high blood pressure.

Why we all need the Life E-Bracelet

As human beings, we are all at risk of a heart attack, such as seniors, individuals with high blood pressure, and those who have previously had a heart attack or heart surgery, have limited options for monitoring their vitals on a daily basis. Without a method for monitoring blood pressure, stress, and heart rate, we may come dangerously close to having a heart attack. Stress tests are administered by doctors, however, this does not allow the individual to monitor their own vital signs throughout the day and while sleeping. It also leaves the individual at risk for having a heart attack without a way to alert emergency services.

 

Team Behind The Life E-Bracelet

We are VK3 Innovations. We specialize in bringing life changing products and innovations to the market in a bid to improve, safe-guard, and enhance our health and mental wellbeing. We are a Social Business founded by Socialpreneur, Social & Emotional Fitness Coach Jemiah Battle. The Life-E Bracelet was spawned out of Jemiah’s personal story of loss of numerous loved ones and friends from undetected heart attacks stemming from high blood pressure, silent strokes, and stress. His sole goal of the product is to focus primarily on preventing heart attacks by raising the awareness of high blood pressure and stress.

Why We Need You To Be Part Of This

The Life E-Bracelet is at it’s start-up stages. We currently seek funds for licensing, marketing, distributing, and other operational expenses.

These are expenses your funds will help us cover;

Cost of revenue. It consists of product costs, including costs of contract manufacturers for production, shipping and handling costs, warranty replacement costs, packaging costs, fulfillment costs, manufacturing and tooling equipment depreciation, warehousing costs, excess and obsolete inventory write-downs, and certain allocated costs related to management, facilities, and personnel-related expenses and other expenses associated with supply chain logistics.

  • Personnel-related expenses include salaries, bonuses, benefits, and stock-based compensation.
  • Research and development. These expenses are related to developing the Life-E Bracelet and any products and services that stem from it (in ex: fitness apps, etc.). These expenses consist primarily of personnel-related expenses, consulting and contractor expenses, tooling and prototype materials, and allocated overhead costs.
  • Sales and marketing. These expenses consist primarily of advertising and marketing promotions of the Life-E products and services and personnel-related expenses, as well as sales incentives, trade show and event costs, sponsorship costs, consulting and contractor expenses, travel, Point-of-Purchase display expenses and related amortization, and allocated overhead costs.

General and administrative. These expenses consist of personnel-related expenses for Life-E finance, legal, human resources, and administrative personnel, as well as the costs of professional services, any allocated overhead, information technology, and other administrative expenses.

With your support and funding, not only would we have enough funds to cover our expenses and produce this life-changing product, but also, save lots of lives (including our loved ones) by making it possible to easily read our blood and stress ratings saving us from heart attacks, stress, and possibly death.

Know us more by contacting the founder himself at JBattle@VK3Innovations.com

Don’t forget to like and share our campaign with your network so more people can see and donate as you just did. Also sign up for our newsletter so you can get update and news on our product launch, latest stories, services, and more history-making products.

Thank you for supporting us, sharing our page, and funding us. We appreciate you!
story_txt:
The Life E-Bracelet PitchDid you know?
Heart disease is the leading cause of death for people of most ethnicities in the United States, including African Americans, Hispanics, and whites. 
For American Indians or Alaska Natives and Asians or Pacific Islanders, heart disease is second only to cancer. 
A heart attack, also called a myocardial infarction, happens because of decreased blood supply to your heart's muscle. Sudden cardiac arrest (SCA) occurs when your heart goes into a dangerous heart rhythm and suddenly stops working. 
Heart attack is rarely fatal, but SCA is fatal in 95 percent of cases. Nearly half of all African-American adults have some form of cardiovascular disease, 48 percent of women and 46 percent of men. 
Heart disease is the No. 1 cause of death in the world and the leading cause of death in the United States, killing over 375,000 Americans a year. About 5.7 million adults in the United States have heart failure. One in 9 deaths in 2009 included heart failure as contributing cause. About half of people who develop heart failure die within 5 years of diagnosis.
Heart failure costs the nation an estimated $30.7 billion each year. Heart disease is the No. 1 killer of women, and is more deadly than all forms of cancer combined. While 1 in 31 American women dies from breast cancer each year, 1 in 3 dies of heart disease.
Heart disease causes 1 in 3 women's deaths each year, killing approximately one woman every minute.With this facts, you would agree with me that a gadget (super-handy) that would be able to keep us informed at all times of our current status in terms of blood readings and rating will be invaluable. What is the Life E-Bracelet?The Life-E Bracelet provides a wristband for monitoring vital signs to help alert users to a risk of an impending heart attack. The bracelet/wristband includes a digital display monitor and various sensors to monitor blood pressure, pulse, stress, and other heart related readings. One key feature of this design is the ability for the band to light up in various colors to indicate different levels of heart rate/blood pressure. The band illuminates in red, yellow, green, and blue in order to alert it’s user as to what they should do. The band is able to notify the user when their blood pressure is getting to a dangerous level and/or they are at risk of a heart attack. The device also includes a wireless notification system to alert family or emergency contacts of an urgent situation. The wristband is adjustable in size to accommodate different individuals.Does it really work?Listed below are few purposes and benefits of having the Life E-Bracelet;
Provides a health monitoring bracelet designed to help prevent heart attacks and assist users in reducing stress.
Monitors vital signs, including heart rate and blood pressure, and alerts users when nearing dangerous levels.
Helps individuals become more aware of their diet, health, and lifestyle choices.
Prompts users to take action to lower blood pressure and stress in order to prevent a heart attack or stroke.
Alerts emergency personnel on behalf of the user in the event of a heart attack, stroke, or dangerously high blood pressure.
Why we all need the Life E-BraceletAs human beings, we are all at risk of a heart attack, such as seniors, individuals with high blood pressure, and those who have previously had a heart attack or heart surgery, have limited options for monitoring their vitals on a daily basis. Without a method for monitoring blood pressure, stress, and heart rate, we may come dangerously close to having a heart attack. Stress tests are administered by doctors, however, this does not allow the individual to monitor their own vital signs throughout the day and while sleeping. It also leaves the individual at risk for having a heart attack without a way to alert emergency services. Team Behind The Life E-BraceletWe are VK3 Innovations. We specialize in bringing life changing products and innovations to the market in a bid to improve, safe-guard, and enhance our health and mental wellbeing. We are a Social Business founded by Socialpreneur, Social & Emotional Fitness Coach Jemiah Battle. The Life-E Bracelet was spawned out of Jemiah’s personal story of loss of numerous loved ones and friends from undetected heart attacks stemming from high blood pressure, silent strokes, and stress. His sole goal of the product is to focus primarily on preventing heart attacks by raising the awareness of high blood pressure and stress.Why We Need You To Be Part Of ThisThe Life E-Bracelet is at it’s start-up stages. We currently seek funds for licensing, marketing, distributing, and other operational expenses.These are expenses your funds will help us cover;Cost of revenue. It consists of product costs, including costs of contract manufacturers for production, shipping and handling costs, warranty replacement costs, packaging costs, fulfillment costs, manufacturing and tooling equipment depreciation, warehousing costs, excess and obsolete inventory write-downs, and certain allocated costs related to management, facilities, and personnel-related expenses and other expenses associated with supply chain logistics.
Personnel-related expenses include salaries, bonuses, benefits, and stock-based compensation.

Research and development. These expenses are related to developing the Life-E Bracelet and any products and services that stem from it (in ex: fitness apps, etc.). These expenses consist primarily of personnel-related expenses, consulting and contractor expenses, tooling and prototype materials, and allocated overhead costs.

Sales and marketing. These expenses consist primarily of advertising and marketing promotions of the Life-E products and services and personnel-related expenses, as well as sales incentives, trade show and event costs, sponsorship costs, consulting and contractor expenses, travel, Point-of-Purchase display expenses and related amortization, and allocated overhead costs.
General and administrative. These expenses consist of personnel-related expenses for Life-E finance, legal, human resources, and administrative personnel, as well as the costs of professional services, any allocated overhead, information technology, and other administrative expenses.With your support and funding, not only would we have enough funds to cover our expenses and produce this life-changing product, but also, save lots of lives (including our loved ones) by making it possible to easily read our blood and stress ratings saving us from heart attacks, stress, and possibly death.Know us more by contacting the founder himself at JBattle@VK3Innovations.comDon’t forget to like and share our campaign with your network so more people can see and donate as you just did. We appreciate you!

story:
Why Lineage?

Since 2014, Lineage has been one of the leaders in the curvy-fit athletic apparel industry. We believe in vibrant, colorful activewear that is also ethical, sustainable, and inclusive. Our unique fit was developed using concepts learned in Broadway costuming. No camel toe, no muffin top! The name Lineage stems from the concept in both sewing and yoga of knowledge being handed down orally from teacher to student.

Our leggings have been featured all over the place, most recently in Yoga Journal. Check out our Press page!

What We Need & What You Get

Our customers have been asking for booty shorts for AGES! (These are shorter that our regular Peacock Shorties.) We've finally developed and tested a fit that we love! Our goal is to produce 14 prints, in sizes small-4X. Our production costs for this are estimated to be $5000.

New Leggings- Our goal is to release 18 new prints, in sizes small-5X. Our production costs for this are estimated to be $27,000.

Both shorts and leggings will be built using lightweight, "squat proof" poly spandex. Our fabric is printed on both sides to ensure that nothing is hanging out in downward dog. This fabric is moisture wicking, and ideal for high impact activities that require a second skin fit. 

Size Chart- Lengths are listed unstretched. When worn, they will stretch.

What do you get out of this? First crack at our new gear, at sale prices. This year's perks are all priced lower than last year! Our limited edition Flirty Mermaid perk won't be available anywhere else. And FREE worldwide shipping on all perks over $125, same as our store. 

The Impact

Lineage is a self-funded company.  Our biggest issue is keeping up with demand! Crowdfunding campaigns help us stay ahead of demand, release new prints and products, and help us keep classic designs in stock. In addition to last year's successful Indiegogo campaign, we've run two other successful pre-order campaigns. Support a small, woman owned business- see why thousands of people are wearing the #bestleggingsever!

Our Philosophy- Ethical, Sustainable, & Inclusive.

Ethical

Our leggings are handmade in New York City's renowned Fashion District. The employees at our shops are paid a living wage, work realistic hours, and are given frequent breaks and holidays. We believe it is vital to the local economy to build our stuff in a fair, sustainable way, not using child or slave labor. Therefore, we will never build overseas. The unfortunate side effect in this is that production is a little slower, and costs are higher- but we feel like it's worth it. 

Sustainable

Our fabrics are printed using sublimation techniques. 

Sublimation Printing is a process in which designs are transferred from pre-printed paper onto fabric by contact heat, of which the dyes are absorbed by the fabric. It is great way to produce high clarity, well defined designs. The pre-printed paper is an advantageous way to store patterns with the flexibility of being able to print on any synthetic fabrication when needed, rather than having to hold inventory on only one printed fabric. This allows for more flexibility and diversity in choosing fabric styles.

Sublimation printing (heat transfer printing) has always been a more sustainable and environmentally-friendly process than dyeing fabrics. Whether it be single or double-sided printing, sublimation uses less water and less energy to “color” a fabric, without emitting hazardous gases into the air.

Our printing facility is further committed to sustainability in a number of ways:

Using water-based inks in our pigment printing operation with no solvents added (which emit harmful VOCs)

Operating an in-house waste water treatment system that cleans and filters our water to remove dye particles

Recycling our exhausted transfer paper to other markets

Collecting our waste fabric to be recycled to other markets

Every step of the process is American made, with an emphasis on a small carbon footprint. Our shops are family owned and operated. Our tags, labels, and packaging are all sourced using American companies. Our mailers are made from 88% recycled materials, and are recyclable. 

Inclusive

Lineagewear is a body positive company.

We don't add surcharges to larger sizes.

We don't have separate sections for "straight" and "plus" sizes.

Body shaming is not our bag.

All bodies are gorgeous, and all bodies are to be celebrated for their unique abilities.

We practice radical self love.

We want every woman, no matter where they are on their fitness journey, to feel OHMazing in Lineagewear. 

Lineagewear doesn't believe in "one size fits all". People are all shapes and sizes, clothing companies skew their size charts differently, and the BMI chart doesn't take into account things like height, fitness, or muscle tone. A hundred years ago, almost every piece of clothing you owned would have been tailor made to your specific measurements. That's the type of fit we strive for with our leggings. We want our garments to fit true to size every time. 

Please, don't ever feel that there is something weird or wrong with YOUR body just because a garment doesn't fit. YOU are perfect, YOU are beautiful!  

Giving Back 

We believe it's our responsibility to give back to our community. To date, we have raised over $31,000 for various charities such as Bend to Mend, NEDA, Project Fit America, Team For Kids, and the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention. 

How To Order

Simply select the perk you're interested in, and check out. You will receive a backers survey shortly after the end of the campaign where you can indicate your size, length, and print preferences. (Pics of our new designs can be found under the "Gallery" tab.)

Budget constraints? You can split a perk with a friend and order two different sizes. 

Change your mind? You can return or exchange a perk after the campaign is over.

Can't get enough? You can add additional perks during the backers survey. 

Remember, all perks over $125 ship free, just like in our store!

Stretch Goal!

"That all sounds great, but what I really want is one of the sold out products from your website!"

Hey, we totally understand that. The more we raise, the more we can restock. If you can get us to our goal of $32,000, we will open up perks to include our existing line of adult leggings- such as our must-have Not So Basic Black leggings, or our Blue Peacock leggings. We even have Maternity Leggings!  (Kids leggings not included in this goal, sorry.)

Risks & Challenges

This is a low risk campaign! Lineage is in it's fourth year of business. We've previously run two successful pre-order sales on our own, each raised close to $30,000. Last year's Indiegogo campaign raised over $24,000. Perks were produced and shipped on time, with some perks arriving early. We have an established supply chain and good working relationship with our printer and our factories. Running this sale as a crowdfunding campaign will help us better organize and manage logistics, as well as help us manage customer expectations.

Fabric printing is estimated to take 4 weeks, and manufacturing is estimated to take 4-8 weeks. Packing and shipping is estimated to take 1-2 weeks. 

Worried about changing your mind? We allow returns and exchanges for campaign backers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word on social media- share our campaign on Facebook! Encourage friends and family to take a look. It's always a good time to drop holiday wishlist hints! 

Thank you all so much for your support.
