story:
I'm Anna, a relatively new Norse Pagan. I cherish and love my gods, and I am upset that white supremacists (or whatever else they might call themselves) continue to use the sacred symbols of Norse Paganism alongside symbols of bigotry and hatred.

I'm setting up this campaign in hopes of challenging the notion that the Norse Gods are anything but ethnically diverse, just as those who worshiped them centuries ago were. These pins portray the gods in a variety of skin tones and races -- future campaigns, should this one be successful, will broaden the diversity to include gender and body type. The hope is to advance the idea that the Norse Gods are representative of those who worship them.

By backing this project and wearing or displaying these pins, you will help challenge the idea that Norse Pagans are all bigots and racists, and instead represent the growing portion of Norse Pagans who are accepting and loving of all.

What We Need & What You Get

The largest portion of the funding is needed for the manufacturing of the pins themselves. I will be going through Zap! Creatives in the UK to get the pins made. I've already worked with them to produce Loki, and their pins are of excellent quality. The rest of the funding will cover packaging supplies and shipping costs.

Each pin will be approximately 25mm tall (about 1 inch) and have one rubber backing. Made of hard enamel and gold or silver plating, these pins will be sturdy and durable!

If by chance the total funding goal is not met, the funds will go towards the production of the most popular pin designs. For those who ordered a pin that is less popular and therefore not made, you will be able to select one of the designs that does get made. Right now, Thor is the first in line for production, with Njord and Freyja following after.

If more than the needed funding is met, I will add more to the series, including Frigga, Sigyn, Skadi, and a few other divine ladies.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge this project faces is getting the required funding to produce all of the pin designs available. Between my social media presence and my own tenacity, I have high hopes that I will be able to make the goal in the required amount of time. Depending on the end funding amount, I am also prepared to put forth some of my own money, out of pocket, to meet the end goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know there are those of you who  just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

Please, share this campaign on social media: Instagram, Tumblr, Facebook, Twitter, you name it! get the word out around the world! Any amount of sharing will help a ton, but the more the better!

story:
Short Summary

  • This is my first indiegogo campaign and I couldn't be more excited! I've been working on developing this product for over a year now. It hasn't been easy, but I have finally come up with a finished prototype I'm proud to show you!
  • With your help I hope to see Concert Cork at ever major music festival and sporting event next season!

What We Need & What You Get

  • My goal of $10,000 will help get costs down low enough so I can distribute Concert Cork in a mass quantity. This would include an official shipment and online network to make it easier to get the finished product to you!
  • If we do not reach our goal we will still do our best to move forward with Concert Cork! However, it will just take longer and on a much smaller scale than we hoped.

The Impact

  • I've always loved the festival and concert atmosphere. Everyone comes together to enjoy and share in their same interests. I would like to help make that experience even more pleasant for everyone. I also hope to grow the company Into something more. We could expand and produce Concert Corks that fit beer bottles, soda cans, and so much more!
  • I've been a small scale entrepreneur ever since I was 17. Starting my own local sticker company out of the basement of my house. I love to see people enjoy my products, I hope to continue that experience on a larger scale with Concert Cork!

Risks & Challenges:

My main risk is getting Concert Cork production ready in time for next festival season. My hope is with your contributions I can get costs low enough to make it more readily available to everyone.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to help make Concert Cork a reality, please share this page with your family and friends! Thank you from all of us at Concert Cork.

story:
Be your most professional, masculine, and confident self every day with the revolutionary, new, Nitro Musk by Musk & Hustle. Our own ingeniously crafted versions of the fragrances you know and love, from the biggest and best designer brands, in a more concentrated, rugged, heroic, and kick-ass form. 

Not all men can be born as Greek Gods, and that's OK.  Whether you're a stunningly handsome man or not, the way you smell is something you can, and should control. That's where we come in.

 

 

Waiting sucks . Tap the banner above to choose from the first 24 Nitro Musks and have them shipped today.  Use code "First24" for 33% off. Ends 11/26

 

 

Employing equal parts nifty science, big brains, and tireless hustle we’ve revolutionized men’s fragrances by creating pure oil cologne we call Nitro Musk. We craft Nitro Musk using the finest ingredients on earth. The exact same grade of raw materials, the same origin and composition of essential oils, and the same unique, exotic, and expensive specialty raw materials as more expensive and less concentrated designer spray colognes.

Here are just a few of the fine ingredients we include in these three new Nitro Musks. If we let you in on the rest we'd have to kill you. Nobody wants that, so we'll just go ahead and keep the rest to ourselves.   

The mixture of apples, vanilla, and mint are simply glorious in #98, our version of Versace Eros. 

 

Ever tried smelling just a little bit like basil? We didn't think so. You should, it's awesome.

 

Mandarin orange, peppercorn, and juniper are just some of the stones along the path to smelling like you were just dipped in the essence of summertime.

 

 

 

 

 

Your brand new , glistening Nitro Stubbies will be oh so comfy nestled in our individually hand packed and labeled, heroic, and compact vessels. Get in line for one today and change your life forever. 

 

 

 

We launched our first 24 Nitro Musks on Kickstarter one year ago and people sure had some nice things to say. Take a look below to see the glorious-ness of Nitro Musk described in spectacularly eloquent detail.

 

We've just completed our second successful campaign on Kickstarter. Check it out HERE. 

 

 

 

Nitro Musk looks especially good on a marble counter top next to old fashioned looking soap in a glass bottle. Will the soap clean better with Nitro Musk nearby? Back us today and find out for yourself.​​

 

 

The next 24 in our lineup kick ass. Keep an eye on our updates for more information on many of these fragrances as well as opportunities to try them out for yourself, for free, before our campaign ends.

 

Want to know more about each of these new Nitro Musks? Tap the image above to read more.

 

 

Do you have fancy white tile and frosted glass in your bathroom? If so, Nitro Musk is perfect for you. You owe it to your fancy bathroom to back us today. 

 

 

 

One of the best things about Nitro Musk is the compact size. You can carry 24 different Nitro Musks, good for 3 to 6 months worth of wear, and take up less room in your luggage than a single can of soup. And if you carry soup with you when you travel, stop. That's weird. 

 

Majestic. Rugged. Stubbies.

 

 

See what all the fuss is about before the campaign ends.  Tap the image above and order Original Nitro Musk today.  Code "First 24" for 33% off. Ends 11/26

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our first priority is to get our Original Nitro Musk in your hands on schedule. Orders will be shipped in order by backer number. The earlier you select your reward level the sooner your precious oil of the Gods will be shipped.

Our Nitro Drifter is perfect for storing, organizing, and transporting your Nitro Pens. Each one is individually hand cut, hand stitched with thick waxed string, and hand stamped with the Nitro Musk brand. Tap the image above for more info. 

The Nitro Squire is an epic valet tray made from thick, ultra premium leather. Perfect for storing, organizing, and displaying your Nitro Musk. Each one is hand made by Ian Norris himself. 

Turn your Nitro Pen into an irresistible conversation starter with our Nitro Skin. Made to outlast your current relationship. 

 

 

There's not much to wearing Nitro Musk properly. Check out our nifty infographic and learn the fundamentals along with a few tricks from our pros.

 

 

 

 

Ruggedly built and super smooth in operation, our stainless steel roller ball applicators will outlast your current relationship. 

 

 

Our quality is second to none because we want you to musk up with confidence. We wear them ourselves every day, and we won't wear anything but the very best. 

 

 

 

 

We'll be hard at work even before our campaign ends in order to bring you our musky goodness as soon as humanly possible. Back us early to receive your rewards sooner.

Thanks for stopping by. Back us today, or click above and try original Nitro Musk in only a few short days. And remember, stay musky my friends.​

story:
We decided to use Indiegogo to launch our Trailblazer pant in order to get the best quality at the lowest price for our friends and hard core Off The Grid fans. This platform gives the ability to sell directly to you the consumer with no middle man to mark up the price! We want to offer you the best quality at the best price possible. 

Off the Grid is an off road / work-wear apparel line, headquartered in San Diego, CA. We are a business whose sole purpose is to outfit consumers with technical yet highly functional and wearable apparel and accessories.  We built the brand to reach the outdoor market with the off road/overlanding community being our key focus. We plan to work side by side with other small businesses within these communities to bring new and relevant products to the market.

This led us to bring our latest product to Indiegogo. With the support of this great community we can bring quality and relevant product to you the consumer at a great price!

So go get yourself a pair of Trailblazer pants and lets keep the adventure going. 

Be sure to follow to keep up to date with us.

http://www.instagram.com/offthegridsurplus

http://www.facebook.com/offthegridsurplus

https://www.twitter.com/OFFTHEGRIDSRPL

http://www.offthegridsurplus.com

story:
Death- Our collective yet predominantly ignored destiny will be faced and embraced using a multi-media theatrical fashion parade. Bringing death to life by creating a cultural shift in the way we grieve that makes our inevitable end accessible and acceptable.

My name is Kat Pengelly; I am an artist and fashion designer establishing the label KOSHKA Art Fuelled Fashion. I have an inclination to create fashion concept shows. Fashion for Funerals - Putting the FUN into Funerals was born of my mother's death. Devastated, I turned to my craft for catharsis.

Have you noticed there is a ‘death positive’ movement permeating the zeitgeist? It’s ok to talk about death. In fact, embark on a conversation down that once dark corridor and you may find that people’s eyes light up with interest and curiosity.  

Fashion for Funerals – Putting the FUN into Funerals where arts, psychology and science collide with the central theme of death. It is a story telling platform for writers, film and theatre makers, fashion designers, artists, musicians, psychologists and scientists. 

The show premiered at the Nati (Natimuk) Frinj Biennale to audience acclaim in *2015. This was made possible through a grant received from the Regional Arts Fund administered by Regional Arts Victoria.

Part of the initial planning in 2015 included discussions with the Fiona Elsey Cancer Research Institute (FECRI) in Ballarat. I turned to this organisation because mum died from cancer. I was looking for understanding and answers. My support of FECRI is in loving  memory of my mum and with the belief that our scientists will find a cure.

                       

I am mindful of the potential that the title has to offend by mentioning ‘fun’ in context with the grief stricken experience that funerals can be. To this end, I consulted with Trevor Bysouth, a Funeral Director and community educator on death and dying who felt that the show is an innovative tool to; “create community awareness of death, grieving, funerals and associated issues”; and that “respectful humour plays a big part in the education process, and indeed the funeral itself.” The sadness must be endured, but it need not be in isolation nor without celebration.

I recently had a fascinating tour of FECRI to look at blood cells through a microscope. There is a ‘Blood Cell Section’ in the show that investigates how “a miniscule change in a microscopic something can be the difference between life and death”.  (1)

 

Blood Cell Fabric Design - Louisa West Studio

The group of blood cells pictured above were selected from the lab with the intention of printing them onto fabric to create a new collection. We have kept the natural characteristics of the blood cells which are quite beautiful. They have been enlarged and colour heightened for artistic representation.  The magnified blood cells remind me of gem-like  pomegranate seeds. I decided on using healthy blood cells for the fabric print as I'm a tad superstitious!

Also established in 2015 was a partnership with the Art Gallery of Ballarat. Fashion for Funerals – Putting the FUN into Funerals has been included in their major exhibition ‘Romancing the Skull’. The Art Gallery of Ballarat will market our event and have also provided seed funding.

                    

 

                              

Best of Ballarat-The best little Tourist mag in town featuring an artwork in Romancing the Skull 14 OCT - 28 JAN Art Gallery of Ballarat

Art credit: Josè Guadalupe Posada Calaverita Gomista (detail)(Little Calavera of General Gomez) circa 1910, relief etching on woven paper. Collection of David Hulme & Brigitte Banziger.

Look out for the November edition of BOB, Fashion for Funerals will be on the cover!

HERE IT IS!

                                    

Front pages are contagious! We also landed on the front page of the Courier recently with this gorgeous image of Eve Ristrom- Gallimore who is also one of our makeup artists. The media Gods are smiling on FFF!

 

Promotional Image for Fashion for Funerals 2017

Concept & Design – ‘Danse Macabre’, Kat Pengelly 2017
Photography – Jeremy Bannister
Model and Makeup Artist – Eve Ristrom – Gallimore
Hair – La Belladonna
Shoes – Preston Zly
Styling – Anne Lewis
Location – The Bishop’s Palace

                 

Fashion for Funerals- Work in Progress

Producing theatre shows is a costly business. It is my intention to pay my creative collaborators equitable fees which are too often overlooked. The project will create employment and professional development opportunities for many regional artists and also raise money and awareness for cancer research and early detection.

Why we need YOUr help - What the $ will do

An ideal budget for a show of this scale would be in the vicinity of $100,000 to do the job at hand without stressing about money. We are aiming for $20,000 because we have the tremendous support of Federation University Australia here in Ballarat who are providing:

- A fantastic fully equipped theatre and rehearsal rooms

- Accomplished, first-rate  staff

-Talented students of the Arts Academy

 

Costs include:

-Arts Industry Professionals (Film makers, Narrators, Script Writers, Designers, Stage and Production Managers, Photographers, Makeup Artists, Sound and Light Technicians, Choreographers) = $20,000 +

ONE HOUR ON STAGE IS COUNTLESS GRUELLING HOURS BEHIND THE SCENES!

-Materials (Fabric,Glue, Mesh, Reflective Tape, Seat Belting, Neoprene etc) = $3,000 - $5,000

-Project Costs (Promotional Printing , Marketing, Insurance, Licenses etc)  = $3000 -$5,000

 

The Focus for Crowd Funding is Artists' Fees

 

We aim to cover other expenses via alternative fund raising activities which we are simultaneously undertaking.

Income streams include:

-Corporate sponsorship

-Advertising in our program

-Box office

 

If we can EXCEED our goal for $20,000 we can #paycreatives and give generously to cancer research

 

PERK PROVIDERS

We have some fantastic perks for early bird supporters. I acknowledge our Perk Providers here for their generosity and belief in our vision.

Eerie Tours

Australia's premium ghost tour provider.

Ballarat Ghost Tour

Set against the backdrop of Ballarat's beautiful Gothic inspired architecture, Eerie Tours will provide you with a night of uncanny occurrence and tales of the birth of the Australian spirit, in more ways than one. This tour travels through underground buildings, back alleyways and through the remains of the old Ballarat gaol, the site of the highest number of executions in Victoria outside of Melbourne.

Old Cemetery Night Tour

A magnificent experience for everyone interested in history, cemeteries and mortality.

You will experience; Eureka Soldiers and Miners Graves, a variety of denominational sections,  The Chinese Cemetery, The Jewish Cemetery, the mass grave of over 10,000 gold rush miners and lots of personal stories about the pioneers of Ballarat.

​Aradale Lunatic Asylum

Aradale is Australia's largest abandoned lunatic asylum. Opening in 1867, this building housed tens of thousands of people described as the worst lunatics in the British Empire.

Around 13,000 people passed away here in its 130 years. As a result, Aradale is considered one of the most haunted locations in Australia.

Eerie tours is hosted by a professional team of historians and story tellers.

Preston Zly

The official shoe providers for Fashion for Funerals - Putting the FUN into Funerals

Preston Zly shoes are hand-made creations built by master craftspeople. Seasonal collections are available through their studio in Melbourne, Australia and online. Their shoes are bespoke, taking inspiration from footwear and art movements of all historical eras and reinterpreted for a contemporary urban lifestyle.

Preston Zly shoes are designed for sustainable longevity – using natural materials such as leather and wood allows them to be re-soled and buffed to almost new condition by an experienced professional – a service offered both online and via the studio.

Sovereign Hill

Immerse Yourself In the Excitement of Ballarat’s Goldrush Days at Sovereign Hill!

Where Australia’s history comes to life! It’s just like stepping back in time - from the hustle and bustle of Main Street where costumed ladies and gents parade their new-found wealth, to the excitement of the Red Hill Gully Diggings where you can pan for real gold and it’s yours to keep...EUREKA!

Bird & Blossom

Fashion for Funerals - Putting the FUN into Funerals official jewellery maker.

Bespoke laser cut jewelry and other products are made with love in Australia and always with sustainable practices at the forefront of the creative process. They support other small business and local tradespeople where possible, sourcing only quality, ethical materials along the way.

Fifteen Trees

Established in 2009 to  reduce carbon footprints. To date, Fifteen Trees has helped plant almost 100,000 trees in all states of Australia. They now operate internationally, coordinating tree planting in New Zealand, England and America.

Eerie Tours | Preston Zly | Sovereign Hill | Bird and Blossom | 15 Trees

 

You can also get your hands on some Koshka Art Fuelled Fashion via our perks!

Tickets are ON SALE NOW for Fashion for Funerals - Putting the FUN into Funerals

  GO TO- www.koshka.com.au

Limited seating and sessions. BOOK NOW!

 

Thanks for taking the time to look through our campaign. I hope your imagination has been captured and your consideration of death and therefore life has been heightened. If you are able to contribute to our campaign I am truly grateful for your support. If you are able to  come to the show, I look forward to meeting you.            

 

Whilst we are alive

Let's Thrive

Please come along for the Ride!

 

 

 

 

Foot Notes

2017 Campaign Film- Josh Waddell, Far Flung Films                                                                                      Models in order of appearance - Victoria Rosewarne, Kat Pengelly                                                         Location- Ballarat General Cemeteries

*2015 Fashion for Funerals creative collaborators that are represented in our Campaign Film:

-Designers- Effie Williams, Faith Valent, Clare Schreenan, Garth Horsfield, Kat Pengelly.

-Fabric Designers- Melinda Muscat, Erin Bond Matherson, Bren Luke, Casey Tosh, Rob Kelty. 

-Film Artist & Projections- Erin McCuskey,Yum Studio

-2015 Film- Nadine Jade Productions

(1) Kirsty Hawkes - Fashion for Funerals Script Writer

story:
Superheroes aren't real, we know this. However, the values they instill in us and the perspectives they provide are very real. Beloved characters and the specific attributes we take from them are often what we wish to see in ourselves, and what we can aspire to. We use attributes of these characters in our everyday lives; the intelligence, readiness, strength, determination, drive, and dedication; when we use these we become our own hero. Our own Urban Hero.

Your Urban Hero takes visual elements of your favorite characters from pop culture and mutates them into trendy and fashionable ‘geek couture’. Selecting characters and concepts from anime, comic books, film, and television allows us the freedom to design great sneakers and apparel so ANYONE can represent the character of their choosing. We want to help empower people in their everyday lives, to help them be the best versions of themselves. Your Urban Hero will share its message of empowerment through fashion.

Even the strongest hero needs the help of a partner, a team, or a friend. You as an early contributor can be that team for Your Urban Hero and help build the very 'sole' of our company. Be with YUH as we begin to create our shoe molds to make these sneakers and so many more a reality.

Your contributions will fund the manufacturing of the sneaker molds for every sneaker we make and will be the very foundation for both Your Urban Hero and empowered footwear for thousands of fellow geeks and sneaker heads. The sneakers will be available in October 2019 but contributors will be able to have their sneaker shipped to them prior to the official release.

Our goal is to raise all the funds needed for the sneaker molds for all our sizes and if possible the remaining funds needed for the complete sample making and mass production of TWO FULL shoe lines.

We have multiple funding goals, the first of which is the manufacturing of the molds for our shoes and samples which will cost $20000, and final mass production of two full product lines for $50,000. We want to bring YUH to every event and city that we can with pop-up events and Con appearances. Your contribution can not only make YUH shoes a reality, but also bring them closer to your hometown!

We have designed a few packages that will help us to achieve Maximum Effort in regards to production completion. Each Perk will either have a one time or lifetime discount. There are secret Perks as well for eagle eyed contributors!

Your Urban Hero has a chance to bring people of many different interests and social statuses together with the mutual adoration of pop culture, quality sneakers and apparel design. Many people have an immense devotion to their favorite characters, movies, or shows. Your Urban Hero will use designs reminiscent of those entities, each and every one, to reflect the Hero you want to represent.  Your Urban Hero has so many options and inspirations that anyone will be able to find something in our collection that reminds of what the characters represent, find something fashionable and to feel empowered.

Aside from our love and appreciation of all the pop culture inspirations that drive our company, our more than a decade of experience in the print, apparel, and marketing industries have prepared us well to deliver you an amazing and empowering shoe like you've never seen before. And most importantly our love and respect for every character we interpret will be felt in each pair of sneakers you wear. Thank you again for your support and be sure to share our links and follow Your Urban Hero on social media for updates and releases!

Excelsior!

story:
My name is Nebi Milkias (mil-KIE-as), entrepreneur and founder of the SoulPal products.  I have studied intensively to become a chemical engineer.  After working for a while, I realized I wanted to create  products … products that have a purpose.  Right now, that purpose is twofold:

 

 

  1.  Give something back to       the community.
  2.  Improve the lives of animals.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I was recently on a run around Town Lake in Austin, Texas.  And on that run, I witnessed the following encounter:

 

I started thinking ...  

 

"What if there was a way to not forget the bags?"

 

"What if there was a way to bring waste bags along, that was:

  • Convenient
  • Affordable
  • Didn't get in the way like other dispensers
  • What if it came in cool, attention-grabbing colors!”
 

A Product is Born…

Later that day, synchronicity struck.  I was in an office supply store, and I saw there was a 3-D printing shop inside.  I then realized that I could put my engineering skills to work by designing a new kind of dispenser.Then I could create a prototype by 3-D printing it. And thus the idea for the SOUL PAL dispenser (Patent Pending) was born!

 

After a lot of hard work, some tears, loss of hair and about a pint of blood, I have a prototype design. I want to prove that I can bring this to the world! And I’ve hired a team of like-minded entrepreneurs to help me make this product a reality.  

 

 I want to show  that the Average Guy with a dream and a plan can make an impact if he gets the right backing. I want this to be an inspiration for other entrepreneurs as well!


Features of the SOULPAL™ dispensers:

 

And  5% of ALL  pre-sales revenue benefits Austin Pets Alive, a no-kill shelter based in Austin, Texas.   

 

We are also working on finding other charities to partner with.

 

It shows that you're a conscious dog owner!


 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

We have already sunk a considerable amount of time, energy and money into our product.  We are a small team seeking to bring this new product to market.  We hope to see it in mass production soon! Development of a new product is heavy lifting for any team.  But I am confident in the team I have assembled. I have faith in them and in the companies vision!

 

How You Can Help?

This is a pre-sale event for the SoulPal dispenser.  We have left it uncapped, to assess the demand for our product.The funds we raise through this event will cover manufacturing and packaging costs.

 

Buy a SoulPal dispenser today!

story:
Combattre tous les jours pour rester en vie, je l'ai fait. Je m’appelle Josianne Monette et je suis survivante de deux cancers.  La vie m'a offerte une deuxième chance et je réalise enfin mon rêve de mettre sur pied une entreprise pouvant donner espoir aux combattants du cancer. 

Je propulse EKKLO, une ligne de vêtements et d’accessoires ludiques, positifs et porteurs d’espoir. Des produits de grande qualité, écoresponsables et fabriqués au Canada. EKKLO,  c’est aussi une nouvelle boutique en ligne qui deviendra à coup sûr, une référence pour les combattants du cancer et tous ceux qui souhaitent supporter la cause. Grâce à votre implication et à cette campagne de financement participatif, je pousserai EKKLO encore plus loin afin de faire une réelle différence dans la cause contre le cancer.

Having to fight for your life, day after day, I know what that’s like too. My name is Josianne Monette and I’m a two-time cancer survivor. I’ve created EKKLO, a line of inspiring clothing and accessories designed to generate hope. Our products are high quality, eco-friendly and Canadian-made. EKKLO is also an online boutique that promises to become the go-to destination for everyone fighting cancer first hand and their supporters. With help from you and this fundraising campaign, I will take EKKLO even further to make a real difference for the cause. 

EKKLO lance d’abord des collections de tuques légères et de foulards faits de bambou apportant chaleur et confort. Nous allons communiquer avec vous pour le choix de votre modèle et couleur.

EKKLO is initially launching collections of toques and scarves made of bamboo, a soft material that’s lightweight, warm and comfortable. You will receive a separate survey email for choosing your favorite design and color.


Mon parcours, ma vision des choses
J’ai reçu un premier diagnostique de cancer du sein le 26 mai 2014. Je travaillais dans une agence de publicité, j’avais 37 ans, un fils et une envie folle de repousser mes limites et d'accomplir un Ironman pour mon 40e anniversaire. Ma vie a basculé. J’ai alors découvert que j’étais porteuse d’un gène très rare (TP53) m’obligeant à être suivi par huit spécialistes pour le reste de ma vie. Un an plus tard, un deuxième cancer, cette fois-ci du col de l’utérus.

My story and vision
I was first diagnosed with breast cancer on May 26, 2014. I was 37, had a job at an ad agency and a son at home. Up to that point, my goal had been to push my personal limits and complete an Ironman for my 40th birthday. And all of the sudden, everything changed. I found out that I carried a very rare gene—TP53—which meant I’d need to be followed by eight specialists for the rest of my life. A year later, a second cancer surfaced; this time in my cervix.

Aujourd’hui, je suis en vie et je veux redonner, partager et humaniser cet enfer afin que les gens d’un peu partout sachent qu’ils ne sont pas seuls.

Today, I’m more alive than ever. I want to give back, share my story and help bring a badly needed human touch to the fight against cancer. I want people everywhere to know that they are not alone.


Porter EKKLO, c'est porter la vie.
Mon aspiration avec EKKLO? Offrir aux combattants du cancer et à tous les supporteurs, une inspiration pouvant les suivre partout et les aider à traverser les revers de cette maladie. 

Wear EKKLO and join the cause
What inspired me to create EKKLO? I wanted to provide those fighting cancer—patients, survivors and their supporters—with a source of inspiration that they can carry with them everywhere and help them through the battle. 


 

Puisque la mission première d'EKKLO est d’alléger le combat contre le cancer, 5% du prix de chaque article vendu seront remis à la recherche. Nous avons joint nos forces à celles de Leucan Laurentides-Lanaudière car en équipe, nous allons toujours plus loin.

My primary mission is to support the fight. That’s why 5% of EKKLO sales revenues will be donated to cancer research. EKKLO has joined forces with Leucan Laurentides-Lanaudière because we’re stronger as a team.

Voici en images, le parcours de fabrication de nos produits!
Derrière EKKLO, il y a des valeurs, des gens et beaucoup de passion.

Here is a video of our manufacturing process!
EKKLO is the product of people, values and plenty of passion.

 

Une créativité sans limites!
D’autres produits seront bientôt proposés, tels que la trousse de survie du combattant et la collection super-héros, destinée aux enfants.

Tons of ideas!
Other products will soon be available, such as our Survival Kit and Superhero Collection for children fighting the battle.

Un succès assuré
Mon passé m’a donné les acquis nécessaires pour lancer cette entreprise. Mon présent me donne les mots justes pour atteindre les combattants et les supporteurs. Ma résilience et ma foi me donnent la force d’en rire, d’en pleurer et de dire les vraies choses.

EKKLO vivra à travers les produits, mais également sur mes plateformes sociales. Des anecdotes, de l’humour, des larmes, de l’espoir. EKKLO sera ma voix, mais aussi celle de tous ceux qui auront envie de se joindre à la cause.

Success guaranteed
My past has given me the knowledge I needed to start this business. My present allows me to find the right words to talk to patients and supporters. My resilience and faith give me strength to laugh, to cry and to tell it like it is.

EKKLO will live through its products and connect with community on social media. We’ll share stories, laughter, tears and hope. EKKLO will be my voice, but also that of all those who want to join the cause.

Et maintenant? À vous de jouer!
J’ai donc besoin de 50 000$ par l’entremise de cette campagne pour faire d’EKKLO, la marque de prédilection des combattants.

What’s missing?
Right now I need to raise $50,000 to make EKKLO the brand of choice for those fighting cancer. I need your support. 

 

Les médias!

Cogecotv Laurentides
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=reb0DbtfAVs

96,9 CKOI
http://www.ckoi.com/mention/soutenez-la-lutte-c...

Accès LE Journal des Pays d'en Haut
http://www.journalacces.ca/actualite/vetements-...

Inspiria
http://inspiria.ca/ekklo-le-reve-dune-survivante/

 

Présidente/fondatrice
Josianne Monette: https://www.linkedin.com/in/josianne-monette-08...
info@ekklo.ca
450 694-0146

Directrice artistique & +++
Stéfanie Plourde: http://spdesigngraphique.com

Stratège marketing et mentor & ++

Rédaction et création de contenu & ++
Marie-Michèle Imbleau: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mariemicheleimbleau

story:
OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN IS NOW CLOSED. PLEASE PURCHASE YOUR NECKLACES THROUGH OUR WEBSITE: www.birthofreason.com

All proceeds of this campaign will be used to continue spreading this symbol to women around the world and supporting empowerment, unity, and liberty!

 

Hello, my name is Judi Weisbart. I am a mother, grandmother and the designer of the Egg Necklace. I saw this image when sitting in a Peace Circle with Israeli & Palestinian women at the Global Women’s Peace Initiative in Geneva in 2002. The egg was a Russian egg that we handed around in order to keep the conversation moving and only the holder of the object could speak. When it was placed in my hand I had a vision of the earth emerging from it. And so I created the necklace for our planet at this moment in our ‘his-tory’, or should I say ‘her-story.’ The time has come for The Birth of Reason. This is the time and we are the women! As our world reels from social shifts, political divisions, environmental disasters, economic insecurity and fear based leadership, we need a new paradigm of unity.

 

Photos by Sarita Relis

Women of Peace: A Movement to Save the World

“The Future of this planet depends on women” – H.E.Kofi Annan, Secretary General of the United Nations

My overall goal is to spread this symbol around the world in order to help women come together and create global change through peace, harmony, understanding, strength and liberty. I foresee this necklace instilling a sense of global belonging and empowerment to women of all races, religions, and ages and inspiring healthy dialogue about the important issues we are facing. The Egg Necklace will be a catalyst for a movement of change – our planet desperately needs the infinite wisdom of women to unify, to rise up and nurture our earth and our people. We are all human beings on one small planet in a universe of infinite energy. Let us use the energy for peace. We can only evolve if we do it with love.

This Campaign

"Wherever men and women are persecuted because of their race, religion, or political views, that place must - at that moment - become the center of the universe." - Elie Wiesel

I am hoping to raise the money to produce 1000 of these necklaces in order to begin the movement! Any money made from this campaign (either below or exceeding my goal) will be used to further the production and distribution of The Egg Necklace and all that it represents. I will not rest!

 

This campaign culminates in February, directly following the United States Presidential Inauguration and also the Women’s March on Washington,Los Angeles and throughout the world. My team shared information about the Birth of Reason Egg Necklace at the marches! Over 3 million Americans spoke out on Saturday January 21, 2017, if you were one thank you and please join us now.  It is my deepest wish to have The Egg Necklace worn by as many women as possible. Our hope is that all of our backers will receive their necklaces by International Women's Day, March 8, 2017.  The more we raise, the better chance that this necklace will have a significant impact! Please support this cause, wear The Egg Necklace proudly, and share this idea with your friends. We also want to invite all who believe in this vision, including the men who stand by women and mother earth thru this difficult time. 

 

History of The Egg Necklace

"Honor your daughters. They are honorable." - Malala Yousafzai

The conception of this necklace was at the Global Women’s Peace Initiative of 2002. I was so inspired by my experience that I came home to create The Birth of Reason Egg Necklace. After producing a mold and finding the right manufacturer, I distributed a number of them in 2003. Although years have gone by since this initial circulation, I know many women who still wear these symbols and hold them close to their hearts, especially in this time of uncertainty and political upheaval.

The Egg Necklace is worn by women all over the world to remind them that they are the co-creators of this earth, and that the eggs they carry are the worlds to come. This symbol has been worn by hundreds of amazing women including: Linda Gray, Eve Ensler, Susan Sarandon, Sister Helen Prejuean, Sara Miller McCune, Patty DeDominic, Anita Roddick, Jane Goodall, Betty Hatch, Zainab Salbi, Mae Chee Sansanee, Elisabet Satourius, Barbara Marx Hubbard, Nancy Pelosi, Diane Meyer Simon, Julianna Friedman to name just a few... add your name to this list of remarkable women who have a sisterhood of co-creation.

 

Ways to Contribute and Perks

“A woman is like a teabag – you can’t tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.” – Eleanor Roosevelt

 

Although any contribution will be much appreciated, I hope you will buy a necklace and wear it proudly! If you can go one step further and help spread this symbol around the world by choosing one of the higher perk levels, that would be truly amazing.

Sending a necklace to an influential woman will have more of an impact than you can imagine! If you choose to do this, we will ship a necklace to a woman of influence, such as senators and congresswomen, heads of non-profits, community leaders, etc. (e.g. women who are well positioned to make a difference).

Even if you can’t contribute monetarily, please do share this campaign with your friends and social network in order to spread the word.

The different levels of perks allow you to choose the extent of your impact on this movement. Each necklace comes in a gift bag with inspiring words and poem. It is made of high quality nickel with silver plate and can be ordered in either all silver or silver egg with gold Earth.

Egg Necklace Design Sketch

 

Egg Necklace Packaging (photo by Sarita)

 

Why I am Confident that I can Make a Difference!

 

My work is for social justice, peace, compassion and beauty, this is the focus of my life’s work. In all my artwork, the purpose is to help create a better world.  My art is a powerful avenue for communicating these values.

Sacred art pieces speak to the traditions and connections to those who came before us, while imparting the history to those who came after.  I create sacred pieces that speak to many different religions and their traditions. To me the expression of art is a language that allows the viewer to feel and understand the artist emotionally. The voice inside me is loud, it yells at me to make a difference, speak out, be the change I want to see. Through the process of my work I try to communicate this voice. I believe it is my responsibility as an artist to give back to the world, to see the need for beauty where there is none, to see the place for healing when there is pain and thru my talents and my heart create a place of peace.

I am the founder & president of A Busy Woman Consulting, helping non-profit organizations create events, raise funds, and develop business. The overriding vision is to create Mission Driven events and strategies that form a bond of trust between the organizations and their donors. I have served and worked with dozens of organizations, individuals and businesses throughout the country and abroad. Designing and managing many large community events, fundraisers, parades and exhibitions. This is my passion…this is my life’s work.

 

Gratitude to the Following Individuals

Video by Life Chronicles - Kate Carter and Oscar Gutierrez

Photos by Sarita Relis and Helene Glassman

Graphic artist of logo: Michele Zuzalek

Model for the necklace: Benicia Grace

Support for making this possible: Alice Haefele
story_txt:
OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN IS NOW CLOSED. PLEASE PURCHASE YOUR NECKLACES THROUGH OUR WEBSITE: www.birthofreason.com
All proceeds of this campaign will be used to continue spreading this symbol to women around the world and supporting empowerment, unity, and liberty!
 

Hello, my name is Judi Weisbart. I am a mother, grandmother and the designer of the Egg Necklace. I saw this image when sitting in a Peace Circle with Israeli & Palestinian women at the Global Women’s Peace Initiative in Geneva in 2002. The egg was a Russian egg that we handed around in order to keep the conversation moving and only the holder of the object could speak. When it was placed in my hand I had a vision of the earth emerging from it. And so I created the necklace for our planet at this moment in our ‘his-tory’, or should I say ‘her-story.’ The time has come for The Birth of Reason. This is the time and we are the women! As our world reels from social shifts, political divisions, environmental disasters, economic insecurity and fear based leadership, we need a new paradigm of unity.

 

Photos by Sarita Relis
Women of Peace: A Movement to Save the World
“The Future of this planet depends on women” – H.E.Kofi Annan, Secretary General of the United Nations
My overall goal is to spread this symbol around the world in order to help women come together and create global change through peace, harmony, understanding, strength and liberty. I foresee this necklace instilling a sense of global belonging and empowerment to women of all races, religions, and ages and inspiring healthy dialogue about the important issues we are facing. The Egg Necklace will be a catalyst for a movement of change – our planet desperately needs the infinite wisdom of women to unify, to rise up and nurture our earth and our people. We are all human beings on one small planet in a universe of infinite energy. Let us use the energy for peace. We can only evolve if we do it with love.
This Campaign
"Wherever men and women are persecuted because of their race, religion, or political views, that place must - at that moment - become the center of the universe." - Elie Wiesel
I am hoping to raise the money to produce 1000 of these necklaces in order to begin the movement! Any money made from this campaign (either below or exceeding my goal) will be used to further the production and distribution of The Egg Necklace and all that it represents. I will not rest!
 
This campaign culminates in February, directly following the United States Presidential Inauguration and also the Women’s March on Washington,Los Angeles and throughout the world. My team shared information about the Birth of Reason Egg Necklace at the marches! Over 3 million Americans spoke out on Saturday January 21, 2017, if you were one thank you and please join us now.  It is my deepest wish to have The Egg Necklace worn by as many women as possible. Our hope is that all of our backers will receive their necklaces by International Women's Day, March 8, 2017.  The more we raise, the better chance that this necklace will have a significant impact! Please support this cause, wear The Egg Necklace proudly, and share this idea with your friends. We also want to invite all who believe in this vision, including the men who stand by women and mother earth thru this difficult time. 
 
History of The Egg Necklace
"Honor your daughters. They are honorable." - Malala Yousafzai
The conception of this necklace was at the Global Women’s Peace Initiative of 2002. I was so inspired by my experience that I came home to create The Birth of Reason Egg Necklace. After producing a mold and finding the right manufacturer, I distributed a number of them in 2003. Although years have gone by since this initial circulation, I know many women who still wear these symbols and hold them close to their hearts, especially in this time of uncertainty and political upheaval.
The Egg Necklace is worn by women all over the world to remind them that they are the co-creators of this earth, and that the eggs they carry are the worlds to come. This symbol has been worn by hundreds of amazing women including: Linda Gray, Eve Ensler, Susan Sarandon, Sister Helen Prejuean, Sara Miller McCune, Patty DeDominic, Anita Roddick, Jane Goodall, Betty Hatch, Zainab Salbi, Mae Chee Sansanee, Elisabet Satourius, Barbara Marx Hubbard, Nancy Pelosi, Diane Meyer Simon, Julianna Friedman to name just a few... add your name to this list of remarkable women who have a sisterhood of co-creation.
 
Ways to Contribute and Perks
“A woman is like a teabag – you can’t tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.” – Eleanor Roosevelt
 
Although any contribution will be much appreciated, I hope you will buy a necklace and wear it proudly! If you can go one step further and help spread this symbol around the world by choosing one of the higher perk levels, that would be truly amazing.
Sending a necklace to an influential woman will have more of an impact than you can imagine! If you choose to do this, we will ship a necklace to a woman of influence, such as senators and congresswomen, heads of non-profits, community leaders, etc. (e.g. women who are well positioned to make a difference).
Even if you can’t contribute monetarily, please do share this campaign with your friends and social network in order to spread the word.
The different levels of perks allow you to choose the extent of your impact on this movement. Each necklace comes in a gift bag with inspiring words and poem. It is made of high quality nickel with silver plate and can be ordered in either all silver or silver egg with gold Earth.

Egg Necklace Design Sketch
 

Egg Necklace Packaging (photo by Sarita)

My work is for social justice, peace, compassion and beauty, this is the focus of my life’s work. In all my artwork, the purpose is to help create a better world.  My art is a powerful avenue for communicating these values.
Sacred art pieces speak to the traditions and connections to those who came before us, while imparting the history to those who came after.  I create sacred pieces that speak to many different religions and their traditions. To me the expression of art is a language that allows the viewer to feel and understand the artist emotionally. The voice inside me is loud, it yells at me to make a difference, speak out, be the change I want to see. Through the process of my work I try to communicate this voice. I believe it is my responsibility as an artist to give back to the world, to see the need for beauty where there is none, to see the place for healing when there is pain and thru my talents and my heart create a place of peace.

story:
Every day people carry different packages such as key cases, coin bags, etc. to hold mobile phones, banknotes, credit cards, keys,coins, Ladies with powder boxes, lipstick and so on.The survivalist and prepper also carry survival essentials: knives, flashlights, multifunctional tools, whistles, notebooks, pens, etc .It’s inconvenient to carry so many items in different packages.

So,we created  ALL IN ONE SOLUTION WALLET:  RenAn most functional and capacity wallet.

This wallet with phone holder, key bag,coin bag,tools bag etc.which  carry the every day carry(EDC) and survival ssentials including the Credit card, banknote and coins,Mobile phone, Powerbank,   Knife ,Multitools, Whistle, Lighter,  Firestarter, Pen,  Notebook, Comb, Usb,Tickets,Key,paracord,adhesive bandages,first aid, compass etc.It is very helpful and convinient for you to organize and carry your EDC and survival essentials.

The RENAN safety Wallet No.1 has over 20 features which make it the most functional and capacity wallet ever.The Wallet has Security with Rfid blocking, Anti-Theft. Made of  durable and water proof Italy Premium Genuine Leather.Germany Thread and Japan Ykk zipper. 100% hand made with strictly quality control to sure the wallet in perfect.

 

 

In the GIF,the wallet was packed with the following items:

 
 

Here is the detail of RenAn safety wallet No.1 features.

 
 
 

The every day carry(EDC) and survival Essentials compartment with larger opening ,easy for you quickly to look and access items. Items classification clear, concentrated,orderly. Very convenient for you to use.


 
 
 
 

This side compartment was designed to put your the EDC and survival Essentials including: tools, lighting , fire essentials, communications,navigation, first aid, hygiene ( for example :Mutil-Tools, Knife, Flashlight ,Lighter,  Whistle, compass, Tritium latern,Ring, Lip balm ,Micor USB or Card reader, First Aid,nail polish, compact etc or other items.). Different size bags in a row help you to make the items organized and orderly.

Three bags( The RenAn Safety Wallet No.1A )or six bags (The RenAn Safety Wallet No.1B) are available for your choice.

Upper part of compartment with a soft genuine leather cover to prevent the items thrown out.


The RenAn Safety Wallet No.1A with three bags where you can put the Big Knife or Muti-tools or Flasht light etc. For example, You can easily to put the Spyderco Knife( Delica or Endura series) or Leatherman tools etc.

 

 

On the top of the compartment is key holder where you can put 6 keys. Convenient to get the keys. With this key holder,you no need to bring other key bags.

 

Two slots are designed for you to keep the daily items: notebook, passport or other items you want(for example : map,comb,carabiner, tickets,Band Aid.Lipstick or powder box etc). It also can be put your mobilehphone here. With round-opened corner particular design on the above slot which is more convinient for you to access the items. The below slot with transparent window design to allow you easily to see clearly what items inside.


 
 
 

At the middle of compartment, a leather pen holder is designed to hold the  pen.

 

 

 

This compartment is designed for the money you daily use,including the credit cards,bank note(cash), check etc.

9 x Credit/I.D.card slots;

2 x Bank note/cash slots; Where you can put over 180 bills of large bank notes.(Tested with U.S.Dollars)

1x transparent window photo slot

2 x SIM card slots ;

1 x Coin pocket or Bank USB key holder. Where you can put 20 coins.

The RENAN Safety Wallet No.1 is equipped with an RFID safe shielding layers defend against electronic pickpocketing.The RFID shielding,adopts the most advanced physical and chemical process,with ionization treatment,has good X-Y-Z three conductive and no harmful to the body.

The high performance at 99.999999%(shield effect 78dB above) approved by NTC.

These two shielding layers keeps your scannable and valuable items safe during you use your wallet anywhere.

 

 

Here are 2 X SIM card slots


 
 
 

Coin pocket or Bank USB key holder where you can put 30 coins.

 
 
 

Accompany with a slim mini wallet which will let you have more slots to place your

more credit cards and bank note(cash),it can be used independently.


 
 
 

With the security friendly design, It’s easily for you to access your mobile phone from  the phone holders.The phone holders can hold  IPHONE 6 or 7 ,Iphone series,Samsung series,Huawei series etc., it also can be holded the other brand phones in the market.

 
 
 

If you frequent use mobile phone in everyday,carrying with mobile power bank or two mobile phones.then, The RENAN safety wallet No.1 will be the perfect holder for your mobile phones.

Located at the backside of wallet is other Phone holder to allow you to stay your other mobile phone or your power bank.

 

 

We added a removable and durable hand strap to make you more convenient to carry the wallet. Two holes in the wallet allow the handstrap to be installed in a different direction, which are well considered both for right-handed and left-handed person to use the wallet. Whether you are right-handed or left-handed, You can use this wallet very convenient.

This hand strap is ANTI-THEFT.


This hand strap is  ANTI-THEFT design.

 

 

The smart design and innovative layout let you to easily put items and easily take items from the wallet.Compartment layout,Items Classification clear, Items concentrated,orderly.Very convenient for you, Your Use experience will be great.

 

 

 

It’s easy to put into the pocket

 
 
 

The wallet is made of Italy Premium Genuine Leather which is water proof , good wear resistance and durable. Using the Geman High Tenacity Serafil Thread and Japan YKK Smooth Zipper to sure the wallet in high quality.100% hand made with strictly quality control.

 

WATER PROOF

 

 

One wallet packed in one flannel bag,then packed in a color paper box.

 

 

It’s sured that all the RenAn safety wallets can be delivery from Feb.2017.

 

 

ABOUT US

RENAN, We are honest, diligent and hardworking , friendly, enthusiastic to help people.

For the safety of people, we design, develop, create the high quality every day carry(EDC) and survival Essentials. Cooperation with world’s first class material supplier, we focus on producing the high quality products. “Let everyone be safe”.

We very grateful to you and all the people who are helping us in this project.

Thanks also to INDIEGOGO.Thank you! Thanks all of your support!

If there is any further information you need, please feel free to contact us: service@renan.net

Or use your mobile phone to scan the below  QR code (our wechat number)   to contact us.

                                                  
                                    
 

                                                                    THANK YOU AGAIN !

story:
BAY & BANK 

Our long-term plan is to launch a project that will attract local British indie-designers, to give them a free platform to sell their clothing via our website bayandbank.com and via our distribution network once-established.  It can be very difficult to drive traffic to your website when starting up. Featuring your products in as many outlets as possible can help immensely with raising brand awareness and can greatly increase sales. 

First Mission

We plan to launch our first project under this brand with beautifully created, British manufactured Cashmere Scarves that we have designed at home. We hope to use this trajectory to create a full range of quality, British clothing and allow other independent and enterprising designers, with clothing that fit our ethos, to feature alongside Bay & Bank.

Prior to launching this project we have approached 4 independent designers and made provisional agreements with them to feature on our website alongside Bay & Bank over the course of the next 2 months.

We have also been targeting independent male boutiques in the London vicinity in a bid to establish a distribution network. Once established, we hope to be able to use our network to enable other independent designers to get their foot in the door.

Advertising

On pre-releasing the images of our Bay & Bank Cashmere Scarves on Instagram, we were approached by GQ Magazine on a request to feature Bay & Bank Scarves in their monthly issue. We plan to utilise this offer should we receive the required funding to back the project.

We have also created our own magazine that will feature upcoming news, Bay & Bank photoshoots, style guides and new independent brands. 

We intend to monetise our adverts on social media; particularly on Facebook & Twitter. Using their advanced target marketing features to build brand awareness among those that are interested in British and local fashion trends.

This will help to get our own & other independent brands recognised in a bid to shake up the industry.

 A Bit About Bay & Bank Cashmere Scarves

Our scarves have been designed by ourselves at home and will be manufactured by a historic UK-based Mill. Using century-old production techniques. The cashmere fibres themselves are gently combed from the under-fleece of Inner-Mongolian Cashmere Goats. Such fur grows on goats high up in the mountains braving temperatures of -30°C, and is sheered in the warmer springtime by nomadic herders, leaving the thick outer coat, enabling the goats to remain warm.

It takes the under fleece of a whole goat to produce just one of our cashmere scarves, as we use only the purest of white fibres. We will place heavy emphasis on precision and control during production, following the process through from herder-to-designer-to-factory, to ensure that the fibre used meets our measured quality criteria accurately. Our products will be produced at a length of 36mm and under 16 microns. This results in superior, closely knit fibres and means that our scarves will mature with age, just like fine wine. Resulting in great longevity, without sacrificing the soft, warm, luxurious handle that you would expect from premium cashmere.

The Bay & Bank Cashmere Scarf Collection will feature subtle, timeless designs with vibrant colour that grades from one side to the other. We have also introduced a purple floral scarf made from a cashmere lambswool composite. The perfect complement to a gentleman’s coat.

Scroll down to see the photoshoot we held in Holborn, Central London just before Christmas with the samples we created.

A BIG, BIG thank you to all of you that took the time to look at the Bay & Bank Cashmere Scarf Project! We would really appreciate it if you would share our project on Social Media!

Once established, we hope to be able to use our network to enable other independent designers to get their foot in the door.AdvertisingOn pre-releasing the images of our Bay & Bank Cashmere Scarves on Instagram, we were approached by GQ Magazine on a request to feature Bay & Bank Scarves in their monthly issue. We plan to utilise this offer should we receive the required funding to back the project.We have also created our own magazine that will feature upcoming news, Bay & Bank photoshoots, style guides and new independent brands. We intend to monetise our adverts on social media; particularly on Facebook & Twitter. Such fur grows on goats high up in the mountains braving temperatures of -30°C, and is sheered in the warmer springtime by nomadic herders, leaving the thick outer coat, enabling the goats to remain warm.It takes the under fleece of a whole goat to produce just one of our cashmere scarves, as we use only the purest of white fibres. We will place heavy emphasis on precision and control during production, following the process through from herder-to-designer-to-factory, to ensure that the fibre used meets our measured quality criteria accurately. Our products will be produced at a length of 36mm and under 16 microns. This results in superior, closely knit fibres and means that our scarves will mature with age, just like fine wine. Resulting in great longevity, without sacrificing the soft, warm, luxurious handle that you would expect from premium cashmere.The Bay & Bank Cashmere Scarf Collection will feature subtle, timeless designs with vibrant colour that grades from one side to the other. We have also introduced a purple floral scarf made from a cashmere lambswool composite. The perfect complement to a gentleman’s coat.Scroll down to see the photoshoot we held in Holborn, Central London just before Christmas with the samples we created.A BIG, BIG thank you to all of you that took the time to look at the Bay & Bank Cashmere Scarf Project! We would really appreciate it if you would share our project on Social Media!  Slate-Gold Scarf (100% Cashmere)     Blue-Green Scarf (100% Cashmere)    Purple Floral Scarf (75% Lambswool - 25% Cashmere)       The Bay & Bank LabelRisks and ChallengesFunding
The biggest issue that we face has been raising capital to manufacture our first order. 
The amount of funding required to get the project running is quite substantial. We have already invested a lot of money in designing and creating our samples.
In order to launch our project we need to pay the herders, manufacturers and transportation costs.
We intend to overcome this issue by reaching out to Indiegogo!
We have a great project and we desperately need your backing!
Time
We are working with some great manufacturers, but time is against us. 
If we do not manage to raise the funding soon, we will have to wait until next year to restart the scarf project.
We are very determined to succeed in this project and will do all that we can get get the ball rolling.

story:
Once where timepieces of this quality are beyond the reach of most people. Today, these classic watches are made affordable yet never compromising quality and craftsmanship. The Alpha Series is inspired by those who takes risks and bucks the trend, yet stays true to the integrity of knowing what a great watch looks like.

It all began with a fascination with automatic watches. As a watch lover, I love how the components of an automatic movement – many tiny intricate parts – all working together in one unison movement. Despite the countless brands and designs available, I have not found a watch that is of high quality, with a unique classic look, and yet affordable. That sparked my passion to create Seamus Watch Co., a brand that is luxurious yet affordable.


The Alpha Day - Accompanied with a white concentric dial that represents the radiance of the morning light. The watch is worn with any style – be it formal or semi-casual. It boasts a genuine leather band textured with a sun-warmed crocodile skin pattern, and geometric gold tone hands that sweep through the breathing space afforded by the dial’s minimalistic design. A day watch which exudes confidence and finesse.

The Alpha Night - Fitted with a black concentric dial that represents the lustrous charm of the night life, which is rimmed with a glowing constellation of roman numerals and diamond-shaped hour markers. The matching black leather strap compliments the intensity and fervor that every individual desires in the night.

The Alpha Limited Edition - A true classic that expresses itself in a subtle yet exquisite way. Unique geometric hands are framed by the sunlight reflecting off the brilliant gold tone case. The navy blue dial edition is limited to 50 pieces and each piece is numbered. Uniquely made for the classic collector.

Crafted with an automatic heart, the Alpha Series has an exhibition back case so the beauty of the movement can be appreciated. The back glass is made with sapphire crystal – where scratches fear to tread.

Case: 

  • 42mm Diameter, 316L Marine Grade Stainless Steel 
  • 20mm Lug Width 
  • 10mm Case Height 
  • Exhibition Case Back

Movement: 

  • Seagull 1701 Automatic Movement 
  • Hand Wind Function 
  • 21,600 Beats Per Hour 
  • 36 Hour Power Reserve

Crystal:

  • Scratch Resistant Sapphire Crystal (Front and Back)

Dial: 

  • Concentric Circle Design With Sun Ray Effect 
  • Minute And Hour Indexes With Applied Markers

Strap: 

  • 20mm Genuine Leather Strap

Water Resistance: 

  • 5ATM (50 Meters)


Perlon Strap!

Each timepiece comes with a perlon strap of your choice! A choice of four colors are available. Compliment your Seamus Watch Co. timepiece with a strap that is fashionable and classy. 



Seamus Watch Co. believes in simplicity and beauty. The array of watches we offer not only stands for the immense significance of time but also ensures every moment in life is made better by our unique offering to all watch enthusiasts. Every timepiece is meticulously crafted and fabricated with pride. Every watch is assured to withstand the test of time. Every product is devoted to earn your trust and captivate your memories. Seamus Watch Co. strives to make every experience worthy of being remembered.


Risks & Challenges

We understand that creating a product has its setbacks due to the complicated process of manufacture, quality control and delivery. However, we are very careful and diligent during our months of preparation. We are working closely with our manufacturers, who are reputable and professional. Creating and delivering a product that is of utmost quality is our highest goal.

We will keep backers up to date during the production process with regular updates by pictures and response to questions backers may have. Customer relations is essential as it is a bridge of communication between Seamus Watch Co. and our valued backers. If along the way we find a delay or setback in production, we will always be transparent and keep all our backers informed.

Seamus Watch Co. thanks you for your contribution!
story_txt:
Once where timepieces of this quality are beyond the reach of most people. Today, these classic watches are made affordable yet never compromising quality and craftsmanship. The Alpha Series is inspired by those who takes risks and bucks the trend, yet stays true to the integrity of knowing what a great watch looks like.

It all began with a fascination with automatic watches. As a watch lover, I love how the components of an automatic movement – many tiny intricate parts – all working together in one unison movement. Despite the countless brands and designs available, I have not found a watch that is of high quality, with a unique classic look, and yet affordable. That sparked my passion to create Seamus Watch Co., a brand that is luxurious yet affordable.






The Alpha Day - Accompanied with a white concentric dial that represents the radiance of the morning light. The watch is worn with any style – be it formal or semi-casual. A day watch which exudes confidence and finesse.

story:
Dear Ladies and Gentleman!

The company SCULP D´OR GmbH, which I founded on 01.12.2014, is aiming the marketing and production of individual, - explicitly after Customer wishes - made figurines, models, masks, busts and sculptures.

Since I was a child I love Gold . It was fascinating for me. The gloss and the warm color that radiates from this metal.
Now I would therefore like to produce unique sculptures, build in solid finegold 999.9 - which it has not given at this time!
But to make my dream come true, I need your support!
So I remain with thanks and recognition,

Erwin Lind

Ps. The images and the video contain my first pattern pieces, which are all solid made!

SCULP D´OR
Products and services:
Countless wealthy people - worldwide - are constantly on the look for luxury goods, Art, or otherwise unusual things, which these persons use to present their prosperity. Gold always plays a very important role here, because gold coveted since time immemorial and is also valued as a safe investment. However, gold bars can not be used for representative, because goldbars are simple and have uniform sizes and shapes. Thus, gold bars can not be regarded as exceptional and representative.
Gold coins often have wonderful imprints, but the price is not shown the actual value (the value of gold) at their trade value ​​is not any relation at hand that predominantly collector values ​​are taken into account.
Exclusive and expensive jewels enjoy equally exceedingly great popularity in these groups of people, but also here is the relation of market value / intrinsic value beyond question. The SCULP D'OR GmbH offers these people the possibility of representative use of gold. Individual, personal wishes of the customerbe explicitly implemented, so that the customer is the artist himself, and a work of art (unique) with very high material value can call his own. The actual, real value of the objects is placed in the foreground and not the artistic value, as in the art scene usual ..

"Gold is the soul of luxury"
SCULP D'OR

  • The financing requirements for the SCULP D'OR GmbH in case of total investment volume is rounded 750,000 € in the baseline scenario. The funds are needed primarily to grow up. As well as maintaining the daily operation (premises, marketing, production, sales, insurance).
  • The most significant costs for security, insurance, and above all for the purchase of special manufacturing equipment.
    • To be able to work faster and effizenter, further production machines must be purchased. The purchase of all equipment will cost € 450,000
  • Preparations for the actual implementation have been completed.
    • So far I have invested € 120,000 in my company, to present the first steps and patterns.

    NEW: A CUSTOMER HAS PLACED A SMALL ORDER ! WONDERFULL!!
     
But I'll never stop the project SCULP D'OR, even though it would be another for many years, because it is my life's work for me


The consequences

If you support my project, you allow me to make my dream come true.
So far, I'm a simple laborer, not wealthy or even rich. Long, strenuous working days I know very well, and so I would like, if SCULP D'OR should get a successful brand, inserting me also for people who have not been so lucky in their life.

SCULP D'OR is at full business operations employ up to 200 people, as well as countless further into partnerships with other companies, which moved the labor market positive on a small scale.
Finally, you help me also to make other people happy with the finished sculptures, as these enjoy them.

But what I can give back to you?

Unfortunately it is not possible to send you a small golden sculpture, since the value of funded, in most cases would be too low and I would have to spend so the collected money on gifts.
So I want to thank you, in the form of perks, which are made exclusively for supporters of my project and therefore represent unique limited. These products are not offered for sale later!


In this way, I would also ask you if you are unable to financially support my project, that you show it to friends and acquaintances.
You can share it also via Indiegogo!

  Thank you very much for your support!     Erwin Lind

story:
Crafted from 100% GENUINE LEATHER these wallets are top quality at a price anyone can afford. These unique wallets are some of the most stylish and useful wallets on the market today. Did we mention it is also noticeably slimmer than your ordinary leather wallet? I love and collect wallets, and have about 20 different kinds. I have leather, plastic, elastic and metal. You name it I have it. I use a variety of wallets and have always wanted one that could meet all the essential needs that someone could have. Doing all this while keeping the wallet under .24" thickness and also using the best most trusted wallet material of all time. Beautiful genuine leather. These wallets will last you a lifetime and only through kickstarter can you get them at a ridiculously low price!

RFID BLOCKING MATERIAL

Something we are very proud of with these wallets is it is not only thin, stylish and useful. It has Integrated RFID Blocking material. Yes that is right each wallet has a special material that allows it to block any RFID.

What is RFID?

"Radio-frequency identification (RFID) is the wireless use of electromagnetic fields to transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects. The tags contain electronically stored information."

So basically what that means is anyone with an RFID scanner can come by and just scan your pockets and steal all the information on your credit cards.

But why should you care about this your identity has never been stolen? Well take a look at this ridiculous fact that happens to so many.
"The number of identity theft incidents has reached 9.9 million a year, according to the Federal Trade Commission. Every minute about 19 people fall victim to identity theft. It takes the average victim an estimated $500 and 30 hours to resolve each identity theft crime."



Each wallet can hold up to 6 cards and still remain a very slim and minimalist wallet. The money clip is also extremely durable and and awesome alternative to carrying your cash around every day. This wallet helps preserve the simple elegance that is leather, while adding in a few new features that are sure to impress. 
The wallet is EXTREMELY  minimalistic. 

Each wallet is only 1.29oz(36.5grams) and each wallet is only 4.25"x2.5"x.24"  or 108x63x6.1mm

YES, at only .24 inches thick it is extremely thin and can still hold all your cash as well as up to 6 cards.

The Design

We wanted a wallet that was 

-Lightweight

-Extremely thin

-Different than the same old bulky bifold

-Affordable

-Superb Quality 


Possible LIFETIME warranty

Now here's the thing we are most excited about and that is we have set up a great relationship with one of the most trusted manufactures I have ever worked with. I know what your thinking, how can a small company offer lifetime warranty? I may be jumping the gun here but we already have a number of CRAZY stretch goals which will be released if the project reaches its goal. This will literally be the LAST WALLET you will ever need. That is what we are most excited about, so please jump on board with us now and take advantage of the insanely low prices!

story:
Hang Tough – my way.

Whether a businessman, bonvivant or globetrotter - Hang Tough bags are for real men.


Luxury German designer bags.

Ingenious, deliberate, precise.

Material: exclusive south German cow leather


Executive Line:

Business bag with safe.


Life Line:


Lieb Ju Design - An Introduction

Founded in 2014, Lieb Ju, a Denglish word pronounced /’li:b ju:/, means “love you” and “love yourself”. 

It started off with women's hand bags. Now, one year later, Kiera, our CEO & designer, is putting her better half on the market. Kiera's better half is of course, the men's collection! Hang Tough - My Way.

Why is the men's collection named Hang Tough?
Hang Tough represents the ambition, power, ingenuity and multifaceted nature of real men. We took the time to observe men, study them and their movements, because every man should be able to sport a bag fashionably and with taste. For real men who are professional and like to cut loose, we have developed the Life and Executive Lines.


Hang Tough - Luxury Bags for your business.








Life Line - Messenger Bag Perks





Executive Line - Luxury Business Bag Perks

Business bag with safe.









Let's Hang Tough Together - Campaign “Unique with Attitude”

Start:
In February 2015 we started to work on a novel generation of business bags. Based on innovative ideas, high quality materials and technological knowhow. Our first productions resulted in combinations of leather and metal.
Based on our private resources we developed and tested the first prototypes.

Intermediate goals we have already achieved:
  • Design and development of a novel, high quality collection of prototypes
  • Raw materials from Europe
  • Production within Europe

Final goal of the Indiegogo campaign:
$ 15,000 would enable us to start marketing and sales of a first collection. In addition, further development and enlargement of the collection could be induced by this.





Reviews

“My wife's got class and she knows me. She got me the ceramic bag with a safe. It's practical, light and nobody else in town has one.” John S. (NYC, USA)

"The black Platon is the Ferrari of all bags!" Thomas W. (Berlin, Germany)

"I got a bag [soft shell messenger] for my tablet, it's perfect for my time on the beach"  Gregory L. (Sydney, Australia)


Materials:

Luxury Southern German Cow Leather





Your Name ...


Dedicate any bag from any of our collections to yourself or a loved one.

The dedication will be made on:

  • the hang tag, and
  • an elegant metal plate located inside each bag.

We suggest you make your dedication on any bag from the Life or Emotion lines. These two lines represent those slippery moments in time which one cherishes above all else.

You will also get a thank you card. You can choose to receive your perk via post or come to our studio in Germany so we can get to know you and your namesake a little better.

The cherry on top: we will share your dedication with bloggers and the press announcing any information you decide to share with us as to the purpose of your dedication.




Feel the inspiration of Ibiza...

Feel the inspiration of Ibiza while enjoying the beach, the hotspots and highlights the island has to offer. The designer Kiera Nagy will guide you through her inspiration and together you can create the ultimate design. The creation the two of you come up with will forever be marked with your name in remembrance of the Ibiza spirit, Lieb Ju care and doing it like Hang Tough - my way! You decide if you want to have this bag as an one of a kind piece or if you would like Lieb Ju to continue producing your Ibiza inspired bag.

Yemanja Beach Club - Restaurant & Blue Marlin Ibiza

Ibiza Dalt Vila



Support us in realizing dreams.



Shipping Fees

  • Free shipping to Germany
  • $ 25 shipping to other EU countries
  • $ 50 shipping to the rest of the world


FAQ's

Q) How can I support your campaign without purchasing a perk?
First of all, thank you, with cherries and chocolate on top! To support us without making a perk purchase, simply do one or more of the following:
You are most welcome to make a purchase
Spread the word by an (legal) means possible, we are on FB, Twitter, Instagram & Pinterest too!

Q) How do I select multiple perks that aren't a packaged deal?
Simply add up all of the relevant contribution amounts, select the most expensive of your perks, and enter in your custom total contribution amount. We'll send you an email after you order to confirm your selection of items and colors.

Q) How do I calculate international shipping if I select multiple perks?
If you select a package, please use the shipping amount that we have provided there.

Q) How long do I have to wait before my order is delivered? 

 “Fortune favors the prepared”
-  Louis Pasteur

We will fulfill our orders in chronological order. If you are the first to make a purchase, yours will be the first sent off!

Q) Are there duty/VAT charges?
If you live outside of the EU, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.


Thank you for hanging tough with us!

Quality,

Taste

They are highlights to your personality.

By buying local raw materials, we offer safe, reliable and fair products at fair prices.By selling to you directly and through fair pricing, we offer comparable products at 70% off luxury prices.
