story:
======================================================

PLEASE NOTE This Update:  Thank you for your support, great feedback and the questions!  We have decided to put this campaign on hold and work with our investors to complete our prototypes before returning to the Crowdfunding.  Those of you that have already pledged their support, can request a refund through Indiegogo or stay on - we will honor your pledges at the current level committed and fulfill when product ready to ship.  Please let us know if you have any questions or comments info@lucantech.com.

=====================================================


We share the pain and loss of migrants who have and are suffering unspeakable tragedies in search of a better life and to escape war!  We are committing 5% of our sales and all of your contribution under the $5 perk to be donated to Mercy Corps Refugee Crisis Response Fund with possible eligibility for corporate matching.

3G & 4G Cellular Watch: Works without pairing with a cellphone.  Make and receive calls, blog, tweet, etc. Wired and Wireless headphones

Modular Design: Fully customizable hardware. Add extra batteries, credit card readers, and more.  An open platform for 3rd party modules.

Independent Fitness Tracker: GPS and 4G built-in, no need to bring phone with you!  Accurate step count, heart rate, and more.

Invisible Input Interface: Capacitive touch on two sides.  Scroll & navigate without touching the screen.

All-in-one payments: NFC built-in.  Mag-stripe emulation, pay anywhere credit cards are accepted.

Smart Pairing:  Automatically  turns 4G and GPS  on or off based on  phone connection availability. Pairs with phone through Bluetooth when near phone, through 4G LTE when away from phone.

LucanTech Smartwatch in the press

Lucan technologies, Inc. Introduces a Completely Re-Designed Modular Smartwatch


Why are we excited about the Chameleon Smartwatch?

The Chameleon Smartwatch is LucanTech's answer to the shortcomings of current offerings in the market that present low end choices of glorified pedometers to higher end offerings that must be tethered to your cellphone to achieve full functionality of the device.  

We believe a smartwatch should be a companion device for your cellphone when you want, but also function independently to offer a seamless, connected 4G experience when you choose to leave your phone behind.  

We believe bio sensors should be integrated in the same device that supports GPS and music during your workout.

We believe in modular design and the advantages of highly customizable functionality, individualized styling, and upgradability to extend the use of your wearable device and reduce e-waste.   

We believe the adoption of mobile payments for convenience and security can be accelerated through the use of unique mag strip emulation that does not depend on merchant investment in unique point of sale devices.

If you share these beliefs and vision for what a smartwatch can be, we ask you to read on and join us in support of this campaign!

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to achieve a successful Indiegogo campaign that will: 

  • Provide the funds necessary to complete our design and bring a truly innovative product to market.
  • Create greater awareness for the vision and advantages of the first modular smartwatch.
  • Help disrupt complacent smartwatch design that is satisfied with choices of reduced functionality or a required companion device.
Supporters can add their voice and share in several perks including:
  • Heavily discounted offerings for early adopters.
  • Eligibility for sweepstakes drawing for free Chameleon Smartwatches. 
  • Participation in promotional items as shown in Perks 
  • Share in contributions to the Mercy Corps Refugee Crisis Response Fund to aid those in need.


The Impact

We have spend nearly a year to perfect our design.  We believe that the current smartwatch companies can and should produce better products with more features with the consumers in mind.  Dissatisfied with what is available, we have taken on the challenge!  We believe that this product when completed, will disrupt the current offerings and result in better products for all. 


Risks & Challenges

Our team is comprised of seasoned entrepreneurs, hardware and software designers, fashion gurus, user experience designers, and supply chain experts with more than 20 years of entrepreneurial and manufacturing experience, so rest assured the smartwatches will exceed your expectations.

We are technologists, innovators and fashion designers! We have done our homework, so the risks are minimal. We have identified and locked in our manufacturers and technology partners. 

We are developing a truly unique and revolutionary product and paying attention to every detail.    We are leveraging decades of experience and key learning from 100s of products developed at companies like Intel, Dell, and IBM.  Hence, our products come with the best quality, with no compromises and no excuses!

Other Ways You Can Help

We recognize that not all our supporters are in the market for a smartwatch. However, if you share our passion for modular design, reduction of e-waste, and independent functionality we ask for your support in other ways:

  • Use the Indiegogo tools to share our message and help inspire others to consider what is possible in smartwatch technology, beyond the limitation of current offerings.
  • Confirm we are on the right track and voice your desire for change with a contribution of $5 or more, while yielding a donation to help with the current refugee crisis.
  • Register for our Sweepstakes to become a LucanTech Insider and help create awareness of our campaign while qualifying for a free Chameleon Smartwatch! 

Who We Are

Murat Erdogan - CEO and Founder 
18+ years of technology product development, leading US and China-based design and manufacturing initiatives and global supply chain coordination. Formerly with Intel, NVidia, EnergyHub, BriteHub, and Omne Mobile payments

Tom Maynard - COO
30 years of industry experience with global project and program management and broad IT experience and expertise in leadership, programs and project management, innovation, process re-engineering, problem solving, quality, continual improvement, with 20+ years of global ops and management at IBM.

Justice Kwesi Kwarteng  - CMO and Brand Strategist

Experienced Fashion Executive, Brand Strategist, Designer, Marketer, Event Producer, Entrepreneur & Business Consultant. Founder of Colorado Fashion Week and The JTA Group.

Kyle Etsler - Director of Technology
Lead Software  and Web Developer, ThingWorx technology developer, creative artist.  Everything Software!

Ross Amans - Director of Hardware Design

 30+years hardware design experience at Tektonix, Intel, Dell, Firmlogics, Newisy’s. Everything Hardware!

Kris Lovin - Marketing and Social Content Manager
Sales and marketing experience.  Everything Social and Social Media!

Shipping

Where do we ship? 
At this time Chameleon is available in the US, Canada, Japan, the EU (all 28 countries), Norway, Switzerland, Australia, New Zealand, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, India, Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Peru & Mexico. International shipping dates may vary dependent on certification in country. 

When we start shipping* 
Chameleon pre-orders will begin to be fulfilled in the February/March 2016 time frame on a first-ordered, first- received basis. Lucan Technologies, Inc. will keep you notified of your Chameleon ship date.


FAQs

  • What is a SmartWatch? According to Google, A SmartWatch is a mobile device with a touchscreen display, designed to be worn on the wrist. "the main benefit of a SmartWatch is that it keeps you constantly updated without having to whip out your smartphone"
  • What is modularity? Modularity refers to hardware features that can be added or removed from the base design allowing consumers to personalize their SmartWatch.  Modularity assures that consumers own a product they are happy with, extends product life.
  • How is LucanTech SmartWatch Modular? The LucanTech SmartWatch has a unique patent pending design that accommodates different hardware modules to be plugged onto the watch similar to the way you would plug in a USB stick to a computer.  Modularity allows you to personalize your watch hardware to cater your needs
  • What modules are available? We will create many of our own attachments but we are excited to see what others create as we are an open platform.  Initially we plan to produce heart rate monitor, USB, Audio jack, credit card swipe, and microphone but plan to produce a high resolution camera and more as we move forward.  We will work with 3rd party partners to develop many more modules.
  • How is LucanTech SmartWatch Modularity different than other modular watches?  We have designed in modularity to enhance your experience and not limit it.  Our base SmartWatch is complete and includes everything you would need out of the box.  The modules are additional features to cater to your needs and lifestyle.  All other “modular SmartWatches” require you to use or buy modules for basic features like GPS, gyroscope etc. which defeats the idea of modularity.
  • What processor are you using?  Unlike other SmartWatches in the market, we have decided to use Intel 64bit Quad Core CPUs with integrated 4G LTE to give us the ultimate power and flexibility.
  • What Operating System do you support?Our SmartWatches will run either Windows 10 or Latest full Android.  You will be able to choose what OS before shipment.
  • What is the Battery Capacity?  This is where our product Rocks!  Our base models will have ~800mAh batteries embedded on to the bands.  We are also planning to offer additional ~1000mAh optional battery for the case.
  • Can I change my bands?  Yes!  You can change the skins that go on to the bands. 
  • What is fingerprint reader?  A fingerprint reader is a device that uses your fingerprint to identify you.  It is more secure than facial and voice recognition and works by taking an image of your finger print and matches to a master copy it has securely stored.
  • What is NFC? NFC (Near Field Communication) is utilized by the LucanTech SmartWatch to support secure credit card transactions at the point of purchase.
  • How does the LucanTech SmartWatch mobile payment differ from Apple Pay? Apple Pay uses NFC, a wireless protocol, to complete a transaction at a terminal.  However, in order for the consumers to be able to use Apple Pay, the merchants have to have a wireless terminal available.  It is estimated that 95% of the terminals cannot accept Apple Pay or Google Wallet since they have not been converted to accept wireless transactions.  LucanTech Smartwatch includes NFC, but will also work anywhere a traditional credit card terminal is available.  LucanTech has a unique partnership with Omne Mobile Payments to offer a complete digital wallet feature that will work anywhere a traditional credit card terminal is available.  Paired with a finger print reader, bio sensors and a secure element, our cellular SmartWatch offers the most secure digital wallet yet!
  • How does the LucanTech SmartWatch credit card emulation work? Unlike the current solutions like Apple Pay, which relies on NFC, the solution on LucanTech watches emulate the magnetic stripe data from cards and send that data wirelessly to traditional credit card terminals. The terminal detects that data as if a card has been swiped through it and processes it in the same way as a plastic credit card would.  This means you can use your LucanTech SmartWatch to pay for anything from gas for your car to groceries anywhere traditional credit cards are accepted!
  • How do I conduct a transaction using my watch? LucanTech takes the security of your information very seriously. LucanTech has implemented measures where by your information will be secure without making it inconvenient for you to access. When you put on your LucanTech SmartWatch, the biometric sensors will be able to recognize that you are now wearing your watch. You will then be able to unlock it on demand with your fingerprint, choose the credit card you want, wave your hand over the terminal and you are done!  Confirm your transaction to complete the purchase!
  • What is an IR blaster and how would I use it? An IR (Infrared) blaster enables your LucanTech SmartWatch to perform as a remote for IR controlled devices like a TV, stereo, or to advance presentation slides at a business meeting. 
  • Does the LucanTech SmartWatch support health apps? Yes, the LucanTech SmartWatch features an integrate health sensor and supports android health apps for heart rate, nutrition, walk/run/bike distance, speed, calories burned, route mapping, sleep quality and more.
  • What options are available for me to navigate menus on my LucanTech SmartWatch? Your LucanTech SmartWatch provides the ultimate flexibility to navigate the many functions and apps supported by your device.  In addition to the fully enabled touch screen, the device also has touch enabled navigation built on to the case for navigation within menus, navigate up/down, left/right, zoom as well as support for gesture and voice commands, back/forward buttons and a familiar “home button” to exit from a displayed menu.
  • Does my LucanTech SmartWatch have an FM radio? Yes, you may listen to FM radio on your LucanTech SmartWatch through the USB connected headphones.
  • Is it Bluetooth, WiFi, and a standalone phone?  Yes, Yes, and Yes! In addition to standard Bluetooth, and WiFi connectivity, your LucanTech SmartWatch is a fully functional, independent, 3G/4G phone!
  • Does it support NFC, IR, and Chromecast? Yes, Yes, and Yes! Conduct point of sale purchases without reaching for your credit card, use the IR blaster as a remote, or share an image or video on a Chromecast enabled TV with your LucanTech SmartWatch!
  • What AV options are supported by my Lucan SmartWatch?  The LucanTech SmartWatch supports audio playback through a number of options, including: an integrated large speaker, via Bluetooth headphones, through wired headphones, or transmittal to WiFi connected external speakers.  The device also has an integrated FM radio for on the go music or to stay in touch with breaking news/weather/traffic information.  The LucanTech SmartWatch also has an integrated microphone for audio recording. The main watch display supports video playback while on the go, or you can share images or video to Chromecast connected monitors or TVs.
  • Does the LucanTech SmartWatch work with Chromecast? Yes, you can share images or video to Chromecast connected monitors or TVs.
  • Is there a camera on the SmartWatch? The LucanTech SmartWatch provides ultimate flexibility for the way you take pictures or record videos.  The SmartWatch comes with a front facing camera in the face of the watch is perfect for selfies or for use in a video chat!  Modular cameras will be developed in the feature to enable you to easily take pictures or video of the world around you.  With the combination of the built in camera as well as the modular camera, you can unleash your creativity and use both cameras concurrently, resulting in  picture-in-picture photos and videos. 
  • What are the purposes for the mini-USB port? The module provided mini-USB port provides a means of charging your Lucan Smartwatch without the need for clumsy chargers prone to wear or breakage.  You only need a mini-USB connector to charge your Lucan Smartwatch from any power source! 
  • Can I make and receive calls independent of a paired phone? Yes, the LucanTech SmartWatch is 3G/4G LTE enabled and has its own Sim card to support your call/messaging needs without having to carry along your phone.  Enjoy your date, run, movie or whatever you are out to do, without a heavy and bulky phone.
  • Can I pair with or connect to my cell phone? Yes, your LucanTech SmartWatch can be paired with your phone via Bluetooth or Wifi when desired.
  • Can I use my existing wired headphones? Yes you can enjoy your favorite headphones with LucanTech SmartWatch.
  • Can I use my existing Bluetooth headphones? Yes, as long as your headphones meet Bluetooth standard specs, you can pair it with LucanTech SmartWatch and enjoy.
  • How do I charge the watch? Your SmartWatch comes with an integrated mini-USB port that provides a means of charging your LucanTech SmartWatch without the need for clumsy chargers prone to wear or breakage.  You only need a mini-USB connector to charge your Lucan SmartWatch from any power source!  We are also planning to integrate wireless charging to simplify your life even further!
  • What colors are available? Our modular and customizable design uses skins to help colorize our watch bands.  We plan to offer many colors as we develop our cases.  An email will be sent for you to select colors, prior to shipment.
  • Is shipping Included? Yes, we have decided to make this simple and shipping is included free of charge for a limited time.
  • Is my credit card information secure on my watch? Yes, we are planning to use secure element, which is ultra-secure - According to Google, A secure element is a tamper-resistant platform capable of securely hosting applications and their confidential and cryptographic data in accordance with the rules and security requirements set forth by a set of well-identified trusted authorities.
  • How are these SmartWatches different than other SmartWatches? LucanTech SmartWatches are inspired by you and our frustration from the lack of features on existing Watches.  We believe that a Smartphone can be elegant and should not depend on a cell phone to function.  We support convergence of technology to eliminate duplication, waste and reduce complicated web of device interaction.  We believe we are the only modular SmartWatch with unmatched battery capacity, wired and wireless headphones, 4G LTE, GPS, NFC and more.
  • If I have questions, how can I reach your team?
    Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible! 
    For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. 
    For all other questions regarding ChameleonSmartwatch, contact us at  info@lucantech.com.

Can I pair with or connect to
     my cell phone? Yes, your LucanTech SmartWatch can be paired with your phone via
     Bluetooth or Wifi when desired.

Can I use my existing wired
     headphones? Yes you can enjoy your favorite headphones with LucanTech
     SmartWatch.

Can I use my existing Bluetooth
     headphones? Yes, as long as your headphones meet Bluetooth standard specs, you
     can pair it with LucanTech SmartWatch and enjoy.

How do I charge the
     watch? Your
     SmartWatch comes with an integrated mini-USB port that provides a means of
     charging your LucanTech SmartWatch without the need for clumsy chargers
     prone to wear or breakage.  You only need a mini-USB connector to
     charge your Lucan SmartWatch from any power source!  We are also planning to integrate
     wireless charging to simplify your life even further!

What colors are
     available? Our
     modular and customizable design uses skins to help colorize our watch
     bands.  We plan to offer many colors
     as we develop our cases.  An email will be sent for you to select
     colors, prior to shipment.

Is shipping Included? Yes, we have decided to make
     this simple and shipping is included free of charge for a limited time.

Is my credit card information
     secure on my watch? Yes, we are planning to use secure element, which
     is ultra-secure - According to Google, A secure element is
     a tamper-resistant platform capable of securely hosting
     applications and their confidential and cryptographic data in accordance
     with the rules and security requirements set forth by a set of
     well-identified trusted authorities.

How are these SmartWatches
     different than other SmartWatches? LucanTech SmartWatches are inspired by you and
     our frustration from the lack of features on existing Watches.  We
     believe that a Smartphone can be elegant and should not depend on a cell
     phone to function.  We support convergence of technology to eliminate
     duplication, waste and reduce complicated web of device interaction.
      We believe we are the only modular SmartWatch with unmatched battery
     capacity, wired and wireless headphones, 4G LTE, GPS, NFC and more.

If I have questions, how can I reach your team?Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible! For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. For all other questions regarding ChameleonSmartwatch, contact us at  info@lucantech.com.

story:
MEET AERIUS.

THE NEW WORLD'S SMALLEST QUADCOPTER®

We launched AERIUS as a Pre-Sale Item on AxisDrones.com last month and the response has been nothing shy of amazing! 


Tom's Guide: "One of BEST Drones of 2015"


Read the Full Hands-On Tom's Guide Review Here


It's just so cute...

3cm x 3cm x 2cm



AERIUS HAS RECENTLY BEEN FEATURED ON:


            

  

     


Features & Technology:

  • The NEW World's Smallest Quadcopter ® - 3cm x 3cm x 2cm
  • Ultra-Compact 2.4 gHz Controller with Drone Storage Compartment
  • 5-7 Minute Flight Time per 15 Minute Charge via USB Cable
  • High Quality, Rechargeable 3.7v 80mAh Battery
  • 2-Speeds Pre-programmed for Desired Level of Flight Sensitivity
  • Headless Mode Allows for Beginners to Ensure Flight Orientation
  • 6-Axis Gyro-Stabilization Keeps Drone Stable and Centered
  • 360 Degree Rotational Yaw Allows Users to Seamlessly Adjust Orientation 
  • Pre-programmed "Trick-Mode" Algorithm Provides Amazing Flips and Rolls!
  • Bright LED Colored Lights for Night Flight and Drone Orientation
  • Available in 4 Color Choices and Controller Accents
  • Portable, Fun, Unique and a Great way to Practice Flying Drones Indoors! 



What We Need and What You Get:

We are now just $26,220 away from our final manufacturing payment in pre-orders that is due this coming week, we are hoping Indiegogo Backers will help us reach that goal in the next couple of weeks!


The best part is, we will begin fulfilling perks by October 23rd, whether we meet our goal on Indiegogo or not! 


That means no crazy wait times for your perks to arrive after the campaign ends, no delays, no hiccups in production, everything is produced and ready to ship out, we just need to make our final payment to get them on the plane!


After the campaign ends and all pre-orders and perks are fulfilled pricing will go up to $40 + Shipping here and on our website, get yours ahead of the holiday gift buying rush and save some cheddar!


Reserve Yours Today!

story:
Update: 9/13/15 

We are getting lots of shares and views, but haven't been getting the financial backing we are looking for.  Please remember, EVERY person who helps fund will get their selected perk, regardless of total funds raised.

Please help us reach our goal!

Why?

There have been 16 line of duty deaths of law enforcement officers since August 1st.  Seven in the last week.  Our mission is that all heroes are honored, and no sacrifice is forgotten.  As we continue in our goal to see the murder of heroes curtailed, we additionally offer apparel that allows you to show YOUR support for those that stand between you and evil.

Sheepdog Significance

There are wolves. There are sheep. And there are Sheepdogs.

There are hundreds of references to shepherds and sheep in the Bible.  In both literal and parabolic context, sheep represent innocence, goodness, purity, and even weakness.  Similarly, wolves and other predators represent evil, wrongdoing, deceit and ugliness.  In Psalms 23, David refers to the Lord as his Shepherd.  In the New Testament, there are references to Christ as both Lamb and the Shepherd.  As our Great Shepherd, God promises to look after His flock.

Additionally, throughout history there is much documentation of the important role that Sheepdogs held in their relationship to the shepherd and his flock. Always vigilant. Loyal. Tirelessly performing the thankless duty of protecting the flock. Why? Because that's what God created Sheepdogs to do. This is their calling.

Much time has passed, and many things have changed since the earliest mention of Abel, son of Adam, as the first keeper of sheep. Wolves, however, still persist in their desire to bring harm and wrong to the world. Daily, there is a struggle, where only the strength and will of the chosen few can ensure the victory of good over evil.

Good remains victorious only because there are still those who are called.  Those born to serve.  Those who will stand against the evil that threatens the flock.   They protect the weak.  They defend the innocent.  They will run toward the danger from which others flee.  They will proactively seek out those who would harm their flock, and destroy them.  They will, if necessary, give their lives in defense of their flock.

They are our first responders.  They are our front line.  They are our first, and sometimes our last and only defense.  Military, Police, Fire, and others.  Our neighbors, our friends, our brothers and sisters.  They are to be revered, heralded as heroes.  They are to be lifted up as servants of the Great Shepherd, and to be honored when in their midst.  

They are SHEEPDOGS.

What We Need & What You Get

We are trying to generate capital to up our standing inventory, break into retail markets, and upgrade our equipment so that production can keep up with the demand that follows.

  • Specifically, we need to purchase a conveyor dryer and up our standing inventory by several thousand dollars so that our printing can become more of an "assembly line" rather than the current one at a time.  With our ability to produce more, we'll be able to seek larger market partners to continue to grow the Sheepdog brand, and our mission of honoring our heroes.
  • More visibility and more sales means more giving back, see below.
  • Our campaign is set up with the "Flexible Funding" option, which means that EVERY person who provides funding will receive their promised perk.  ** We are already producing, and have produced, hundreds of shirts, and are capable of filling all perk obligations even if we fail to reach our funding goal to upgrade our equipment. **
  • We hope that the exposure of our campaign will help us to develop partners who can help us ensure that any family who desires to have their hero memorialized with a Sheepdog T-shirt can have that happen.

The Impact

A portion of our revenues go directly or indirectly to support causes that we believe in.  Always has, Always will. That's not so strange. All businesses ultimately support the stuff they believe in.  The difference is, we're proud to let folks know the kinds of organizations that we like to support.  While we have no official affiliation or recognition from any groups at this time (hint. hint.  we are looking to partner up with quality organizations!), we currently support:

  • Flying Wheels Foundation

  • Chris Kyle Frog Foundation

  • Lone Survivor Foundation

  • Concerns of Police Survivors (COPS)

  • Weld County Sheriff Posse / Reserves

  • Rocky Mountain Christian Church


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if a monetary contribution to our success is not possible, you can help in the following ways:

  • Send people to our website, www.sheepdogtees.com
  • Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/sheepdogtees
  • Follow us on Twitter:  www.twitter.com/sheepdogltd
  • Use the indiegogo share tools!

PERKS

$5 Perk

$20 Perk

$50 Perk

$75 Family Perk

$75 Memorial Perk --  Tees will be similar to shown.  These tees were made for the family of Officer Jay Sheridan, Limon, Colorado PD, EOW 3/9/2011.  Officer Sheridan's name and memorial tees used respectfully with permission of the Sheridan Family.  Shipped to department of your choice, with your thanks.

$100 Perk -- SIX Shirts

$250 Perk -- 15 Memorial Shirts  We'll work with you on the customization, and you'll get 15 of one style of memorial shirt.  Sizes XS-2X.

$300 Perk.  We'll customize a Sheepdog shirt just for your unit, department, shift, or cause!  You get 20 of them!  

$500 Perk, You name it, keep it clean! 50 custom tees with the Sheepdog Logo!

$1000 Perk.  We tag the left sleeve with the Sheepdog Flag patch, the back is yours!  Two colors, 100 shirts.  We'll help your creation happen!

Follow us on Twitter:  www.twitter.com/sheepdogltd

Use the indiegogo share tools!

PERKS

$50 Perk

$75 Family Perk

$75 Memorial Perk --  Tees will be similar to shown.  These tees were made for the family of Officer Jay Sheridan, Limon, Colorado PD, EOW 3/9/2011.  Officer Sheridan's name and memorial tees used respectfully with permission of the Sheridan Family.  Shipped to department of your choice, with your thanks.

$100 Perk -- SIX Shirts

story:
We are asking for money to construct the store we will be selling these clothes out of. We need about $2,500 to complete the correct modifications to the retail space in Kent, OH. The name of the store will be Tailor Made. Each item in the store will be made by local designers in the community. 


Why is this beneficial?

Revots Lyerhc is more about making clothes, or even making a profit. We want to change lives as well. Not only will we be making top quality apparel, we will also give the youth a chance to show the world their artistic expressions. Our scholarships are geared toward the students who believe in their art no matter if its dance, music, fashion, etc. We don't want to discourage students from wanting to go to college because of their study choice, we want to embrace it.

We believe if we can provide students a way onto a college campus, who knows what they can accomplish. Some may even enroll into college as a photographer, but graduate as a lawyer. There are endless possibilities. 

As far as apparel, we want to deliver artistic expression in everyday life. Whether it's an intriguing quote to and original painting. Our goal is to stand out above the rest by also displaying hidden talent.


We at Revots Lyrehc want to spin a negative and make it positive. Music and fashion rule the minds of the youth today, so why not include the two by motivating students to achieve greatness. 

Our Company is planning two scholarships to do just that. We are using 10% of our sales throughout the year to fund these scholarships. 

However, nothing in this world is free. We are hitting the community to get the word out! We don't want to take much or your time, we just want everyone to know our plan to change the future of these younger generations!


To give you an idea of how our shoes are made, watch below:

story:
Owl Boutique - Nha Trang, Vietnam


Hi everyone! I'm Jeremiah, 27 years old from Singapore. My girlfriend Ella is 25 years old and from Nha Trang, Vietnam. Together we've started a small business in ladies fashion, bikinis and beachwear. Nha Trang is Vietnam's resort city and is known for being host to the Miss Universe 2008 Pageant on July 14, 2008.

We have a portfolio of young freelance models, who help us present our collections. And also our shop assistants, who are usually from the poorer countryside.

We are always worried about one thing.

The ease in which these young ladies can be lured or conned into the sex trade.

So what we do specifically is get and give these girls a job before they fall into the downward spiral. We can't help all of them, but at least we can change the lives of some of them.

So please, read on and see how you can make a difference in the lives of these girls.


What We Need & What You Get

We need upwards of USD $5000 to find a new shop and a new home for the boutique.

The landlord has already cautioned us that we might need to find a new place by July. However, we've been looking around for a good location for months and the most similar shop we can find costs more than 5 times our current rental.

So even if the campaign does not reach its goal, the money will still be put into rental of the new shop space. I will personally come out with the shortfall because this cause means so much to me.

And because we want you to know how much of a change you have made into the lives of our young ladies... Some of the perks include a night's stay in a five star hotel in Nha Trang, a personal tour of Nha Trang by Ella and myself, get to meet some of our young ladies, free clothing or accessories and hand written notes and pictures of the young ladies whose lives have been made better because of your contribution.

Other perks include free international shipping - if there are items you'd like to buy, quarterly photo album and we're still thinking how else can we thank you :)

Some Items Sold in our Boutique:
1) Accessories - Necklaces and earrings.
2) Crop Tops
3) Bikinis Made in Nha Trang
4) Maxi dresses Made in Nha Trang
5) Tank Tops
6) T Shirts
7) Imported clothing, etc.

Other Ways You Can Help

So even if you can't help, help us tell the world about our little campaign and how we are starting to change the lives of our young ladies.

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! :)


Thanks!


Update Section

**Latest Update: 04/06/2015**

Bad news. We are moving by the 30 June instead of 28 July. Sigh. Am currently changing the logo to reflect the new name of our Boutique and then update our Facebook page accordingly. Being a world away isn't easy but I'm not giving up. Ella's searching hard for another location so we really need all the help we can get. Thanks so much for supporting! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

story:
MorningWood Glasses - In a class of its own... 

Elegant, Beautiful, Sustainably made in Santa Barbara, California, USA.

Creating elegant and refined wooden eyewear is really difficult! THAT'S WHY YOU HAVEN'T EVER SEEN THEM! There are lots of wooden eyewear brands in the market but almost all of them are clunky and lacking in design. The exceptions are a handful of exclusive brands that retail for upwards of $800! (Crazy expensive right?!). We set out with the goal of creating refined and beautiful wooden frames that will have you looking and feeling like a million bucks without the exorbitant price tag. What we're talking about are highly polished, elegant glasses with unrivaled style and fit. 

Our vision was to create a top quality, edgy and fun, one-of-a-kind glasses brand. Through perseverance, or maybe fate, we've been successful in pulling together some of the leading minds in eyewear design, wood manufacturing and technology to make this a reality. 

We've been working for over a year on gathering the right team and perfecting our manufacturing process. We are finally ready to scale to production. That is where you fit in. Join us and we'll give you the most awesome pair of sunglasses you have ever owned. PERIOD.


What You Get

Help us and we'll give you the most awesome pair of sunglasses you have ever owned. PERIOD.

Your purchase will help us lease industrial space and obtain the remaining equipment we need to finish setup of in-house production so we can begin shipping glasses to you!

We'll ship to you:

•An awesome brand and shades that all your friends will envy 

•Glasses sculpted from beautiful hardwoods equipped with Italian hinges and premium polarized scratch resistant lenses

•Refined/elegant frames by leading eyewear designer

•Personalized with engraved signature or other custom message                                (for example: "Happy Birthday Dad!")

•Sustainably crafted in Santa Barbara, California, USA 

A name to remember, a look you will never forget...


Our Guarantee 

We're so confident that you'll love your MorningWood Glasses, that if you don't you can send them back within 30 days of receipt for an exchange or full refund. 


Share The Love

Like our vision and our brand? (Who doesn't like Morning Wood?!) Share our campaign with your friends and lovers on social media!


Join the movement and let's make this happen!


About Us

While many eyewear companies buy from contract manufacturers overseas, our production is entirely Santa Barbara based allowing us to control the the entire process assuring the highest possible quality.

Controlling production also allows us to offer creative touches such as personalized laser engraving and entirely custom frames. We have assembled a world-class team; refined replicable frame manufacturing protocols and tooling; secured boutique retail partnerships; successfully manufactured prototypes and are moving into production at scale. Help us get frames shipped ASAP by joining us today!


Can I Order Rx MorningWood Glasses?

We do not currently offer prescription lenses however, you can take our frames to your local optometrist and have them outfitted with your lens prescription.

We'll ship to you:


•An awesome brand and shades that all your friends will envy 
•Glasses sculpted from beautiful hardwoods equipped with Italian hinges and premium polarized scratch resistant lenses
•Refined/elegant frames by leading eyewear designer
•Personalized with engraved signature or other custom message                                (for example: "Happy Birthday Dad!")
•Sustainably crafted in Santa Barbara, California, USA 
A name to remember, a look you will never forget...


Our Guarantee 
We're so confident that you'll love your MorningWood Glasses, that if you don't you can send them back within 30 days of receipt for an exchange or full refund. 



Share The Love

Like our vision and our brand? (Who doesn't like Morning Wood?!) Share our campaign with your friends and lovers on social media!


Join the movement and let's make this happen!

About Us


While many eyewear companies buy
from contract manufacturers overseas, our production is entirely
Santa Barbara
based
allowing
us to control the the
entire process assuring the highest possible quality.
Controlling production also allows us to offer
creative touches such as personalized laser engraving and entirely custom frames. We have assembled a world-class
team; refined replicable frame manufacturing protocols and tooling;
secured boutique retail partnerships; successfully manufactured prototypes and are moving into production at scale. Help us get frames shipped ASAP by joining us today!

Can I Order Rx MorningWood Glasses?
We do not currently offer prescription lenses however, you can take our frames to your local optometrist and have them outfitted with your lens prescription.

story:
Welcome to The Butterfly Boutique’s Indiegogo page,

All of my life along with hundreds of thousands of other women, have struggled to find fashionable clothing owing to my size, and when I have they have been at almost extortionate prices.

At The Butterfly Boutique I'm going to do things a bit differently, I'll bring you fashion that’s affordable in sizes 14 to 32, with new lines arriving every other week there’s bound to be something you’ll love!

I have a passion for plus-size fashion and it is a firm belief of mine that every woman deserves to look and feel her best even if she is larger than the UK average dress size 14.

I will carry this seasons trends along with everyday basics, special occasion wear and everything in between at prices to fit everyone’s budget.

There’s a tonne of perks available to all donators, and early bird specials too for the first supporters including discount, advertisement opportunities, and free clothing!

Everyone who’s followed a link from Curve Clothing will know the story of starting my business from home, in to a market stall then into a shop.

I hope to do it all over again but bigger and better!

Curve Clothing was a finalist in The Best New Business Awards for 2013, and I was nominated for a Special Recognition Award for my work by The Prince's Trust and I was also made a Prince's Trust Young Ambassador in November 2013.

Around £400 will be used to cover fees and start up overheads.

With £1000 The Butterfly Boutique will launch an online store with a fabulous range of affordable clothing, £2000 will enable us to have an even bigger range including underwear and hosiery. 

With this initial support I'll begin the path to once again opening a shop in the North East of England and continuing and expanding the online store.

It would be hugely appreciated if you could share the link with friends and family.

Follow The Butterfly Boutique on Facebook & Instagram to keep up to date and take a look at www.TheButterflyBoutique.co.uk

xox
<3

story:
Make a Difference!

Evolve over Hate Clothing was originally started in 2011 and worked closely with the music industry to try and give kids a positive message to follow. This campaign is to bring back the clothing line so that we can work with charities and try to improve the community. This cause is important to me as I grew up in a broken home and understand the struggles of growing up with limited help. If you help us raise the money to get this off the ground you will be helping get kids off the streets and have someone to look up to.

What We Need & What You Get

Ok, so here’s the crunch. This line has been started before and still has a following years later, but we need a little help getting it to the right place. I want to be able to pull together the funds so that proceeds will go to Big Brother, Big Sister and Homeless Teens.

So, we are asking for just $1,500 to help us get shirts printed and ordered. If we break that barrier, any money over and above our target will be donated to Big Brother, Big Sister and Homeless Teens and, once we are all set up, we will be donating to both of these charities on a quarterly basis.

For your donation, you will be rewarded with:

  • $10 will get you a personalized thank you message
  • $25 will get you a personalized thank you message, plus a design of your choice
  • $50 will get you a personalized thank you message, plus two designs of your choice
  • $100 will get you a personalized thank you video and two designs of your choice
  • $500 will get you a personalized thank you video and one of each design
  • $1,000+ will get you a lifetime sponsor spot on our website and personal thank you video plus all designs that are put out.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that there are thousands of people, businesses looking to get off the ground so if you want to learn more about ours, take a look at the following links. And, if you like what you see, please feel free to pass the word onto your friends and families.

  • Facebook www.facebook.com/evolveoverhate
  • LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/brandonwskinner
  • Website http://evolveoverhate.com

Thanks you for taking the time out to read our proposal and I hope that you will be able to help us.

Thank you for taking the time to read over this.

Brandon
Evolve over Hate

story:
Vagn Schou former Danish plastic manufacturer in 1990 created Unicomputer A/S and developed thousands of high-end computers which in 1997 became Award from PC WORLD for the product Pentium II 266 testet in PC WORLD nr. 11/97 as the fastest computer ever seen.

A near friend of Vagn from his youth became  Alzheimer, and is now dead. Of emotional reason Vagn made research examinating the market for GPS products  who could better Quality of life for Dementia.

Vagn realized  the market of quality GPS products was very poor, to expensive, and the need for new innovative effective products were real.

In 2013 Vagn created "Uni Care Products ApS" (hereafter UCP), with intention to develop more effective and cheap products for Dementia. No monthly Fee´s, Free of freight cost Worldwide. Warranty 1 year.

Now we have made an 2-way calling GPS Tracker Watch with pedometer and location update evry 1 minute -yet keep good battery life on the 420 mAh battery inside the Watch, consumption ½ of similar products..

Also we wanted to make the Watch so slim and thin as possible , and could be used of both men, woman, and kids in school, also as security for travelling bussiness persons,  and  was as easy to use as possible in the daily life, so we thoose to charge the battery by using Magnetic inductive charging instead of doing this by normal USB connector- this will make it easier for elders to recharge the battery after 3-5 days use and also make the watch more waterproff. Note the TPU strap is lock with screw into the Watch and can be changed.

Button 1:Voice Message:Press “button 1”to light the screen , Press again to come to recording phone list

Press to choose the number ,Hold button to record , Loosen finger to send the voice message to selected number

Button 2:SOS button/pick up and hang up :Emergency calling : Hold SOS button will call SOS numbers automatically for 3 times, if no one pick up the phone 

When there is a call coming , press to answer, press again to hang up

When use button 3 to select numbers , Hold button 2 can call selected number

Button 3:Dial/Answer : Press “button 3”  to light the screen , Press again to enter phone list

Press to choose the phone number , Hold to call selected number

Button1/Button2/Button3 : A call coming , press any key to pick up the phone

Button 4:Power /Hang up /Back: Hold to turn on the watch , Press to Hang up the calling ,

if on submenu, Press to back to time display

Without SIM card , Hold button can turn off the watch


The GPS Watch use The Ublox-5M module with sensitivity-159dbm and you can use an micro-SIM card from your local Net-provider. The Celluar unit use LDS antenna and use high quality mic and speaker for clear and loud sound when making phone calls and voice message from the watch.

Main functions

  After finish “adding watch”

  1. Press icon on the right corner , choose the listed watch

    （1）press “Loc”to get the current position (Please make sure: 1. The watch is power on with SIM card inside; 2. The SIM card has sufficient Data; 3. GSM connectivity is normal.）

    （2）Press“track”to choose the tracking period ,click “play”to see the routing history. There are three map version “satellite””2D””3D”

    （3）Voice message

    Press Voice Icon “  ”to enter “voice message” menu ,press “Hold to talk” to record , Loosen finger to send  (Remark:max 15 seconds to record )

    ②when there is a voice message come from the watc, there will be a red point on icon . Press icon to hear new voice message

    （4）Press”dial”to enter dial menu ,Press call icon to call watch

    （5）Press “Guard”to call the watch and it will answer automatically, the guardian can hear the surroundings of the wearer, without watch being noticed.

Setting up and control side

（1）Press wearer’s picture to enter basic information page, check and modify

（2）Press“message centre”to check SOS alert, battery low alert, geo fence in/out alert,  administration right transfer, guarding the watch , delete the watch etc

（3）Press“Geo fence”to set area range

（4）Click”Family members”, can transfer administration right , cancel guarding ,add members ,check or modify, delete family member （only the administrator can delete other members）

（5）Click “Watch tools”to set“remote watch turn off” ,“Detach notice””Work mode””Watch time”“watch tracking” , “Alarm”,“Mute” etc

Pls note : Only Adminitrator can remote turn off the watch

Above you se the 2 maine menu side you use in the APP. One is the Main Funktion GPS side and the other is the setting up and control side. From these 2  sides the APP administrator control the watch and who is allow to call to/from the Watch and can see all alarm message and multi Geo-fence from the Watch, and ofcause the GPS location of the Watch .



The Plant

UCP is working close developing to the manufacturing plant situated in China, who has over 500 skilful workers and a team of R&D professionals dedicated to turn ideas to innovative products. There is implemented ISO 9001 system to have our product quality closely monitored to meet the requirements of our costumers.

The plant is well equipped and provides comprehensive services, including mold making, plastic injection, silk screenbing, pad printing, hot stamping, spraying, bonding, SMT and assembling line, enable us to meet diversify needs.

The GPS Unit

my/ GPS watch 01 is third generation of fine GPS Watches, and have all the facilities to secure our dear one. Statistics show that more than 2 % of the population worldwide have, or will become Alzheimer Disease, and the cost of a GPS Watch is a small price to pay securing our elderly people. Every day a dementia patient is wandering, and cost the community a fortune to find, and many times it is to late to find the patient alive. 

my/GPS Watch is dedicated to give all possible security for the person wearing the unit, and allow caregivers to follow the user in his behaviour pattern without the users attention. With 5 meter accuracy you can monitor position of the patient on Map or Picture in real time with 1 minutes interval.

my/GPS Watch is the newest and sharpest GPS watch in the world, developed to meet all the needs that will appear for a Alzheimer patient. We have together with a range of Caregivers (Residential Homes) made research of daily problems the Caregivers meet in their work with Alzheimer patients! We think the Features of my/GPS Watch 01 will meet all the needs.

Hardware Features:

1.  Ublox GPS/LBS positioning. Real time tracking

2.  WorldwideQuadband :GSM: 850/900/1800/1900

3.  SOS call and message alert

4.  Super low power consumption, ½ of similar products

5.  Voice message

6.  Watch release alert

7.  Pedometer

8.  Sreensize: 0,96 inch display

9.  Optional lockable security strap

10. Magnetic inductive charging

11. High grade waterproof

12. Double color  watch strap

13. Free Android, iOS mobile app tracking platform

14.Track route play

15. Multiple Geofence sized from 500M-2KM in circular or rectangle

16. 16 family numbers

17. Battery status display and low battery alert

2 ways calling GPS which tracker with Location every 1 minute keep similar battery life. Patent pending.

For Alzheimer, elderly, kids, or those who need immeditate care whenever there is an emergency.

A big SOS button can be easily touched , and make emergency calls in turn, until one of the pre-set numbers answered.

Magnetic inductive charging easier to use for Alzheimers and elders and improve waterproof performance comparing to USB charging.

Mass production of the first 1.000 units has taken place with a capacity of 1.000 units a day. We expect to manage delivering the first 500 units within 1 month from ending of the campaign.

The Phone Unit

myPhone S501 is an standard  Qualcomm based 4G phone(both EU and US-band version is available) with large 4.000mAh Battery for normal use in 3-5 days before re-charging is needed.The GPS tracker APP is pre-installed in the phone at the delivery , so all you need to do is to insert your local SIM-Card in the phone and you can start the APP and setup new user account and scan in the GPS watch bar-code on the watch -box with your phone camera and key in the watch phone number, and you are ready to use the Watch and the Tracker APP in the phone.


For branding of products as my/GPS Watch,my/Smart Watch, my/Phone, and my/Tablet we need distribution channels in US and other countries outside Scandinavia.

Developing of new products, in the Mobile Cloud area, are on going, and will continue.

Distributors to market the range of my/products, should already be in the field of Mobile Health Care, or have connection to Residential Homes. 

In advance, thanks for your help branding my/Products, and helping Caregivers to secure their love one, and allow these a better Quality of life, also to support Uni Care Products developing of new innovative products for a better life for you and Alzheimer patients.

Vagn Schou

story:
Short Summary

My Name is Ezekiel Crawford. I am an 18 year old creative from Auckland, New Zealand. Over the past year I have been developing a streetwear label called Slaeve, which will be going into production in the coming months.

After copious weeks of juggling part time work, an architecture degree and designing a label, I have been awarded the opportunity to showcase Slaeve to the world at this years New Zealand Fashion Week.

What I Need To Get There

The entire event has a multitude of expenses, and they break into two parts:

  1. Entry Free. The cost to be a part of the show is the biggest factor. The production, models, make up and other things supplied by the NZFW team will be a cost of $4500NZD + GST.
  2. Preparation and Creation. As the collection is yet to be finished, there is still money needed to be spent on materials, but also on items to go alongside each of the 10 looks (shoes, accessories, etc.)


What You Get

Every dollar contributed can never be thanked enough. However, in my best efforts, these are some of the things you will be awarded with if you conrtibute:

  1. Detailed concept sketches of sample designs for the premier collection.
  2. Personal copy of retail look-book.
  3. Discount codes for brand release later this year.
  4. Copy of "Slaeve: Beginning" online and hardcopy zine detailing the story, design and ambitions of the brand.
  5. VIP to showcase events such as release parties.  

The Impact

Just like anyone who is passionate about something, I have put hours upon hours each day into creating something I love. Now I have an opportunity to show some of the more influential people in the industry how I do things. The reasons why this is so important to me are:

  • Massive amount of exposure for the Slaeve label
  • National and International Recognition, but most importantly:
  • It will make my parents so proud!


Risks & Challenges

The major risk in being a part of this event is that while I am organising for Fashion Week I will simultaneously be preparing for Slaeve to go into production, ready to sell. This will be a massive challenge, and having financing for the event covered will make this so much easier.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute financially but you still want to help, here are some ways you can:

  1. Share this to Faebook! Let everyone know and hopefully someone you know might be able to help too! If you do share this, send me an email and I will thank you personally for your help. (ezekiel@lonelylonely.net)
  2. Follow Slaeve on social medias, and watch things take off!
  3. Comment and show support! Any words of positivity really do help at 2 am when I really want to sleep.

Website: slaeve.net
Instagram: instagram.com/slaeve
Facebook: facebook.com/slaeveclothing
Tumblr: slaeve.tumblr.com

Preparation and Creation. As the collection is yet to be finished, there is still money needed to be spent on materials, but also on items to go alongside each of the 10 looks (shoes, accessories, etc.)






What You GetEvery dollar contributed can never be thanked enough. However, in my best efforts, these are some of the things you will be awarded with if you conrtibute:


Detailed concept sketches of sample designs for the premier collection.
Personal copy of retail look-book.
Discount codes for brand release later this year.
Copy of "Slaeve: Beginning" online and hardcopy zine detailing the story, design and ambitions of the brand.
VIP to showcase events such as release parties.  

    The Impact Just like anyone who is passionate about something, I have put hours upon hours each day into creating something I love. Now I have an opportunity to show some of the more influential people in the industry how I do things. The reasons why this is so important to me are:  Massive amount of exposure for the Slaeve label National and International Recognition, but most importantly: It will make my parents so proud! 



   Risks & Challenges The major risk in being a part of this event is that while I am organising for Fashion Week I will simultaneously be preparing for Slaeve to go into production, ready to sell. This will be a massive challenge, and having financing for the event covered will make this so much easier.
    Other Ways You Can Help If you are not able to contribute financially but you still want to help, here are some ways you can:


Share this to Faebook! Let everyone know and hopefully someone you know might be able to help too! If you do share this, send me an email and I will thank you personally for your help. (ezekiel@lonelylonely.net)
Follow Slaeve on social medias, and watch things take off!
Comment and show support! Any words of positivity really do help at 2 am when I really want to sleep.


Website: slaeve.net
Instagram: instagram.com/slaeve
Facebook: facebook.com/slaeveclothing
Tumblr: slaeve.tumblr.com

story:
We made a functional bag using natural fabrics sourced from world-renown producers. It's an exquisite messenger that will age in an amazing way and will stay strong.   

Help us bring our project to life!

The adjustable 65" shoulder strap is long enough for people of any sizes.

 

Put your own battery inside the bag and connect it to the external port. This way you can charge the phone while using it.

You  can also place the phone inside the bag and connect it to the external  port with the included audio cable. You can then listen to music while  keeping your phone safe.

story:
Summary:

Hello! My name is Kathy and I love powerlifting. I was pretty lost in life and came across the sport by accident. I have always loved making things, especially clothing designs. I see a lot of potential in the market for powerlifting-focused activewear. Plus, it's fun! I will pick a charity each month and send 30% of proceeds to it. I will show receipts of donation!

First up on the list is a working computer. Currently, I'm using a computer from 2014 that I purchased for $50 from a friend. It runs occasionally. Actually, it runs more than i do! Sadly, it's on it's last leg. 

Other financial needs are backstock. I would like to have a solid backstock before actually selling. I need to purchase perks and basics for my line, and I would love to be able to get that going. Anything left will go straight to the process of moving away from a hosting site and having an actual storefront. In the future I would also love to have artist's drop their own lines and reap the royalites. 

My goal is to make lifting accessible to everyone by making designs for all types of people. For a hobbyist weightlifter to an elite athlete, I want everyone to celebrate their gains alike!

Taking this leap does come with challenges. I still work full time and am training for competition. With funds, I could also help pay a few friends to help with this process. 

Times are tough and I definitely understand how donating is only feasible for some. I would really appreciate even share or a tag. Anything helps and I will never forget anyone who helps me.

story:
Short Summary

CHATSHOPPIE-Shopping is chat easy..

    Introduction

    I am Anup, Founder and CEO of Automation Spectrum Pty Ltd, http://www.atmtspec.com/           a startup company located in Sydney, Australia, which creates cognitive products using Artificial Intelligence and cognitive technology.  Our first cognitive, interactive product built on Artificial Intelligence is Chatshoppie.

    I have nearly 20 yrs of experience in IT sector, with an MBA, Engineer and Advanced Diploma in Computer technology have worked in various levels starting as Software Developer, Senior Software Engineer, Consultant, Project manager and Senior Project Manager.

    I have experience of founding a startup in Bangalore, India & also worked as partner for one of the other startups.

    LinkedIn:

    https://www.linkedin.com/in/anup-gopalakrishna-...

     

     

     Built on Cognitive Technology and AI. 

     Chatshoppie is a standalone web application which resolves many problems faced by online shoppers. We are confident & believe that Chatshoppie will revolutionize the world of online shopping by making customer's online shopping experience as sleek and swift in looking for products of various brands.

    Story:

     
    Product Demo:
     

     

     

    TO BE- Product Features

    1. The future product page of Chatshoppie will be as shown below. In the Accordion branded product display feature Customer's will have the option of choosing the brand and the required product as per their convenience.

         Accordion brand products display

     

    2. Text to Speech 

    3, Speech to Text 

    4, Discounted products search across all major brands.

    5. Personalised workflows

    6. Mobile Apps for both Android and ios.

    7.  Universal Shopping cart

    8. Automating the data extraction process to ensure price mapping with our clients.

     

    What We Need & What You Get

      The preliminary version of Chatshoppie is developed and tested. The strategy implemented to GO LIVE with Chatshoppie-Retail is distributed in 3 phases and the support from potential backers will help us immensely in accomplishing the goal. Other verticals like Travel, Accomodation will GO LIVE in the subsequent cycles.

      The goal amount of AUD 25,000 raised will be utilised for phase 1-GO LIVE & the related hiring a ecommerce consultant who will bestow the responsibility of data loading and maintenance and a developer who will assist me in developing TO BE-Product Features.

      Rewards:

      1. Contribute  $3000 AUD for Apple Bluetooth Speaker​-Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker.

      2. Contribute $1000 AUD for Belkin 15000mAh Pocket Power Bank-Black compact and thin design for portability, 

      3. Contribute $500 AUD for Swiss Peak Rollerball Pen-Swiss Peak Heritage Rollerball Pen Precision Swiss Peak rolling ball pen with a lacquer finished brass barrel & shiny chrome accents.

      4. Contribute $250 AUD for Reusable Barista Coffee Cup​-Barista Coffee Cup-Compact 300ml double wall coffee cup which will keep drinks hot for longer.

      5. Contribute $100 AUD for 4GB Flash Drive Key Ring​-Compact maple wood flash drive with a smart magnetic cap closure and a key ring.

      6. Contribute $50 AUD for Handwritten post card

      7. Contribute $25 AUD for Thank you eCard

      8. Contribute $5 AUD for Virtual Hi-Five

       

      GO LIVE Phases:

      The strategy implemented to load & maintain data records through API's from clients will be decided based on the occasions(eg events, festivals & holidays) and seasons.

      The 3 phases are as follows:

      Phase 1: GO LIVE - 30th of March 2020

       1. Top category of women's,men's and children Clothing will be shown.

       2.  Accordion brand products display feature will be delivered.

       3. Text to Speech will be delivered

       4. Speech to Text will be delivered

       5. Countries covered Australia and US

      Phase-2: GO LIVE-22nd of June 2020

      1.  Top category of women's,men's and children shoes will be shown.

      2.  Discounted products search across all major brands feature will be delivered.

      3.  Personalised workflows will be delivered.

      4.  Phase 1 countries plus India & Europe will be covered.

      5.  Chatshoppie will be delivered for multiple languages ( French, Spanish)

      Phase-3: GO LIVE - 21st of September 2020

      1.  Top category of women's,men's and children accessories will be shown.

      2. Mobile Apps for both Android and ios will be delivered.

      3. Universal Shopping cart will be delivered.

      4. Automating the data extraction process to ensure price mapping with our clients will be delivered.

      5. Countries covered plus Rest of the world.

       

      The Impact

        1. Customers usually visit several online shopping websites looking for buying products at the desired cost, size and colour.

        If a customer is looking to buy a product from online shopping for a certain price or size or colour usually visits a particular online website ( may be of a particular brand) and buys the product but finds out that for a reasonably lesser price the customer could have bought the same product from another online website where the product is of the same quality, colour and size. 

        2. Online shopping on websites is traditional way of shopping as one needs to perform 4 to 5 steps to filter, scroll and buy the desired product.

        Most of the ecommerce/online shopping websites have search bar where we could type the product we are looking for and click on search and the products are displayed for shopping and then we need to select the subcategory size, colour before we buy the desired product and if we are typing products with specifications like size, colour and price in the search bar and then search the results are not good.

        3. Customers are unaware of websites to visit which offers discounts to buy desired products across all major brands.

        When customers are looking for a product which has discounted price across various  websites of top brands always find it challenging to find the best but with chatshoppie any product with discounts across various brands are all shown in one place for customers to buy which makes online shopping experience easy and convenient.

        4. Customers usually wait few seconds to minutes  for websites to load and get frustrated more so during festivals.

        Website page loading concern is one of the most common issue for most of the online shoppers, and its seveare more so during festivals, special events and holidays. Chatshoppie is developed on highly robust cognitive architecture using the cognitive services which aims to deliver both response and products in few seconds that is in conjunction with the vision of company.

        5. Downloading various mobile apps for online shopping will consume more memory and screen space which slows down the performance of the downloaded apps as well as the mobile, on the contrary, one Chatshoppie mobile app will fix the above mentioned issues as the app shows products of various brands all in one place.

        6. Lack of customer interaction, personalised workflows and the ability to react dynamically to customer’s request.

         Online shopping on websites has neither dynamic customer interaction capability nor the ability to display products based on customer profile mapping  and more over customers have to navigate on the websites looking for products which is frustrating as its time consuming. 

        Summary of Problems:

        1. Chatshoppie follows only 2 step process: 

                                         a. One-time Registration: Click on "REGISTER HERE" button on the main page and type your name and email id and click "REGISTER". You will receive a confirmation email from us.

                                          Click on "REGISTER HERE" button.

                                     

                                     Type your Name and Email and click on "REGISTER" button

         

         

                                         Account Confirmation Email from Chatshoppie

                                                                     Thank you page                         

         

         b.Signing: Click on "SIGN IN HERE" on the main page and type your registered name and email id and click "Sign in" button to start using the application.

        Type your Registered Name and Email and click on "SIGN IN" button.

         

        On Sign in, the app page is shown, click on Retail and Type "hi"

         

        2. Chatshoppie is a customer friendly cognitive chat web application product in that customers instead of visiting several websites in search of a particular product, can simply ask Chatshoppie the product they are looking to shop.

        3. Chatshoppie swiftly asks queries, customer replies to the queries, chatshoppie at every stage confirms the customer reply (to make sure we are on right track)  and summarises the entire requirement before displaying relevant products from various top brands and also provides suggestions and alternative options based on the customer profile there by saving time and money.

        App asks simple queries & confirms customers answers

         

        App asks few queries to find exact product as per requirement.

         

        App summarises the customers entire requirement & takes few seconds to find the relevant product.

         

        Click on "BUY NOW"

        Note:

        We can click on REFRESH button to refresh the page and resume looking for a new product.

        We can click on LOGOUT button and the application logs you out to main page.

        4. Quality products are displayed for customers who after answering few basic queries from chatshoppie will be able to view and buy the exact product they are looking for which is from various TOP BRANDS all in one place.

        On Clicking "BUY NOW": Product on Amazon for further purchase

         

         

        On Clicking "BUY NOW": Product on ebay for further purchase

         

        5. The product displayed in chatshoppie undergoes severe testing process which involves quality stream and zero error prone, we use API's for data extraction and ensure that only highly reviewed products are inducted in to our databases and we follow the protocol of (WYSIWYG-"What You See Is What You Get").

        6. Chatshoppie has the ability to understand the customer profile and suggest products as per customer requirements which saves time and effort and value for money as the customer will be confident to use the product due to its unique ability to understand the customer needs and desires.

        OTHER PRODUCTS:

         

        Co-Founder's Message:

        Abhilasha Anup is the co-founder of Automation Spectrum Pty Ltd, 

         

        Risks & Challenges

          The real Risks and Challenges we face doesn't lie in going live with the project as preliminary version of the product is already developed and tested but the main risk arises if we don't go live as potential challenges faced by online shopping community will persist that leads to more frustration due to investing more time,effort and no value for money spend in buying products online.

          If we raise our minimum funding goal, we do not anticipate ANY challenge or potential risks in going LIVE with phase 1 of the project .

          We understand that crowdfunding campaigns can come with unexpected hiccups so we've prepared ourselves for every eventuality.

          It's imperative to us that we keep an open channel with our backers by conveying our thoughts to you every step of the way through Indiegogo comments and occasional updates to ensure you're always in the loop
