story:
Hello World! My name is Nathaniel Wilson, and I am a 20-year-old entrepreneur! I am the owner of "What's The T', a Black Queer apparel brand that combines ancient symbology with colloquialisms and Black Queer interests! We feel that it is now time for us to step into the true purpose and intent of our Brand, and that is to create Healing Crystal infused T-shirts! Yes! That's right! Healing crystal infused T-shirts! I want to make clothing that is fashionable and supports the energetic healing and energetic protection of a person. This type of modality is especially important for marginalized groups because it allows us to be fabulous and yet fiercely protected by Earth's magic! By contributing to our campaign, you will not only be helping a small business to grow, but you will be helping to pave new ways for fashion to become more ecologically centered through earth intelligence!

                                                           What we need.

We need $10,000.00 to accomplish our goal! 10,000.00 will cover the cost of producing 200 crystal infused t-shirts. A set of 50 healing crystal shirts cost $2,000.00 to manufacture due to the cost of sourcing the crystals, crushing them, and then infusing them with our apparel ink. Then, we have to create a screen to screenprint the designs onto the shirts. The four designs that we will be producing are:

Logunede- Logunede is an Orisha from Nigeria's Yoruba religion and represents untouched and untested Beauty, and is androgynous, and is given lots of love by the LGBT community.

Oshumare- Oshumare is also an Orisha and is the spirit of the rainbow. Oshumare is androgynous as well.

Oshun- Oshun is probably the most widely known and loved, Orisha! She is the spirit of Beauty, sensuality, magic, wealth, and love!

 For the fourth design, we will create an image of a Black gay couple in a loving embrace! We feel that it is essential to show love in all of its various forms directly and affirming way! 

The crystals that we will use to produce our shirts will be Rose Quartz, Shungite, and Carnelian. The Benefits of these crystals are:   

Rose Quartz: A stone of universal love! This crystal purifies and opens the Heart Chakra to love and harmony in all relationships.

Shungite: Reduces inflammation, and EMF exposure, and relieve emotional stress,

Carnelian: Helps to overcome abuse of any kind, restores vitality, and motivates one to become successful!

Lastly, the remaining 2,000.00 will go towards creating a beautiful, eco-friendly crystal decorated packaging box for our customers to have an all-around immersive experience.

 

                                                            What you get!

Each Donor will receive a free crystal infused T-shirt of their choice, and 30% off their Next "What's The T" purchase! Also, Donors will receive VIP access to all of "What's the T's" future product lines and also get the chance to tell us what you would love to see us create! We want our donors to stay involved as much as possible, and so we will always be open to receiving YOUR ideas, insights, and visions!

If we fail to reach our full goal, all of the funds that have been raised will still go into producing as many crystal infused shirts as the funds will allow. At Minimum we will need $500.00 to maintain production. However, ANY AMOUNT HELPS!!! Lastly, if we do not meet the goal in this campaign we will create another campaign to to meet our desired goal. We will keep going until we reach our goal because we are passionate about bringing Crystal Infused Apparel To The World!!!

                                                                The Impact!

 Our project is valuable because it gives a voice and presence to healing modalities through a Black Queer lense! Black and Black Queer people have been revolutionary over the past 40 years in introducing many popular indigenous healing practices prevalent in our society. Sadly, we have been forgotten! Our project is also valuable because we are using clothing and crystals as a means of upliftment, representation, and protection! Currently, in our store, we sell unisex Hamsa tees, and they are most popular because they represent all of what we are aiming to do with our work! Lastly, We feel that our project can inspire a cultural shift in where we begin to look at fashion as a reflection and tool for connecting with the Earth energetically through healing modalities infused into clothing, whether it be through chromotherapy, crystal-infused clothing, organic threads, beading, and much more!

                                                       Risks & Challenges

As with any new endeavor, there are always risks and challenges. We see that our significant risks and challenge right now is being able to make and maintain sales during the pandemic. However, we feel that this can be remedied through excellent marketing and vending at small local flea markets.   Another risk and challenge is people being skeptical of our products' healing benefits, and we feel that this trust in us can be built reviews, consistency, customer interaction, and dedication to creating quality products. 

                                          How else can you get involved?

One of the best ways to get involved is by sharing our campaign on your social media pages! 

Thank you so much, and if you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to send us an email at Info@Whatsthett.com!
story_txt:
Hello World! My name is Nathaniel Wilson, and I am a 20-year-old entrepreneur! I am the owner of "What's The T', a Black Queer apparel brand that combines ancient symbology with colloquialisms and Black Queer interests! We feel that it is now time for us to step into the true purpose and intent of our Brand, and that is to create Healing Crystal infused T-shirts! Yes! That's right! Healing crystal infused T-shirts! I want to make clothing that is fashionable and supports the energetic healing and energetic protection of a person. This type of modality is especially important for marginalized groups because it allows us to be fabulous and yet fiercely protected by Earth's magic! By contributing to our campaign, you will not only be helping a small business to grow, but you will be helping to pave new ways for fashion to become more ecologically centered through earth intelligence!
                                                           What we need.
We need $10,000.00 to accomplish our goal! 10,000.00 will cover the cost of producing 200 crystal infused t-shirts. A set of 50 healing crystal shirts cost $2,000.00 to manufacture due to the cost of sourcing the crystals, crushing them, and then infusing them with our apparel ink. Then, we have to create a screen to screenprint the designs onto the shirts. The four designs that we will be producing are:
Logunede- Logunede is an Orisha from Nigeria's Yoruba religion and represents untouched and untested Beauty, and is androgynous, and is given lots of love by the LGBT community.
Oshumare- Oshumare is also an Orisha and is the spirit of the rainbow. Oshumare is androgynous as well.
Oshun- Oshun is probably the most widely known and loved, Orisha! She is the spirit of Beauty, sensuality, magic, wealth, and love!
 For the fourth design, we will create an image of a Black gay couple in a loving embrace! We feel that it is essential to show love in all of its various forms directly and affirming way! 
The crystals that we will use to produce our shirts will be Rose Quartz, Shungite, and Carnelian. The Benefits of these crystals are:   
Rose Quartz: A stone of universal love! This crystal purifies and opens the Heart Chakra to love and harmony in all relationships.
Shungite: Reduces inflammation, and EMF exposure, and relieve emotional stress,
Carnelian: Helps to overcome abuse of any kind, restores vitality, and motivates one to become successful!
Lastly, the remaining 2,000.00 will go towards creating a beautiful, eco-friendly crystal decorated packaging box for our customers to have an all-around immersive experience.
 
                                                            What you get!
Each Donor will receive a free crystal infused T-shirt of their choice, and 30% off their Next "What's The T" purchase! Also, Donors will receive VIP access to all of "What's the T's" future product lines and also get the chance to tell us what you would love to see us create! We want our donors to stay involved as much as possible, and so we will always be open to receiving YOUR ideas, insights, and visions!
If we fail to reach our full goal, all of the funds that have been raised will still go into producing as many crystal infused shirts as the funds will allow. At Minimum we will need $500.00 to maintain production. However, ANY AMOUNT HELPS!!! Lastly, if we do not meet the goal in this campaign we will create another campaign to to meet our desired goal. We will keep going until we reach our goal because we are passionate about bringing Crystal Infused Apparel To The World!!!
                                                                The Impact!
 Our project is valuable because it gives a voice and presence to healing modalities through a Black Queer lense! Black and Black Queer people have been revolutionary over the past 40 years in introducing many popular indigenous healing practices prevalent in our society. Sadly, we have been forgotten! Our project is also valuable because we are using clothing and crystals as a means of upliftment, representation, and protection! Currently, in our store, we sell unisex Hamsa tees, and they are most popular because they represent all of what we are aiming to do with our work! Lastly, We feel that our project can inspire a cultural shift in where we begin to look at fashion as a reflection and tool for connecting with the Earth energetically through healing modalities infused into clothing, whether it be through chromotherapy, crystal-infused clothing, organic threads, beading, and much more!
                                                       Risks & Challenges
As with any new endeavor, there are always risks and challenges. We see that our significant risks and challenge right now is being able to make and maintain sales during the pandemic. However, we feel that this can be remedied through excellent marketing and vending at small local flea markets.   Another risk and challenge is people being skeptical of our products' healing benefits, and we feel that this trust in us can be built reviews, consistency, customer interaction, and dedication to creating quality products. 
                                          How else can you get involved?
One of the best ways to get involved is by sharing our campaign on your social media pages! 
Thank you so much, and if you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to send us an email at Info@Whatsthett.com!

story:
The word TOURBILLON was originally intended for French "whirlwind" or "whirlpool".

 Mr. Breguet

 The use of such natural phenomena for the first time in the use of timepieces is most likely related to the celestial movement of "single axis rotation" proposed by Rene Descartes and other philosophers.  From 2004 to 2005, Swiss watch manufacturers launched the tourbillon watch, which is the focus of the public.

Tourbillons are included in some expensive modern watches as a novelty and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity. The mechanism is usually exposed on the watch's face to show it off.

The tourbillon is one of the most valued features of collectors' watches and premium timepieces, possibly for the same reason that mechanical watches fetch a much higher price than similar quartz watches that are much more accurate. High-quality tourbillon wristwatches, usually made by the Swiss luxury watch industry, are very expensive, and typically retail for tens of thousands of dollars or euros , with much higher prices in the hundreds of thousands of dollars or euros being common. A recent renaissance of interest in tourbillons has been met by the industry with increased availability of time pieces bearing the feature, with the result that prices for basic tourbillon models have receded somewhat in recent years (whereas previously they were very rare, in either antiques or new merchandise); however, any time piece that has a tourbillon will cost a great deal more than an equivalent piece without the feature.

Tourbillon principle

 In a regular and balanced manner, the automatic machine core outputs a certain amount of energy, thus overcoming the influence of gravity on the mechanical table at different vertical positions.

 The practice of this principle is to install a CAGE structure in the core, which is loaded with three adjustment mechanisms; the escapement design, the hairspring and the balance wheel are called the tourbillon escapement.

 The tourbillon that rotates once every minute can send an average force at the same speed to eliminate the difference, so as to improve the accuracy of the neutral difference.  The core of the watch, like the engine of a car, the difference between the mechanical core and the tourbillon, like the difference between a general family car engine and the Formula 1 racing engine, not only the function is completely different, but the price difference between the two is even more  do not.

 Since the watch is not placed vertically for a long time, the tourbillon device has no effect on the watch as much as the watch, but the tourbillon device is extremely complicated, and the tourbillon becomes synonymous with the High-end watch because of the high production cost and process requirements.  Or even become an investment project).

Why the Price of our tourbillon watch is affordable?

Why our tourbillon watch could be sold in that affordable price, not because of the low costs of movement, low costs of the cases and other watch parts, the facts are explained belows.by skipping wholesalers , distributors and retail fees ,they offer luxury tourbillon timepieces for less than USD12,000

If we send our watch to the street shop for selling, the price will be extremely high because of the above calculation, therefore our price shown in Kickstarter will never been seen in the street shops. Clear !

Brands

Our ambition is to create our very own brand, which we can share with watch enthusiasts around the globe. Through “Viginti Octo”, we are offering high-quality products with unique and exclusive designs comparable to watches at luxury brands, but at only a fraction of their retail price.

We have spent over a year to prepare the launch of our product and had made tremendous improvements in order to achieve the best quality for our supporters. Every single piece of our product have been refined and improved during our research and development cycle, it is our greatest joy to bring the best quality product to our crowd funding customers.

Specially designed butterfly buckle with extravagance quality leather strap.

Every single product comes with an individual identification number.

Transparent bottom cover, can enjoy the beauty of mechanical rotation

 INFORMATION:

  • Brand: Viginti Octo
  • Model: Tourbillon
  • Movement: Automatic
  • Power Reserve: 58 Hours
  • 27 jewels Co-Axial Tourbillon Movement 
  • Frequency: 28,800 Oscillation/Hour
  • The tourbillon located at 6 o’clock rotate at a speed of 60s for one circle
  • The balance wheel and the escapement system encircle the center of balance wheel Flying tourbillon

 CASE: 

  • Case Size: 44mm 
  • Case Thickness: 14mm
  • Case Material: 316L High Finished Stainless Steel
  • Case Back: Transparent

FEATURES:

  •  Dial Crystal:  Special made sapphire crystal
  • Water Resistance: 10 ATM / 100 meters / 330 feet
  • 3 Years Warranty

BAND

  • Band Type: Butterfly Buckle Strap
  • Starp Material: Italian Genuine Leather
  • Buckle: 316L High Quality Stainless Steel

Rose Gold Case and White Dial

Silver Case and Black Dial

Silver Case and Black x Gold Dial-----Crowdfunding Limited Edition 

Shipping:

When we send out the backer surveys, we will give you an option to pick a low declared value so you pay little to no VAT / Customs fees, or the option to pick a declaration of the full amount you paid.

We will work with our couriers to make sure you pay as low a price as possible when it arrives.

Risks and challenges

We realize creating and delivering a product is a complicated process and sometimes with unexpected delays.however this is why we have taken the up most care and diligent preparation.
We have a well-established relationship with reliable manufacturing partners, tried and tested prototypes and are confident in the quality.
We're going to keep our backers/buyers informed during the production process and this will be done with regular updates and sharing pictures as often as possible, for example machining and tooling of cases, dial preparation, final assembly, movements and packaging.
We have done the best to minimize any risks to our backers. We have taken into account any delays in production and included this in our timeframes for delivery.
Backers can return the watch if it is not same as described or does not function.

story:
WIK is the light you need, at the moment you need it. A light on your wrist that frees up your hands. WIK features a uniquely stylish and comfortable design, an innovative magnetic band, amazing battery life, and LED lights that will not dim.

Let's face it, the old flashlight and headlamp desperately need to evolve. WIK is the next gen light you've been looking for. When life comes your way, whether you're on a run, hiking the trail, or blazing your own path, WIK is there when you need it. When other devices aren't up to the task, or their battery died long ago, WIK is the natural evolution to fill your lighting needs. 

Flashlights and headlamps have been around for ages. We are so used to them that its difficult to see that light needs an update. Have you ever tried using the light on your cell phone? Been frustrated that you can't quite position it? Had a headlamp leave a mark on your forehead? Those days are finally over. Meet WIK!

                  

Product review by Rusty Cannon:

“WIK is the best light I’ve tried, hands down. The powerful LED light provides a smooth and broad pan of light without the usual tunnel effect. It is water resistant and has an innovative magnetic band that allows you to use it in all kinds of ways- on your wrist like a watch, around a belt, around a pack strap, around a bike post, or just about anywhere you can fit the band around. When I first tried the WIK, I was shocked at how comfortable the lighting in front of me was. I had a nice big area of light as I wore it on my water bottle belt while I ran. It also goes great on any area you can secure it to on a running vest or water vest. The light and band are extremely light which is a nice change from bulky, bouncing headlamps.”

Read the entire reveiw here: http://endurancereview.com

 

A lot of thought went into finding the right LED's. WIK's high efficient LED's allow for optimal balance between battery life and brightness. WIK's light is ambient so it lights up your entire area. WIK's LED's will never dim so you can enjoy WIK's full luminosity for the entire life of it's battery. 

The red LED light will help preserve both your night vision. High and low intensities give you several lighting options. WIK's unique white to red flashing mode makes you extremely visible to others.

Rain? Sweat? No problem. WIK is water-resistant. Feel confident that WIK will stand up to the elements. The band can also be removed for cleaning. WIK's housing and band are both durable and comfortable. Much lighter than a typical flashlight or headlamp. 

This is where WIK really sets itself apart. The band was one of the most difficult features to design, but I nailed it! WIK's band opens up a world of possibilities and gives WIK unprecedented versatility. 

The two sections of magnets allow you to orient WIK into several configurations. Point WIK's LED's up to light up a room. Point them down to light up a specific area.

WIK's magnets are strong enough to attach through most materials, and keep it firmly in place. Attach WIK through the outside material and still be able to use the pocket. Genius!

Loop WIK's band around anything: your wrist, your belt, a pipe, your bike, a tree branch, anything! 

On top of that, WIK is weighted in such a way that it can even be draped over non-magnectic objects like a cupboard.

WIK's ergonomic design makes the band peel on and off as opposed to snap together. The magnets are ribbed and fold onto each other creating a strong hold on and off your wrist. 

 

WIK's rechargeable lithium-ion battery coupled with its high-efficient LED's gives it an amazing battery life and light output. WIK will last up to 6 hours on high, 12 hours on low and 3 days on flashing mode.   

Most flashlights, headlamps, and other battery-powered lights dim with use. Not WIK. WIK's patent-pending electronics keep the light from dimming. WIK will not dim as the battery is being used, and can be used while charging. 

                                                 

 

Forget the one-size (and color) fits all approach: WIK comes in a variety of colors, and two sizes. The regular size will fit most wrists and the smaller size will fit everyone else, even the little ones. 

Whether you're a DIYer, a runner, a cyclist, or a camper WIK was created for you. Have it on hand - literally.  WIK is the light that goes from one task to the next.  

As an avid long-distance runner, I have struggled to find the right light. Running the ultramarathon's night section is one of the biggest challenges - you either have to hold a flashlight or wear a headlamp which gets uncomfortable, causes tunnel vision, and often produces a kind of flat light that washes out rocks and roots on the trail making it more likely to trip and fall. 

WIK is the perfect balance of light. Just enough to let you see the trail and decifer its nuances.

Most running lights on the market are trying to sell users on lumen count alone, but that misses the point. 

 

                  

Constant frustration of needing a light better than the one my phone provided led me to search for a better solution. It didn't exist. So I set out to create one. Three years ago I ordered some LED strips and hot glued them to a velcro band. I took a USB cable, stripped the wires, and soldered the two together. Plugged it into a battery stick and put it on my wrist. And WIK was born. After three years of perfecting it, WIK is ready to share with the world.  

It worked great. I took the idea to a top design firm, Espiritu Design in Salt Lake City and we proceeded to bring WIK to life.

We tested everything: button sound, tactile feedback, LED brightness vs battery life, which materials felt the best and so many magnets. The magnetic band had to be perfect. I am so happy with how it turned out, and I'm confident you'll love it to. 

I will never forget the day I was handed six high-definition prototypes. WIK was finally here and was even better than I imagined. It's versatility blew me away. 

I can't wait for you to have one. I hope you'll join me on this journey to take these last few steps and put WIK out into the world that needs it. I'll be forever grateful to the backers and believers on Kickstarter and Indiegogo for joining me in making it happen. THANK YOU!

story:
The artists at Thatcher Finch are the same men and women who work for some of the most innovative branding companies in the world. Their design artistry is deeply rooted in brand identity, graphic design, and cause-oriented initiatives. Together, we created an attainable, expressive, ultra-luxury dress shoe that comes packed with features and is designed for comfort. The traditional construction of men’s boots and shoes are combined with our innovative design and bold patterns. Thatcher Finch shoes are built for the progressive stylist. Help us make our first production!

We’ve mastered the process of printing on leather to create a seamless, wear tested, and bold statement on each shoe. Using a digital application process, our patterns bond directly to the leather to create a long-lasting wear, avoid flaking, and reduce the visibility of scuffs.

Thatcher Finch will be built around you, our audience. Our website will introduce a unique place for our audience to submit their inspired artwork and connect it directly to a cause they’re passionate about. Each shoe design will be voted on and selected by, the Thatcher Finch community for production. We’re creating shoes that are comfortable, elegant, exciting, and most importantly- inspired. By using our audience inspired design process we’re uniting our efforts, in walking toward causes we’re passionate about.

Music unites, uplifts, inspires and brings about wide-scale change. The music note boot reflects a common identity, we all share.

Our floral boot is a tribute to the beauty of the natural world we live in and our need to be mindful of our environmental impact.

Traditional style meets the modern gentleman. Our gold fleck shoe is a reflection of the constant opportunity to be innovative and bold. We chose a midnight color that can be worn as a black or dark navy shoe.

 

Uplifting artistry deserves a wide-scale platform. Our colored marble shoe brings art to life.

Match any Thatcher Finch shoe with high quality, soft, and durable dress socks created specifically for you, our wearer.

We’re introducing a stackable box design that pulls out like a drawer for easy access each time you use them.

Waxed dipped, matching laces, built to remain tied and compliment your bold patterns.

Modern fit, comfortable, and complementary — our Thatcher Finch sweaters are the perfect addition to any wardrobe. Available in light heather grey, deep navy blue, and true to size.

Our shoes are handcrafted and produced in an artisan-inspired workshop specializing in high-quality leather dress shoes and boots.

Each dress shoe & boot is made with full grain calfskin leather uppers & lining. They are hand crafted and uniquely patterned. No two patterns are exactly the same.

The digital application process coupled with other manual processes gives each pair its unique characteristics. Each pair goes through a rigorous inspection to ensure that every shoe is of the highest quality.

When it comes to everyday style, no matter how good your shoes look, comfort is just as important. Thatcher Finch dress shoes are flexible, light, and padded. Designed to provide a comfortable fit each time you lace them up. 

Becoming one of our backers means a lot to us, much more than just buying a pair of shoes or boots, at an amazing price. And, we want to show our thanks and appreciation to you in return. Each backer at any pledge level will be added to our Thatcher Finch community list to get exclusive access to the following:

We have the ability to ship to most countries world-wide and will provide free shipping for all super early bird purchases (US, CA, AU).

If the need for an exchange arises due to incorrect sizes, we will need to charge for the exchange shipping both ways as we’re working on getting Thatcher Finch off the ground! This is true for domestic & international orders.

All exchange requests must be submitted within 30 days of receiving your shoes and/or boots. The cost of international shipping (if applicable) will be charged at the time of the survey once the campaign is over and will vary based on the destination country.

You can see international shipping rates here. If applicable, duties and local taxes will be charged by the appropriate authority at the destination country. Please determine these charges locally.

Our founding team, Danny and Brian, grew up with a healthy obsession for shoes. Danny, an avid shoe collector, product developer, and design enthusiast, has postulated innovating the men’s dress shoes industry for many years. Coupled with Brian’s extensive experience in sourcing and manufacturing from the finest and highest quality artisans throughout the world- Thatcher Finch was formed. Formally educated in Business, Marketing, and Product Development they’ve obsessed themselves with designing and producing luxury footwear of the highest quality.

The additions of other key team members has made Thatcher Finch a reality. Their collective footwear experience ranges from designing & manufacturing to digital marketing, branding, social media strategy, e-commerce platform expertise, warehousing and logistics. Together, the Thatcher Finch team has done it all.

To assure that our supporters receive top notch service, we put together a team with extensive experience in product innovation, footwear logistics, and distribution.

In our first IndieGogo campaign, we’re fully prepared to exceed our backers' expectations. We’re honored and excited to share Thatcher Finch with the world, and in turn, provide a platform for our audience to help shape our future design releases.

Luxurious Innovation. We spent a lot of time prototyping, wear-testing, and engaging our audience to determine the types of patterns that would be both innovative and luxurious. We’ve spared no expenses in ensuring you will get only the best.

Affordability. By implementing a direct-to-consumer business model that delivers your shoes straight from the artisan to your doorstep, we eliminate the need for retailers, wholesalers, marketers and other middlemen. The limited release, one-of-a-kind luxury you will experience with our shoes is incomparable, at a price that is unparalleled. Less than $200 for a $400-$800+ shoe.

Transparency. Your commitment to us is only the beginning of our relationship together. We are committed to you, our audience. We will keep our relationship strong by delivering innovative boots and shoes and communicate with you every step of the way. You will get regular updates as we fund, produce, and ship out your one-of-a-kind shoes. Get in touch with us anytime, about anything!

Exclusivity. Every Thatcher Finch shoe and boot pattern is uniquely applied and handcrafted, meaning that no two pairs are identical. However, each pair goes through a thorough inspection process to assure the quality you expect from a world-class luxury brand.

Experience & Reliability. Thatcher Finch was founded by a team of enthusiasts with a lifetime of experience in the design and product industry. We don't make commitments that we can't honor. We have the infrastructure and expertise to assure a smooth process from taking your order through delivery. We want to be your go-to brand for all things men's luxury, and we will earn your confidence one pair at a time.

We are building a community of contributors through Thatcher Finch. Your support and in some cases, your creativity, will help build the Thatcher Finch family, and shape the direction of each product release and cause we support!

YOU are key to the success of our campaign, and ultimately our company. We want Thatcher Finch to be a representation of the causes you’re passionate about, your designs, your style, and your life!

We need your support to get our first collection off the ground and to assure the Thatcher Finch community, everywhere, has access to luxury statement shoes!

As you become part of our inner circle, help us by sharing our campaign with YOUR inner circle. Thank you!

 

Risks and challenges

We have a lifetime of experience in product manufacturing and logistics. We are well organized and prepared to confront any situation that may arise. We have seen it all.

The most common risk in manufacturing is production delays. The manufacturing process relies on multiple components coming together at the same time. While we are very well versed in managing production and delivering on-time, there is always the possibility of a delay. However, we will be providing updates every step of the way to keep you fully informed.

The artists at Thatcher Finch are the same men and women who work for some of the most innovative branding companies in the world. Their design artistry is deeply rooted in brand identity, graphic design, and cause-oriented initiatives. Together, we created an attainable, expressive, ultra-luxury dress shoe that comes packed with features and is designed for comfort. The traditional construction of men’s boots and shoes are combined with our innovative design and bold patterns. Thatcher Finch shoes are built for the progressive stylist. Help us make our first production!We’ve mastered the process of printing on leather to create a seamless, wear tested, and bold statement on each shoe. Using a digital application process, our patterns bond directly to the leather to create a long-lasting wear, avoid flaking, and reduce the visibility of scuffs.Thatcher Finch will be built around you, our audience. Our website will introduce a unique place for our audience to submit their inspired artwork and connect it directly to a cause they’re passionate about. Each shoe design will be voted on and selected by, the Thatcher Finch community for production. We’re creating shoes that are comfortable, elegant, exciting, and most importantly- inspired. By using our audience inspired design process we’re uniting our efforts, in walking toward causes we’re passionate about.

story:
WHY WE DO WHAT WE DO:

Year to year we were just observing how fashion industry has been growing and became accessible to everyone. But it came with a price - according to a 2018 study, combined, the global apparel and footwear industries account for an estimated 8% of the World´s greenhouse gas emissions. 
October 2018 we decided that it is enough and we have to act - That is when we came up with idea of Nøgen Steps(Nøgen in Danish means Naked). We've made a commitment: luxury has to be accessible, well made and most importantly - it does not have to kill Our planet! 
We want to be an example that sets high standards for fashion industry and changing fashion consumer behavior

The question for You right now is: Do #YouCareWhatYouWear ? If your answer is - Yes, go on and check out our first collection and how we do what we do.


We are the Socially & Environmentally aware Premium Sneakers Brand.

We think that the fashion industry is broken, and that there’s a better way of doing things. 

We put sustainability at the core of everything. That means better materials, processes, longer lasting and really versatile sneakers.

It’s our mission to lead the footwear industry on REAL SUSTAINABILITY.

We PLANT A TREE for every pair sold.

We donate a pair of sneakers to PEOPLE IN NEED for every 4 pairs sold.

NØGEN is luxury for everyone, and the planet!

 

FOLLOW OUR JOURNEY 


 

 

Our first collection is inspired by the Street Basketball of the 90's, with a minimal twist to make of our sneakers a timeless and very versatile piece.

 







 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

#HappyFeetHappySoul

At Nøgen we are really committed to save our planet and leave a better space to the generations to come. In collaboration with the NGO: ONE TREE PLANTED, every time you buy a pair of sneakers we plant a tree.
The Atlantic Forest, also known as Mata Atlantica, once covered 130 million hectares across Brazil. Now, this tropical rain forest ecosystem is home to more than half of the country’s population. Centuries of deforestation for timber, sugar cane, coffee, cattle ranching, and urban sprawl have reduced the size of the forest by over 90%. Although the water supply for Brazil’s two most populous cities (Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo) comes from this forest, there is a lack of public policies and resources to protect it.

Our partners in Brazil are working to restore 15 million hectares of the Atlantic Forest by 2050. By helping plant trees in this critically important forest we are promoting the conservation of biodiversity, creating jobs and income opportunities for communities, and establishing sustainable land management practices among Brazilian land owners. The 15 million hectares of restored forest also has the potential to sequester 200 million tonnes of CO2 annually, and will help restore water quality and quantity for the millions of people in Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, and so many of the surrounding communities.

We are partnering with the NGO: SOLES4SOULS where we donate 1 pair of new sneakers for every 4 sneakers we sell.​
Everyone deserves a good pair of sneakers. Every day children are prevented from attending school, adults are unable to work. Walking becomes unbearable. A new pair of sneakers provides relief in many developing nations around the globe, in times of disaster, and helps bridge the economic gap in developed countries.

Sneakers keep people healthy, happy and thriving. In many developing nations, walking is the primary mode of transportation. Every day millions are exposed to unsanitary conditions that lead to diseases. These diseases may lead to sickness, even death. They also keep children out of school leaving them without an education and continuing the cycle of poverty.

With your help, we can provide a life-changing solution: a good pair of sneakers.


 

By cutting the middlemen we can offer you best quality products at unconventional prices!

 

Our competition, in our opinion, sucks. We're going to ride our high horse over to the soapbox now:

  •  Well made sneakers look the same but with different logos on them depending on the brand and their prices are very high.
  •  Indie luxury brands with more unique designs are difficult to find and prices are astronomical. 
  •  Luxury sneakers are made of real leather and don’t pay attention to sustainability and the footprint on the planet.
  •  There’s not a single brand designing luxury sneakers with a.) best in class materials b.) being 100% compromised with the planet and the society c.) with no animal cruelty [ 100% vegan ] and d.) selling at an affordable price except Nøgen.

 

WHAT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT US...

 

*All sales are final. Since each purchase benefits the artisans and organizations receiving profits, we are unable to issue refunds. If your purchase does not work for you, please consider gifting or selling your item to a friend or family member. You are contributing to a great cause, give yourself credit for this good deed!

  

We understand you've probably seen a few Crowdfunding projects get blindsided by a shipping container sinking in the ocean, Chinese new year, and acts of god which make weeks turn to months and months turn to years.

We want to take a second to highlight our suppliers and factories. They aren't in Vietnam or Bangladesh or some other place that promises to give us a low cost at the expense of others, but from some of the most esteemed manufacturers and suppliers in the world; ones who work with brands you have definitely heard of (but we can't name here).

They make shoes all day. Luxury shoes. Solid, heavy things that feel good in your hands. And we pay them well to make sure they make them right, and they are delivered safely.

All that said, anyone who promises you they will deliver no matter what probably has not thought of everything. An earthquake could open up a massive fissure in the earth and swallow our factory in Porto. Floods and mudslides could wipe out the docks on the coastline. A hurricane could sweep away our shipping containers.

On the other hand, if 20,000 people back our campaign, we might need more time to process the orders, coordinate with you wonderful backers, and get all our supplies in place.

But whatever happens, we're prepared, we'll keep you updated, and we'll get through it. We promise.

story:
Our Story

Hardwear is a wearable technology clothing brand. We make garments which are fashionable, versatile and make your life easier. 

At initial glance, there is nothing which shouts technology. That's because we are a fashion first business and technology second. We believe that the product should shout style, fashion and function. 

But our technology has a very clear purpose....to make your life a little bit easier.

Our garments help you out by enabling you to control your smart phone when it's not easy or convenient to do so, for example, when you are cycling.

The products in our range are Bluetooth enabled, allowing you to make or receive phone calls, play your favourite music direct from your phone or get alerts from friends. All this whilst you are on the go....and never having to retrieve a phone from a pocket.

Running or cycling. For lazy days in the park or  even on the commute to work, you'll always be in control of your device. 

 All the garments are washable too and we've made some of the technology removable so it can be charged either in or out of the garment via a USB.

Why are we creating this brand?

We want to create this brand because we believe that we can make people's lives that bit easier through integrating our every day communication directly into our clothes, making wearable technology truly 'wearable'.

We believe that the technology we use in our everyday lives can be seamlssly integrated into the clothes we wear, without you ever feeling like you look like a robot,

   

The Bluetooth technology has been designed specifically to be functional within our clothing ranges. It's easy to use, easy to charge and easy to remove. You just put it on, sync to your phone....and away you go! 

   

This is where you come in!....

  • We at Hardwear are looking for funding so that we can get our Brand from a concept to full fat production and sales!
  • We have all our garments and accessories designed and ready to go, with prototypes and samples made, tested, loved and looking awesome!
  • We have conducted ‘wearer trials’ to ensure the garments are fit for purpose and operate the way we intended them too.
  • We now need investment to fund the next stage of our journey… and this is the part that will make the dream into a reality.
  • Our dream has a few stages of development and each is as important as the next, but only you can help decide how far we get...(no pressure!)
  • Your contribution will help us achieve our ultimate goal of being a significant online presence, a recognised brand and a market leading wearable technology fashion proposition!

What do we need?…..We need £30K for production costs, manufacture and business set up.

·  If we reach our funding goal, we can go into production with our 4 proposed garments (Jacket, Gilet, 2 x Hooded Tops) in a selection of colours.

·  We can also purchase the technology which will be integrated into the garments and the mouldings to house the tech stored in the garments (a one off cost at production) and also the injection rubber switch covers for the Bluetooth tech in the garments (also a one off cost at production)

·  This stage one funding will also enable us to  purchase some IT equipment and business set up, which will allow us establish an online presence too so we can start to trade through an e-com website.


What you’ll get…..’Our Perks’…..(The Good Bit!)

Because we are so confident that our products are….well, amazing, we are giving them as our Perks. This way, you can receive, wear, get to know and ‘share the love’ of a product you have backed!

For us at Hardwear, it makes sense to offer you the chance to receive these items at a discounted price, as a token of thanks for your contribution to our campaign.

Also, we are offering you the option to buy the products in the form of ‘bundles’ too, so you can choose a number of combinations of items, based on your investment to the campaign!

  

Product Description

The HW1 Hooded Top

  • Slim fit silhouette for a sleeker look
  • Double layered drawstring hood for extra weight and comfort
  • Ribbed cuff and waist hem
  • Chest front zip pocket
  • Headphone holders in the neck seam
  • Internal access point for headphones
  • Outer Pockets
  • Thumb holes in the sleeve cuff
  • Removeable Hardwear 3 button control panel (In Cuff)
  • Removeable Hardwear Headphone Jack and Mic Hub
Available in Black, Grey, Navy or Red 

 

  


*Watch the video to learn more about above the HW1 features

The HW2 Hooded Top

  • Slim for silhouette for a sleeker look.
  • Drawstring and toggle double layered hood for extra weight and comfort
  • Ribbed cuff
  • Chest front zip pocket
  • Internal chest zip pocket
  • Headphone holder in the neck seam
  • Internal access point for headphones
  • Poly Cotton outer shell 
  • Drawstring hem with contrast toggles
  • Outer zipped pockets
  • Thumb holes in the sleeve cuff
  • Removeable Hardwear 3 button control panel (In Cuff)
  • Removeable Hardwear Headphone Jack and Mic Hub
Available in Navy, Grey, Red or Black
  

      

  • The HW3 Gilet

  • Polycotton Outershell
  • Polyester inner shell
  • Polyester fleece lining
  • Ribbed sleeve ports
  • 2 x Internal chest zip pocket
  • Headphone holder in the neck seam
  • Internal access point for headphones
  • Drawstring hem with contrast toggles
  • Outer zipped pockets
  • Removeable Hardwear 3 button control panel (In front Hem Panel)
  • Removeable Hardwear Headphone Jack and Mic Hub
Available in Black, Grey or Navy

    

        

         

 


 

*Watch the video to learn more about the HW3 product features

    The HW4 Windcheater
  • Nylon outer shell (100% Waterproof and windproof)
  • Polyester fleece lining
  • Ribbed 2 piece collar
  • Ribbed 2 piece Cuff
  • Internal zipped chest pocket
  • 3 external zipped pockets
  • Thumb hole in the sleeve cuff
  • Drawstring toggle hem
  • 'D' ring Hood fastener
  • Double chest zip front
  • Headphone holder in the neck seam
  • Internal access point for the headphones
  • Removeable Hardwear 3 button control panel (In Cuff)
  • Removeable Hardwear Headphone Jack and Mic Hub
  • Available in Navy, Grey or Black

   

      

      

 

*Watch the video to learn more about the HW4 product features

                                                       Size Guidelines:

   

   

 Our Bluetooth technology...How it works...

 Our garments contain a very simple bluetooth 3 button switch unit in the cuff, which is linked to the  microphone 'hub' and headphone jack point in the top chest pocket via a cable system which is sewn into the sleeve. 

This system enables  you to effortlessly select music, make or receive calls and adjust your volume setting without having to fumble for your mobile phone. So  wherever you are, you will always remain totally 'hands free' and connected...to  your friends, to your music and to your device.

 How do I care for my technology?....

 Both the Switch unit and the Headphone/Microphone hub are removable, which  makes it really easy to prepare the garment for washing. Simply disconnect from  the cables remove from the inner pouches and off you go!

 We have spent time ensuring that this is as easy a process as possible for you as you  don't want to mess around with leads, cables and devices!

 We have also used non corrosive cabling, which is subtly integrated within the  garments. These cables, which attach the hub and the switch units together, never  need to be removed, so you can wash all our garments with confidence and never have to worry about things breaking or not working.

 How do I charge the technology?

The Bluetooth unit can be charged using the supplied USB charging cable. Because  we have developed our technology to be removable, you can either keep the unit in  place and charge via a USB charge outlet on the garment, or you can remove the  switch unit and charge once removed (this might be when the garment is being  washed for example) 


Technical Description:-

  • Bluetooth technical Specification ver.3.0+EDR
  • Class 2
  • Working Distance 10M
  • Frequency Width 2.4GHZ (2.402-2.483.5MHZ)
  • Speaker parameters 30mm 32ohm 0.25W*2
  • Mic Distance 1M
  • DAC rate 98dB
  • Stand by time 250 hrs
  • Working Time 4-6 hrs

 

   

The Impact....

 We believe that our products, service and Brand will be world leading and  innovative.

 By being a contributor to this campaign, you are helping to grow awareness of  and helping promote  the applications for wearable technology, it’s purpose  and place in the world and more importantly how wearable technology and fashion,  when integrated, completely change the face of fashion as we know it. 

 We are 'Future Proofing Fashion!'...

 Your contribution will help turn a dream into a very real opportunity.

 As technology develops, gets smaller and becomes more integrated and as  consumer awareness of the applications for wearable technology grow, along with  the ongoing and future developments of ‘Smart’ Textiles, Hardwear could forge a  dominant position within the market and become a significant online presence and  market leader.

   

 Risks & Challenges....

 There are many risks that we face in bringing this brand to life. Essentially, our  biggest risk will be market competition. 

As more established and global brands  start to compete in this space, our market position will be challenged, our  customers will be given more choice and the industry will start to become more competitive. 

This change in market awareness, although presenting a risk to us, also provides us with a great opportunity. 

As the market grows and more products are introduced to it we can start to explore many more different ways to bring new garments with new technologies into market. We are already seeing interest from a Sportswear Smart Textile company and this gives us additional opportunities to grow the brand.

By getting into the market at this early stage we have the opportunity to establish our Brand name and become a trusted market leader at the forefront of this new wave of technological change.

We also know we will face some manufacturing challenges through the early developmental years of the brands growth. We are fortunate to have already secured good international textile and electronics manufacturing and production. 

However, as the Brands product offer and range width grows and sales units increase, we will need to identify more manufacturers and producers of both textiles and electronics. This challenge will need to be met in order to ensure the Brand remains scaleable long term.

 

Opportunities for solving these challenges....

·  As our brand and the technology available develops, we will be well placed to introduce further USP's into our offer. For example: Solar, Heat generation, conductive thread, LED, GPS and Biometric integration.

·  As we grow our product range we can start to explore new markets (we are already exploring Sportswear). Further development could be introduced through building/construction and Emergency services.

·  Collaboration with more traditional retailers to produce ‘capsule’ ranges for 3rd party fashion designers or retailers is also a very real possibility as this ensures the designers can trial innovative designs with a low risk and we can take advantage of being market leaders.

·  More long term, we are looking at developing a licensing model to sell internationally through US and EU distributors, alongside the existing UK market

·  We would be aiming to secure manufacturing agreements with larger textile and electronics companies in Asia so that production is maintained and can grow at manageable levels.

  

Other Ways You Can Help…

Share the Love of Hardwear!

  • Visit and 'like' our Facebook Page!
  • See how we are progressing in images on instagram
  • Give us a 'Tweet' on Twitter (#stayconnected, #hardwear #fashiontech, #wearables, #hardwearlabs)

Give us a ‘Shout Out’!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign!
  • Come join our campaign page and let us know what you think. Your early stage feedback is critical to shaping our project!

   Thanks for reading!......
story_txt:
Our StoryHardwear is a wearable technology clothing brand. We make garments which are fashionable, versatile and make your life easier. At initial glance, there is nothing which shouts technology. That's because we are a fashion first business and technology second. We believe that the product should shout style, fashion and function. But our technology has a very clear purpose....to make your life a little bit easier.Our garments help you out by enabling you to control your smart phone when it's not easy or convenient to do so, for example, when you are cycling.The products in our range are Bluetooth enabled, allowing you to make or receive phone calls, play your favourite music direct from your phone or get alerts from friends. All this whilst you are on the go....and never having to retrieve a phone from a pocket.Running or cycling. For lazy days in the park or  even on the commute to work, you'll always be in control of your device.  All the garments are washable too and we've made some of the technology removable so it can be charged either in or out of the garment via a USB.Why are we creating this brand?We want to create this brand because we believe that we can make people's lives that bit easier through integrating our every day communication directly into our clothes, making wearable technology truly 'wearable'.We believe that the technology we use in our everyday lives can be seamlssly integrated into the clothes we wear, without you ever feeling like you look like a robot,   The Bluetooth technology has been designed specifically to be functional within our clothing ranges. It's easy to use, easy to charge and easy to remove. You just put it on, sync to your phone....and away you go!    

This
is where you come in!....

We at Hardwear are looking for funding so that
     we can get our Brand from a concept to full fat production and sales!
We have all our garments and accessories
     designed and ready to go, with prototypes and samples made, tested, loved
     and looking awesome!
We have conducted ‘wearer trials’ to ensure
     the garments are fit for purpose and operate the way we intended them too.
We now need investment to fund the next stage
     of our journey… and this is the part that will make the dream into a
     reality.
Our dream has a few stages of development and
     each is as important as the next, but only you can help decide how far we
     get...(no pressure!)
Your contribution will help us achieve our
     ultimate goal of being a significant online presence, a recognised brand
     and a market leading wearable technology fashion proposition!



What do we need?…..We need £30K for production costs, manufacture and business set up.
· 
If we reach our funding goal, we can go
into production with our 4 proposed garments (Jacket, Gilet, 2 x Hooded
Tops) in a selection of colours.
· 
We can also purchase the technology which will be
integrated into the garments and the mouldings to house the tech stored in the garments (a one off cost at production) and also the injection rubber switch covers for the Bluetooth tech in the garments (also a one off cost at production)
· 
This stage one funding will also enable us to  purchase some IT equipment and business set up, which will allow us establish
an online presence too so we can start to trade through an e-com website.

What you’ll get…..’Our Perks’…..(The Good Bit!)
Because we
are so confident that our products are….well, amazing, we are giving them as
our Perks. This way, you can receive, wear, get to know and ‘share the love’ of
a product you have backed!
For us at
Hardwear, it makes sense to offer you the chance to receive these items at a
discounted price, as a token of thanks for your contribution to our campaign.
Also, we are
offering you the option to buy the products in the form of ‘bundles’ too, so
you can choose a number of combinations of items, based on your investment to
the campaign!  Product DescriptionThe HW1 Hooded Top

Slim fit silhouette for a sleeker look


Double layered drawstring hood for extra weight and comfort

Ribbed cuff and waist hem
Chest front zip pocket
Headphone holders in the neck seam
Internal access point for headphones
Outer Pockets
Thumb holes in the sleeve cuff
Removeable Hardwear 3 button control panel (In Cuff)
Removeable Hardwear Headphone Jack and Mic Hub
Available in Black, Grey, Navy or Red 

 






  
*Watch the video to learn more about above the HW1 features

The HW2 Hooded Top


Slim for silhouette for a sleeker look.
Drawstring and toggle double layered hood for extra weight and comfort
Ribbed cuff
Chest front zip pocket
Internal chest zip pocket
Headphone holder in the neck seam
Internal access point for headphones
Poly Cotton outer shell 
Drawstring hem with contrast toggles
Outer zipped pockets
Thumb holes in the sleeve cuff
Removeable Hardwear 3 button control panel (In Cuff)

Removeable Hardwear Headphone Jack and Mic Hub


Available in Navy, Grey, Red or Black  




      

The HW3 Gilet


Polycotton Outershell
Polyester inner shell
Polyester fleece lining
Ribbed sleeve ports
2 x Internal chest zip pocket
Headphone holder in the neck seam
Internal access point for headphones
Drawstring hem with contrast toggles
Outer zipped pockets
Removeable Hardwear 3 button control panel (In front Hem Panel)
Removeable Hardwear Headphone Jack and Mic Hub
Available in Black, Grey or Navy


    

        

         

 

 
*Watch the video to learn more about the HW3 product features

    The HW4 Windcheater



Nylon outer shell (100% Waterproof and windproof)
Polyester fleece lining
Ribbed 2 piece collar
Ribbed 2 piece Cuff
Internal zipped chest pocket
3 external zipped pockets
Thumb hole in the sleeve cuff
Drawstring toggle hem
'D' ring Hood fastener
Double chest zip front
Headphone holder in the neck seam
Internal access point for the headphones
Removeable Hardwear 3 button control panel (In Cuff)
Removeable Hardwear Headphone Jack and Mic Hub
Available in Navy, Grey or Black

   




      

      


 
*Watch the video to learn more about the HW4 product features

story:
- Version Française plus bas -

Hello everyone,

My name is John Albrecht and when I created Kinesix more than a year ago, I wanted to make a difference and create products with the only purpose of making sports & activities easier.

I have a background in kinesiology and while studying kinesiology I had a lot of interest in biomechanics and decided to pursue in that field.

First of all, this campaign will bring a safer aspect during obstacle races and secondly, it will let people know what Kinesix is capable of create, all made in CANADA!

With your help, you will give the opportunity for a startup to grow bigger and to develop more local products in a near future.

Our first-ever product was especially designed to protect  the elbow & forearm while crawling in the mud or in the ground during an obstacle race (Spartan Race, Tough Mudder, Warrior Dash and so on...). The semi-compressive sleeve makes sure the sleeves will not turn around the arm and the removable plastic part attached with industrial Velcro© has the purpose of protecting the elbow & forearm against burises and scratches that could occur during an obstacle race.

Also, the plastic part will help protect the fabric from ripping itself, making the sleeves reusable for a long period of time.

For those who also run, because of the removable plastic part, the sleeves could be used only for traditional runs.

The logos on each sleeve are reflectives, making them visible and safe to use during low light conditions.

What We Need & What You Get

We need 10 000$ CAD for  two reasons:

  1. 4000$ are needed to pay the second half of the industrial mold of the protection part;
  2. 6000$ are needed to start the production of the first batch (including the ones we'll send you) for the events Kinesix will participate as a partner (Défi Xtraining, Prison Break Race & XMAN Race).

That is why we created all sort of perks, just for You, your friends, your colleagues and even your family!!!
Everything counts in the road to success, from small steps to bigger ones. You can support us or motivate yourself and/or your entourage to participate to an obstacle race with a new kind of product!

All the perks here are made so you can enjoy our new product and use it for all your obstacle races! 

In any case, the funding goal is not reach you will still receive the sleeves!

Characteristics

Sleeves:
- 80% Polyester, 20% Spandex Black matte fabric
- Reflective logos
Protections:
- Polypropylene (PP)


Patent Pending

The Impact

Kinesix wishes to develop 4 categories, Endurance, Intense, Obstacle & Pro. Our protective sleeves are our first product developped for our Obstacle category. 

Actually in development, we are also working on another protective gear for the knees & tibias, and so, by helping us we will be able to put this product on the market sooner than expected.

The other 3 categories are not yet produced, but with the help of our awesome technical clothing designer, we already designed complete clothing lines for each one. As Kinesix will grow in popularity, thanks to you, as we hope, it will give us the opportunity to take a step further and try to offer a complete set of clothes within this year and the beginning of 2016.

Risks & Challenges

It is certain that, although the product has been tested and improved before its final production, for some of you maybe, the product won't reach your expectations. That's why we need your feedback, to know what's wrong and help us develop the best possible product on the market. Each case will be evaluated and we will contact you back to discuss about it.

Other Ways You Can Help

We realized that your help will be different from one person to another, so you can also help by simply relaying and sharing information to your surroundings or other people in which our product will be relevant.

On behalf of the entire team of Kinesix, we thank you from the bottom of our heart for your help, because our success depends on YOU!

_____________________________________________________________________________


Résumé

Bonjour à tous,

Mon nom est Jonathan Albrecht et lorsque j'ai créé Kinesix il y a plus d'un an, je voulais faire la différence et créer des produits avec pour seul but de faciliter la pratique des activités sportives.

Je suis kinésiologue et c'est durant mes études que je me suis intéressé à la biomécanique et ai décidé de poursuivre dans ce domaine.

Tout d'abord, cette campagne apportera un aspect plus sécuritaire pendant les courses d'obstacles et d'autre part, cela va permettre aux gens de savoir ce que Kinesix est capable de créer et de démontrer sa capacité de tout produire au Québec!

Avec votre aide, vous donnerez l'occasion à une entreprise en démarrage de grandir et de développer plus de produits dans un avenir rapproché.

Notre tout premier produit a été spécialement conçu pour protéger les coudes et avant-bras lors des passages au sol, notamment en rampant pendant les courses à obstacles (du style Prison Break, XMAN Race, Défi Xtraining ou encore The Mud Day...). Le tissu semi-compressif, empêchera la manche de tourner autour du bras alors que la partie de plastique amovible, attachée par du Velco© industriel, évitera les bleus et les égratignures qui peuvent survenir durant les courses à obstacles.
Également, la partie de plastique évitera au tissu de se déchirer, ce qui en fera un produit réutilisable sur une longue durée.

Pour les amateurs de course à pieds, puisque la partie de plastique s'enlève facilement de la manche, les manches seront alors utilisables pour des courses traditionnelles.

Les logos sur chaque manche sont réfléchissants, ce qui permet d'être vu dans des conditions où la visibilité est réduite.

Ce dont nous avons besoin & Ce que vous recevrez

Nous avons besoin de 10000$ pour 2 raisons:

  1. 4000$ serviront à financer la dernière partie du moule d'injection plastique pour la protection de plastique;
  2. 6000$ seront utilisés pour lancer la première production (incluant les manches que nous vous enverrons) pour les événements auxquels Kinesix partcipera cet été en tant que partenaire (Défi Xtraining, Prison Break Race & XMAN Race).

Voilà pourquoi nous avons créé toutes sortes de récompenses, juste pour vous, vos amis, vos collègues et même votre famille!!!

Tout compte dans le chemin de la réussite, des petites étapes aux plus grandes. Vous pouvez simplement nous soutenir ou vous motiver vous et/ou votre entourage à participer à une course à obstacles avec un nouveau type de produit innovant!

Toutes les récompenses ici sont faites en sorte que vous pouvez profiter de notre nouveau produit et l'utiliser pour toutes vos courses à obstacles! 

Dans tous les cas, si l'objectif de financement n'est pas atteint, vous recevrez quand même les manches!

Caractéristiques du produit

Manches:
- Tissu 80% Polyester, 20% Spandex, noir mat
- Logos réfléchissants
Protections:
- Polypropylène (PP) moulé


Brevet en cours d'homologation
L'impact

Kinesix souhaite développé 4 catégories, Endurance, Intense, Obstacle et Pro. Les manches de protection sont les premiers produits développés et font partis de la catégorie Obstacle.

Actuellement en développement, nous travaillons sur un autre produit qui protègera cette fois-ci les genoux & tibias et ainsi, en nous aidant nous allons pouvoir sortir ce produit sur le marché beaucoup plus tôt que prévu. 

Les 3 autres catégories ne sont pas encore développées, mais avec l'aide de notre géniale designer technique, nous avons déjà conçus des gammes complètes de vêtements pour hommes et femmes en attente d'être produit. Lorsque Kinesix aura grandit en popularité, grâce à vous, comme nous l'espérons, cela nous permettra également de sortir nos gammes de vêtements avant la fin de l'année 2015 et au début de l'année 2016.

Risques & Défis

Bien que le produit ait été testé et amélioré avant sa production finale, il n'en est pas moins que pour certains d'entre vous, le produit ne paraisse pas à la hauteur de vos attentes. C'est pourquoi nous avons besoin de "feedback" de votre part, de connaître ce qui ne va pas et de nous aider à développer le meilleur produit possible sur le marché. Chaque cas sera évalué et nous vous contacterons en retour pour en discuter.

Les autres façons de nous aider

Nous sommes conscients que que votre aide sera différente d'une personne à l'autre, c'est pourquoi vous pouvez aussi nous aider en relayant et partageant simplement l'information à votre entourage ou à du monde dont notre produit sera pertinent.

Au nom de toute l'équipe de Kinesix, nous vous remercions du fond du coeur pour votre aide précieuse, parce que notre réussite dépend de VOUS!

_____________________________________________________________________________

The Team - L'Équipe



JONATHAN ALBRECHT
Founder of KINESIX - Fondateur de KINESIX

_____________________________________

PASCALE DUFRESNE
Chief Designer - Designer en chef

_____________________________________

CÉDRIC LE BARS
Consultant Marketing strategies - Consultant en stratégies marketing

_____________________________________

AUGSTIN DELPORTE
Consultant Web strategies & SEO - Consultant en stratégies web & SEO

_____________________________________

GENEVIÈVE BÉLANGER
Olympic Athlete - Athlète Olympique
Consultant Administration & Finance - Consultante en administration & Finances

RésuméBonjour à tous,Mon nom est Jonathan Albrecht et lorsque j'ai créé Kinesix il y a plus d'un an, je voulais faire la différence et créer des produits avec pour seul but de faciliter la pratique des activités sportives.Je suis kinésiologue et c'est durant mes études que je me suis intéressé à la biomécanique et ai décidé de poursuivre dans ce domaine.Tout d'abord, cette campagne apportera un aspect plus sécuritaire pendant les courses d'obstacles et d'autre part, cela va permettre aux gens de savoir ce que Kinesix est capable de créer et de démontrer sa capacité de tout produire au Québec!Avec votre aide, vous donnerez l'occasion à une entreprise en démarrage de grandir et de développer plus de produits dans un avenir rapproché.Notre tout premier produit a été spécialement conçu pour protéger les coudes et avant-bras lors des passages au sol, notamment en rampant pendant les courses à obstacles (du style Prison Break, XMAN Race, Défi Xtraining ou encore The Mud Day...). Le tissu semi-compressif, empêchera la manche de tourner autour du bras alors que la partie de plastique amovible, attachée par du Velco© industriel, évitera les bleus et les égratignures qui peuvent survenir durant les courses à obstacles.Également, la partie de plastique évitera au tissu de se déchirer, ce qui en fera un produit réutilisable sur une longue durée.Pour les amateurs de course à pieds, puisque la partie de plastique s'enlève facilement de la manche, les manches seront alors utilisables pour des courses traditionnelles.Les logos sur chaque manche sont réfléchissants, ce qui permet d'être vu dans des conditions où la visibilité est réduite.Ce dont nous avons besoin & Ce que vous recevrezNous avons besoin de 10000$ pour 2 raisons:
4000$ serviront à financer la dernière partie du moule d'injection plastique pour la protection de plastique;
6000$ seront utilisés pour lancer la première production (incluant les manches que nous vous enverrons) pour les événements auxquels Kinesix partcipera cet été en tant que partenaire (Défi Xtraining, Prison Break Race & XMAN Race).

Voilà pourquoi nous avons créé toutes sortes de récompenses, juste pour vous, vos amis, vos collègues et même votre famille!!!
Tout compte dans le chemin de la réussite, des petites étapes aux plus grandes. Vous pouvez simplement nous soutenir ou vous motiver vous et/ou votre entourage à participer à une course à obstacles avec un nouveau type de produit innovant!
Toutes les récompenses ici sont faites en sorte que vous pouvez profiter de notre nouveau produit et l'utiliser pour toutes vos courses à obstacles! 
Dans tous les cas, si l'objectif de financement n'est pas atteint, vous recevrez quand même les manches!
Caractéristiques du produit

Manches:- Tissu 80% Polyester, 20% Spandex, noir mat- Logos réfléchissants
Protections:- Polypropylène (PP) moulé






Brevet en cours d'homologation

L'impact
Kinesix souhaite développé 4 catégories, Endurance, Intense, Obstacle et Pro. Les manches de protection sont les premiers produits développés et font partis de la catégorie Obstacle.Actuellement en développement, nous travaillons sur un autre produit qui protègera cette fois-ci les genoux & tibias et ainsi, en nous aidant nous allons pouvoir sortir ce produit sur le marché beaucoup plus tôt que prévu. 
Les 3 autres catégories ne sont pas encore développées, mais avec l'aide de notre géniale designer technique, nous avons déjà conçus des gammes complètes de vêtements pour hommes et femmes en attente d'être produit. Lorsque Kinesix aura grandit en popularité, grâce à vous, comme nous l'espérons, cela nous permettra également de sortir nos gammes de vêtements avant la fin de l'année 2015 et au début de l'année 2016.





Risques & Défis
Bien que le produit ait été testé et amélioré avant sa production finale, il n'en est pas moins que pour certains d'entre vous, le produit ne paraisse pas à la hauteur de vos attentes. C'est pourquoi nous avons besoin de "feedback" de votre part, de connaître ce qui ne va pas et de nous aider à développer le meilleur produit possible sur le marché. Chaque cas sera évalué et nous vous contacterons en retour pour en discuter.




Les autres façons de nous aider
Nous sommes conscients que que votre aide sera différente d'une personne à l'autre, c'est pourquoi vous pouvez aussi nous aider en relayant et partageant simplement l'information à votre entourage ou à du monde dont notre produit sera pertinent.
Au nom de toute l'équipe de Kinesix, nous vous remercions du fond du coeur pour votre aide précieuse, parce que notre réussite dépend de VOUS!
_____________________________________________________________________________
The Team - L'Équipe


JONATHAN ALBRECHTFounder of KINESIX - Fondateur de KINESIX

_____________________________________PASCALE DUFRESNEChief Designer - Designer en chef_____________________________________CÉDRIC LE BARSConsultant Marketing strategies - Consultant en stratégies marketing_____________________________________AUGSTIN DELPORTEConsultant Web strategies & SEO - Consultant en stratégies web & SEO_____________________________________GENEVIÈVE BÉLANGEROlympic Athlete - Athlète OlympiqueConsultant Administration & Finance - Consultante en administration & Finances

story:
Nefarious Shoes are wickedly affordable, trendy shoes for women. Our shoes are tailored to fit women with a shoe size of 7-13. Nefarious Shoes aims to provide quality shoes at an affordable price so that every woman may feel beautiful. What sets Nefarious apart from any other women’s shoes line is that we offer specialty sizes for women who would not be able to find attractive and trendy shoes otherwise. Each shoe will be equipped with padding in the insole to ensure maximum comfort all day. In today’s market, you can find beautiful flats and heels up to a women’s size 9. We will provide the same level of trendiness for women that are left out of that realm. Not only will we provide shoes that are physically appealing to catch the woman’s eye, we intend to offer our shoes at an affordable price so that the average teen, wife, or mother can feel beautiful when they step out in our shoes.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding we receive will be used for all startup costs, including: manufacturing, shipping/processing, building a website, and marketing. A portion of all of our proceeds go to foundations and charities that aid women and children. 

The Impact

For years, we have seen disparities in the fashion realm for tall women and women with large feet. Does that make us any less of a woman? No! By helping Nefarious' campaign, you are helping us create a brand for women that are aching to feel beautiful when they step out of their house in one of our fabulous pairs of shoes. 

Risks & Challenges

One of the risks we may find is with opening an online store. People shop in shoe stores in order to try on the shoes before they buy them. We will combat this and reassure that we will have a remarkable return/exchange policy that is flexible and accommodating for everyone.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you or someone you know has struggled in the search for fashionable shoes, accommodating their size but not their sense of style, mention Nefarious Shoes! Share us on your Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!

story:
IS SUSTAINABILITY IMPORTANT TO YOU?

MAY & HUGO is an Eco Swimwear label that uses and supports an intelligent and sustainable way to create products by recycling!


WHO ARE WE?

The concept label was founded in 2015 by Emily MAY Tait and Marcos HUGO Bello. Emily is from the small town of Bellingen on the East Coast of Australia. She studied a Bachelor of Design specialising in fashion and went on to work in the Australian swimwear industry after completing her studies. Marcos is from Tenerife in the Canary Islands. He studied audio visual communications and has worked in various roles within the photography and video industry. They are now based in Sydney, Australia.


WHAT DO WE DO?


One year ago, we were both working in the fashion industry. We were appalled by the amount of waste created, and the disregard for the environmental impact of the companys' practices. We decided there was only one way to make a change and help the planet, so we both quit our jobs to create the eco-friendly label- MAY & HUGO. Now we design and produce swimwear using first grade sustainable fabric.

Check out this collection in motion:     THE BEACHES '16 VIDEO LOOKBOOK


WHY IS IT SUSTAINABLE?


The fabric we use is made from recycled post-consumer waste. Items such as abandoned fishing nets, carpets, plastic bottles, clothing and more are rescued from oceans and landfill, broken down into raw material and re-spun into yarn to make the fabric. 
This process not only reduces worldwide waste, but also requires much less energy than producing the yarn from virgin materials!      



WHY SHOULD YOU CONTRIBUTE?


We've designed and produced our first 2 collections in small quantities, which we've been selling through our website and in high-end markets, where we have direct contact with our customer. We now know exactly what our customer wants and we're ready to start producing bigger numbers and expand our range to include men and children's swimwear.


Along with our second collection, we released a capsule collection using a new and innovative double layered fabric, which allows styles to be seamless, reversible and have raw edges.

This means no elastic which can dig in all the wrong places. These styles literally flew off the shelf so we decided to design an entire collection with this fabric. We have sampled the collection and tried and tested each style on friends and family. Everyones feedback has been the same- We have created swimwear that is amazingly comfortable, flattering, and functional!



We want to produce our third collection in bigger numbers, meaning we can keep the costs down and we won't sell out of popular styles so fast! When you help fund this project, you can be amongst the first to get your hands on this unique, cutting-edge new swimwear. 

PERKS



For the last 8 months we have put all of our energy and hard earned savings in to this project. We have even given up the comfort of a home and have been living in a van and working at public libraries or the homes of friends and family.


 


$20,000 will allow us to manufacture larger quantities, give us the funds we need to expand our range to include men's and children's swimwear, help with our marketing costs and to rent a work space.
If we don't reach our goal, all the funds will still go in to producing this collection and expanding our range, just in smaller numbers.


Facing The Facts


Did you know.. 

- there's over 76 million tons of global textile production annually and 20% of global production waste comes from the textile and apparel sectors  !!

- It can take more than 20,000 litres of water to produce 1kg of cotton; equivalentto a single T-shirt and pair of jeans !! 


We need your help to spread the word and help make the world a better place. We have a dream to not just create our own successful label, but to influence other labels to work more sustainably. We believe the fashion industry can be turned around. We want to promote consumerism that works on a circular economy, but to do this we need to get word out and grow MAY & HUGO.



Challenges 


Like with all projects, we know we have challenges to face. What can make swimwear difficult to sell all year round is that it's very seasonal. But while it's winter here in Australia, it's summer in the northern hemisphere! We've already started working with a PR team in NY to build our brand awareness up there, and drive more traffic to our website, where we ship worldwide!
Between us we have over 7 years experience in the fashion industry and we know what it takes to build a successful label. Every cent raised will help us towards our goal.

Make a pledge in this campaign and vouch for a sustainable future for fashion! 

If you're not in a position to make a donation but still want to help, you can! Share this campaign through your social media channels and help get the word out- the more people that know about us, the better!


MAYANDHUGO.COM                             @MAYANDHUGOSWIM



Or get in touch with us at:

info@mayandhugo.com
