story:
*After publishing our campaign, WE


1. Received negative feedback on PRICING
2. So NOW, we provide 1 SINGLE PERK - [from EARLY BIRD to LAST BIRD]


AT WHOLESALERS' PRICE







Cauden Moneyclip - part 2


Mission

  • We at Cauden believe in keeping things simple and straightforward.

  • This money clip incorporates a minimalist design, doing away with all of the clutter and uselessness that have become mainstays in contemporary products. 

  • Modest and reserved, we value a style that is at once direct and expressive. 
  • We want to create something that has never been seen before without throwing common sensibility out the window.
  • That is our mission here. That is our goal.




Featured by




Usage

  • Safely fitting as many as nine credit cards or about eighty bills (forty folded in half), our money clip was designed to get the job done and look good at the same time.

  • You can even mix your cards with your cash, keeping the bills in between the cards for ease of use. 
  • (*Note: In case of carrying both cards and cash, adjust the quantity accordingly to above guidelines. Going beyond these limits is discouraged and may lead to breakage.)


Design

  • The carbon fiber is visible just on the underside of the Italian vegetable leather, making this piece an outstandingly fashionable accessory.
  • Edge coated in the same color as the leather in incredible precision, our money clip follows our design principle - "To stay modest, reserved and straightforward, valuing a style that is at once direct / expressive and to create something that has never been seen before."



Weight 

  • Because carbon fiber is utilized, this money clip is incredibly light, weighing in at just six grams, which is the weight of a quarter and less than one-tenth of the weight of a traditional bi-fold money clip at around ninety grams. It's almost weightless!

(*Note: yellow background of above pictures is of the actual Italian vegetable leather used in money clip production)



Size

  • At 1.5 cm (up to 2cm with 10 cards) high, 2.1 cm wide, and 5.5 cm long [0.6in x 0.8in x 2.2in], this money clip will stay slim in your pocket.



Materials

  • Manufactured from 100% toray carbon fiber sheets and the highest quality Italian vegetable leather, this money clip is made to last.

Carbon Fiber

  • The reason for our choice of carbon fiber as the main material of our first product is because carbon fiber is known as one of the strongest materials relative to its weight.


Italian Vegetable Leather

  •  The Italian vegetable leather we use is of the highest quality that is renowned for its deep color, its supple texture, and its noticeable aroma.

(*Note: Above pictures are all of the actual Italian vegetable leather used in money clip production.)



Leather Protection

  • Our Leather is coated multiple times with bees wax and nano clear coat to prevent any scratches and water damage.



Components

  • Once you receive your product, within the carefully packaged box you will find one money clip in a holder along with one warranty card and four usage direction / contact cards (5 cards in total).

  • Extensive thought was invested even into our packaging - We are absolutely confident our product stands out in quality in every aspect.



Colors

  • Available in 8 colors, our money clip allows for incredibly unique and fashionable styling.
  • [*Check the bottom of the page for the appendix of very close up photos!]

Red


Orange


Yellow


Green


Blue


Navy Blue


Purple


Brown

(*Note: Background of each above picture is of the actual Italian vegetable leather used in money clip production)



Obsession

  • We can say with complete confidence that our obsession with simplicity, uniqueness, and superior quality is simply unmatched in the marketplace. 
  • Our mountain of samples speaks for itself.

  • We always strive to produce the best handmade products, basing our reputation on simplicity, utility, originality, and durability. 


Plan

  • Right now, we are asking for your support. We are looking to raise an absolute minimum of $12,000, and with that capital, we plan on addressing four areas of cost saving: bulk discount on carbon fiber production, bulk discount on carbon fiber finishing, bulk leather purchase discount, and bulk leather craftsmanship discount.

  • Our plans will result in the following discounted rewards:



Timeline



Delivery Date

  • We promise to ship our products within 2 ~ 2.5 months from the moment that we receive initial funding.
  • Truthfully however, we are likely to deliver EARLIER by about JULY 2016. 
  • We're giving you the worst case delivery schedule just in case of accidents/unexpected events.



Risks and Challenges

  • There are no foreseeable risks to the project, except for one where we do not get funded


Q&A (Must read)

Q: Why should I buy your product?

A: Our carbon fiber leather money clip is unique, very light & strong, and is quite possibly the most minimal and fashionable way of carrying your money (and cards).


Q: Where are they delivered from?

A: They are all mailed from South Korea - which should take anywhere from 1 to 2 weeks.


Q: Are there any additional charges?
A: Buyer may be subject to import tariff of their respective country, but due to the price of the merchandise, event of taxation is highly unlikely. Those who order the distributor package may be subject to tariff. As much as we would like to, we cannot bear any tax burdens for you, so consult with your local tax offices on this matter in advance.


Q: What is the earliest date by which you can ship the product?
A: Though we cannot promise anything, if everything works out quickly, we believe delivery can happen from late June to late July.


Q: How tight is the tension of money clip?

A: The money clip's tension is what took most of our development time. Tension is just right for fitting of anywhere between 1 to 10 cards. It may be very very slightly tight at first (though still completely fine for application), but over use tension very slight loosens becoming even more balanced.


Q: Carbon fiber is a strong material, why does it break?

A: Strong characteristic is relative to its thickness and overall mass. For its thickness and weight, our clip is very strong, but if you open the clip beyond parallel angle it is likely to lead to breakage.



Thank you very very much for reading this far.


We sincerely appreciate your interest in our product.


We really hope to be able to show our gratitude one day by returning with many more products.
*Please check us at www.TheCauden.com if you need full sized pictures.



*Appendix (Close up photos)


Red


Orange


Yellow


Green


Blue


Navy Blue


Purple


Brown

Plan
Right now, we are asking for your support. We are looking to raise an absolute minimum of $12,000, and with that capital, we plan on addressing four areas of cost saving: bulk discount on carbon fiber production, bulk discount on carbon fiber finishing, bulk leather purchase discount, and bulk leather craftsmanship discount.
Our plans will result in the following discounted rewards:




Timeline




Delivery Date

We promise to ship our products within 2 ~ 2.5 months from the moment that we receive initial funding.
Truthfully however, we are likely to deliver EARLIER by about JULY 2016. 
We're giving you the worst case delivery schedule just in case of accidents/unexpected events.





Risks and Challenges
There are no foreseeable risks to the project, except for one where we do not get funded



Q&A (Must read)

Q: Why should I buy your product?
A: Our carbon fiber leather money clip is unique, very light & strong, and is quite possibly the most minimal and fashionable way of carrying your money (and cards).

Q: Where are they delivered from?
A: They are all mailed from South Korea - which should take anywhere from 1 to 2 weeks.

Q: Are there any additional charges?A: Buyer may be subject to import tariff of their respective country, but due to the price of the merchandise, event of taxation is highly unlikely. Those who order the distributor package may be subject to tariff. As much as we would like to, we cannot bear any tax burdens for you, so consult with your local tax offices on this matter in advance.

Q: What is the earliest date by which you can ship the product?A: Though we cannot promise anything, if everything works out quickly, we believe delivery can happen from late June to late July.

Q: How tight is the tension of money clip?
A: The money clip's tension is what took most of our development time. Tension is just right for fitting of anywhere between 1 to 10 cards. It may be very very slightly tight at first (though still completely fine for application), but over use tension very slight loosens becoming even more balanced.

Q: Carbon fiber is a strong material, why does it break?
A: Strong characteristic is relative to its thickness and overall mass. For its thickness and weight, our clip is very strong, but if you open the clip beyond parallel angle it is likely to lead to breakage.


Thank you very very much for reading this far.

We sincerely appreciate your interest in our product.

We really hope to be able to show our gratitude one day by returning with many more products.

*Please check us at www.TheCauden.com if you need full sized pictures.



*Appendix (Close up photos)

Red



Orange



Yellow



Green



Blue



Navy Blue



Purple



Brown

story:
ABOUT GIRLSTALKTOBOYS

girlstalktoboys is a fashion brand for children aged 2-8 years. It is owned and designed by Kelly Ekardt, an American mother based in London. She believes strongly in the impact clothes can have on individuals and has always been driven by helping people express themselves through what they wear. Equally, Kelly knows through time spent in the industry how the clothes we wear can impact society. girlstalktoboys is designed and manufactured in the UK as Kelly wants to help promote traditional industries in the community she lives in and help everyone involved in her supply chain earn a living wage.

Kelly studied fashion design in Missouri, US, before working in various parts of the fashion business in America and London. Kelly suffered a brain haemorrhage 4 years ago, while she was 30-weeks pregnant. Both mother and daughter are fine now, but that was not always certain. Kelly realised during these weeks and months that life can be short and it was time she followed her dreams. It took over three years to regain her health, but she finally decided to commit herself fully to creating a line of clothing that would satisfy her creative ideals without compromising on production standards.

MOTTO

The motto behind girlstalktoboys (‘Clothes speak louder than words’) is inspired by Kelly’s daughter imagination and her quirky sense of style. Over the past few years Kelly has designed and sown the odd piece that she couldn’t find anywhere else. Clothes for children should be practical but not at the expense of style. One way to get around this is by placing compatibility right at the centre of the collections’ design principles. Children (and parents!) should be able to pick pieces from the wardrobe without having to worry what matches. Life’s too short for that!

www.girlstalktoboys.com

This results in a deeply personal project. Kelly was driven to embark on this journey by the realisation that life is too short not to follow your dreams. Her ensuring fashion influences, including clean yet playful Korean and Japanese styles, were combined with her daughter’s imagination and the belief that what we wear impacts us as well as those who made our clothes.


PRODUCTION

Having produced the first set of samples with the help of a great network of North London creatives and craftsmen, Kelly now needs to put her patterns into large scale production to satisfy the demand created at recent trade shows and through the press. Because girlstalktoboys does not produce in low-cost locations, a significant amount of funds is required to achieve that. At the same time, the next collection needs to be designed and finished in time for industry trade shows in London and Paris in June. girlstalktoboys aims to raise GBP 20,000 to achieve genuine lift off. An amazing amount of press has already been generated for girlstalktoboys, but the nature of the fashion business means that this will only be rewarded in 6 months time.

Here’s how the funds will be used: 

  • 31% will go into producing the first girlstalktoboys seasonal collection (Autumn/Winter 2016), which will hit the shops in July. 
  • 35% will be used to design the next collection (Spring/Summer 2017), which needs to be ready by the end of May. 
  • 30% of the funds will pay for all the marketing required, including a booth at Paris Playtime, the leading trade show for children’s wear.  
  • Finally, 5% gets routed back to Indiegogo for the use of this amazing website!

If not the entire amount we aim for is raised, producing AW 2015 will take priority.

Please help Kelly realise her dream and ensure that one more brand produces ethically, sustainably and locally. Clothes speak louder than words!

www.girlstalktoboys.com


LOOKBOOK


OUTFITS


VIDEO



BEHIND THE SCENES


SPRING/SUMMER 2017 COLLECTION IN PROGRESS


PERKS

We have designed a unique combination of perks to make this worth your while. There is a chance to get your hands on girlstalktoboys clothes months before anybody else, to receive limited edition prints of the designs used in the first collection and even the possibility to have Kelly custom design a piece of clothing for a child or an adult!


PRESS

Absolute Magazine

Mutiny Magazine

CWB Childrenswear Buyer

Alegre Media

A special thanks to those who made my first collection happen, I couldn't have done it without you.

  • Fiona Wade (my illustrator, she is amazing!)
  • Clare Walsh from Clare Walsh Photography (lookbook and campaign)
  • Vanessa Ockenden from Vanessa Valentine Photography (laydowns and behind the scenes and emotional support)
  • Matt Maude from Left Eye Blind (collection video)
  • Jay Maude from Jay Maude (collection video and campaign video)
  • Niels Bischoff (emotional and business support)
  • Tina Lam (collection support)
  • Luis from Tottenham Textiles (garment prints)
  • Julius Ekardt (husband and backbone)

story:
You'll be dead soon. 

Your life consists on average of 28 000 days. No more, no less. If you are 25, you have 19 000 days left to realize your dreams. If you are 45 it leaves you with 12 000 days to do all the things you want to experience in life. Each new day is a chance to continue your amazing journey, and each new day is a chance to change. To start fresh.

You'll be dead soon, but this clock is here to remind you to make the most of each day. For the truth is, you can do and be anything you want. One day at a time.

The clock that counts down your days, so you can be everything you dream.


CHALLENGE YOURSELF


How it works

28 is a wooden LED desk clock that counts down your days. You simply calculate your remaining days, and set the clock to count down. From here on in you will have a constant reminder to do, and be exactly what you want. 

Today I'll be happy. 

Today I'll be kind. 

Today I'll be ingenious. 

Each person is given on average 28 000 days when they are born. What you do with them is up to you. 

GO PLACES


Specs

-LED display

-AC power Adapter with battery back up

-6.8 x 3.6 x 2.1 inches

-Black


Motivation is the mother of change

All we need to change our lives is the right motivation. 

Get that contract. Jump over that wall. Be that person. Follow that dream. Pass that test. Start that company. Be that parent. See that country. Take that ride.

28 is your constant reminder that you can do anything with your life. Because it's yours. With 28 you can change your own life, or help someone change theirs. 

Be the best you can be. 


We need your help

28000 is a simple product. It has one function; it counts down your days. We foresee no major challenges in production. We have a product ready to build, a manufacturer ready to go, and a fulfillment company ready to ship. Our funding will cover necessary tooling and programming costs to transition from prototype to large scale production. All we need now is you. 


28000days@mail.com

story:
The Ultra IS HERE!! We reached 100% funding! Click here to order your pair or go to TakeFlightUltra.com!

_____________________________

The Take Flight Ultra: Parkour & Freerunning Shoe. Designed by Traceurs and for Traceurs, and versatile enough for everyone. 

We set out to make the most versatile and best performing Parkour & Freerunning shoe we could imagine. The result is the Take Flight Ultra. If you do Parkour, we think you are going to love it! And if you don't do Parkour? Well, we think you are still going to love it! We designed the Ultra for sport, and it's also versatile enough to be worn and loved by everyone in casual wear and every day life :)



Our Plan & Our Flex Goal

We need your help to make this shoe better than ever! We are guaranteeing to launch the shoe this August (2016) in 2 inaugural colors and 9 total sizes!

The colors are: Red and Blue

The sizes are: 6.5-12.5

However, we want to bring this shoe to the world in more sizes and more colors including sizes 4-14 and a 3rd color Electric Green. From that we reach our flex goal:

Flex Goal: $30,000 (Add sizes 4-14 and Electric Green)

If we reach $30,000 in funding then we are going to expand the shoes sizes from the current 6.5-12 to sizes 4 to 14 and we will add the 3rd shoe color, Electric Green.


Our Story.

The Buildup - Summer 2012: In summer 2012 we set to produce our very first Parkour shoe. It was a arduous process that ended up lasting 2 years. Here was our first shoe prototype. It was a fun concept, but the shoe turned out awful.

1st Shoe - Summer 2014: After a complete redesign, 2 years of added work, and more than 70 changes and iterations we finally launched the Take Flight 1.0 in summer 2014.

2014-Today: The 1.0 has been embraced, loved, and enthusiastically worn by Traceurs worldwide! Here is a video of Take Flight pro Oscar Sanchez wearing the 1.0 in Spain!

Embarking on Shoe #2 - May 2015: Launching from the success of our first shoe, in early 2015 we set out to improve upon the Take Flight 1.0 and make our second shoe. Our vision? Make everything better. We didn't know if it was possible, but we were dedicated to trying. We designed 5 concept shoes that we loved, and then we did something we've never heard before - we presented them to our fans and followers and let THEM decide which one we made. Here were the five versions.

...and fans chose the Ultras!

Move To Development - June 2015: We then moved the shoe to development and testing, and now we've arrived at the finished product seen below and in this campaign. It's crazy comfortable, light, and versatile, and with your help we'll be releasing it in 3 colors: Flame Red, Shock Blue, and Electric Green.


Athlete Testimonials

Here are 4 short video testaments to the Take Flight Ultra Shoe.

"I'm 100% sure I'm going to wear these when they come out." -Joey Adrian


"I love this shoe!" -D'Ondrai Jones

"The Take Flight Ultras make me better." -Adam Dunlap

"I love the Ultras because they are super light and come in great colors." -Danee Marmolejo

Great Gifts - What You Get For Pledging!

For pledging in this campaign and helping us reach our goal to bring the Ultra shoe to the world, we have the following perks designed and offered only through this campaign!

Beyond The Shoe - Inspiring and Supporting Traceurs and Athletes Worldwide
Take Flight is a people driven company. For us, Parkour is our history and our medium, but we are much larger than that because our goals are all people driven as we work hard to bring inspiration, connectivity, and support to Traceurs, athletes and individuals worldwide. Every item we sell goes into funding that mission, and the larger we grow the more people we are able to impact positively.
A few facts....

  • All our profits go to support Traceurs/Freerunners, and Parkour community initiatives around the world.
  • We believe in growing together. We sponsors professional Traceurs in 13 countries all who receive endorsement salaries and or direct financial compensation for their work. 
  • We are focused on those who live by Parkour. All our products are designed by Traceurs and Freerunners!
  • We believe in community and growing together, and our vision is to keep growing and keep putting the community first. 

Four members of our international team that work throughout their communities to support Parkour through instruction, training, and inspiration.

Our Mission: To produce the highest quality athletic and urban apparel for customers worldwide, while providing people the inspiration to discover their own potential through movement. 

Our Method: Helping the Parkour community grow through developing our global brand that supports Traceurs, Parkour communities, Parkour gyms, and Parkour organizations in all corners of the globe.

Beyond Parkour: We believe that the Parkour style of clothing, footwear, and life is the total style that people everywhere can benefit from. That’s why we are calling the Ultra Shoes a “The World's Most Versatile Parkour Shoe.” Regardless of where you come from, we think you will love the Ultra shoe as well as our growing line of footwear, apparel, and other products.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is spreading the word about this campaign and getting people to order the shoe. We want to launch more sizes and colors, but in order to do that we need people to pre-order the shoe. We have worked really hard to bring this amazing shoe to the world, and we fully believe people are going to love it which is why we back it with our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. We have amazing production partners who we've worked with for years, and we've made shoes before, so we are experienced in the process. We are ready to move to production and we have everything in place to make it smooth. The only question still is how many sizes and colors we are going to be able to make and that's where we hope you'll join us in helping us bring this shoe to more people.


Other Ways You Can Help

Besides pledging for this campaign, there are 4 other ways you can support this project and support us in general:

#1. SHARE, SHARE, SHARE This Project! Please share this project and video on your Facebook, Twitter, and other social media. Every share is valuable to us!

#2. Follow Us On Social Media! We have some pretty robust social media channels. Follow us for daily inspiration!

  • • Follow us on Facebook ---> www.Facebook.com/TKFLT
  • • Follow us on Instagram---> www.Instagram.com/TKFLT
  • • Follow us on YouTube ---> www.YouTube.com/TKFLT
  • • Follow us on Twitter ---> www.Twitter.com/TKFLT

#3. Carry our products in your store or help us distribute! If you own a Parkour gym, a retail establishment / chain, or if you're a distributor, and you'd like to carry our products and help us get them into stores, we'd LOVE to work with you! Go ahead and contact us at media@takeflightapparel.com, and we'll get back to you right away.

#4. Go Take Flight. Part of our mission is to inspire people everywhere to Take Flight. And that means YOU! We believe you are full of more potential then you know - all you have to do is unleash it. We're here to support you and cheer you on. We mean that :-) 


Frequently Asked Questions

When am I charged?

You are charged as soon as you make a pledge on the campaign.

How do I choose my shoe size and color?

Once you receive your contribution confirmation, please send us an email at media@takeflightapparel.com or contact us through the campaign. Let us know your name, email address, and contribution level so we can match your email to your contribution, and then let us know the shoe color and size you'd like. Our official colors are Shock Blue and Flame Red... and our official sizes are 6.5-12.5 US (see images and size chart below)

What is the width of the shoe like?

We’ve made the shoe to be versatile and flexible so they fit a wider foot. However, technically the width of these shoes is normal. We are not specifically making wider sizes.

Can I change my pledge?

Absolutely! Until we reach our funding goal, you can increase or decrease your pledge at any time. We hate to say it, but you can even cancel it.

What if I want to retail the shoes in my store, gym, or retail chain?

If you’d like to retail these shoes or any of our products such as our tees, pants, hats, and other items in your establishment go ahead and contact us at sales@takeflightapparel.com. It’s a very quick process to approve you as a retailer, and then we’ll give you all the breakdown. We look forward to working with you and being a part of your continued success!

If you have any other questions, let us know by sending us an email at contact@takeflightapparel.com or a message through Indiegogo. We'll respond to you personally and then add your answer here for everyone to benefit from.

Once you receive your contribution confirmation, please send us an email at media@takeflightapparel.com or contact us through the campaign. Let us know your name, email address, and contribution level so we can match your email to your contribution, and then let us know the shoe color and size you'd like. Our official colors are Shock Blue and Flame Red... and our official sizes are 6.5-12.5 US (see images and size chart below)




What is the width of the shoe like?
We’ve made the shoe to be versatile and flexible so they fit a wider foot. However, technically the width of these shoes is normal.
We are not specifically making wider sizes.
Can I change my pledge?
Absolutely! Until we reach our funding goal, you can
increase or decrease your pledge at any time. We hate to say it, but you can
even cancel it.
What if I want to retail the shoes in my store, gym, or
retail chain?
If you’d like to retail these shoes or any of our products such as our tees, pants, hats, and other items in your establishment go ahead and
contact us at sales@takeflightapparel.com.
It’s a very quick process to approve you as a retailer, and then we’ll give you
all the breakdown. We look forward to working with you and being a part of your
continued success!
If you have any other questions, let us know by sending us an email at contact@takeflightapparel.com or a message through Indiegogo. We'll respond to you personally and then add your answer here for everyone to benefit from.

story:
HOUKIE    -     #THESHOESAVIOUR

SAVE $$ ON SKATEBOARDING SHOES !!  

 Tired of wasting money on new skate shoes?? Problem solved!!

This is a flexible overshoe that will protect all areas where damage occurs when skateboarding. It is a "one-size fits all" shoecover. The patent pending dynamic stretch bands at the midfoot allows the Houkie to stretch to fit numerous sizes. The Houkie is stylish, removable and reusable. Hopefully we will launch the Houkie in September 2016!! The actual product will be injection molded rubber and in many different colors.  The initial launch color will be black.  The lightweight HOUKIE only weighs 185 grams!  

The product will not be bulky (approx 1/16th of an inch thick) and will allow the skater to keep the "board feel" that is of utmost importance!

                        UPDATE----------06/23/2016--------------------UPDATE

We have completed a redesign for the HOUKIE!  Here is a pic of the new look which will be created in our USA factory!!  



Skateboarding has progressed from casually riding on a skateboard to stunts, tricks and maneuvering the skateboard in many ways such as kicks, flips, jumps, spins.....etc. This new maneuvering and riding of the skateboard has been known to cause excessive and severe damage to many areas of the rider's shoes due to the surface that the rider is on, and the manipulation of the skateboard with the rider's feet. On the top of the skateboard is "grip tape" which is essentially sandpaper. This grip tape, when it comes in comes in contact with the skateboarder's shoe during the tricks and maneuvers, adds traction to the shoe in order for the rider to perform the tricks. This grip tape also causes tearing and major wear to several areas of the shoe. The main areas of the shoe that is affected are the outside upper of the shoe, the laces of the shoe, the ball area of the sole as well as the heel and heel area of the sole. In addition, the soles of the rider's shoe is susceptible to wear from the grip tape and the hard surfaces on which the rider is skating on when his is riding and performing these tricks and stunts, for example: concrete, blacktop, hardwood etc. Within a short time, the skateboarder has worn his shoe down so much that he will need to replace the shoe because it is no longer usable or safe to use. In this day and age, a skate shoe can range in cost from $60 to over $120 per pair.

The current products on the market provide some protection of the upper portion of the shoe, but not to the bottom of the shoe. These "patches" are affixed to the shoe with adhesive glues or other types of adhesive means.  Another product is a type of glue or rubber cement that is applied to the area of the upper portion of the shoe that dries to form a barrier where the wear is prevalent.

The current products as stated above are semi-permanent fixes that are mostly not removable from the shoe. These products, such as the adhesive patches, cannot be removed once applied and do not last very long. They do not allow the skateboarder to wear it for any other use than to skateboard since the shoe is altered and not very visually appealing. They do not protect all areas of the shoe where damage and wear is prevalent. Also, the glue/rubber cement product  is not removable once applied. This product takes time to dry before the rider can wear the shoes to skateboard. Although it can be placed on most areas where the damage is prevalent, it is very messy and does not provide the best protection. It is a very temporary fix to the problem. These products are not removable nor are they reusable. 

Our local tester, Stevie Gandy (photo above) says that he loves the HOUKIE. According to Stevie, he has better board control, can do flick tricks more efficiently and he doesn't even feel the HOUKIE on his shoes because they are so light.

The HOUKIE is a removable and reusable flexible overshoe that is placed over the shoe which will cover all areas of the shoe that are damaged during skateboarding. This overshoe is made of a flexible material that conforms to the shoe in all areas needed in order to protect specific portions of the shoe while conforming to the shoe's shape.  The overshoe adds additional cushioning and traction to the heel and ball of the shoe. The middle of the overshoe is constructed in a way to allow the overshoe to be stretched to fit and conform to a very broad range of shoe sizes and not just to a few size ranges. The upper and the sole also have added traction in the form of raised areas or other forms of traction to allow the "grip" of the shoe to the skateboard for the efficient execution of tricks and stunts. The overshoe also covers the laces area on the front of the shoe protecting them from damage where it is prevalent. 

Once the skateboarder has finished using the product, it can be removed and saved to be reused at a later time. The construction of this overshoe is such that it can be used on any type of shoe therefore making any shoe style a "skateboarding" shoe. There is also areas of the HOUKIE that will allow for different company logos who wish to sponsor or license the product.

We are hoping to have the Houkie last a minimum of 4 months so this will save tons of $$ on shoes. We are currently working with a local rubber chemist to come up with the best custom rubber compound that will be flexible but durable enough in addition to keeping the "board feel" for the skateboarder. Feel free to ask any questions about the Houkie. 

We have gone through 4 design changes so far and have finally fixed all the bugs in the design.  Now we need to get the proper custom rubber compound to make these perfect.  We have also located a manufacturer here in the USA so this will be American Made and we will be able to guarantee the consistency and quality of the HOUKIE. We are ready to get the final mold created and start production. 

 Below is a picture of the design phases from beginning to present.....

So far, we have done all of the development work, spent the money to get molds and samples tested so we could get this product created and out there for you guys to protect your shoes.  We are in the final stretch and are so close to having this completed!  This is where your support will push us to the finish!!  We are moving the manufacturing of the HOUKIE to the USA!!! The money raised will be used for the creation of the final design mold and obtaining the custom rubber compound and for the first run of the product. The HOUKIE will retail for $30 to $35 a pair when released. We hope to have the product to market for sale in September 2016.

BACKER LEVEL REWARDS:

$5 pledge or more:  

$25 pledge or more:

 $50 plegde or more:

 $100 pledge or more:

 $250 pledge or more:

story:
Hi-

My name is Diamond Weems and I would like to present my brand Forever Diamond. Forever Diamond consists of cosmetics, skin care, extensions, and hair products.

Forever Diamond launched its Liquid and Matte lipsticks as of June 1, 2016. Forever Diamond Cosmetics provides 24hr hydra technology with long lasting intense hydration where the suspended pigments creates a soft cushion, comfort, and long lasting wear. The lipsticks are vegan, hypoallergenic, paraben, and glueten free.

Recently I got an investment offer from Idea Buyer LLC, which is similar to Shark Tank minus the television exposure. Since I am so far in the process, meaning I already have the product, packaging is completed, and it selling, they are willing to invest in my brand  to get it into retail stores.

This is a dream come true for me as I put a lot work into my product to make sure it focuses on not only pigmentation, but the moisture on ones skin. I want to thank everyone for the continued support with Diamond's Beauty Bar (www.diamondsbeautybar.com) and hopefully you can help me with my next business venture. I understand that not everyone can contribute, but if you can share my campaign or spread the word of Forever Diamond Cosmetics, I would greatly appreciate it.

story:
Q'Vani - CEO/Founder:

My name is Drew Weaver and I'm an entrepreneur with an engineering and IT background.  I've always had an affinity for fashion and one day I decided to fuse both of my passions to create Q'Vani™.  A Luxury Footwear Brand that utilizes patent-pending technology to instantly repair heels.  I developed this technology because I'm a stickler on my appearance and forgot to repair my shoes one day before an important meeting and my shoe repair specialist couldn't help me out last minute.  So, I wasted time and money buying a new pair.  I knew there had to be a more cost-effective way and when I realized there wasn't one, I created Q'Vani™. Contributors to the Q'Vani™ campaign will be a part of making history by changing an industry that has not seen structural innovation since inception.  Since we're fully manufactured in the US, your contributions will allows us to create American jobs and even better it gives America an opportunity to become a dominant force in the footwear industry once again.


Q'Vani - Director of Operations:



Over three years ago, Q'Vani™ was just an idea.  One that the Founder was quite passionate about.  He started by sketching on a scratch piece of paper, then it led to many late night self-brainstorming moments to hash out the details of the technology needed to successfully accomplish a task so revolutionary. While working full time as an engineer, he used personal funds to bootstrap the entire process.  Once the prototype was completed, he learned from past business failures that he had to let go of his full-time job to give his passion a fair chance at succeeding.  After much contemplation and mental wrestling with fear, he marched into his bosses office and took a blind leap of faith.  

With nothing in the way to distract him from his goals, he embarked on probably the hardest thing he has ever done in his life...not to mention raising two children at the same time. The road has been arduous, yet rewarding. 

The founder is highly aware that he has been tremendously blessed to be able to solely fund Q'Vani™ from idea to fruition.  We recently launched our website and it is imperative that we create a buzz via marketing and hire a sales team to effectively integrate our products into the market.  This is where you guys come in! Q'Vani™ is seeking $150,000 to fund the next phase.  You can see a breakdown of where the funds will be utilized below:

  1. Marketing - $25,000
  2. Sales Team - $50,000
  3. Working Capital  $75,000
Marketing - $25,000
Q'Vani™ has a 3-tier marketing plan. The first-tier is traditional advertising and publicity (radio/TV/news/print).   The second-tier is internet marketing (social media/emails).  The third-tier is celebrity endorsements. (either Film/TV or fashion celebrities who don't have their own footwear line.)  All tiers will run simultaneously.
Sales Team - $50,000
Q'Vani™ will acquire a proven sales team to implement a highly-effective sales plan intermingled with Innovative Q'Vani strategies to help us stand out from our competitors. 
Working Capital - $75,000
Q'Vani™ will utilize $75,000 for day-to-day operations.  We will continue contracting shoe and heel production through our premier manufacturers in the United States while maintaining our strong relationships with Luxury Italian calf-skin leather and kid suede dealers in order to insure superb quality in our hand-crafted Luxury Men's Footwear.

Our Appreciation for Your Pledges:

Q'Vani™ is offering a plethora of perks to thank our supporters ranging from Q'Vani™ logo Coffee Mugs to One on One Conferences with Andrew Weaver, CEO/Founder of Q'vani™.  (transportation, hotel and other charges that may occur are not included) 
If Q'Vani™ does not reach our fundraising goal of $150,000, we will use the funds raised to fulfill perks and implement a scaled-down version of our marketing and sales team plan until our revenue can provide substantial working capital to help Q'Vani™ expand our business model.

ReInvent the Heel: The Impact of Innovation

Our contributions are about creating fashion career opportunities for Americans who spend years in fashion colleges to only find out after graduation there are few quality fashion manufacturers still located in the United States.  

Through innovation, Q'Vani™ is creating revenue streams in the footwear industry that are unprecedented.  Our patent-pending technology will insure that America can become the leader once again in an industry that has long left our shores.  

By manufacturing footwear smarter and owning the patents, other companies will have to license our technology until they come up with their own knock-offs.  By this time, Q'Vani™ will launch our next phase thus staying ahead of our competitors.  It will become harder to catch up to the originators without sacrificing quality.

Our patent-pending "Gravity" heel system allows our customers to repair their luxury footwear instantly for a fraction of the traditional shoe repair costs without cheapening the product.  Our footwear comes with an original set of heels, but additional heels are sold separately.   

This wonderful aspect of Q'Vani™ licensing is groundbreaking for the footwear industry.  We offer fashion entrepreneurs an opportunity to create their own businesses customizing heels for our footwear.  If Apple can do it for electronics, why can't we do it for footwear?



Challenges

In any business venture, there are challenges that may hinder a company from achieving its goals.  One of our greatest assets is being a team of master brainstormers.  Our solution-oriented executive team has faced many struggles in our careers and instead of backing down, we've embrace the challenges and enjoy figuring out how we can solve our challenges in innovative ways.  In fact, we enjoy solving challenges other companies face just for the fun of it!   A slight addiction we must say.  

The CEO is a big fan of Leonardo da Vinci in that he believes Leonardo is the greatest thinker and inventor to ever live...a pure renaissance man.  Long story short, we embrace the future challenges to prove that we are always living up to the true meaning of our company name...Q'Vani™:  "To Seek and Exude Excellence!" 

Our current challenges are:

 

Challenge #1

Sticker shock for a new brand.  Many customers who want a pair of our innovative footwear will find it hard to justify paying luxury prices for a new brand.

Solution #1

We wholeheartedly stand by the superior quality of our footwear.  We've spent the last two years researching and testing our competitors products and can guarantee you that our products are equal to or better than most most on the market.  The definition of Q'Vani™ is: "To Seek and Exude Excellence!"  We live by this definition personally and professionally.  That being said, we are working hard to create a strategy to offer random discounts on our product line when customers participate in our social networking product protection app called FAPO™.


Challenge #2

Competitors knocking off our Patent-Pending Heel System and bringing it to the masses before us.  

Solution #2

We have been studying this market for a few years now and we have yet to find a company publicly working on a replaceable heel product for men's footwear.  We are working diligently to align ourselves with celebrities and successful fashion brands who do not carry footwear lines in order to insure a prominent position in the rebirth of the footwear industry.  


Challenge #3

Obtaining talented footwear designers and manufacturers to keep our product lines fresh and relevant for years to come.

Solution #3

We are currently have a program to obtain stellar fashion talent throughout the world by investing in their dreams as they work for us.  It's a win- win scenario! This program will have companies re-vamping their human resources departments to obtain top talent.  Honestly, who would want to work for a company that has them buying everyone coffee after college graduation, when Q'Vani™ is offering them an avenue to own their own business while building ours.

At Q'Vani™, we are well aware there will be additional challenges for us to face and we welcome them as we consistently brainstorm to stay ahead of the curve.



Your Voice Matters!

Ladies and Gentlemen,  Q'Vani™ is aware that not everyone can contribute financially, but your voice is powerfully valuable to us.  Please use your influence to get the word out about our innovative products and plans to reinvest in America via the fashion industry.  To make it easier, you can use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.  We greatly appreciate you!


PERKS!


Q'Vani 16oz. Ceramic Coffee Mug


Q'Vani Mobile Device Stand


Q'Vani Limited Edition T-Shirt


Watch Movement Cuff Links


Q'Vani Footwear Collection


We are Proudly Working to Bring Footwear Manufacturing Back to America!

Challenges


In any business venture, there are challenges that may hinder a company from achieving its goals.  One of our greatest assets is being a team of master brainstormers.  Our solution-oriented executive team has faced many struggles in our careers and instead of backing down, we've embrace the challenges and enjoy figuring out how we can solve our challenges in innovative ways.  In fact, we enjoy solving challenges other companies face just for the fun of it!   A slight addiction we must say.  
The CEO is a big fan of Leonardo da Vinci in that he believes Leonardo is the greatest thinker and inventor to ever live...a pure renaissance man.  Long story short, we embrace the future challenges to prove that we are always living up to the true meaning of our company name...Q'Vani™:  "To Seek and Exude Excellence!" 
Our current challenges are:
 
Challenge #1
Sticker shock for a new brand.  Many customers who want a pair of our innovative footwear will find it hard to justify paying luxury prices for a new brand. 
Solution #1
We wholeheartedly stand by the superior quality of our footwear.  We've spent the last two years researching and testing our competitors products and can guarantee you that our products are equal to or better than most most on the market.  The definition of Q'Vani™ is: "To Seek and Exude Excellence!"  We live by this definition personally and professionally.  That being said, we are working hard to create a strategy to offer random discounts on our product line when customers participate in our social networking product protection app called FAPO™.


Challenge #2
Competitors knocking off our Patent-Pending Heel System and bringing it to the masses before us.  

Solution #2
We have been studying this market for a few years now and we have yet to find a company publicly working on a replaceable heel product for men's footwear.  We are working diligently to align ourselves with celebrities and successful fashion brands who do not carry footwear lines in order to insure a prominent position in the rebirth of the footwear industry.  



Challenge #3

Obtaining talented footwear designers and manufacturers to keep our product lines fresh and relevant for years to come.

Solution #3
We are currently have a program to obtain stellar fashion talent throughout the world by investing in their dreams as they work for us.  It's a win- win scenario! This program will have companies re-vamping their human resources departments to obtain top talent.  Honestly, who would want to work for a company that has them buying everyone coffee after college graduation, when Q'Vani™ is offering them an avenue to own their own business while building ours.
At Q'Vani™, we are well aware there will be additional challenges for us to face and we welcome them as we consistently brainstorm to stay ahead of the curve.






 
  Your Voice Matters! Ladies and Gentlemen,  Q'Vani™ is aware that not everyone can contribute financially, but your voice is powerfully valuable to us.  Please use your influence to get the word out about our innovative products and plans to reinvest in America via the fashion industry.  To make it easier, you can use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.  We greatly appreciate you!


PERKS!




Q'Vani 16oz. Ceramic Coffee Mug




Q'Vani Mobile Device Stand




Q'Vani Limited Edition T-Shirt




Watch Movement Cuff Links



Q'Vani Footwear Collection



We are Proudly Working to Bring Footwear Manufacturing Back to America!

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

  • mein name ist jeannette hamleh und ich bin designerin
  • ich möchte meine eigenen trachten turnschuhe produzieren lassen
  • ich sammle gelder für die produktion / den produktionsstart meiner
  • turnschuhe

- my name is jeannette hamleh and im a designer

- I would like to be producing my own bavarian styled sneakers

- I have been collecting funds for the production /  start the production of the
   sneakers


Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

  • ich benötige 15000 euro um die trachten turnschuh produktion zu starten
  • durch meine perks bekommen ihr die turnschuhe als erster, und mit einem rabatt von 10%
  • auch wenn die zielsumme nicht ganz erreicht wird, wird das geld in die produktion der trachtenturnschuhe fliesen.

  • i need 15000 USD to start the production of the sneakers
  • through my perks you get the sneakers at first, and at a discount of 10%
  • even if the target sum is not quite achieved, the money will be tiled in the production of the sneakers.

Die Folgen

Verrate mehr über deine Kampagne und lass die Leute wissen, was sie mit ihrem Beitrag bewirken:

  • die turnschuh produktion ist für mich wichtig um meine kunden glücklich zu machen und um mich als designerin zu leben / meine ideen zu verwirklichen
  • the sneaker production is important to make my customers happy and to me to live as a designer for me / my ideas into reality



Risiken & Herausforderungen

solch große stückzahlen zu produzieren lässt mich als "one women" firma an meine finanziellen grenzen stoßen. mit eurer hilfe möchte ich diese hürde überwinden.
ich möchte versuchen auch als kleine designerin eigene konzepte und designs zu realisieren.
to produce such large quantities makes me as "one women" company come up against my financial limits. with your help, I want to overcome this hurdle.
I want to try as a small designer's concepts and realize designs.

story:
Thank you for taking the time to have a look at our new flagship store, The Hangar.  

We will be piloting in Gravenhurst, Ontario. 

This platform will enable a good indication of want in the community for a store with high end goods sold for a fraction of the cost. 

We will carry everything from when you're parked on the couch relaxing, until you meet up with friends for a fancy night out. 

I suppose you could compare us to Winners, however we like to think that we actually cost less and are more organized. Therefore you spend less money and even less time sifting through the never ending rows of hangers. 

If you have ever looked into your closet and sighed, realizing it was time to make the trek to the big city, pay the enormous gas prices at the pump and wait in never ending lines to pay for your overpriced pair of jeans, then you understand why The Hangar will benefit you. It's time for us 'small town folk' to get some awesome deals on designer clothes. Muskoka is just the beginning.

 We (The Hangar) are a local store, meaning we don't charge more just because it's summer, we do clearance priced fashion year round. With so many different brands and suppliers, our racks will never go 'stale.' We won't ever carry more than a few of the same item, which means the chances of you running into someone with the same shirt are slim. 

We have access to the newest styles and trends with our global suppliers that can deliver the best prices for us and in turn, you.

Having our launch this winter, we feel gives us a strong chance to meet people from the area and build our client base within the local community and surrounding areas.

Besides, fall/winter clothes are fun. 

If you purchase perks,  I will mail you gift certificates for our grand opening that you can use on any clothing in the store. PERIOD.





.

PERIOD..

story:
Hi there,

Thank you for your interest in our Wear Art, Give Sight campaign! We are beyond excited to finally give our supporters the chance to directly connect themselves with the children they are helping. Through new techniques, we’ve been able to take the colorful and creative art of the young students we help and bring it to a new line of sunglasses. For every pair sold, fifty percent of the revenue will go to support these children. 

We see so much potential, so much creativity in our students. We want to share their talent and the power of their imaginations with the world, and give them a way to help the community they come from. We love these sunglasses, wear them every day, and hope you will love them too. Through our partnership with Wdoo, we've also been able to create some amazing, exclusive perks available to people who support the campaign, please check 'em out!

Last, we are thrilled to have you join us on our social mission, while adding something unique and fun to your style. Wear Art, Give Sight, Change the World. 

Best wishes,

The Education In Sight and Wdoo Team



Why glasses?

*Statistics for rural Chinese students

 

Globally, over 150 million low-income students suffer from uncorrected poor vision, and in China, as many as 30 million rural students suffer from the same problem.

With 80% of all classroom learning being visual, students in these classrooms who can’t see, can’t learn, and lose any chance at an equal education. 



Giving free glasses is one of the most powerful tools we have for combating educational inequality around the world.


Why do we need your support?


While we have been able to raise a portion of the costs needed to help students this year, we are still short of reaching our overall goal and being able to fully support all of our partner schools. With your help, we’ll be able to work in all 120 partner schools, deliver eyeglasses to all students in need, and be able to train and educate all key stakeholders in the community, including local teachers and parents.


Who are we helping? 

This year, we aim to help Baoshan and Derong counties in Yunnan, China, and all of the elementary and middle schools there. 

Our work is currently focused in the poorest regions of rural China. Children there face adversity in every element of their education. Many live without guardians and have parents that live a thousand miles away to work to raise money and support their children. Classroom sizes are often 50 to 60 students, where students are taught en masse, and many drop out before the age of 12 to go farm or work in factories.  




Sunglasses + Art

We want to give you the opportunity to connect with the students you are helping. Through our partnership with the designer eyeglasses company Wdoo, we have been able to bring the art and creativity of the students we work with and apply it directly to a pair of sunglasses. The colorful and unique artwork on each pair of glasses was actually created by the young artists of Yunnan province. When you go out in public, your glasses will have something no one else’s does – a story of creativity and inspiration that started all the way on the other side of the world. 


Our Sunglasses

Frame 1 - Bird of Paradise


Frame 2 - Kaleidoscope 


Frame 3 - Dangerous Beauty


Frame 4 - Tree of Learning


Frame 5 - Snap, Crackle, Pop


Frame 6 - View Through a Window


Frame 7 - Zebra Dreams


Frame 8 - In the Schoolyard


Frame 9 - Red Chamber


Frame 10 - Little House on the Paddie


Frame 11  - We are the Children


Frame 12 - Dance by Sunset


Sunglasses Quality

Here are some of the nitty gritty details:

  • Our frames are made with cotton base cellulose acetate propionate from Eastman - an enviromentally friendly material
  • Their design printing is done with the latest UV Flatbed technology, which literally raises the designs off the glasses and gives them texture
  • Our lenses are UV 400, polarized, revo mirror finishing and anti-reflective coating
  • The frames themselves go through 3 levels of quality control and are meticulously designed to allow maximum comfort and durability
Basically, these are some of the best sunglasses money can buy. 

After this campaign, these sunglasses will retail for $70, and so we are offering a special opportunity to our supporters here on Indiegogo. 


Special Perk - Customized Sunglasses

One thing you may have noticed - with our "CUSTOM EIS x Wdoo Sunglasses" and "CUSTOM LINE" perk, we are able to create for you a one-of-a-kind pair of sunglasses, using any design you would like. Through the unique manufacturing abilities of Wdoo, this is now possible, and those who choose this perk will get to work directly with their design team to adapt your design to a pair of our wayfarer or aviator frames. 

Do you have a cat you love that needs to be on a pair of sunglasses? 
We can do it. 
Have a designer friend with some cool stuff?
Put it on a pair of sunglasses. 
When it comes to our CUSTOM perks, the world is your oyster. 



Our Partner – Wdoo

We have partnered with a manufacturing company called Wdoo - a new kind of eyeglasses company focused on telling stories with eye wear through unique designs. After decades of experience in the eyeglasses industry creating all different shape, material and cost of frames, the founders of Wdoo felt that there was something missing in the whole industry. Where were the stories, where was the inspiration? Wdoo set out to change this. From the beginning, Wdoo hasn’t operated like a traditional manufacturer. Instead of recycling styles season after season, Wdoo is bringing the stories of artists, causes, and change-makers to life through eyewear. 

At Wdoo, “Strange things happen”, and two pairs of glasses are never alike.


How does your purchase help kids?

For every pair of sunglasses we sell through our Indiegogo campaign, 50% of the revenue will go to support children who need eyeglasses. These costs include providing eye exams to students, free eyeglasses, eye care education, teacher training, and only going towards 10% administrative overhead (we are still a small team, have mercy on us!) 



FAQ

How do I select the style I want when I purchase? 

Excellent question! Once we have received your order through our campaign, we will send a survey to the email you registered with that will allow you to select the style you would like, as well as any custom message you want printed if you select a Deluxe version. 

When can I expect to receive my sunglasses? 

We are doing our best to fulfill orders as quickly as possible. For the early supporters to our campaign (within the first 20 days) we hope to deliver before Christmas time. Orders submitted later in the campaign can be expected to be received in January 2016. 

If major donors are already supporting you, why should I help?

To date, we’ve been privileged to have the support of many generous individuals, corporations, and foundations. But to sustain our organization for the long haul, we need to engage you, our community members. All donations, regardless of the amount, help further our mission and allow us to reach more students. 

You say 20% of students needs eyeglasses, but your impact estimates only 15% need them. What’s with the difference?

Great question! Our 20% figure is based off of national data performed through larger research institutions, and collected across different areas of China and the world. These rates can fluctuate from area to area, and in Yunnan province, our main area of operation, we’ve found the need to be slightly less than the national average. However, even though the occurrence rate is lower, our students still suffer the same negative effects of poor vision, and benefit equally from receiving the glasses they need. 

What payment methods do you accept?

Indiegogo accepts all major credit cards.

Is shipping included?

Yup

Does international shipping cost extra?

Yes, but Indiegogo doesn’t allow us to add any extra shipping to the perks, so it is included in the suggested donation price.

I have more questions. Who do I ask?

Please email eis@education-in-sight.org to ask your question. We’ll get back to you as fast as we can!

story:
Introducing Tacuin


Tacuin has created an eco-friendly notebook with a soft cover, a smooth writing paper and with all the comfortable feel of a luxury notebook. So whether you are an avid writer or have always dreamed of writing more, today is the day to join our Tacuin notebook movement! 

We invite you to help us bring our dream to life by contributing to Tacuin – in return, we're offering a range of exclusive rewards, together with our deepest gratitude. We’ve been working on this campaign for a while now and we are very excited about this opportunity to reach out to you. 



How You Can Help

For us to bring Tacuin into life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started. It will help us cover the costs of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of Tacuin. We are committed to continuous improvement to give our costumers the best possible solutions.



How We'll Use the Funds

The funds generated from this campaign will be entirely used for the first large-scale production of the notebook including packaging, shipping as well as the Indiegogo, Paypal & Payment processing fees.





Features

  • Large A5 | 14.8 x 21 cm | 5.8″ x 8.3″ 
  • FSC® certified 
  • Italian Style
  • Hard cover, soft touch, 100% biodegradable
  • 192 plain or lined pages, made from eco-friendly paper
  • Thread bound
  • Marker ribbon
  • Elastic closure (optional)
  • Folder pocket in the back cover (optional)


Colors




More about the Tacuin Project

This is where we started to envision Tacuin and all the possible benefits we could bring to people!


When reviewing these benefits, we feel inspired and certain that this project was much needed to be created. We hope to reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to write. Our mission is to take care of every funder, supporter and customer with the utmost respect and care. We feel this will be the key to our growth.


Eco-Friendly

Quality and sustainability are the principles that guide our project, from the conceptual design of the notebook to the manufacturing, distribution and sale. The utmost attention has been dedicated to choosing the materials. For this reason all our direct partners (such as our paper manufacturer and bookbinders) bear the FSC® Chain of Custody certification and are based on a shared commitment to environmentally friendly high quality products.

In addition to our commitment to the FSC®, the selected paper used in our notebook holds the following ecological certifications:

  • FSC® certified
  • Elemental Chlorine Free
  • Acid Free
  • Selected Secondary Fibres
  • Heavy Metal Absence
  • Long Life Paper
  • EU Eco-Label (EU Marguerite)




Paper Love

Attention to every detail and passion for quality is important to us in order to enhance the characteristics of each Tacuin notebook. We offer a premium quality product that infuses each notebook with a touch of Italy.

The cover owes its velvety touch to a carefully manufactured, 100% biodegradable, flocked paper based on eucalyptus pulp which fascinates with its special tactile feel. With its smooth and luxurious finish our Tacuin collection ensures a high quality experience and a particularly soft texture allowing for an extraordinarily comfortable and relaxed hold.



Tacuin in the Press

"The most important thing is to love and share our love and that’s what you are doing by sharing and giving us something to caress and love." Matthew Lesko (New York Times Best Selling Author & Entrepreneur)





What people are saying about Tacuin

"It touches me deeply to see how much love, care and respect is put into the Tacuin notebook. It shines through in all aspects of the process of making your dream come true... now it is easy to love, care and respect whatever I choose to write or draw here." S. Boye Petersen


"It is simply beautiful and pleasant, nourishing and calming to even just view." S. Lee


"A brilliant way to benefit." A. Naim

 

"Thank you so much for this opportunity to write a review for this great cause. May all beings benefit." J. Sethi 


"I was immediately drawn to Tacuin after the first glimpse. It is humble to the eye and luxurious to the touch. My first thoughts were of quality, then of sustainability. Tacuin is a beautiful mix of both." C. Horstkamp


"This is such a soulful, beautiful item, so much more than a notebook. I would write my deepest heart wishes and desires and treasure it forever. The care in every detail gives it a life that elicits reflection, awareness and creativity." S. Lee



Timeline

We aim to send all pre-order incentives by November of 2015.

  • September 2015: Indiegogo campaign ends 
  • October 2015: Production & assembly of notebooks
  • November 2015: Begin packaging and shipping of small orders
  • Late November 2015: All large orders (10+ notebooks) packaged and shipped


Shipping

Please include $10 if shipping to the EU, and $18 if shipping outside of the EU. Please note that the shipping costs remain the same up to 5 notebooks. 


The Impact

As a global sustainable development project we take very much to heart our social responsibility. Our corporate culture is reflected in the knowledge, skills and awareness of each member, and every detail is carried out in a clear and consistent way, in an environment full of enthusiasm and a disposition towards the common good.

We strive for a balance between economic development and social-environmental responsibility based on respect and reliability, and our desire to have a beneficial impact on people, society and the environment.

Through your contributions we are able to support Balanced View, a non-profit organization committed to empowering people all over the world to see their strengths and talents, and contribute them for the benefit to all.


Risks

We've already sourced our necessary materials and our direct partners such as paper manufacturer and bookbinder and we are confident to be able to deliver our orders quickly as soon as our project is funded. Most of our manufacturing process is done by hand, so there could be some delays with one of our manufacturing partners or shipping providers.

In the event of unforeseen delays in the manufacturing and shipping process, we will be 100% transparent. We will do everything we can to ensure that all orders are shipped by the end of November 2015.



Other Ways You Can Help

Any way that you can help is greatly appreciated. These campaigns do the best when they get momentum right from the start. The more activity we get the higher the chance our project will be featured on Indiegogo's Homepage. If you know any influential people please let them know about our campaign. 

If you would like to support our project but you are not able to contribute, please spread the word and share Tacuin  with your community, friends and family.

  • Share this link: http://igg.me/at/tacuin/x/9332425
  • Twitter: include @Tacuin_ to your tweet
  • Visit our Indiegogo campaign page as many times a day as you can



Thank you!



Contact

If you have any further questions or you are interested in our products please send an email to support@tacuin.com.
For press inquiries please contact press@tacuin.com or download our Media Kit here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/b7avu74x0hta1c3/AADP...
story_txt:
Introducing Tacuin



Tacuin has created an eco-friendly notebook with a soft cover, a smooth writing paper and with all the comfortable feel of a luxury notebook. So whether you are
an avid writer or have always dreamed of writing
more, today is the day to join our Tacuin notebook movement! 
We invite you to help us bring our
dream to life by contributing to Tacuin – in
return, we're offering a range of exclusive rewards, together with our deepest
gratitude. We’ve been working on this campaign for a while now and we are very excited about this opportunity to reach out
to you. 






How You Can Help
For us to bring Tacuin into life, we need your support!
Your generous funding will help us get things started. It will help us cover the costs of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of Tacuin. We are committed to continuous improvement to give our costumers the best possible solutions.



How We'll Use the Funds

The funds generated from this campaign will be entirely used for the first large-scale production of the notebook including packaging, shipping as well as the Indiegogo, Paypal & Payment processing fees.













Features

Large A5 | 14.8 x 21 cm | 5.8″ x 8.3″ 
FSC® certified 
Italian Style
Hard cover, soft touch, 100% biodegradable
192 plain or lined pages, made from eco-friendly paper
Thread bound
Marker ribbon
Elastic closure (optional)
Folder pocket in the back cover (optional)


Colors




More about the Tacuin Project

This is where we started to envision Tacuin and all the possible benefits we could bring to people!









When
reviewing these benefits, we feel inspired and certain that this project was much needed to be created. We hope to reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to write. Our mission is to take care of every funder,
supporter and customer with the utmost respect and care. We feel this will be the key to our growth.



Eco-Friendly
Quality and sustainability are the principles that guide our project, 
from the conceptual design of the notebook to the manufacturing, 
distribution and sale. The utmost attention has been 
dedicated to choosing the materials. For this reason all our direct 
partners (such as our paper manufacturer and bookbinders) bear the FSC® Chain of Custody certification and are based on a shared commitment to 
environmentally friendly high quality products.



In addition to our commitment to the FSC®, the selected paper used in our notebook holds the following ecological certifications:

FSC® certified 

Elemental Chlorine Free
Acid Free
Selected Secondary Fibres
Heavy Metal Absence
Long Life Paper
EU Eco-Label (EU Marguerite)


 


  




Paper Love
Attention to every detail and passion for quality is important to us in order to enhance the characteristics of each Tacuin notebook. We offer a premium quality product that infuses each notebook with a touch of Italy.
The cover owes its velvety touch to a carefully manufactured, 100% 
biodegradable, flocked paper based on eucalyptus pulp which fascinates 
with its special tactile feel. With its smooth and luxurious finish our Tacuin collection ensures a high quality experience and a particularly soft 
texture allowing for an extraordinarily comfortable and relaxed hold.



Tacuin in the Press
"The most important thing is to love and share our love and that’s what you are doing by sharing and giving us something to caress and love." Matthew Lesko (New York Times Best Selling Author & Entrepreneur)





What people are saying about Tacuin

"It touches me deeply to see how much love, care and respect is put into the Tacuin notebook. It shines through in all aspects of the process of making your dream come true... now it is easy to love, care and respect whatever I choose to write or draw here." S. Boye Petersen


"It is simply beautiful and pleasant, nourishing and calming to even just view." S. Lee



"A brilliant way to benefit." A. Naim


 

"Thank you so much for this opportunity to write a review for this great cause. May all beings benefit." J. Sethi 


"I was immediately drawn to Tacuin after the first glimpse. It is humble to the eye and luxurious to the touch. My first thoughts were of quality, then of sustainability. Tacuin is a beautiful mix of both." C. Horstkamp

"This is such a soulful, beautiful item, so much more than a notebook. I would write my deepest heart wishes and desires and treasure it forever. The care in every detail gives it a life that elicits reflection, awareness and creativity." S. Lee




Timeline
We aim to send all pre-order incentives by November of 2015.

September 2015: Indiegogo campaign ends 
October 2015: Production & assembly of notebooks
November 2015: Begin packaging and shipping of small orders
Late November 2015: All large orders (10+ notebooks) packaged and shipped



Shipping
Please include $10 if shipping to the EU, and $18 if shipping outside of the EU. Please note that the shipping costs remain the same up to 5 notebooks. 



The Impact



As a global sustainable 
development project we take very much to heart our social responsibility. Our 
corporate culture is reflected in the knowledge, skills and awareness of
 each member, and every detail is carried out in a clear and consistent way, in an 
environment full of enthusiasm and a disposition towards the common 
good. 
We strive for a balance between economic development and
 social-environmental responsibility based on respect and reliability, and our desire to have a beneficial impact on people, society and the environment. 
Through your contributions we are able to support Balanced View, a non-profit organization 
committed to empowering people all over the world to see their strengths
 and talents, and contribute them for the benefit to all.



Risks
 
We've already sourced our necessary materials and our direct partners such as paper manufacturer and bookbinder and we are confident to be able to deliver our orders quickly as soon as our
project is funded. Most of our manufacturing process is done by hand, so there could be some delays with one of our manufacturing partners or shipping providers.
In the event of unforeseen delays in the
manufacturing and shipping process,
we will be 100% transparent. We will do
everything we can to ensure that all orders are shipped by the end of November 2015.



Other Ways You Can Help
Any way that you can help is greatly appreciated. These campaigns do the best when they get momentum right from the start. The more activity we get the higher the chance our project will be featured on Indiegogo's Homepage. If you know any influential people please let them know about our campaign. 
If you would like to support our project but you are not able to contribute, please spread the word and share Tacuin  with your community, friends and family.


Share this link: http://igg.me/at/tacuin/x/9332425

Twitter: include @Tacuin_ to your tweet
Visit our Indiegogo campaign page as many times a day as you can







Thank you!










Contact

story:
Short Summary

My name is Ben, ex military of 11 years and now pursuing projects and ventures instead of military goals. In my time with the military I noticed a very large change in the perceptions the common man has and how numb we have become to what is in front of us. This campaign and the Label I have created is aimed at putting messages and thoughts with true meanings into symbolism causing people to take a deeper look, cause their mind to release juices of creative thought and teach people that what is front of us isn't always as it seems. People have become a kin to symbolism, we fight for symbols and many have died for symbols. I will use them to stimulate the mind of a person and get them to think deeper and look further into what they see.

What We Need & What You Get

The campaign goal has been set in order to achieve a first print of shirts with various designs. If you donate $30 to the campaign you will receive a first edition print of the Puzzled? logo as well as first look at and option to buy further designs. 

The Impact

Through my own experience of becoming 'awakened' to the world around me I aim to help others experience the same. Everything starts out small but by creating this method of expression, partnered with the natural inquisitive nature of others wanting to know a designs meaning, we can help stimulate peoples thoughts and change how they perceive things in front of them, humbly starting with "what does that mean on your shirt?"

Risks & Challenges

In the military I was a person of influence, I met intense situations and scenarios which required quick and evasive thought/action. Everything is a risk and everything is a challenge. I am not sure what the challenges I'll face during this process but I certainly welcome them. Its cliche but challenges present success or lessons. Both very valuable. Risk is necessary.

Other Ways You Can Help

Other ways you can help is by sharing this idea with your family, friends and colleagues. Those people you know who are the open minded, deep thinking analysts that believe there is more than what it seems and who want to wear something that has a meaning and purpose behind it. For those people; we are of like mind.
