story:
My name is Yukiko Wade, co-founder and Creative Director of Tiny Blossoms, Inc. - a premium clothing brand for girls from age 6 months to 3 years old.  I am very excited to launch my first Spring & Summer 2015 collection in a month!  

Yukiko Wade is a sponsored grant recipient of The Grove Center for the Arts & Media, a Southern California non-profit arts organization. Contributions for Tiny Blossoms, Inc. are tax-deductible through The Grove Center for the Arts & Media to the extent permitted by law. You will receive a tax-deductible receipt from The Grove for your contribution as well as the perk you select.  (See the interview video with Joey O'Connor on the Gallery page.)

We bring our customers  the highest quality organic influenced fabrics from Japan for this collection. Custom made flowers and hand dyed buttons and lace add elegant detail to our designs.  We believe in supporting our local fashion industry,  all of our garments are sewn in the United States!  Tiny Blossoms pledges 10 % of our profit to help unfortunate children in Rwanda and Japan.  

 Tiny Blossoms clothing is unique, contemporary and sophisticated, reflecting an heirloom quality. A premium brand, Tiny Blossoms, has quality and value that our customers  appreciate.  Be sure to  go to my company website for full description of styles, color and size options at www.tinyblossomsinc.com! 　日本語訳は、英語文のすぐ下にありますので、そちらを御覧ください。また日本語吹き替え版ビデオを御覧になりたい方は、こちらのリンクをクリックしてください。

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/tiny-blossoms-children-s-apparel-that-gives-back/x/9826806#gallery


 

Children are like blooming flowers: They will bloom into their full potential with love and guidance from others...

When we walk through a valley and look out at the blooming fields, we simply stop and admire their beauty for a while. As we examine each flower closely, we can easily notice its unique beauty.  I believe that children are like blossoms - they are to be noticed, cherished, and cared for in order to bloom into amazing people.

After having two children six years ago, my desire to cherish and give my best to them led me to start creating garments that are simple, comfortable and stylish. My husband, Adam believed in my vision and eventually this passion became a company, “Tiny Blossoms, Inc.” I believe my line of clothing can not only bring children a sense of peace and comfort in a busy world, but also smiles and joy to those around them.  

We need your support to finish Spring & Summer 2015 Collection!

In order to make my collection available in the market, cover all of expenses from preproduction, production and other expenses, and prepare for next season, Adam and I would like to raise $23,000 through this Indiegogo campaign. I think it's possible to accomplish this goal with your support!

Your donation will go towards:

  • Pre-production: fabrics, pattern making, grading & marking
  • Production: cutting, sewing and packaging
  • Notions: trims, buttons, and other supplies
  • Preparation for next season’s collection                                  


PERKS/商品説明

Be sure to  go to my company website for full description of styles, color and size options at www.tinyblossomsinc.com!

                                Girls Tunic ＆ Girls Shorts//女児チューニック & 女児ショーツ
                                                                          Girls Stripe Knit Jacket/女児ジャケット　　




 Girls Stripe Knit Jacket & Girls Balloon Dress & Bloomer/女児ジャケット& 女児バ  ルーンドレス &ブルーマー


                                  Girls Tunic ＆ Girls Shorts//女児チューニック &女児ショーツ




                                                                                                  Girls Romper/女児ロンパー



                              Girls Balloon Dress/女児バルーンドレス & Bloomer/ブルーマー


                                                                                                       Tote Bag / トートバッグ




                                                                                                                      Hair Band/ヘアーバンド   



                                                                                                                   Hair Clips/ヘア-クリップ                 



     Tiny Blossoms Wants to Give Back!



Tiny Blossoms believes in helping children and is pledging 10% of its profit to bring hope to those in need.  In March 2011, the tsunami from The Great East Japan Earthquake Disaster wiped out the northern part of Japan. Around 1,800 people lost their lives in the city of Rikuzentakata, Iwate where my sister’s family lives. Many children became orphans. A portion of our pledge will go to help rebuild a public library in the city to give hope and encouragement to those children. 



Tiny Blossoms, Inc. will also donate to a non-profit organization called PEACE Water:No Thirsty Child to install well systems in various Rwanda villages. Many children walk all day to collect infected water from swamps or rivers and carry it home to their families. Not only do they become very ill from the water, but the time spent laboring keeps them from going to school. Installing well systems will help people in these villages be dramatically healthier, but also bring these children back to school where they belong to receive primary education.

Lastly, to support local employment, all of our garments are sewn in America.

I believe every child has unique talents and can “bloom” when given love, care and guidance. Your support will make a huge difference for these children’s lives. 

Would you be willing to be a part of launching our exciting project? Thank you so much for watching this video, learning about Tiny Blossoms and supporting our campaign. Remember, not only will you receive wonderful perks, your donation is tax-deductible.

Yukiko Wade

Co-Founder of Tiny Blossoms, Inc. 


日本語訳：

Children are like blooming flowers: They will bloom into their full potentials with love and guidance from others...私にとって子供とは、綺麗に咲き誇る花のように、人から愛され導かれると、才能をフルに発揮することができると信じています。

私は高品質女児用子供服製造販売会社”タイニィブラッサム（小花）”のオーナー兼デザイナーのゆきこウエイドです。野原一面に咲きほこる花畑を観ると、その個々の美しさに目を奪われ，しばし時間を忘れ、見入ってしまいます。私は、どの子供も、このきれいな花のようなものだと思っています。小さな花が個々の存在を見つけてもらい、愛され、導かれ，素敵な花を咲かせるように、子供達に無限な可能性が秘められていると信じています。

この会社の原点は、私達の子達への愛情を形として何か触感できる物を作りたいというパッションから始まりました。また、スピード社会で暮らす現代人の方々の為に、ストレスレベルの低下を促進させ、シンプル、かつ平安をもたらせることのできる洋服作りをめざしてきました。私のビジョンをサポートしてくれた主人のアダムと一緒に、”タイニィブラッサム”という会社を立ち上げることができました。今回のコレクションは、高品質なオーガニックの生地を日本から輸入、レース、ボタンはロスアンゼルスで、手で染められました。私のデザインする服は、着心地がよく、見た目にも肌にも優しい子供服の提供、そして周りにいる人たちへ笑みと喜びを与えるような服作りに重点を置いています。今回のコレクションは、６ヶ月から３才までの女の子が対象です。


2015年春夏コレクションの製造資金支援のお願い！製造資金費用、2015年春夏コレクションの製作、来シーズンのコレクションの準備などをするためには、＄23000ドル必要になります。支援金は、下記のように使われます。


  • 生地
  • パターン作り
  • グレーディング
  • マーキング
  • カッティング
  • 縫製
  • レースその他のサプライ
  • 来シーズンの準備


タイニィブラッサムは人道支援活動をサポートします！

タイニィブラッサムは、モットーにもあるように、恵まれないルワンダと日本の子供達に希望と勇気を与える為に、利益の１０％を寄付します。会社経営が軌道に乗り次第、寄付金の比率を上げていきたいと考えております。

2011年３月に、東日本大震災が東北で起こり、私の姉の家族が在住する岩手県陸前高田市では約1800人の尊い命がなくなりました。たくさんの子供たちが親をなくされました。利益の一部は、困難を強いられている子供たちに希望と励ましを与えるために、市立図書館新築資金へと寄付されます。

もう一つのチャリティー先は、非営利団体”PEACE Water:No Thirsty Child”を通して、様々なルワンダの村々に井戸を設置することです。多くの子供達は、一日中かけて歩き汚れた水を溜り池や川から組み、家に持って帰ります。多くの子供達は、その水で病気になるだけではなく学校に通うことができずにいます。井戸を村々に設置することで、村全体の健康の回復だけではなく、子供達が居るべき場所即ち小学校に戻って勉強することが可能になります。

最後になりましたが、、アメリカ国内のファッション業界雇用率をサポートする為に、タイニィブラッサムは、全ての服をアメリカで縫製します。

私はどんな子供であれ、愛情をかけられ、導かれれば、必ず才能が発揮されると信じています。あなたの支援で、この子供達にポジティブな影響を与えることができます。

私たちのこのエキサイティングなプロジェクトに一緒に参加しませんか？ご視聴ありがとうございました。

ゆきこウエイド

代表取締役タイニィブラッサム

Around 1,800 people lost their lives in the city of Rikuzentakata, Iwate where my sister’s family lives. Many children became orphans. A portion of our pledge will go to help rebuild a public library in the city to give hope and encouragement to those children. 



Tiny Blossoms, Inc. will also donate to a non-profit organization called PEACE Water:No Thirsty Child to install well systems in various Rwanda villages. Many children walk all day to collect infected water from swamps or rivers and carry it home to their families. Not only do they become very ill from the water, but the time spent laboring keeps them from going to school. Installing well systems will help people in these villages be dramatically healthier, but also bring these children back to school where they belong to receive primary education.
Lastly, to support local employment, all of our garments are sewn in America.
I believe every child has unique talents and can “bloom” when given love, care and guidance. Your support will make a huge difference for these children’s lives. 
Would you be willing to be a part of launching our exciting project? Thank you so much for watching this video, learning about Tiny Blossoms and supporting our campaign. Remember, not only will you receive wonderful perks, your donation is tax-deductible.
Yukiko Wade
Co-Founder of Tiny Blossoms, Inc. 

日本語訳：
Children are like blooming flowers: They will bloom into their full potentials with love and guidance from others...私にとって子供とは、綺麗に咲き誇る花のように、人から愛され導かれると、才能をフルに発揮することができると信じています。
私は高品質女児用子供服製造販売会社”タイニィブラッサム（小花）”のオーナー兼デザイナーのゆきこウエイドです。野原一面に咲きほこる花畑を観ると、その個々の美しさに目を奪われ，しばし時間を忘れ、見入ってしまいます。私は、どの子供も、このきれいな花のようなものだと思っています。小さな花が個々の存在を見つけてもらい、愛され、導かれ，素敵な花を咲かせるように、子供達に無限な可能性が秘められていると信じています。
この会社の原点は、私達の子達への愛情を形として何か触感できる物を作りたいというパッションから始まりました。また、スピード社会で暮らす現代人の方々の為に、ストレスレベルの低下を促進させ、シンプル、かつ平安をもたらせることのできる洋服作りをめざしてきました。私のビジョンをサポートしてくれた主人のアダムと一緒に、”タイニィブラッサム”という会社を立ち上げることができました。今回のコレクションは、高品質なオーガニックの生地を日本から輸入、レース、ボタンはロスアンゼルスで、手で染められました。私のデザインする服は、着心地がよく、見た目にも肌にも優しい子供服の提供、そして周りにいる人たちへ笑みと喜びを与えるような服作りに重点を置いています。今回のコレクションは、６ヶ月から３才までの女の子が対象です。

2015年春夏コレクションの製造資金支援のお願い！製造資金費用、2015年春夏コレクションの製作、来シーズンのコレクションの準備などをするためには、＄23000ドル必要になります。支援金は、下記のように使われます。


生地
パターン作り
グレーディング
マーキング
カッティング
縫製
レースその他のサプライ
来シーズンの準備


タイニィブラッサムは人道支援活動をサポートします！
タイニィブラッサムは、モットーにもあるように、恵まれないルワンダと日本の子供達に希望と勇気を与える為に、利益の１０％を寄付します。会社経営が軌道に乗り次第、寄付金の比率を上げていきたいと考えております。
2011年３月に、東日本大震災が東北で起こり、私の姉の家族が在住する岩手県陸前高田市では約1800人の尊い命がなくなりました。たくさんの子供たちが親をなくされました。利益の一部は、困難を強いられている子供たちに希望と励ましを与えるために、市立図書館新築資金へと寄付されます。
もう一つのチャリティー先は、非営利団体”PEACE Water:No Thirsty Child”を通して、様々なルワンダの村々に井戸を設置することです。多くの子供達は、一日中かけて歩き汚れた水を溜り池や川から組み、家に持って帰ります。多くの子供達は、その水で病気になるだけではなく学校に通うことができずにいます。井戸を村々に設置することで、村全体の健康の回復だけではなく、子供達が居るべき場所即ち小学校に戻って勉強することが可能になります。
最後になりましたが、、アメリカ国内のファッション業界雇用率をサポートする為に、タイニィブラッサムは、全ての服をアメリカで縫製します。
私はどんな子供であれ、愛情をかけられ、導かれれば、必ず才能が発揮されると信じています。あなたの支援で、この子供達にポジティブな影響を与えることができます。
私たちのこのエキサイティングなプロジェクトに一緒に参加しませんか？ご視聴ありがとうございました。
ゆきこウエイド
代表取締役タイニィブラッサム

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I am Ben Swift, the founder and creator of Jelliskin. I have spent the past 15 years offering personalised products in shopping malls around the UK. As you probably know retail is a fast paced ever changing world in constant need of clever innovation and great design which suits current trends and markets in order to succeed. For a small company it's also very important to stand out, and in a way it can be easier to have the nimbleness to change and innovate quicker.

Our core products were canvas prints, we took a customers image from their phones, usb sticks etc. then printed canvases on-site in pop up shops in shopping malls. We had a few good years with this concept but sales started to dip, we needed new products to get sales going again, after noticing a trend in customising products like mobile phones and tablets, I knew that's the route to go down, I needed something that we could call our own. That's when I looked down the route of phone skins, traditionally printed on vinyl using solvent ink, then skillfully applied to a phone, the vinyl skins were very cool but needed expensive equipment, drying time, and didn't really offer any protection. I needed this product but done in a different way. I was already very familiar with a printing process called sublimation so what I needed to do was find suitable materials to create a gel skin. Again I hit a brick wall and found the process to be too laborious and not cost effective. We eventually found a type of polymer that could be printed, great we thought we'd cracked it... We were wrong. We then had to spend 2 years developing a unique formula of resin that could be hardened in advance to allow the gel skin to be printed on demand in minutes. We have had such belief and focus in our Jelliskin product that all our time, money and focus has gone into getting this unique product where it is today.
In order to grow the brand and concept faster we have recruited several distributors around the world. We sell the Jelliskin blank on branded packaging, they are then sold to various retailers who offer customised Jelliskins for their clients. 
Our real passion is retail and we feel there is a great opportunity to sell Jelliskins all over the world, but we need to make people aware of the product and continue to perfect our range and products.
We are 75% of the way there with this product and our passion and determination has blinded us in a way, we really need your support to help us utilise all the work put in so far, we have been extremely resourceful with what we had and where we already are but you could be a vital part of the puzzle that helps to make this dream a reality.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise £20000 in funds for marketing, product development and increase production capacity.
  • We are offering all backers a unique opportunity to receive a "I Made It Happen" Limited Edition Jelliskin for a reduced price of £7.00, normally £14.99, these will be available for iPhone 4, iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus, Samsung S4, S5. 

Risks & Challenges

  • I have developed such a wide range of knowledge and skills during this project out of necessity and maybe it's time to appreciate what other people could bring to the product as we grow. There are a lot of planned but unfinished areas of the business, we have all the materials to increase quality but not equipment, we have the designs for retail packaging but no printed product, our app is 75% complete but we need to final development and need to get it found. 
  • Being as resourceful as we are the funding will allow us to complete everything we need to.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you feel you can't contribute, we'd love you to share this campaign and pass it to backers who may be able to help. Thank you in advance.

story:
by:


We sell alpaca clothing for the outdoor enthusiast.

We started with alpaca base layers after learning about the natural lightweight warmth alpaca provides. We wanted to try some out in a base layer suitable for outdoor recreation. Unable to find any, we decided to make some ourselves. 

Our alpaca base layers perform wonderfully in insulation, strength, and moisture wicking. We expanded our offerings to alpaca field pants and accessories and have now designed The Ultimate Field Coat, pairing alpaca's lightweight warmth with traditional waxed cotton for a long lasting versatile coat that gets better with each use. 

Materials:

Alpaca: Lightweight, warm, and strong. We source our alpaca from Peru and the        inner plaid lining is made with 100% of the finest alpaca, manufacturer by a trusted partner who has been with us since our first product launch. 

Waxed Cotton: Traditional waxed cotton sourced from long standing waxed cotton producer; British Millerain. 

Sewing: Final sewing and packaging will be completed with one of our local manufacturers

And that's all there is too it! Two fabrics, some buttons and zippers, and one sewing facility. 

Now we need some help. We are trying to raise $9,000 for the alpaca fabric that will be the lining for these coats. 


Perks


The Coat

$495 Regular retail 
 $300 Indiegogo 
 $285.00 Early Bird (First 30)


Water repellent waxed cotton exterior

Fully lined interior of 100% alpaca

Zip off lined hood

Lower pockets have both top and lined side entry

Secure interior zipper pocket

Two button adjustable cuff

Available in men's and women's. Exterior color is a dark forest green with classic red/white/black plaid alpaca flannel lining. 
See our Blog: A Personal Story About The Ultimate Field Coat
www.woopwear.com/blog


Alpaca T

$65.00 Regular retail
$45.00 Indiegogo
$40.00 Early bird (First 25)


Lightweigt 170 gsm jersey knit

70% alpaca/30% tencel

Moisture wicking

Odor restistant

Men's and women's 

Ships in September

Long Sleeve Alpaca Shirt

$79.00 Regular retail

$65.00 Indiegogo

$60.00 Early bird (First 25)

Lightweigt 170 gsm jersey knit

70% alpaca/30% tencel

Moisture wicking

Odor restistant

Men's and women's 

Ships in September


Alpaca Hat

$28.00 Regular retail
$17.00 Indiegogo

Made with our trade partners in Bolivia of 100% of alpaca. Mid weight knit hat in

grey or blue. 

Ships in September


Size Charts




Why Indiegogo?

     We are an independent online business and we sell our products direct to the consumer. Which means savings for our customers,  but it makes it harder to make the minimum requirements for manufacturing. In order to make our manufacturing minimums we need a little help with the alpaca fabric. 
     Alpaca is considered a luxury and rare fiber typically found more in high end fashion. However, it's natural attributes of lightweight warmth, moisture wicking, and strength make it a great choice for outdoor lifestyle apparel. We want more people to be able to experience the warmth and comfort alpaca can offer, and by being and Idiegogo supporter you can get even more savings and be one of the first to receive the coat. 


Fulfillment Schedule

We are asking for $9,000 to place our first alpaca flannel order. Our manufacturer in Peru takes four months to make the alpaca fabric so to get us going we will be placing two fabric orders. The first thirty people to order the coats will get them in September, just in time for fall. The later coat orders will come two months later, in November.

All other perks will be shipped in September. 


Things to consider

Manufacturing:  We have established relationships with our manufactures and while most of the time things go smoothly, there is always the possibility for unforeseen delays. Please know that we will do all that we can to get you your perk on time.

Customs and duty: Additional customs delays may be encountered for orders outside the U.S. Any additional duty charges are the receivers responsibility. 

We will keep you updated on the progress off your perk. 

Thanks for your support!

www.woowpear.com

story:
We are so honored to finally present you with a beauty company that is in line with the way you live your life: Organically!  The Organic Face is a proudly made, owned and operated in the USA.  We are a beauty company dedicated to creating natural organic cosmetics and skincare products using active botanical ingredients and minerals. Our mission is to create beauty products that are as safe for you on the inside as they are for your the outside.

  • Do you ever think about how you take care of what goes in your body but not what goes ON your body?
  • Do you want to protect your skin from sun, aging and the elements using nothing but all natural solutions?
  • Are you interested in finding the best results for your face but don’t have the time?

If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you might want to keep reading…


Our popular culture reinforces the idea that organic is better and helps with everything from health and stamina to anti-aging and longevity!   At The Organic Face we are out to create a beauty line that is in sync with these facts.  Going green is not just limited to food; it especially applies to the beauty products we use. Help us establish a program to serve people in need of healthy beauty options. For as little as $25  you can obtain an “Organic Face” product and see how easy it is  a to achieve a fresh face and stunning skin naturally.  Refining your beauty care regimen with chemical-free makeup will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to The Organic Face today!


The global market for organic cosmetics and personal care products is expected to see industry leading growth over the next five years, with North America carving out the largest slice of the pie.

The market for these products worldwide was estimated at $7.6bn in 2012, and is expected to rise to $13.2bn by 2018, giving a CAGR of 9.6 percent over the six-year period, according to Transparency Market Research.

According the market research, one of the biggest drivers of this growth across all consumers groups is the desire for products deemed to be more natural, reflecting aspirations for better personal health and hygiene. – This fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision “The Organic Face” and all the possible benefits we could bring to people

The Organic Face began with a desire to create safe and toxic free cosmetics for women of all skin types. We offer a natural alternative to conventional cosmetics, without compromising on performance or durability. Naturally preservative and irritant free, our pure mineral cosmetics are weightless, long wearing, water resistant and offers protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays.

Free from toxins and cheap fillers, such as talc, synthetic dyes, parabens, and irritants like bismuth oxychloride, The Organic Face Mineral Powders provides complete coverage without clogging pores, making it suitable for skin conditions such as acne prone skin, rosacea, and eczema.

Our natural mineral cosmetic formulations work in harmony with the skin to cover imperfections and help improve skin tone for a natural long lasting glow. 

It is these benefits and much more, that assure us that our product line has what it taken to be an industry leader. This paired with attention to detail, and quality service will help us achieve success. Our mission is to take care of every customer and staff member with the utmost respect and care. We feel this will be the key to our customer and staff retention.


Our company is passionate about creating an unmatched beauty line that’s functional and safe. Unfortunately, we have noticed when companies switch to green concepts, the new products lack the functionality, but we are dedicated to bringing our customers quality organic products. We are also committed to making these products easy to use and incredibly affordable.  Help us make our dream a reality and let’s get beautiful for less!



Noreen Diani is the creator and founder of The Organic Face. With more than 18 years experience working in the beauty industry, Noreen recognized the need for  organic and chemical free cosmetic line that did not compromise on performance or durability. Working with a number of different skin types, Noreen came across many with allergies and reactions to the chemicals in makeup products today. In addition, Noreen suffered from allergies herself, so she decided to create a makeup line that is safe and chemical free. And that is how The Organic Face was born!


For us to bring the “The Organic Face” to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started and help make our concept a reality. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing, and production needs. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “The Organic Face”cosmetics.  We will also use the funding to test and improve our products.  We are committed to continuous improvement, so we can provide our customers with the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to expand “The Organic Face” makeup line and create additional products and services that will compliment the products we currently offer.

 “The Organic Face” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!


We need about $100,000 to get “The Organic Face” completely into the marketplace. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up.

This project is one that envisions providing make-up that actually complements and is 100% Chemical Free Cosmetics and sharing knowledge to those that are without the valuable information for their skin through workshops and video

-The funds would be allocated to mass production of the cosmetics, securing a steady distribution in North America , possibly Western Europe and also make them available online worldwide.

-These products are 100% chemical free. 30% of funding goes toward continuous Research & Development of New Colors and Chemical Free Cosmetics!!!!!!!!

If we do not raise all of the money, whatever is raised will go towards priorities: 

1. Mass Production of Current Products

2. Research & Development of Chemical-Free Cosmetics. 

3. Expanding Current Online Outlets Marketing Campaign (Such as Amazon, Checkout our products on Amazon ) 



We are so grateful to everyone who has taken the time learn about our campaign and for those who have helped us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign, and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  Thank you for being a part of our “The Organic Face” family.


If you cannot donate, but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!


Website: www.TheOrganicFace.net

Our Social Media Connections:

  • Instagram:@TheOrganicFace

  • Twitter: @TheOrganicFace

  • Facebook: TheOrganicFace

  • YouTube: TheOrganicFaceNet

  • Google+: +TheOrganicFaceNet


If you would like to share your ideas, discuss a collaboration or a sponsorship, we would love to hear from you! Please feel free to contact us at crowdfunding@whatsinyourmakeup.com

We offer a natural alternative to conventional cosmetics, without compromising on performance or durability. Naturally preservative and irritant free, our pure mineral cosmetics are weightless, long wearing, water resistant and offers protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays.Free from toxins and cheap fillers, such as talc, synthetic dyes, parabens, and irritants like bismuth oxychloride, The Organic Face Mineral Powders provides complete coverage without clogging pores, making it suitable for skin conditions such as acne prone skin, rosacea, and eczema.Our natural mineral cosmetic formulations work in harmony with the skin to cover imperfections and help improve skin tone for a natural long lasting glow. It is these benefits and much more, that assure us that our product line has what it taken to be an industry leader. This paired with attention to detail, and quality service will help us achieve success. Our mission is to take care of every customer and staff member with the utmost respect and care. We feel this will be the key to our customer and staff retention.Our company is passionate about creating an unmatched beauty line that’s functional and safe. Unfortunately, we have noticed when companies switch to green concepts, the new products lack the functionality, but we are dedicated to bringing our customers quality organic products. We are also committed to making these products easy to use and incredibly affordable.  Help us make our dream a reality and let’s get beautiful for less!Noreen Diani is the creator and founder of The Organic Face. With more than 18 years experience working in the beauty industry, Noreen recognized the need for  organic and chemical free cosmetic line that did not compromise on performance or durability. Working with a number of different skin types, Noreen came across many with allergies and reactions to the chemicals in makeup products today. In addition, Noreen suffered from allergies herself, so she decided to create a makeup line that is safe and chemical free. And that is how The Organic Face was born!For us to bring the “The Organic Face” to life, we need your support!Your generous funding will help us get things started and help make our concept a reality. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing, and production needs. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “The Organic Face”cosmetics.  We will also use the funding to test and improve our products.  We are committed to continuous improvement, so we can provide our customers with the best possible solutions.We will also be using the funding to expand “The Organic Face” makeup line and create additional products and services that will compliment the products we currently offer. “The Organic Face” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!We need about $100,000 to get “The Organic Face” completely into the marketplace. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up. This project is one that envisions providing make-up that actually complements and is 100% Chemical Free Cosmetics and sharing knowledge to those that are without the valuable information for their skin through workshops and video-The funds would be allocated to mass production of the cosmetics, securing a steady distribution in North America , possibly Western Europe and also make them available online worldwide.-These products are 100% chemical free. 30% of funding goes toward continuous Research & Development of New Colors and Chemical Free Cosmetics!!!!!!!!If we do not raise all of the money, whatever is raised will go towards priorities: 1. Mass Production of Current Products2. Research & Development of Chemical-Free Cosmetics. 3. Expanding Current Online Outlets Marketing Campaign (Such as Amazon, Checkout our products on Amazon ) We are so grateful to everyone who has taken the time learn about our campaign and for those who have helped us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign, and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  Thank you for being a part of our “The Organic Face” family.If you cannot donate, but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!Website: www.TheOrganicFace.netOur Social Media Connections:
Instagram:@TheOrganicFace
Twitter: @TheOrganicFace
Facebook: TheOrganicFace
YouTube: TheOrganicFaceNet
Google+: +TheOrganicFaceNet
If you would like to share your ideas, discuss a collaboration or a sponsorship, we would love to hear from you! Please feel free to contact us at crowdfunding@whatsinyourmakeup.com

story:
Short Summary

Let me inspire you with how Dragonfly was born. I love designing clothes for women, I spent 14 years successfully creating collections for companies in New York City. It came to a point where I felt a change was coming. My father was quite ill in Bali and my mother needed help. I had just met someone from Australia, and I have also been looking to have time for volunteer work, so everything seemed to be pointing in that direction. One crazy, fine, sunny day in the concrete jungle of Manhattan I took a break from work to call my mother. I had made  up my mind to take a leap of faith, and be with them and eventually work on my own collection to be inspired through the Asian culture which I love, to find my passion. I asked her not to speak until I was finished, I was afraid I would lose the courage. As I was coming to the end of my adrenaline fueled monologue I uttered, "all I need now is a name for my brand", at that very instant, through the thickness of traffic and the throng of people whizzing by me, through the maze of grey skyscrapers, a big Dragonfly found me and hovered next to me for about as long as I looked at it in awe, and spoke into the phone... "I have found the name".

I checked its symbolism not short after. It became my mantra..

Transformation, adaptability, creativity, delving deeper into the emotional realm, of wisdom and lightness... finding personal authenticity. Elegant and graceful, a Dragonfly accomplishes its objectives with the utmost simplicity and strength. It is an inspiration to behold. This is the concept; of being beautiful, luxurious, easy to wear clothing as well as embodying a unique and environmentally sensitive lifestyle. We encourage building long-term sustainable growth opportunities and of the preservation of local art forms. A better fashion future while encouraging giving back to the community. “Dress to express, Live to express”.

I've started up this campaign in the hopes to help achieve the completion of my first full collection. For me this is no ordinary project as it represents my journey from the time I shifted direction in my life.

Living in countries as diverse as Indonesia, India, Kenya, Argentina, Switzerland and Sri Lanka, Dragonfly finds inspiration through a wide variety of cultures, religions and traditions gaining insight into their communities. Creatively inspired, thoughtful pieces from journeys across the globe, distilled in Indonesia, embodying local traditions while continually searching for ways to reduce our impact on this earth and its resources. We are committed to being a responsible, honest, community oriented and empowering Brand. The Dragonfly Collection makes use of organic cotton and bamboo textile, combining innovative inspiration from across the world with a loving touch of local craftsmanship for the non-conforming individual.

The wonderful contributions made by you will give the brand some breathing space to move forward with production and the fashion show, It would mean the world to us if we complete our goal!!

And I could not have done any of this without the love and encouragement of my biggest fan, my mother Ana Maria Rohrer, who, sadly, passed away June 11th 2015. More reason to finish what we both started with so much love. R.I.P. <3

What We Need & What You Get

$5000 will help us in the following:

-Travel Expenses ($1600)

-Fashion Show fees ($1500)

-Samples and giveaways ($500)

-Part of the hand painted Batik fabric cost ($400)

-Graphic designer and Promotional items fees ($400)

-Photoshoot/Campaing ($300)

-Producing more charitable items such as the Dragonfly pendants for non-profit Organization MTC ($200)

-Shipping the perks ($100)

______________________________________________________________________

PERKS:

Please see on sidebar for all our amazing perks towards your contributions!!

    The Impact

    Fashion with a purpose... we all (I hope) try to contribute any which way we can to the improvement of our communities and environment. At Dragonfly we strive for this personal connectivity to helping making a positive impact. Whilst creating good quality, feminine items we are conscious of making them as user friendly as possible.

    One of the projects we are involved in is to bring awareness and contribute towards MTC non-profit organization. A safe haven and therapy centre for children with Cerebral Palsy in Bali.

    Dragonfly is expanding into bringing other like-minded communities together.

    A huge thanks to Erik Lehman Recycled Recitals - Contemporary artist, musician and designer for composing original song for the runway show: https://recycledrecitals.bandcamp.com

    Risks & Challenges

    We try to be as transparent as possible. Being all sustainable is an arduous task but every step counts. Be part of our better future with fashion!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some of you beautiful hearted people who would love to contribute, but cannot financially, do not despair! :) simply share our campaign on all your social media platforms and we will be eternally grateful. Please use the Indiegogo share tab.

story:
Introduction

The idea is very simple – to develop intelligence. The way to do it, is difficult, but possible. And we have already done the small part of it!

The solution is universal software. We have named it Artificial Intelligence AIA. AIA will be able to adapt to any type of environment (body) he will be put in. After some training he will start to provide response action and there will be no need to develop special applications for the robots. AIA will change the world.


Revolutionary new view to artificial intelligence

At this moment the world’s technology of the creation of artificial intelligence has two main directions:

·  Modeling the neural connections of the brain

·  Creating large storage of the information about everything

We think that nօne of these give the solution. We have chosen another way. We are modeling the human brain behavior – from biological functionality till abstract intelligence. We have imaginationhow the brain adapts to the environment, how processes the data, how creates abstraction, etc… And we are modeling and developing this behavior. It’s an extremely new direction and we are following it. We believe that the result will approve the electivity of our strategy.


What we have now

Now we have simple intelligence with simple association behavior. It’s included in AIA v1.0. And we have ArmMen v1.1 client application which works with AIA v1.0. ArmMen provides the human voice as a single channel input data to AIA and provides the result to the user.

Find it at: https://www.treeveloper.com


What we will have in the next step

·  We will have the new version of AIA with multichannel input/output and simple association intelligence. It will be able to determine the kind of input signals, remember and react.

·  We will have the new version of ArmMen which will provide the data from web camera and microphone to AIA v2.0 and will represent the output to the user. AIA will be able to determine the objects (view, name, behavior, etc…), intelligently associate its properties with each other, and react to the requests based on simple association intelligence.


What we will have in the future

·  We will have extremely generic AIA for any kind of environment (body) and with large specter of intelligence.

·  We will have the robot ArmMen with AIA inside. ArmMen will be a good friend and assistant to many-many people. He will be able to save lives, to help, to teach, and to make a lot of things easier. We will give new opportunities to improve its abilities and to learn more.

·  We will have a lot of simulators for AIA. Each simulator will be the model of concrete environment (car, coffee machine, robot, etc.). It will provide ability to AIA to learn much faster than it would be possible in real life.

·  We will have implemented Artificial Evolution for our robots and for AIA (Natural Selection, Heredity, Gene flow). All the information collected during the life can be matched with information of others and the chosen subsets of knowledge will be imported into child AIA. Each new generation of AIA will be more adoptive and smarter.


About the project

The design and development was started in 2013. Past years were full of testing, discussions and development. The number and difficulty of the algorithms that need to be implemented is impressive.

To develop our ideas we need more resources – a team of smart and creative developers. Now we are growing a team. We have a goal and we are moving forward.

We know that our project will change the frozen stereotype about artificial intelligence. And your founding will help us to reach this goal faster.

Find us in Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/treeveloper

story:
Hi! My name is Sophie Chang. I am the founder of SOCOL shirts. This shirt is not your average shirt. As a fashion designer for women's clothing, I for long have wanted to start a line for men. I didn't know what particular piece of clothing I wanted to focus on until I noticed most of the shirts were not as comfortable as others. In fact most of the shirts were either too casual or too dressy when it came to style. After several months of research and testing here I am, the  SOCOL brand came alive. A design that is not only great in versatility, comfortability and stylish but also Eco-friendly and made in Los Angeles. After finding out that 40% of the LGBT youths are homeless, I thought what would be a greater way to give back to a community who not only faces civil discrimination but, sexism and a breach of civil rights. Immediately, that's when I decided to dedicate this line of men's shirts to this community.

                                                                 

1.) Versatile- In style, Comfortable, Dress up dress down, Multi-color option. Versatility is important when it comes to the SOCOL brand. We wanted to create one shirt for all, along with comfortability and stylish color options to choose from. So, we designed our one slim fit look for all. Wearing the shirt brings out your inner personality.

2)Eco-Friendly- Anti-bacteria, Non-shrinkage, Bamboo fabric, breathable. With our shirts being made from Eco-friendly bamboo materials, SOCOL believes in bringing more green house products to the universe.

3)Made in Los Angeles- Handmade and Tailored. Our revolutionary SOCOL shirts are made in the Fashion Capital city of Los Angeles, creating local jobs to build a stronger economy.                                                                                          
4) For a greater cause- 5% of every sale made will be donated to the LGBT Community.          

                                            

 

                   

                

              

                 

           

  
                                                       "SOCOL IN MOTION "
 
 
 

        

                                               

                                                        "CLASSIC  BALLET " 

                   

             

                                                                                                        

      

                                                                                                                    

              

        

                When you order color selection and size will not be required until the end of the campaign. You will be notified by Via Survey or email. Buy now choose later. 

      

                   

                        Here is what some people thought about SOCOL shirts.                

 "I like the SOCOL shirt because it feels so comfortable and not too tight nor too loose. -Ethan      

 "When I put it on it feels AMAZING!!!!!"- David

 "  I love the shirt so much because it fits both my causal wardrobe and my dressy wardrobe- Kenny

 "Its easy to stretch in and my body feels like I have nothing on at times."- Vince 

"The colors are great they are neutral and bold, they go with many of my outfits."-Alexander

"I love the slim fit look, and my wife said I look great."-  Christian 

     

                                                    

                                                   Meet the Creative Director Sophie Chang

                   

It really took a whole village of people to make this project come alive!!! I want to thank my team who have participated: 

Keishawn Blackstone, Katrina Guevera, Chelsea Stager, Nichole Beeks, Sophia Collins, Jonathan Harris, Kevin Silva, Brandon Forrest, Shawn Hines, Steven Hong, Xavier Bush, Ovi Bostioca, John Michaels, Vera Ninkovic, Scilla Siekmann, Braden Overett

Especially a big Thank You to the Runway Ballet!

SOCOL would like to thank each and everyone of you for your support in making the SOCOL brand an exclusive take off. Without your help, SOCOL wouldn't be SO COOL!!!


Risk and Challenges: 

There are always some challenge's in the Fashion Industry, especially when it comes to creating high end designs. We are facing some challenges to make the shirts because of the expensive equipment, materials and labor. Our bamboo stretch fabric is expensive and hard  to produce, it requires high skills and labor to produce best quality, but with our experience and knowledge, we have what it takes to overcome these challenges.

Without your help, SOCOL wouldn't be SO COOL!!!Risk and Challenges: There are always some challenge's in the Fashion Industry, especially when it comes to creating high end designs. We are facing some challenges to make the shirts because of the expensive equipment, materials and labor. Our bamboo stretch fabric is expensive and hard  to produce, it requires high skills and labor to produce best quality, but with our experience and knowledge, we have what it takes to overcome these challenges.

story: This campaign has ended.
story_txt: This campaign has ended.

story:
THE SMARTEST POWER WALLET

Thorne Wallet is a new generation of smart wearables. Charge phones and several small electronic devices, TWO-WAY anti-loss tracker, wireless file transfer and storage and a hybrid charging and data cable for all your daily power needs.

Every Thorne Wallet comes with a standard wireless charging functionality, 32GB of storage and a hybrid cable for charging both iOS and Android devices.

 

 

THE MEDIA ABOUT THORNE WALLET

 



  • Stream files for up to 12 hours on a single charge on any device.
  • 32GB to 128GB of internal wallet storage for all your documents, files, media.
  • Backup your cellphone files with a simple click of a button on our Thorne Wallet app

  • The 5000 mAh integrated battery will power you through the whole day
     
  • Thorne Wallet uses a Smart Charging Algorithm for optimized fast charge times. It can charge your phone fully twice 

 

  • Thorne Wallet features the best and thinnest tracker on the market
  • Bi-directional anti-loss function for both your wallet and your phone

  • Every Thorne Wallet comes with a  hybrid charging and data cable that is capable of charging  both iOS and Android devices

  • We  know i'ts hard to spot when someone is stealing  your personal information without even laying a hand on your pocket!  Don't worry, every Thorne Wallet comes with RFID protection layers

  • Every Thorne Wallet comes with built-in wireless charging capabilities and it works well with all Qi wireless chargers in the world. If you do not have a Qi charger on hand, you can also plug your wallet in for more electrical power.Our charger also supports wireless phone charging, such as Samsung Galaxy S7, Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus, etc. 

  • Using the highest quality Leather and with its durability and sophisticated smell of technology  and leather will save you some bucks and  worries for the lifespan of the wallet

 

 

 

 

 


 

Officially in 2014, Zlatko Georgiev started  Thorne Technologies, Inc. The company was involved in working  on design engineering for other product development companies and startups.

We have been involved in creating some products from the ground up for companies who are now established as a brand on the market.

Thorne Technologies is focused on building innovative products who will make our life easier. 1 year ago the first Thorne  Wallet prototype was created, tested and developed in an early stage. 
Now we have a fully functional prototype and tested it at all stages of  development ensuring the highest quality, safety and satisfaction for all of our customers.

 

 

 



Every Thorne Wallet is enclosed in a stiff hybrid metal/plastic case for enhanced durability and safety. Bending it, walking over it or dropping it will still keep the internal circuitry and battery intact for maximum safety, thus eliminating the worries of the wallet failing.

Alex wasn't saving any strength when he was trying to show off to the team that he could break one of our wallets. Didn't work out well for him. Wallet 1:0 Alex


Drop tests were more painful for us than it was for the wallet.

Trying to get a perfect shot.

​

 

THORNE is wireless charged with our Qi charger and with our hybrid iOS/Android Cable. You can also access the files inside the Wallet by just connecting the wallet into the computer ( it will show as a USB drive on the computer ). How you charge it is your decision.



 

The wireless network of the wallet allows you to connect to its files within or backup your phone data to it if the need arises. Stream, share or download video, pictures and music directly from the wallet to your cellphone or computer without the need of internet connection.
 

 

 

 

  1. Thorne Slim Or Fold
  2. Tracker + Tracker Charger
  3. Hybrid Data and Charging Cable
  4. Wireless Charger

 

 


General:

1. What payment channel do you accept?

  • We accept Paypal and credit card payments. 

2. What to do if none of these above payment systems works?

  • Please contact us by sending an email to hello@thornewallet.com and we will guide you through.

3. Which option is best for me?

  • Depending on your needs. If you are a minimalist with few cards to carry and more cash then we suggest Thorne SLIM. If you carry more cards than cash then we recommend you the Thorne FOLD. (both versions have same technical specs)

4. Can you offer more colors?

  • Dark Navy and Classic Brown so far.  New Red color will be released up reaching the $100,000 stretch goal.

Technical:

1. What’s unique about this technology?

  • The power bank itself can be wirelessly charged and holds Wi-Fi Flash Drive inside with an NFC chip to be programmed once we reach the $300,000 stretch goal. We have patent pending for the innovative technology that we built from the ground up and are responsible for advancing the evolution of wallets.

2. What’s the battery life?

  • Up to 1400 charge cycles. 

3. How much do the wallets weigh ?

  • ​Thorne SLIM - 109g
  • Thorne FOLD - 117

4. How long does it take to fully charge the wallet and the tracker?

  • It takes around 2-3 hours to fully charge the wallet, depending on the source of power you use.

5. Is the wallet easily crushed? Can I sit on it?

  • Please do not worry too much. You can sit on the case designed to withstand the weight of a human being without breaking a sweat. 

Safety:

1. Is the wallet water proof?

  • Treat Thorne Wallet like every other wallet. Please do not drown it or drop it in the toilet. Don't trust what other smart wallets promise you with their water proof marketing, it's bad rep.

2. Is Thorne Wallet safe with the integrated battery?

  • Imagine this wallet as a power bank in daily life. It is as safe as every other battery bank on the market if you use it for its intended use. The internal battery protection circuit ensures maximum safety and quality that we assure has passed safety standards.

Shipping:

1. When does shipping begin?

  • Shipping for ALL outstanding items is on track to start in September 2017.

2. Where does it ship to?

  • Everywhere except the outer space.

Customer Service:

1. What’s the warranty?

  • Thorne Wallets have 12 months warranty. If any product shipped has a defect within 12 months from the date you receive it, Thorne will pay for repair or replacement of the wallet. User error does not account in this case.

2. Who to contact for other questions?

hello@thornewallet.com 

Or give us a call at+1 302-313-6618

 

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.

story:
Every woman is part of this world.  We are all different! Could you imagine our society surrounded by identical women? Diversity is a treasure for the soul. It is the greatest source of inspiration. We are all different from a physical, character and cultural point of view. Every one of us wishes to feel good and confident, to be accepted by others. To be beautiful and desirable. We are women. This is what we want to be and show.

I have named this project Voluptuous Swimsuits


Why Voluptuous Swimsuits?

Because in fashion, women are not fairly represented. Voluptuous Swimsuits’ goal is to fill this gap. Voluptuous Swimsuits wants to break the rules of the fashion industry which does not allow women to be different but ‘in the size’ or ‘in the image of’. Voluptuous Swimsuits wants to break these rules and allow every curvy plus size woman to be valued as she is and have beautiful fashionable garments! Voluptuous Swimsuits is a rebel entity! You will like it or not! The curvy plus size revolution is here and now!

Voluptuous Swimsuits dedicates its swimsuits exclusively to curvy plus size girls and women of all ages offering them swimsuits of the best quality and shape. From US size 12 to 28 and up.

Voluptuous Swimsuits celebrates and fosters diversity and self-acceptance and it is against abuse and exploitation, too.

Voluptuous Swimsuits are 100% manufactured in Italy, a country known worldwide for fashion and the high quality and high standards of its products.

The first Summer Collection has been presented in June 2015 at the Yacht Club of Monaco, in the Principality of Monaco.

The swimsuits are sold online through the website

www.voluptuous-swimsuits.com

Because of the brand is a newborn, the internet prices are very competitive - from USD 55 to USD 87 - for a garment 100% made in Italy. Plus size swimsuits offered by competitors are generally expensive. The prices can go up to USD 200 for swimsuits made in China or in low cost countries!

Why the plus size market?

Because: 

• Curvy plus size women struggle to find high quality, attractive designer swimsuits that will fit the shape and accentuate their voluptuous bodies.

• Plus size customers are not taken into consideration and not valued by the fashion industry.

• The fashion industry tends to make plus size consumers feel guilty because of their size.

• Plus size consumers are not offered with choices.



Why are customers purchasing Voluptuous Swimsuits?

• Because our swimsuits are handmade by the best fashion tailors in the world: They are 100% made in Italy; this guarantees a high quality garment in term of finishing touch.

• Because Voluptuous Swimsuits are made with the best 'made in Italy' fabrics: 

- Microfiber is one of the best and latest fabric technology used on swimwear because it wicks moisture away from the body, dries fast after washing, has an exceptionally soft, silk like hand and hold its shape well. The microfiber is 100% made in Italy.

- Lycra of the best quality: Lycra is a synthetic elastane fiber that can stretch up to six times its length and return to its original state – time and again. Lycra fibers have redefined comfort, fit, freedom of movement and shape retention.

• Because our swimsuits fit the shape and emphasize our customers voluptuous bodies.

• Because our swimsuits are glamourous and fashionable.



Moreover, Voluptuous Swimsuits have the following features:

• Fully lined in the same color and fabric for worry free coverage.

• Adjustable/convertible removable straps so you can change the look and customize the fit.

• Side boning, no padding or under wire for comfortable support.

• Comfortable under wire cup molded bra which gives shapely support without show-through.

• Glamorous v neckline which accentuates your bust.

• The detailing on the leg opening is reinforced zig zag stitching for strength.

• Flatters the fuller figure.

• Offer reversible options.

What are we going to do next?

• To open a retailer shop in Miami (FL) to sell Voluptuous Swimsuits to our lovely clients. It will be the first shop fully and only dedicated to Curvy Plus Size Women!

• To select major department stores all around Europe interested in selling Voluptuous Swimsuits.

• To enlarge the e-commerce market including the seller platforms e-bay, Amazon, Asos, Etsy, etc.

• To participate to swimsuits fashion shows in the USA and Europe.


Where will the funds go?

The raised funds will go to:

·  Design and manufacture the 2016/17 collections, 100% made in Italy.

·  Open the first shop in Miami (FL).

·  Operate the shop and hire a shop manager and an assistant manager.

·  Improve the e-commerce website.

·  Shoot the collection in Florida.

·  Participate to fashion shows woldwide.

So far my personal investment reached USD 100.000 to design and manufacture the first Summer collection, to realize the e-commerce website and for the marketing of the collection. Sales have been successful over my own e-commerce website www.voluptuous-swimsuits.com which is operating in the USA, Canada and Europe.

Voluptuous Swimsuits' goal is to open 10 shops in the USA in the next 5 years, the first one in Miami in 2016 (end of third quarter).

story:
What We Are About

Simply Chickie is a 100% organic, really funny, USA made clothing line for babies, toddlers, and women designed to spread the mission of CLEAN WEAR across our globe. Each piece was specifically designed to share a message of hope in the face of Cancer.

My name is Gwendolyn Gardner, and I am the founder and designer of Simply Chickie Clothing. Over 10 years ago, I was diagnosed with Breast Cancer. 

That same week, I broke up with my boyfriend and found out I was pregnant with my little girl. As you can imagine, the juxtaposition of life and death was confusing, yet transforming.

I started thinking about what I put in my body and eventually what I put on it. I paid attention to smells and food and everything coming in contact with my mouth and my skin.  I was eventually operated on and the cancer was excised. 

However, I couldn't stop there. I started taking really good care of myself—exercised—ate organically grown fruits and vegetables —and practiced yoga. I needed to live because I was going to be a single mom, and I didn't just want to be here now, but for years to come.

I paid attention to labels and discovered that the lovely soft cotton clothing I enjoyed hid a dirty secret: the conventional cotton crop is one of the most polluting crops grown.

Pesticides and Chemicals Placed on Our Cotton Crops 

As I started making life-altering changes, I also thought about my daughter every step of the way---and other children just like her. I knew for sure I was going to do everything in my power to ensure my little girl was as safe as I could make her--hence the idea of Simply Chickie was born. 


Elizabeth at Age 3 and Myself

I created an organic cotton clothing line--that not only did I know would be safe for my child and all other people who wore it, but I added funny, cute sayings to each piece in an effort to spread the message more organically in more ways than one.

The truth is...I wanted to make sure I gave people a moment to laugh because I remember a time when I couldn’t. And now, thank goodness, laughter is part of my every day.

"Inside Me" Signature Baby Body Suit

The Mission

Seven out of the 15 most carcinogenic chemicals known to man are used on conventional cotton, and the amount makes up 25 percent of the worldwide total use for chemicals. 
When I learned all this information--I knew I had to create a new line of clothing to disrupt what was happening in our society.
The public does not know the impact conventional cotton could be having on their health in the long run. 
Simply Chickie Clothing's mission is to help more people realize the importance of CLEAN WEAR for their overall health and wellness by creating clothing that truly benefits our bodies while also revolutionizing the industry. 


What We Need & What You Get


We are striving to make organic cotton clothing more available and affordable to the masses. Unfortunately, organic cotton is currently very expensive and this campaign will help broaden awareness, hopefully resulting in lowering the price, so we may provide wonderful clothing to more people.

We need $15,000 to grow Simply Chickie's exposure and add a companion adult t-shirt line.

Adult Line of T-Shirts

Just Hatched and May Contain Peanut Baby Body Suit

Local Chick Baby Body Suit

You can pre-purchase some of the designs here and custom gift sets on Indiegogo or buy the children's clothing at www.simplychickieclothing.com. 

Please see our perks section for these awesome deals.


  Our Partners

We believe in holistic health and prevention, so Simply Chickie is honored to partner with two other eco-friendly companies, who have lent their amazing cleaning and skin care products through the perks you will receive when donating.

This cooperative project allows for all the aspects I researched that potentially cause cancer to be packaged into one CLEAN gift!

“Violets are Blue”—a skin care line, out of New York, free of parabens, sulfates, alcohol, or synthetic fragrance and “The Optimist Co”—a chemical free cleaning product line from Cape Cod.

Part of Some of the Perk Packages


Optimistic Co Laundry Detergent

Violets are Blue Lip Balm


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help this campaign succeed:

  • Share it verbally and by email with your friends, family, and co-workers
  • Share and like us on the following social media platforms:
https://www.facebook.com/simplychickie/
https://twitter.com/simplychickie
https://www.instagram.com/simplychickie/

A Big Thank You

We’d like to thank Kathleen Vanderveer and the Newport Historical Society for allowing us to film in the store, Janet Booth from Lila Delman Real Estate for providing the venue for the mama and baby video shoot, Karen Sanderson from The Beauty Counter for providing the make-up, Films by Andy for his awesome video, Kathy Staub , owner of the Jane Picken’s Theater in Newport, Rhode Island for showing the 30 second Simply Chickie video before every single movie this month at the theater, Seema Alexander my business strategist for the Indiegogo campaign and all aspects of Simply Chickie, and all the mamas, babies, and kids who came out to be part of the video and pictures.

I am so thankful to them for being part of this CLEAN movement!

I needed to live because I was going to be a single mom, and I didn't just want to be here now, but for years to come.I paid attention to labels and discovered that the lovely soft cotton clothing I enjoyed hid a dirty secret: the conventional cotton crop is one of the most polluting crops grown.Pesticides and Chemicals Placed on Our Cotton Crops As I started making life-altering changes, I also thought about my daughter every step of the way---and other children just like her. I knew for sure I was going to do everything in my power to ensure my little girl was as safe as I could make her--hence the idea of Simply Chickie was born. Elizabeth at Age 3 and Myself
I created an organic cotton clothing line--that not only did I know would be safe for my child and all other people who wore it, but I added funny, cute sayings to each piece in an effort to spread the message more organically in more ways than one.
The truth is...I wanted to make sure I gave people a moment to laugh because I remember a time when I couldn’t. And now, thank goodness, laughter is part of my every day.

"Inside Me" Signature Baby Body Suit


 The Mission
Seven out of the 15 most carcinogenic chemicals known to man are used on conventional cotton, and the amount makes up 25 percent of the worldwide total use for chemicals. 
When I learned all this information--I knew I had to create a new line of clothing to disrupt what was happening in our society.

The public does not know the impact conventional cotton could be having on their health in the long run. 

Simply Chickie Clothing's mission is to help more people realize the importance of CLEAN WEAR for their overall health and wellness by creating clothing that truly benefits our bodies while also revolutionizing the industry. 






What We Need & What You Get


We are striving to make organic cotton clothing more available and affordable to the masses. Unfortunately, organic cotton is currently very expensive and this campaign will help broaden awareness, hopefully resulting in lowering the price, so we may provide wonderful clothing to more people. 

We need $15,000 to grow Simply Chickie's exposure and add a companion adult t-shirt line. 


Adult Line of T-Shirts


Just Hatched and May Contain Peanut Baby Body Suit


Local Chick Baby Body Suit
You can pre-purchase some of the designs 
here and custom gift sets on Indiegogo or buy the children's clothing at www.simplychickieclothing.com. 
Please see our perks section for these awesome deals.


 
Our Partners


We believe in holistic health and prevention, so Simply Chickie is honored to partner with two other eco-friendly companies, who have lent their amazing cleaning and skin care products through the perks you will receive when donating.
This cooperative project allows for all the aspects I researched that potentially cause cancer to be packaged into one CLEAN gift!
“Violets are Blue”—a skin care line, out of New York, free of parabens, sulfates, alcohol, or synthetic fragrance and “The Optimist Co”—a chemical free cleaning product line from Cape Cod.
Part of Some of the Perk Packages



Optimistic Co Laundry Detergent
Violets are Blue Lip Balm


Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help this campaign succeed:

Share it verbally and by email with your friends, family, and co-workers
Share and like us on the following social media platforms:

https://www.facebook.com/simplychickie/https://twitter.com/simplychickiehttps://www.instagram.com/simplychickie/

A Big Thank You


We’d
like to thank Kathleen Vanderveer
and the Newport Historical Society
for allowing us to film in the store, Janet
Booth from Lila Delman Real Estate
for providing the venue for the mama and baby video shoot, Karen Sanderson from The
Beauty Counter for providing the make-up, Films by Andy for his awesome video, Kathy Staub , owner of the Jane
Picken’s Theater in Newport, Rhode Island for showing the 30 second Simply Chickie video before
every single movie this month at the theater, Seema
Alexander my
business strategist for the Indiegogo campaign and all aspects of Simply
Chickie, and all the mamas, babies, and
kids who came out to be part of the video and pictures. 

I am so thankful to them for being part of this CLEAN movement!

story:
Hi, Thanks for visiting my page to help raise funds to get Deckdolly clubbing clothing fashion brand up and running. I will be using a company that is voted the top fifty eco friendly trace back to seed t-shirt company based here in the U.K. I need to raise three thousand pounds to pay for five hundred organic cotton & organic bamboo cotton t-shirts with the trademarked logo Deckdolly. Another five hundred pounds for 2,500 mail bags that are bio-degradable and the rest is to cover postage and packageing. This label is designed for music artist's, DJ's and clubbers worldwide. The t-shirts are made in a windmill factory in India, people working at this factory get a good decent wage and decent working hours. The t-shirts are then sent to The Isle of Wright herein the U.K. to be screen printed by hand with eco friendly fabric paints. I will be selling the t-shirts at forty pounds each once the label is up and running. I will be posting out a t-shirt to every person who donates/funds twenty pounds each. My Deckdolly label is also making one little black dresses. Each one only one made each. The idea is so that when girls go clubbing they won't need to worry about meeting another girl in the same dress who may be younger or slimmer. Each dress is made by hand in London. I hope to grow my business to employ other fashion designers and pattern cutters here in London and export goods from the U.K. The materials for the dresses will be remnant fabrics that were samples used at fashion shows. New materials that are reused instead of sending to landfill. I hope to raise awareness of sustainable fabrics and the impact on the environment making cheap t-shirts has. Please help me in succeeding my goal of becoming self employed and also getting to the point of employing other people too. Thanks a million for visiting my page.

Kind Regards

Deckdolly

"Fashion in the mix"

story:
Where it all began....

Two years ago, in a little aerobics studio one rainy Sunday morning, a tiny acorn of an idea became a reality.

Having had my Personal Training business for over nine years, training with athletes as young as five, I knew the market was crying out for a dedicated fitness wear brand for little people.

The statistics behind childhood obesity are staggering: obesity costs the UK over £50 billion every year, and over 41 million children under the age of 5 obese.
It was clear that more needed to be done to encourage children to get fit and active from an early age.

There was a definitive need to bring a trusted and safe fitness brand for children that encourages and embraces a healthy lifestyle- and so Munchkins Muscles was born.

It was soon after I started this tough but incredible journey, that I discovered the devastating facts behind the fashion and sports wear industry- more specifically under Greenpeace's Detox My Fashion Campaign. Their findings were quite literally terrifying. The fashion industry is the second biggest polluter in the world, second only to oil, with "fast fashion",  toxic chemicals and mass textile waste literally poisoning eco systems and water ways across the globe.


 

Lets not beat around the bush here- the facts are in black and white for all to see. 

The fashion industry is TOXIC- toxic to the environment, toxic to the people who make the clothing and toxic to those who wear it.

 

Sadly so few people know about the horrors that the fast fashion industry is causing- rivers are awash with deadly harmful chemicals, aqua marine life is dying, skin conditions and illnesses directly caused by these chemicals are rife, landfills are overflowing with discarded clothing made from artificial fibres that is unable to break down, and the world is literally choking under what is the second most polluting industry in the world. 

So what can we do?

 

We need to change our habits to change the industry- and we need to change fast, before it is too late.
 

----------------------------------------------------------------

Munchkins Muscles®: the game-changer for kids fitness

We are the eco-fitness brand for the future.

Over two years of extensive research, development and sourcing saw the creation of something very special indeed. Munchkins Muscles is an award winning, pioneering brand of fitness wear for children age 3-10 years.
Designed in Scotland and inspired by the big outdoors, our brand motivates and empowers children to get fit, chase adventures and have fun! 

 

"Born in the mountains, made in the sun: Powered by fitness, driven by fun”™

Features


Each garment is ethically made to an exceptionally high standard, from GOTS and OEKO-TEX certified organic fabrics. This ensures they are free from harmful pesticides, chemicals and dyes, making them super-soft, hypoallergenic, breathable and comfortable- and so suitable for children with sensitive skin.
Funky functional features include thumbholes, handy gadget pockets, and a more generous cut to allow for freedom of movement and growth. No annoying cords around the hood or waistbands, and no itchy neck labels make for happy little munchkins.
Unisex activewear that is perfect for sports time, adventure time, play time and chill time!


 

Eco Packaging


We only use 100% eco friendly, biodegradable packaging with no plastic or metal attachments.


Charity Projects


We donate a % of our profits to environmental and wildlife projects to help protect our precious planet for future generations to come.

At the end of every tax year we allocate our charitable donations to projects that we feel most need our help. 

We also donate 1 in every 3 garments sold to a child in need.

Munchkins Ambassadors Programme

As part of our core values as a brand we are committed to encouraging and motivating children to get fit and active. Our Munchkins Ambassador Programme engages with kids from across the world who excel in a particular sport or activity, supports their journey, and shares their sporting successes, and so helping to motivate and encourage other kids to get involved and try new sports. 


 

Traction

We launched our wee brand onto the global platform at the prestigious Bubble Show in London earlier this year, where we won the Green Ambassador Award for Best Eco Brand and were featured on the Bubble Kids Catwalk Show over two days. We were tipped as the "one to watch" by My Baba Magazine, and later featured in Vogue Magazine "Cool Kids" section.

Don't just take our word for it....

 

"Munchkins Muscles are trailblazing in their creation of eco and ethically made children's sportswear. The premium activewear brand ensures that everything from certified organic fabrics to fair trade manufacturing to biodegradeable packaging is done in the most efficient and sustainable way possible." My Baba Magazine


"Wow they are so soft! The children absolutely love them!" Bubble London Show


"These are just awesome. We love what you are doing, not just for kids but for a safer planet too. This has never been done before. Such an exciting new brand!" Buyer


"The beautiful range is ethically made from luxury organic fabrics, resulting in soft comfortable and functional apparel, allowing for easy layering and active styling, whilst being respectful of the planet." Vogue Magazine

 

Crowdfunding Campaign- where will your money go?

The funds raised from our first ever Crowd Funding campaign will play an enormous part in supporting the growth of our brand. 

As we are a 100% eco and ethical committed brand, costs are far higher than for non-eco brands- minimums are high for such things as purchasing organic yarns and fabrics, biodegradeable bags, and coconut fibre string ties. Therefore any funds we raise will be an enormous help in developing our products further and getting our voice heard.

We hope you will join us on our journey and help us to clean up the fashion industry once and for all!

 

A kid's eco fitness brand for the future?

This is our time.

#joinoursquad

"Born in the mountains, made in the sun: Powered by fitness, driven by fun”™

-------------------------

Key principles

Inspired by Greenpeace’s “Detox My Fashion” Campaign, a global initiative to incite much needed change in the deadly polluting fashion manufacturing industry, Munchkins Muscles® is committed to cleaning up the face of fashion with our core key founding principles of:

  • using only GOTS®certified organic fabrics
  • no harmful chemicals or dyes
  • plastic and metal-free zone
  • biodegradeable packaging
  • ethical and fair labour manufacturing
  • transparent supply chain- 100% traceable to source
  • eco manufacturing including recycling of water
  • donate a % of our profits to charity initiatives in education, environmental and wildlife projects

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help...

If you can't contribute financially to our wee campaign, that doesn't mean you can't help us!

Here are a few ways you can help us and the planet at the same time:

  • Share our campaign on social media and on your networks
  • Use the Indiegogo share buttons to spread the word!
  • Encourage your family and friends to shop sustainable brands- and tell them about us!
  • Reuse clothing rather than binning it
  • Think twice before buying cheap "fast fashion"- if it is cheap, who or what has paid the price?
  • Cut your plastic use and reuse or recycle bags and packaging
  • Share Greenpeace's Detox My Fashion campaign to help spread the word of fashion's deadly secrets
