story:
• High quality, honest prices We believe that good design and high-quality components speak louder than an extraordinarily expensive flashy logo. We pass the savings on to you, so you get the same quality at a 1/2 or 1/3 of the typical cost. 
     
  • Clean, minimalist design All we wanted is simple and elegant, as our minimalist and simplistic designs are adaptable for every dress and occasion from casual to formal wear.
     
  • Not only personal using but also spreading love Maybe you’d want to gift an Artemis watches to that special someone in your life, as a birthday, valentine’s day, father’s day, anniversary, or groomsmen memento etc. Maybe you’d want to keep a watch for yourself. We want our watch manufacturing process to start with a desire to make you smile. We also have a future project in the works where we will put forward some beautiful women’s watches.
     
  • Changing Lives We are going to offer customizable engraving service on the watch’s back in the future, have a dash of personality and we truly believe the perfect finishing touch is you and special messages for loved ones.

We are two guys with a lifelong love of watches. Over the years, we got frustrated with what the top dollar watch companies were knowing they only cost a fraction of the price to make.

One day we were joking about making our own watch brand, which at the time seemed like an impossible adventure, until one day early in 2018 we decided to go for it and started researching. And that's where it began! We wanted to create affordable, stylish, high quality and personalized watches that were meaningful for everyone.

 

Each component in Artemis watches, inside and out, is selected with careful consideration and make sure they are refined and minimalistic.

We use high quality materials in every part of our watches, from the Japanese movements inside to the stainless steel and PVD plating encasing the watch. And we don't skimp on the leather! Our leather straps are genuine leather.

 


Case Material: Stainless Steel 
Case Diameter: 40mm Case 
Thickness: 6mm 
Band Material: Genuine Leather 
Band Width: 20mm 
Clasp: Pushbutton Deployment Clasp 
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel 
Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal/Mineral Glass 
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Water Resistant: 3 ATM

 

For our first collection,
we are offering Four different models to choose from.

1.Black/Black Leather

2.Black/Brown Leather

3.White/Black Leather

4.White/Brown Leather

 

With your help we can launch quality watches that have our brand’s value of committing to high quality and style with no ridiculous prices. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our watches, but sharing our Campaign with friends. The important thing to remember with IndieGogo is. We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways. We hope through the use of social media we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal. If you could do something as simple as following our Artemis Instagram or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click our Facebook page and Instagram or share our project, link at the top of the page right next to the video. This will help with our goal to grow Artemis Wrist Wear into a market leader, providing style and uniqueness at affordable prices and enable us to build our brand further.

We have gone through many manufacturers to find the current reputable manufacturer we are working with now. The hardest part of starting the company is raising the funds for the initial deposit. With your help, we can use the money raised in this campaign to fund the initial purchase. Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production. Production time takes roughly 40-90 days depending on the quantity of the order. after deposited, our manufacturer will start processing everything in hopes to get our watches on your wrists as soon as possible and getting our customized laser engraving machine and start to customized watches.

story:
Please note - Indiegogo no longer accepts payments via Paypal so if you'd like to contribute using Paypal please get in touch with me direct and I will let you know the shipping costs etc. (My paypal address is stewartdavidbell@gmail.com).

My name is Stewart Bell, I'm the main composer & keys player for progressive rock band Citizen Cain. I'm currently working on a solo project - entitled The Antechamber Of Being - which includes a trilogy of lucid dreaming themed concept albums, 2 storybooks, an EP plus, accompanying art-books. So far I've completed two of the albums, a storybook and an art-book and I am currently working on the EP and the new storybook. As you can imagine, producing this type of material involves a lot of work and funding is always essential in order for the project to continue smoothly. To that end I have designed some t-shirts featuring; the artwork from my project plus; 5 classic album covers from Citizen Cain's back catalogue (artwork by vocalist and bass player Cyrus.) You can view the different designs in the video above or the images below.

The ongoing costs of the overall project at the moment are mainly promotional based plus the initial recording costs required for putting down guide vocals etc for the upcoming EP.  Buying one or more of these unique t-shirts/ sweatshirts will obviously go a long way to helping with those costs.

Printed on high quality Fruit Of The Loom garments the 9 designs will be available on premium heavyweight tees, raglan sweatshirts plus ladies fitted sofspun tees.

The fundraiser is a flexible one meaning that, even if it doesn't reach its goal, the money will still go towards the completion of the project and, of course, the orders will still be honoured and rewards delivered on time. Ideally though, the project will reach it's goal (or exceed it!) and things can continue moving forward with the overall Antechamber Of Being project.
 

I understand that not everyone can afford to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. You can get the word out and make some noise about the campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools. Any help will, of course, be greatly appreciated and I am constantly grateful for the ongoing support of old and new fans alike who make all of this possible. THANK YOU!

Size and ordering information/ designs:

Below is information about the sizes of the t-shirts and sweatshirts plus images of the different designs available. You will be asked which size and design(s) you'd like via e-mail after the fundraiser is complete. Please note, there is no size XXXL in sweatshirts.

Also note that the perks include options to order up to four tees/ sweatshirts in one go but if you'd like to order more than 4 products (i.e, 5 or 6 T-shirts) or multiple different items (for example, 1 Mens Tee, 1 Ladies Tee & 1 Sweatshirt) then please contact me telling me what you'd like to order and I will work out the price, incl. postage, then send you details on how to place the order.

Men's T-shirts:

 

Ladies T-shirts:

 

Unisex Sweatshirts:

 

All Designs -

TAOB Pt 2 Album Cover -

A Word A Name -

Universal Awakening -

She Never Was -

Serpents In Camouflage -

Somewhere But Yesterday -

Raising The Stones -

Playing Dead -

Ghost Dance -

Ladies Fitted Sofspun Tee (all designs available)

Raglan Sweatshirt (all designs available)
story_txt:
Please note - Indiegogo no longer accepts payments via Paypal so if you'd like to contribute using Paypal please get in touch with me direct and I will let you know the shipping costs etc. (My paypal address is stewartdavidbell@gmail.com).
My name is Stewart Bell, I'm the main composer & keys player for progressive rock band Citizen Cain. I'm currently working on a solo project - entitled The Antechamber Of Being - which includes a trilogy of lucid dreaming themed concept albums, 2 storybooks, an EP plus, accompanying art-books. So far I've completed two of the albums, a storybook and an art-book and I am currently working on the EP and the new storybook. As you can imagine, producing this type of material involves a lot of work and funding is always essential in order for the project to continue smoothly. To that end I have designed some t-shirts featuring; the artwork from my project plus; 5 classic album covers from Citizen Cain's back catalogue (artwork by vocalist and bass player Cyrus.) You can view the different designs in the video above or the images below.
The ongoing costs of the overall project at the moment are mainly promotional based plus the initial recording costs required for putting down guide vocals etc for the upcoming EP.  Buying one or more of these unique t-shirts/ sweatshirts will obviously go a long way to helping with those costs.
Printed on high quality Fruit Of The Loom garments the 9 designs will be available on premium heavyweight tees, raglan sweatshirts plus ladies fitted sofspun tees.
The fundraiser is a flexible one meaning that, even if it doesn't reach its goal, the money will still go towards the completion of the project and, of course, the orders will still be honoured and rewards delivered on time. Ideally though, the project will reach it's goal (or exceed it!) and things can continue moving forward with the overall Antechamber Of Being project. I understand that not everyone can afford to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. You can get the word out and make some noise about the campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools. Any help will, of course, be greatly appreciated and I am constantly grateful for the ongoing support of old and new fans alike who make all of this possible. THANK YOU!Size and ordering information/ designs:Below is information about the sizes of the t-shirts and sweatshirts plus images of the different designs available. You will be asked which size and design(s) you'd like via e-mail after the fundraiser is complete. Please note, there is no size XXXL in sweatshirts.Also note that the perks include options to order up to four tees/ sweatshirts in one go but if you'd like to order more than 4 products (i.e, 5 or 6 T-shirts) or multiple different items (for example, 1 Mens Tee, 1 Ladies Tee & 1 Sweatshirt) then please contact me telling me what you'd like to order and I will work out the price, incl. postage, then send you details on how to place the order.Men's T-shirts: Ladies T-shirts: Unisex Sweatshirts: All Designs -TAOB Pt 2 Album Cover -A Word A Name -Universal Awakening -She Never Was -Serpents In Camouflage -Somewhere But Yesterday -Raising The Stones -Playing Dead -Ghost Dance -Ladies Fitted Sofspun Tee (all designs available)Raglan Sweatshirt (all designs available)

story:
Afrikans... at its essence, integrates expressions of cultures and art to become a beautiful fashion statement! We take the elements of African creativity (bold colors, patterns, abstraction) and combine it with the structure, design, and comfort of Western apparel to make a truly distinct and identifiable clothing line that stands out from the traditional aesthetic and feel of modern clothing.

    This project is close to our hearts because it represents a bigger message that we believe is important to the current state of the world. Combining the best parts of cultures, as humans, has lead us to great discoveries and new frontiers. Afrikans clothing is made for everyone (men+women) and represents the beauty that's conceived when we combine our strengths!  

What We Need & What You Get

     We've broken away from the steps of traditional retailers by empowering our customers to help in the creation of new clothing pieces. We source the finest materials Africa has to offer, to provide you with different fabrics, as well as various styles of "Everydaywear" designs to create new original pieces. Our summer line consists of everything from short-sleeve dress shirts to beautiful blouses. 

 

 

We've come along since we began this journey, from sourcing material directly from africa to prototyping new clothing designs in the US.  We're excited to share with you our new clothing line Afrikans!

By contributing to one of our perks today, you'll receive a one of a kind clothing piece that has a great message, and helps you STAND OUT! You'll also help us achieve our dreams of bringing african designs and creativity to wider audiences!

Ankara and African Wax Print Fabric

What is ankara?

It's the name of a popular fabric worn by many Africans. Ankara commonly known as “Ankara prints”, “African prints”,”African wax prints” “Holland wax” and “Dutch wax”, is a 100% cotton fabric with vibrant patterns. It is usually a colorful cloth and is primarily associated with Africa because of its tribal-like patterns and motifs.

For our 1st Indiegogo Campaign and our Inaugural Afrikans Summer Collection we have a limited run of 30 different fabric designs and over 300 pieces available!   

 

Each one of our Clothing Perks are unique to you because our initial fabric options are limited in availability.

We have hand selected each fabric to go along with our various designs

                                                            The Gatsby

                                                                 The Pepe

 

Our goal is to create an ecommerce clothing store specializing in bold afrikan designs blended with the comfort and familiarity of popular outfits. We hope to be a UNIFYING springboard for creative DIVERSITY ! 

                                                                      The Swali

                                                                      The Ramonda

                                                                     The Wade

                                                                      The Grace

                                                   The Loud (Dashiki)

                                                                        The Breezy

 

The Impact

Over the years we have refined our focus and developed a vision for our brand to become a source of inspiration and inclusion for humanity. Your contribution in Afrikans today will not only bring you cool clothing with great history, but also empower us to employ more people around the world to create things that they are passionate about!

                                                                            BouBou

 

                                                               The Skyee

 

FAQ

  1. When do I get to choose my fabric, and the size of my shirts?  After the campaign, you will be sent a survey where you will be presented with our fabric options, you'll also be able to tell us the size you would like to receive it in. It will all make sense when you get your email survey! Just make sure the email address associated with your Indiegogo is one you check often.
  2. When will I get my clothes?                                                                                                                   September 1st, we hope to get them to you before that date, but the latest you can expect your clothing to arrive is September 1, 2018.
  3. Do you ship internationally? Of course! We ship to wherever you are in the world!
  4. What if my clothing doesn't fit?                                                                                                                   Our goal is 100% satisfaction! So if for any reason your clothing does not fit, send it back to us and we will replace the clothing at no extra cost.                                                                                Return Policy: We offer complete refunds as long as the clothing is not damaged. Refunds must be claimed within 30 days from the date of delivery.

Risks & Challenges

 Our inventory is based on the amount of fabric we have available. Our goal is to create truly one of a kind pieces that have limited run productions. We believe this process increases the value of our products over time and enables us to build a valuable business. We understand that the limited releases and its high cost can be a deal breaker for some customers. So we will have clothing collections that are non customized and delivered in favorable timeframes for consumers.    

 

We understand that you may not be financially able to contribute at this time, but you can still help, just make sure you share our campaign through Indiegogo to anyone you think will love our clothing!!!

story:
Ripe Brand Clothing

Our Why

Our Vision is to make people to feel like Kings and Queens of their professions and endeavors. We see a few big brands that are multi-million dollar brands and billion dollar brands that only endorse brig brands like themselves. We are going to have our brand support and sponsor the local communities to empower people to chase after what they desire. Our goal is to build a kingdom of young entrepreneurs on a beer budget to look good and feel like they can accomplish anything.

Our Gift to God

Royalty gets you though any closed doors because its ordained by God himself. Queens know that God choose them to be the overseers over their particular gifts and strengths. We strive Queens to show the world that it's possible that you can be royal if you let yourself to be. Being royal isn't about always the wealth that comes in the kingdom. It's how you treat the people that are apart of your kingdom. It's a selfless attitude but structure that people will follow. We are luxury brand the is fullfilling a need of looking and feeling important when society says otherwise. Our gift to God is to restore the faith in people chasing behind their passions and dreams!

Offers to be apart of the Kingdom

MORE THAN 25% OFF FUTURE PURCHASES

DIVERSITY

SOCIAL MEDIA SHOUT-OUTS

BRAND QUALITY

AFFORDABLE PRICE

FAST SHIPPING (2-3 ARRIVAL)

COMMUNITY SUPPORT

EDUCATION

UPLIFTMENT

EMPOWERMENT

Future Vision and Goals​

  • Have Dry cleaning Delivery services
  • Have local school event worldwide for children
  • Start a Baby Line Ripe-Baby Clothing rise up princes and princess'
  • Worldwide Brand 
  • Restore Joy to people

Chief Imaginary Officer:

Terrance Ramsey's passion for starting a clothing brand is he sees a strong need for a brand to serve the community not just to sell a quality product but also to provide a service to people who need to be catered to. Back in the early mid-2000's, his mother couldn't afford designer clothing from the mall because she was a single mother and had to pay bills. Terrance used to get picked on for not having those types of clothes. We have a vision of where our brand will be one of the top brands of the world but affordable to people who lack finance. The Red Pineapple came to Terrance in a dream back in 2015. Red pineapples are the original pineapples are only found in the lower Caribbean and South America. Its a Royal Fruit! Fun fact is that the red pineapple has spikes in the crown and fends off things that try to mess with it. It has flowers that blossom out the crown as well! Another fun fact that is that it grows its own berries on top of the crown as well that you can eat! This will explain why Terrance came up with Ripe Brand Clothing and Royal Blossom Commonwealth listed below. How does this Pineapple relates to God? The Pineapple is connected to the mother plant and it never stops being ripe as long as it stays connected to the mother plant. Once disconnected, it will spoil fast. When connected to God you never stop growing unless you disconnect with God. (you will stop being ripe and blossoming).

Chief Executive Officer 

Donta Joe is a native of Virginia and also a graduate of Bethune-Cookman University. He love to help others and he is also an entrepreneur outside of day job at Verizon. Donta shares the same vision as Terrance in changing the oppressed people that aren't appreciated in this world! We got him as our CEO because he knows how to get the job done and knows how to do business. 

Darryl King Chief Strategist Officer :

Darryl is from Buffalo, New York and is also among us as an entrepreneur. We got this Guy because he understands how to promote business as well giving the best advice in how to maintain customers.  He is a part owner of a coffee shop in Tampa Florida. He is currently residing in Fl. Darryl is out going person as well as a family man!

Interview with N-touch News

https://youtu.be/qHWnXkfePlk

Examples Of Royalty

Product Development Stage: 

Ripe-Brand Clothing is in the production stage. In our pictures above are some of our production products! The designs that you see are already made. They just have to be mass produced. 

Royal Blossom Commonwealth objectives:

When you purchase a product, you will be asked to take a picture and give a testimony of your experience with RBC. We are going to shout-out our customers/supporters everytime that you shop with us on all our social media pages. Supporters will be added to secret Google+ community that will be nothing but love and support where all of our kings and queens can see our latest designs and innovation. This community is our own world that where people can get away from their problems and feel like somebody. We are going to bring like mined people together for empowerment and encouragement.

Success and Accomplishments:

Foreign Pineapple Shocker, Red Pineapple Crowning, and Purple Pina Crowning has raised a total of $737 all together! 

SWOT ANALYSIS (Market Challenges):

Strengths: Strong Message Being Communicated, Strong Brand communication, Powerful message,  

Weaknesses: No credibility, Production Delays, Shipping Delays Shipping Costs,funding the first branding launch

Opportunities: Help out the communities, Unlimited Audience on the internet, pulling people to campaign with details and online of our vision

Threats: Not giving God the Glory of (RBC) the Kingdom

Note: This is our fourth Campaign

Delivery Description  

Once you sow your seed of royalty, the mass production will take 2-4 weeks after the campaign is finished plus the the shipping time as well as delivery time to you get to you. If you stay in the Tampa, St. Pete, Clearwater and Orlando areas we will deliver the products to you. You will have place your order on www.ripebrandclothing.com. We are going to Inbox you or email you special instructions on what to do. We are going to be using DHL express and the shipping costs will be determined by where the package is being sent. We will also provide USPS service to people who aren't able to afford the DHL Express. We want cut out the wait time for people to get their products and to ensure that if something is wrong that you can exchange the product defect asap.

WORD OF MOUTH GIFT 

Let's say that you're not able to donate any money. That is perfectly fine. We still will need your help. We need your help by spreading the word as well through social media. If someone donates money from your network we will give you a shirt as well to say thank you. Please like us on Tumblr, Instagram, Facebook, and our website is www.ripebrandclothing.com(under contruction) Please also use Indiegogo Share tools as well.

story:
The Campaign has ended

Go to www.flashybackpack.com to buy your today!

The World Needs More Flashiness

We think this world is way too serious. That's why we came up the Flashy Backpack! One look and you're guaranteed to smile.  We're sure you'll delight somebody as you walk down the street with this party machine strapped to your back. Support our campaign and you'll make this world a better place.  Easier than you thought, eh?

Pick From 4 Awesome Patterns

We've developed 4 awesome patterns for you to choose from. We also came up with 4 equally awesome names. Dare you to come up with something better. 

4 Awesome Patterns

Look - It's a Party on Your Back!

Look at All These Features!

So many good ones, we're going to tell you twice:

  • Embedded LED Lights with 20 different flashing modes (and the source of eternal youth... maybe?)
  • Extra Large Compartment to Hold All Your Stuff (like your light-saber)
  • Industrial Felt (really strong felt)
  • Durable Zippers (zip it... zip it real good)
  • Thick, Comfy, Reinforced Shoulder Straps (cause' that light saber ain't light)
  • Nylon Top Handle & Straps (Strong enough to survive a car crash and the biggest tantrums)

What? You Need More?

Wait, we haven't convinced you yet? Okay, fine. Here are additional views of the production ready models.

✔ Folder ✔ Books ✔ Laptop ✔Water Bottle ✔ Snack

A Hidden Compartment for The Battery Pack - Can Also Store Skittles, Money, etc.

So Easy to Operate - You Shouldn't Need to View This... But You Will Won't You?

LED Light Strip Operation

We incorporated a standard LED light strip so it's super easy to operate. Bet you never thought you can change the world with just 3 buttons!

LED Light Strip Controls - 3 Buttons to Change the World!

  • Switch ON/OFF > Hold the "SPEED/BRIGHT" button for about 1 second
  • Change light effect > Press the "MODE" button
    • Flash (Blue) 
    • Flash (Aqua) 
    • Flash (Green) 
    • Flash (Yellow) 
    • Flash (Red) 
    • Flash (White) 
    • 3 solid colors changing (Red, Green, Blue) 
    • 6 solid colors changing (Blue, Pink, Red, Yellow, Green, Aqua) 
    • 3 colors fast flashing (Red, Green, Blue) Strobe (Blue) 
    • Strobe (Aqua) 
    • Strobe (Green) 
    • Strobe (Red) 
    • Strobe (White) 
    • Strobe 6 colors (Blue, Pink, Red, Yellow, Green, Aqua) 
    • Combination (Loop all 19 effects) 
    • Fade 7 colors (Blue, Aqua, Green, Yellow, Red, Pink, White) 
    • 3 colors changing - Dimmer Effect (Red, Green, Blue) 
    • 7 colors changing - Dimmer Effect (Blue, Aqua, Green, Yellow, Red, Pink, White) 
  • Change the speed for the modes (5 Speeds) > Press the "SPEED/BRIGHT" button while in "modes"
  • Solid color mode (Total 20 colors) > Press the "COLOR" button to cycle through colors
  • Change the brightness level for solid color mode (5 brightness levels) > Press the "SPEED/BRIGHT" button while in solid color mode

Who Came Up With the Flashy Backpack?

We are designers and engineers who don't take ourselves very seriously, (ahem), although we can and will do serious things also! We've designed smartphones, launched satellites, and make beautiful custom phone cases and drinkware. Oh, and we engineered the McDonald's Shamrock Shake STRAW and the uselessly useful Frork.

Yea, we've work at a company called Google. Heard of them? Our founder and CEO, Elwin Ong, is a rocket scientist. Seriously. MIT PhD. ROCKET SCIENTIST.

We Engineered the McDonald's Shamrock Shake STRAW

We Also Designed and Made the Frork Featuring Anthony Sullivan!

Timeline

We've spent the past few months perfecting every aspect of the Flashy Backpack. Now we need your support to bring the world some flashiness!

    Risks & Challenges

    We've Got This!

    Let's see, we've designed smartphones, launched satellites, and make beautiful custom phone cases and drink-ware. So yeah, we know what we're doing.

    We've already developed all the prototypes and approved the pre-production models with a manufacturer that meets our standards. We will use standard off-the-shelf LED lights to reduce our risk, but future plans include adding programmable LED lights and an accompanying app!

    We expect production units to ship one month after our campaign is completed. We need your support to fund the minimum order quantities required to bring this flashy bag of awesomeness into reality. So please join us and let's change the world together.

    FAQ

    What is the backpack made of?

    The Flashy Backpack is made from 3 major components:

    1. Industrial grade felt for the main pieces of the backpack - Industrial felt is super strong and tear resistant, water resistant, flame resistant, dirt resistant, and most importantly, tantrum resistant.
    2. Nylon straps - We use the same nylon material used in car seat belts for the top handle and straps between the shoulder strap and main backpack
    3. LED light strip - The light strip is a standard off-the-shelf component. We've developed special straps within the small compartment to hold it securely in place. We've also made a special hidden pocket inside the small compartment to hold the battery pack.

    What are the patterns and how are they made?

    Good question. We went through a lot of pattern ideas before settling on 4 fun and inspiration patterns that we think will fit most people's lifestyles. They are Sandy, Party, Chill, and Solar. Each pattern is expertly laser cut by large, complex, industrial machines that go bzzzzzzzzz bzzzzzzz bzzzzzzz! 

    How big is the backpack?

    The large compartment is roughly 17" x 11" x 4" inside, which is comparable to most standard backpacks. The small compartment is a bit smaller, 8" x 5.5" x 2.5". 

    Are the LED lights programmable?

    We like the way you think. They are currently pre-programmed, but we do have plans for a Flashy Backpack 2.0 with accompanying mobile app that will customize the LED lights, change traffic lights to green, and call Superman!

Go to www.flashybackpack.com to buy your today!
The World Needs More Flashiness
We think this world is way too serious. That's why we came up the Flashy Backpack! One look and you're guaranteed to smile.  We're sure you'll delight somebody as you walk down the street with this party machine strapped to your back. Support our campaign and you'll make this world a better place.  Easier than you thought, eh?
Pick From 4 Awesome Patterns
We've developed 4 awesome patterns for you to choose from. We also came up with 4 equally awesome names. Dare you to come up with something better. 

4 Awesome Patterns

Look - It's a Party on Your Back!
Look at All These Features!
So many good ones, we're going to tell you twice:



Embedded LED Lights with 20 different flashing modes (and the source of eternal youth... maybe?)
Extra Large Compartment to Hold All Your Stuff (like your light-saber)
Industrial Felt (really strong felt)
Durable Zippers (zip it... zip it real good)
Thick, Comfy, Reinforced Shoulder Straps (cause' that light saber ain't light)
Nylon Top Handle & Straps (Strong enough to survive a car crash and the biggest tantrums)

What? You Need More?
Wait, we haven't convinced you yet? Okay, fine. Here are additional views of the production ready models.

✔ Folder ✔ Books ✔ Laptop ✔Water Bottle ✔ Snack

A Hidden Compartment for The Battery Pack - Can Also Store Skittles, Money, etc.

So Easy to Operate - You Shouldn't Need to View This... But You Will Won't You?

story:
About LifeWatch Mk. 1

LifeWatch is the most streamlined and discrete method for calling Emergency Services on the market! It’s also the first Emergency Alert watch on the market. Although the original intent was for allergy-sufferers, LifeWatch quickly gained traction with women and men who may not feel safe on their walks home or at a local bar. LifeWatch’s proprietary emergency alert technology makes it the most discreet way to call emergency services to your exact GPS location, this allows for protection against kidnapping, date-drugging, and peace of mind for any medical conditions the wearer may have. With your contributions, we can make LifeWatch possible for the millions of people with life-threatening conditions and for the millions of young men and women who should feel safe on their walks home.  Staying Stylish and Safe at all times.

Millions of people in the United States are Hospitalized due to their allergies, diseases, and conditions. Most of those people are brought to the Emergency room via 911 call and ambulance arrival. LifeWatch’s emergency alert method is one of the fastest, most streamlined way for First Responders to receive life-saving information about the wearer so that First Responders can be better prepared to help in any situation. 

Furthermore, the rate of abductions, rapes, and muggings of college-aged women has increased in the past decade, and in many instances, they are unable to pull their phone out and dial 911, LifeWatch gives them an extra, fast and reliable opportunity to receive Emergency Services assistance in their time of need.

 

  

 

 

LifeWatch, LLC. Team

LifeWatch was designed and founded by two young entrepreneurs who have a passion and excitement for keeping people safe, happy and healthy. Jack & Connor have known each other since the beginning of high school and have dreamt up, and worked on numerous projects together; including raising $14,000 for the Pulse Night Club shooting.

The product might be delayed due to under-funding, this campaign is not a guarantee that the LifeWatch Mk.1 will come to market, by supporting us you acknowledge that this campaign and your donation are not a guarantee. 

Copyright LifeWatch, LLC (C) 2017

story:
-1)  !!! Don't need to worry about the time-reading of this anti-clockwise watch because it has been tested by more than 50 people who could all read the time easily when he/she want to read it !!!
 0) Don't worry about it, you could also receive the high quanlity REVERSION even though the campaign can't reach the goal because it's a flexible funding !
 1) The website (WWW.LIN-BLUE.COM) is under construction......
 2) Could you please do me a big favor to share this product/link to your friends via your social networks while reading this project, maybe someone else love this watch, and it will be a big help for this campaign, thank you very much!
3) [Important update !!] The 3rd version of test samples were arrived today(2/22), the font of 'REVERSION' and it's width/hight are more close to the artwork, and the upper/movement part is slimmer/thinner than the 1st/2nd version, it near perfect. Please refer to the update 1.
 4) The environment resistance test result was updated !
 5)  [Very important update !!!] Some good people/friends leave us the valuable suggestions/advices after they reviewed the campaign, they thought this watch will be better if it could be more easy to read the time for someone need to know the time immediately in the emergency moment. So we have updated a new design of easy-reading version for you.


We know that there are so many watches come to be sold in the market every month, every week, even every day, Especially the smart watch/wear.

With the rapid development of science and technology, our world is changing so fast that we can't catch up with it.

However, in our world, everything will Return to the origin which it comes from in the final, and nothing can change this law becaue this is the essence of everything!

So, the conclusion comes out: The real fashion --- is the 'CLASSIC' !

Because only the 'classic' will never be eliminated.

We have traveled our minds back to the origin of 'time', and rethinking it's essence, then, we found out a new concept --- BACK TO TOMORROW.

The evolution watch is coming, we named it --- REVERSION!!!

It means: NO SMART, BUT FASHION !



For our first collection, 3 types are offered for you to choose from:

(Updata to the easy-reading version ! )


As the time goes by, our minds have been set to be clockwise to anything if is related to the watch or clock’s rotation direction.

But we have forgotten one thing that there are so many instances which also indicated the existence of the anti-clockwise in our world and our life.

For example: the direction of earth rotation, the direction of running in the Athletics, the direction of spiral stairs you go upstairs, or the direction of your reading method(from left to right, from above to below), even the direction when you draw a round on the paper, and so on.

All these examples listed above are acting by the anti-clockwise direction.

We found this concept, and used it...

Therefore, an anti-clockwise watch---‘REVERSION'---was born.

And it means --- BACK TO TOMORROW.


Now, let's have a look at some pictures at first !


  • The 3rd version of test sample: 

1) The font of 'REVERSION' and it's width/hight are more close to the artwork.

2) The upper/movement part is slimmer/thinner than the 1st/2nd version, it near perfect.


  • The 1st and 2nd version of test samples:

Gold

Sliver

Black

Gold

Sliver

Black


  • Anti-clockwise design.

  • Twin sapphire design --- abrasive hardness is 100 times harder than normal glass.

  • The world’s thinness watch design --- The top-set movement construction makes you feel it’s thinner than the normal watch, the major thickness is only 4.5 mm.
  • Complete transparent case/body design.
  • Accuracy: ±20 second per month worn under normal circumstances(MIYOTA movement).
  • Water resistance: 5 ATM (50 meters)
  • Battery life: 3 years


  •  Major (lower part) thickness: 4.5 mm

  • Material: all 316L Stainless Steel
  • Diameter: 44 mm
  • Twin sapphire glass diameter: 41 mm
  • Band material: Leather
  • Band width: 20 mm


  • Details of the back (you could easily adjust your time from the back-view).

  • Easy band changing system：





We are so confident with our watch’s quality and durability that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, you could send it back to us for repair except: battery life, Wear and tear and aging, abnormal use, accidents, etc.


Now, you could have it by more than 35% discount of the retail price in the funding duration, and the first 500 sets is in manufacturing now. 


Flash memory disk of Red dot design award and iF product design award.

  • 8GB for you who buy 1 reversion[$99, $109]
  • 16GB for you who buy 2 reversions[$199]
  • 32GB for you who buy 3 reversions[$299]


  • The cool white crocodile leather band for who choose the Reversion gold.
  • The cool brown crocodile leather band for who choose the Reversion silver.
  • The cool blue crocodile leather band for who choose the Reversion black.


  • Idea/design.[2014/5~2014/9]
  • Supplier selection. [2014/9]
  • Rough machining of parts for test samples. [2014/10/F]
  • Finish machining of parts for test samples. [2014/11/M]
  • Parts assembly for test samples. [2015/1/E]
  • Test items: water resistance test, impact resistance(drop, hammer) test, environment resistance test, etc. [2015/2/F~3/F]
  • Rough machining of parts for retail/funding products. [2015/3/M]
  • Finish machining of parts for retail/funding products. [2015/4/M]
  • Parts assembly for retail/funding products .[2015/5/M]
  • Package producing. [2015/5/F]
  • Product Packing. [2015/5/M]
  • Delivery. [2015/5/E]

Note: 

The test sample showed in the photos is the very early prototype and it's just near to 60% of the final level.
And the upper/movement part in final version will be more silm/cool than the test sample.


Without your support, we can do nothing!

Without your support, we can’t share our idea with you!

Without your support, this cool product could not be known by the world!

ZG.Lin, and Bluewins.Y, the founder of LIN+BLUE. We want to design a series of special watch from now and share them to you.We love this work so much which we can’t separate from, because the product designing has been a part of our life. While designing the reversion, the well friendship was established between us, even the two families. We hope to keep this relationship forever, and design more something cool!

We are so confident that you will be satisfied with it when you receive the reversion. And with your support, we could promote the next generation which the appearance design was almost finished, and we promise to you who will have bought the reversion could get a discount for our next watch.


There are always risks and challenges when promoting a project because it takes a lot of works to finish the product. However, we have the very confident to make it. Why? Because Shenzhen is the most famous city in producing watch, there are more than 50% of the world's watches were made in Shenzhen every year.  And we have more than 10 years of experience in our each fields.

ZG.Lin: More than 10 years of experience in industry design and original painting design.

Bluewins.Y: More than 10 years of experience in watch design, have designed more than 50 models of watch, and quite familiar (personal relationship) with lots of watch suppliers.



So, we are so confident that we can make this watch not just for the special appearance but more for the quality and durability guarantee.

The manufacturing fulfilment plan:

1.  The supplier has been selected.

2. The sample for test are completed and the improvement is in progress.

3. The preliminary work of production(mould, tooling, fixture...) is in progress.

4. The logistic partners has been selected (The HongKong Post). 

5. The packaging prototypes was done.

6. The first 500 watches is in manufacturing now...

story:
Short Summary

Hi! My name is Elizabeth Jackson. I am a mother of one precious little girl, and I quickly realized that every parent has their own preferences and needs when it comes to baby clothes. My daughter grew so fast, she was in 6-9 month size by the time she was 3.5 months! I wished for an easy way to keep up with her, and be able to get clothes to fit my needs and preferences without having to leave the house!

That's why I designed the Bamboo Baby Box. You'll get the items you need for a price you can afford. Get brand new items with the tags still on them, or go for the budget option and go for used items. Send items back in to get a credit towards your next box, even items we didn't send you!

  • No hidden fees! You pick what price you want to spend (based on number of items and level of use)
  • No shipping fees! We'll pay for shipping!
  • Keep all the items as long as you want! This is not a rental!

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to get the ball rolling, we need money to go towards:

  • Inventory (the largest portion)
  • Custom-designed boxes
  • Tags
  • Website
  • Licenses (business and re-sale)

 

The Impact

Save your time, protect the planet, help families in need!

The textile industry is one of the biggest pollution sources, especially for water. By reusing items, we can help cut down on demand!

We also want to help families that might not be able to afford the baby clothes they need, so for every 5 boxes we sell, we'll send one to a family in need.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest hurdle with this project is getting a good inventory with a wide variety of styles, brands, and styles. The majority of funds from this campaign will go towards getting the best, high quality items we can find for our first box. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, you can still help by spreading the word!

  • Share this campaign and our website: www.bamboobabybox.com

I wished for an easy way to keep up with her, and be able to get clothes to fit my needs and preferences without having to leave the house!
That's why I designed the Bamboo Baby Box. You'll get the items you need for a price you can afford. Get brand new items with the tags still on them, or go for the budget option and go for used items. Send items back in to get a credit towards your next box, even items we didn't send you!

No hidden fees! You pick what price you want to spend (based on number of items and level of use)
No shipping fees! We'll pay for shipping!
Keep all the items as long as you want! This is not a rental!

 

What We Need & What You Get
In order to get the ball rolling, we need money to go towards:

Inventory (the largest portion)
Custom-designed boxes
Tags
Website
Licenses (business and re-sale)

 

The Impact
Save your time, protect the planet, help families in need!
The textile industry is one of the biggest pollution sources, especially for water. By reusing items, we can help cut down on demand!
We also want to help families that might not be able to afford the baby clothes they need, so for every 5 boxes we sell, we'll send one to a family in need.

Risks & Challenges
The biggest hurdle with this project is getting a good inventory with a wide variety of styles, brands, and styles. The majority of funds from this campaign will go towards getting the best, high quality items we can find for our first box. 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you just can't contribute, you can still help by spreading the word!
Share this campaign and our website: www.bamboobabybox.com

story:
Know Your Enemies

WHO 2018 global air quality figure, reveals that 7m people die every year worldwide, because of pollution-related illnesses. Around 91% of the world's population lives in places where air quality levels exceed WHO limits. This is disturbing as air quality declines, the risk of stroke, heart disease, lung cancer, and chronic and acute respiratory diseases increases for the people who live in the high-risk pollution cities.

Source: WHO
 

Fact 1: An average American breathe 2 gallons of air per minute which mean around 3400 gallons of air each day. 

Fact 2: Inhaling air pollution takes away at least 1-2 years of a typical human life. 

Fact 3: It has effects as small as burning eyes and itchy throat too as large as breathing problems and death.

 

Why NS Smart Mask

NewShield smart face mask is an innovation that is designed to fight airborne pathogens and pollutants with active carbon filters. Offering five-level protection and designed with your breathing safety in mind, We are determined to put you off the statistics by filtering harmful allergens, virus, dust, haze, oxidants, bacteria, and pollutants.  

We are determined to ensure that those smallest particles released from a wide range of diffuse sources and direct emissions, like PM 10 and PM 2.5 are stopped because our mechanism filtration process is unmatched bringing the future of smart face mask for quality breathing.

 

 

Defend Your Future

NewShield smart face mask can remove up to 99% of airborne particles as small as 0.25 microns in diameter.  That’s not all NS also blocks and deactivates thousands of bacteria, dust haze and viruses. NewShield proprietary filter provides five layers of protection with its high-tech innovative particle filters.

NS smart mask interior silicon feature material is the secret behind the mask’s cool, dry interior - a feature that really sets it apart.  This high-efficiency silicon material allows for the quick release of heat, moisture, and CO2, preventing excess build-up with no irritation and providing lasting comfort.   

 

 

Our Selling Point

NewShield smart face mask exhale air valve and silicone gel interior is the secret behind the mask’s cool, dry interior - a feature that really sets it apart.  This high-efficiency exhale valve allows for the quick release of heat, moisture, and CO2, preventing excess build-up and providing lasting comfort.      

The unique shape structure provides extra airflow and helps with heat dissipation, a major problem in other masks.

story:
Spuds™ is a pair of shorts that combines innovative materials, next level design, with a look that will make you stand out without making a scene. 

Built for all elements of your life.

From working out, to going out, and everywhere in between. We do not classify Spuds™ under a certain category of short, since they do so much. Let them be the best training shorts you ever own, the best hiking shorts you ever use, and still look great with a button down when it's time for a night out on the town.

Gravi™ Pocket System...No more dropped phones.

Putting your phone on the ground, having it fall out of your small pockets... you've seen it, you've encountered it. Devices are getting larger, but pockets are staying the same. We decided to change that. With the Gravi™ Pocket, your phone (even large iPhone and Samsung plus models) is secured against your right hip. This allows you to run, squat, bench press, lay weights on your thigh, and do any other intense physical activity, all while having your phone protected and feeling like it isn't even there.

Gym shorts are great for working out, but not going out, and you certainly wouldn't wear your favorite chino/cargo shorts while working out. We have created a pair of shorts you can throw on in the morning, train during the day, lounge in the afternoon, and still look great when its time to go out.

Many shorts have media pockets, but they all kind of suck. They are either designed for phones from 5 years ago, or are in locations that make no sense.

The Gravi™ Pocket is designed to hold the largest of phones (even iPhone and Samsung Plus models with cases), all while securing the device against your right hip. We found this location to be perfect for every physical activity we tested. You can run, squat, bench press, leg raise, bike, hike, and anything else, all while keeping your device secured. The Gravi™ Pocket is also designed to utilize the waistband of Spuds™ to bear the weight, so it feels like it isn't even there.

Say goodbye to putting your phone on the ground, floppy armbands, or worrying about it falling out of your pocket. The only thing that will be on your mind is your next step or next rep.

Looks light your favorite cotton twill shorts, but performs better than your best athletic shorts. The body material is made from an advanced nylon and spandex twill blend that provides a soft cool feeling. The polyester pocket material is extremely durable and lightweight, while being quick drying and moisture wicking.

The C6 DWR (Durable Water Repellant) coating implementing into Spuds™ is more environmentally friendly and designed to help keep you dry. Whether you're caught in a rainstorm, spill your favorite sports drink, or drop your coffee during your morning rush, rest assured you can still move at the speed of life.

As Spuds™ were designed to be worn all day, everyday, it was imperative to make sure they stay smelling fresh. Integrated Anti Bacterial properties mean that you can put them on in the morning and still smell fresh into the night. Say goodbye to midweek washes, or even weekly washes.... your significant other will never know.

With the perfect amount of tailored stretch, Spuds™ perform when its time to train. Lunges, rock climbing and leg raises are no match. They also are less likely stretch out and become baggy over time.

Even with all the advanced technologies jam packed into the Friiz™ material, they are still breathable to help keep you cool. This property allows your body's heat to be vented while allowing cool air to flow through. No more overheating, even with a material that looks sophisticated enough for a night out.

From the very beginning we were inspired by the diversity California provides. From the salty Pacific, cold Sierras, and scorching Mojave, California has something for everyone. This inspiration is baked into every color of Spuds™. It was only fitting to work with some of the worlds best manufacturers and suppliers, right here in the Golden State. So yeah, they're made in the USA.

We were tired of overpaying for too many pairs of shorts, that are really stuck in the 20th century. Ugly gym shorts with small pockets, restrictive cargo and chino shorts, there had to be a better way. We are creating a pair of shorts that combines advanced materials and technologies to be made for all elements of your life.

Our Values:

Create high quality Men's Wear that can be worn everywhere

Implement technologies to make your life more simple

Apply next generation design to help solve everyday problems

Advance the narrative of bettering yourself in all aspects of life

Give back to the community  

Risks and challenges

We have fully funded our venture ourselves so far, and are now ready for production. Teaming up with a local manufacturer in San Francisco that has, and continues to produce quality apparel for years, we are ready to produce large quantities of Spuds™ for you.

Spuds™ are fully developed, sourced, and are ready for production.

We have also been able to keep our supply chain small, and are closely connected to each to ensure sticking to our strict timeline, and quality of product.

It is our goal to create a quality product, to stick to schedule, and to inform you of every step along that journey.

Thank you for helping us make this possible.

You were made for all elements.

-Spuds Apparel

<<日本のオーダー紹介>>

<<中文訂購介紹>>

The gadget - Diaper+ is real product, it isn't just a concept.

Distributor Wanted: kevinwu@diaperplus.com.tw

Product Review Wellcome: kevinwu@diaperplus.com.tw

New parents and those caring for elder relatives have enough problems. Diaper+ makes one of them just a bit easier by letting you know—clearly and accurately—when a diaper needs to be changed.

Why need the Diaper+? Most diapers now come with a “wetness indicator” that lets the caregivers or parents know when a diaper needs changing. These wetness indicators only work when you can see them, so you have to remove your baby or elderly relative’s pants to see if the diaper needs to be changed. That’s uncomfortable for you and them. If your baby or elderly relative is asleep, you run the risk of waking them to check and that’s often not a risk you want to take.

Adult diapers are supposed to protect the dignity of our elderly relatives. Removing clothing to check a wetness indicator robs them of the very dignity the diapers were intended to protect.

Allowing your baby or elderly relative to wear a wet diaper for an extended period isn’t an option. It will often lead to diaper rash and cracked skin, causing discomfort and pain and potentially leading to infection. To minimize the risk, diapers should be changed as soon as they get wet so they’re always protected by a clean, dry diaper.

Caring for a baby or elderly relative isn’t just hard work, it’s work that causes stress and worry. You want the best but you can’t be constantly monitoring your baby or elderly relative to know if they have peed. Nothing else would get done.

Diaper+ saves you the time and worry and will give you the freedom to get other things done knowing your baby or elderly relative is clean and dry.

There are other diaper monitors on the market, but they have to be placed inside the diaper which runs the risk of causing discomfort to your baby or elderly relative. Diaper+ goes on the outside of the diaper so the person wearing it won’t even know it’s there.

The Diaper+ system consists of a smart sensor and a mobile phone application. The Diaper+ sensor is small and round and connects wirelessly with your android or iOS device via Blue-tooth.

The sensor reads the temperature inside and outside of the diaper and utilizes a complex, proprietary algorithm to determine.

Most of the time, the person wearing it won’t feel a thing, and if a baby does get their hands on it, it’s too large to swallow or become a choking hazard.

 

How it works:

You attach the sensor to a diaper or incontinence pad with a double-sided adhesive sticker so it’s easy to remove from a soiled diaper and attach to a clean one.

Whenever your baby or elderly relative urinates, the Diaper+ sensor sends a signal to the app which alerts you that it’s time to change the diaper. It’s as quick and effective as if your baby or elderly relative could tell you themselves. You’ll know immediately when a diaper needs changing so you can minimize the time your baby or elderly relative spends in a wet diaper, reducing the risk of diaper rash and infection.

The Diaper+ app can be installed on Bluetooth-enabled android or iOS device. There are two versions, one for a baby, one for an elderly relative and it’s easy to choose the version that’s appropriate to your situation.

If you’re leaving your baby or elderly relative in someone else’s care for long periods, you can link your phone to that of the person caring for your baby or elderly relative and get every notification they do so you can ensure your loved one is receiving the quality of care you expect.

 

The app also features a tracking system that records:

•    Each time your baby or elderly relative pees

•    Each time the diaper was checked

•    Each time the diaper was changed

Data is kept for three weeks so parents and caregivers can look for trends and adjust their schedule accordingly.

You can also use the Diaper+ app to track how many diapers have been used so you’ll always know how many are left and when you need to shop for more. You’ll never be caught without a diaper and you’ll have a better idea of how many diapers you’ll need to budget for in the coming month.

 

The android app is ready to ship and the iOS app is coming by January 2018. The system is available in English, Traditional Chinese, and Simple Chinese.

story:
TM

Simply the smartest heated apparel ever made, Temperatek uses cutting edge heating technology using proprietary Graphene solutions to create uniform heating. We formulated our own unique heated textile that is coil less, wireless, washable, lightweight, thin, flexible, Heats to 110 degrees and uses low battery power. We created an on the go system to keep you warm with our Hoodies, Joggers, Scarves and blankets that never goes out of style. 

Creating a uniformly heated product that is not in patches, Temperatek is advancing the way we think about heated apparel. With a background in wearable technology and bio medical soft good design, Temperatek is aimed at helping people stay warm and dry all winter long. Temperatek apparel is a great way to keep your loved ones warm this winter, weather your at home or on the go. Our products are sustainable and long lasting, we use cotton and organic cottons that are sustainably sourced and our production means are ethical. This means that both our fabrics and our products are produced with the planet and humans in mind to create longevity and sustainability within our industry.

Temepratek will officially launch our products into the marketplace starting with pre sales and then moving to our Direct to Consumer website. Ultimately Temperatek hopes to start on a Non Profit sector of the business that gives back to our community thru job training and giving away battery powered heated items to homeless shelters, battered women shelters, orphanages, and children`s hospitals.

Arianna's story

I am an apparel and soft goods wearable technology designer. Developing several products for the Virtual reality and augmented reality markets, as well as developing medical devices using technology, which are used in remote physical therapy, post operation healing and alternatives to surgery. Having 18 years apparel and soft goods prototyping experience and the love of helping people through technology is where the love of wearable technology began. Making adaptive clothing as a child when breaking my femur bone and was in traction for several weeks in the ICU helped me understand how I can help people with my skills. Sewing and developing products that help people has always been a passion. Working in technology has allowed me to have access to newly developed technologies that have potential to be made into wearables, inventing new products for the soft goods and apparel markets. Using these new technologies is the future and I hope to bring new technology in the wearable space to reality and allow new products in this category to be made accessible to all people.

story:
The world’s most provocative watch.

Square-faced. Designer-grade. Stunningly provocative. The MC Watch is built from the industries finest materials at a refreshingly unpretentious price.

Back the timepiece breaking all the rules.  



All watches look the exact same. Sure, watchmakers will throw their own little spin on them. They’ll paint them bizarre colors. Build them from “unique” materials. Hell, they might even slap a few bells and whistles on them... before too long there will be a watch equipped with a waffle maker (give us a shoutout if you decide to run with that idea).

Yet, despite all the bizarre colors, “unique” materials and fancy schmancy bells and whistles (that have a habit of no longer working after a few uses)... most every watch seems to look the exact same. Or, at the very least, boringly similar.

That’s until Raj, MC’s timepiece mastermind had a vision.

MC Collection

Time to be a part of the winners square

 

One night, Raj, had a dream whilst fast asleep...

Kronos, the Greek god of time, visited him floating atop a cloud with Frank Sinatra singing lightly next to him. As “Strangers in The Night” played lightly in the background, Kronos looked at Raj and said...

“Give the mortal realm something provocative to keep track of the seconds in the minutes, the minutes in the hours, the hours in the day...”

Raj, as you could probably expect, was a bit confused by Kronos’s ambiguous advice and asked that Kronos not speak in riddles.

Kronos was offended at first but then realized he was being a bit pretentious (not unlike so many watchmakers littering the internet).

So, Kronos repeated his advice, this time in English...

“Raj, construct a watch from the finest materials the world has to offer at an extraordinarily reasonable price and make the timepiece square.”


Raj’s eyes grew wide as the full force of the idea struck him like one of Zeus’s thunderbolts. At this moment, Kronos drew a large fiery square in the sky with his pointer finger and disappeared, leaving the burning square behind him.

Two years have passed since this fateful dream and today the mortal realm has the provocative MC, the world’s best square-faced watch, designed from industry-leading materials, at an incredible price you simply cannot beat.

A line of watches built with the precision of aircrafts, missiles and bulletproof glass.

When Raj set out to build the very first MC, he refused committing the cardinal sin so many watch brands have done in the past (and are still doing today), finding a white label product and slapping a logo on it.

We won’t name any names (you know who you are), but some very prominent watch companies don’t actually use their own designs, instead, they use templates of other cheap white label designs and mark them up.

While creating a custom design from scratch required more work and certainly more time, Raj knew that he wanted to build the MC with the best materials he could find while ensuring their price point stayed well below “luxury brands”.

 

He scoured the globe for the best materials and came up with a provocative but oh so stunning square-faced design that gave the MC an edginess you’d have to run your fingers along to fully comprehend.

Let’s take a deep dive into the impeccable materials found in each MC.

CASE Finest 316 Stainless Steel
STRAP Interchangeable Leather Strap
MOVEMENT Swiss Ronda 763
WATER RESISTANCE 5 ATM
GLASS Sapphire Glass

 

316 Stainless Steel... the creme de la creme of steel.

Each MC is made with 316 Stainless Steel, the creme de la creme of steel. Unlike other steel, it’s packed full of an element called Molybdenum, which drastically improves corrosion resistance making the iconic square frame of the MC watch practically immortal.
 

Best-in-class movement protected by bullet-proof glass.



No, no. Don’t go firing a pistol at your wrist. While these puppies aren’t necessarily bullet-proof per se, they're constructed with Sapphire Glass... a glass that has been used in aircrafts, bulletproof glass and on the heads of missiles rocketing through the air at 5,000 meters per second. In other words, the sexy face of your MC stays beautiful and scratch free, even if it comes into contact with loose pocket change, stubborn belt buckles, or rough table surfaces. Not to mention, with it being powered by the luxurious Swiss Ronda 763, there’s something beautiful inside worth protecting. 
 

A sexy watch face you’ll want to lick.



Did we take that one too far? We might have. Our apologies. In all seriousness. One of the most alluring qualities of the MC is its provocative square face that runs circles around its circular counterparts. It’s damn edgy. It’s sharp. It’s sexy. It’s kissable. It’s licka*... Anyway, whether you’re sporting your MC with a suit and tie or casual Saturday wear, you will rock it confidently knowing it’s making a statement as it clings like a glove to your wrist.

*MC is not responsible in the rare circumstance that a stranger licks, kisses or fondles the watches and wrists of MC wearers. 

CASE SIZE  32 mm
CASE THICKNESS 7 mm
STRAP LENGTH 75 mm x 115 mm
STRAP WIDTH 18 mm


We keep it simple, pick one of three (or all three).

We build simplicity into everything we do. But, don’t mistake this simplicity for lack of luxury. Here at MC we believe you can do luxury without the bullshit. Currently, we offer three simple timeless designs... the Croft, Bond and Jones.

Their pretty faces can be mixed and matched with a genuine leather strap of your choice... a genuine leather strap so soft, warm and velvety that your wrist will be purring the moment you slip it on.

Simmer down wrist... simmer down... we’re in public.  
 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise $16,000 solely for inventory purposes. This will help us get a great jumpstart.
  • If you help back MC, you will have access to the watches, 3 months before anyone else #trendsetter
     

The Impact

  • Helping people become more fashionable one step at a time
  • Providing a high quality (not just sticking our logo onto something) at an affordable price, every material used in MC is the highest material, we are able to make it affordable by taking less margins #greedisoverrated
     

Challenges

Building MC has been a long time coming, we have been on this journey for almost 2 years. The reason we waited so long is because we didn't want any complications in the manufacturing process. We sourced the best materials and worked with many manufacturers to negotiate pricing to make MC affordable.

The only challenge will be to get watches made and shipped to you within that 60 day window.. To execute this, we have already pre-paid for certain materials that typically take longer to produce & we will be communicating with our factory to send us constant updates..

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help back MC by purchasing a watch, no biggie! Shout us out on social media..

@themcwatch
story_txt:
The world’s most provocative watch.

Square-faced. Designer-grade. Stunningly provocative. The MC Watch is built from the industries finest materials at a refreshingly unpretentious price.Back the timepiece breaking all the rules.  

All watches look the exact same. Sure, watchmakers will throw their own little spin on them. They’ll paint them bizarre colors. Build them from “unique” materials. Hell, they might even slap a few bells and whistles on them... before too long there will be a watch equipped with a waffle maker (give us a shoutout if you decide to run with that idea).
Yet, despite all the bizarre colors, “unique” materials and fancy schmancy bells and whistles (that have a habit of no longer working after a few uses)... most every watch seems to look the exact same. Or, at the very least, boringly similar.
That’s until Raj, MC’s timepiece mastermind had a vision.


MC Collection
Time to be a part of the winners square



 
One night, Raj, had a dream whilst fast asleep...
Kronos, the Greek god of time, visited him floating atop a cloud with Frank Sinatra singing lightly next to him. As “Strangers in The Night” played lightly in the background, Kronos looked at Raj and said...


“Give the mortal realm something provocative to keep track of the seconds in the minutes, the minutes in the hours, the hours in the day...” 

Raj, as you could probably expect, was a bit confused by Kronos’s ambiguous advice and asked that Kronos not speak in riddles.
Kronos was offended at first but then realized he was being a bit pretentious (not unlike so many watchmakers littering the internet).
So, Kronos repeated his advice, this time in English...

“Raj, construct a watch from the finest materials the world has to offer at an extraordinarily reasonable price and make the timepiece square.”


Raj’s eyes grew wide as the full force of the idea struck him like one of Zeus’s thunderbolts. At this moment, Kronos drew a large fiery square in the sky with his pointer finger and disappeared, leaving the burning square behind him.
Two years have passed since this fateful dream and today the mortal realm has the provocative MC, the world’s best square-faced watch, designed from industry-leading materials, at an incredible price you simply cannot beat.
A line of watches built with the precision of aircrafts, missiles and bulletproof glass. 

When Raj set out to build the very first MC, he refused committing the cardinal sin so many watch brands have done in the past (and are still doing today), finding a white label product and slapping a logo on it.
We won’t name any names (you know who you are), but some very prominent watch companies don’t actually use their own designs, instead, they use templates of other cheap white label designs and mark them up.

While creating a custom design from scratch required more work and certainly more time, Raj knew that he wanted to build the MC with the best materials he could find while ensuring their price point stayed well below “luxury brands”.


 
He scoured the globe for the best materials and came up with a provocative but oh so stunning square-faced design that gave the MC an edginess you’d have to run your fingers along to fully comprehend.
Let’s take a deep dive into the impeccable materials found in each MC.

Finest 316 Stainless Steel

Swiss Ronda 763

story:
AVAILABLE NOW ON WWW.TROVE.CC

The Ultimate Slim Wallet and card case is back

We launched our first wallet design on Kickstarter 4 years ago, introducing the World to the Ultimate Slim Wallet. TROVE is now back for the 3rd time to create the Cash Wrap, another wonderful addition to our collection, it features a way of carrying cards, cash and coins in a slim profile that our customers have been asking for. 

The TROVE Cash Wrap was funded on Kickstarter in just 2 hours! Making it one of the fastest funded wallet projects ever! Our final funding figure has also put us at the most funded leather wallet from the UK on Kickstarter as well.

Due to its popularity, we have been invited into Indiegogo's InDemand program to spread the benefits of our products to even more backers and supporters. Please see our campaign below.

Follow our journey @trovecc

Keep up to date with our journey and new rewards on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

What is the TROVE Cash Wrap? 

The Cash Wrap works on its own to carry cash, cards, notes, tickets, keys and accessories, or as an addition to the original TROVE Wallet and TROVE Swift wallets to carry even more.

 

The Cash Wrap folds around the ultra minimalist elastic cardholder with pull tab, or your existing TROVE Swift wallet, to give you quick access to your cards. A narrow elastic strap secures everything you're carrying inside. 

Lovingly crafted by experts with the world's finest materials

TROVE is handmade in the UK at one of the last remaining leather goods factories. Whether you choose 100% vegetable tanned full grain Tuscan leather, or non-leather alternatives, every TROVE features precision woven Italian elastic to make your wallet durable and lightweight.

 

Not into leather? We've got you covered

Vegan-friendly performance materials include our Reflex range made with micro glass beads bonded to a polyester/cotton fabric base and genuine RFID blocking Carbon Fibre, produced using a patented process in the USA, bonded with genuine Alcantara as used by luxury sport car manufacturers.

Why is it better than your bulky wallet? 

TROVE products are designed with minimal carry in mind to make your life more streamlined and hassle-free. 

Extremely slim 

Just like our previous TROVE products, the Cash Wrap can hold a lot while staying compact. Organise up to ten cards in different compartments and use the built in pocket for coins.

Quick access to your Cash and Cards

Use the pull tab to access your most-used cards without opening the Cash Wrap, or access cash FAST without unfolding the whole wrap. The Cash Wrap is designed to fit British £50 notes, which are larger than most international currencies.

 

Modular design

Already carrying a TROVE Wallet or TROVE Swift? Combine it with the Cash Wrap to carry more.

Alternatively, use the Cash Wrap on its own with the supplied elastic card holder and pull tab, or even separate the two for an ultra-minimalist card case in one hand and a Cash Wrap body in the other - one product, two ways of carrying. 

Already have a TROVE Swift wallet?

Your TROVE. Your way.

Perks 

We have a great range of colours on offer for pre-order prices. We have split them into different material categories for easy picking. As part of our Special Pre-Order offer, we are also giving away a FREE matching TROVE Cable Clip with every Cash Wrap. 

Pick a Leather Cash Wrap

Makermet for campaign design, management and creative direction. Video production by Georgi Scurfield at LeftLion Extended. 

And Matt for lending his tandem ?

You can combine our Leather Cash Wraps with one of our TROVE Swifts by choosing the TROVE Combo perk.
The following Perks are available:

1 x TROVE Cash Wrap Leather + 1 x FREE matching Cable Clip : £30 (GBP)

1 x TROVE Cash Wrap Reflex + 1 x FREE matching Cable Clip : £30 (GBP)

1 x TROVE Cash Wrap Carbon + 1 x FREE matching Cable Clip : £35 (GBP)

2 x TROVE Cash Wrap Leather + 2 x FREE matching Cable Clip : £55 (GBP)

2 x TROVE Cash Wrap Reflex + 2 x FREE matching Cable Clip : £55 (GBP)

2 x TROVE Cash Wrap Carbon + 2 x FREE matching Cable Clip : £65 (GBP)

1 x TROVE Cash Wrap + 1 x TROVE Swift + 1 x FREE matching Cable Clip : £55 (GBP)

 Our Timeline so far: A special thanks to... Makermet for campaign design, management and creative direction. Video production by Georgi Scurfield at LeftLion Extended. And Matt for lending his tandem ?

story:
Overview

Imagine this: You’ve finally ordered a lipstick online that you’ve been seeing ads for on your Instagram feed for weeks. You’re so excited when the package arrives, but once you try the lipstick on, you realize that the color looks nothing like in the pictures. Now, you’re stuck with yet another product that you never use and can’t return.

This is the harsh reality of shopping for makeup online.

Our very own co-founder, Anisha, experienced this herself when she bought the lipstick shade “Boy Bye” from the Kylie Cosmetics website, and she’s not alone. Shoppers of all different skin tones have been constantly frustrated by false expectations and inaccurate depictions of makeup on social media and retail sites. They deserve better.

 

 

That’s why we’ve designed swatchcandy, the solution that every makeup user has been looking for. With our app, you can see lipsticks on real people with skin tones like yours so that you don’t have to second guess your next makeup haul.

 

 

We created a mobile app for makeup lovers to find their perfect colors by using the world’s largest library of makeup swatches to curate photos for each user’s unique skin tone. We do this using swatches, or samples of makeup applied to the skin to show off its color and texture.

swatchcandy was founded by Sabrina and Anisha, two women of color with backgrounds in Industrial Design and Computer Science from Georgia Tech who were tired of the difficulty involved in finding reliable and representative images of makeup online. In just 6 months, we turned our class project into a startup, after being selected into an incubator program through Georgia Tech in June. After interviewing over 150 people of all skin tones about their frustrations in the makeup buying process, our team discovered that a majority of makeup shoppers have trouble finding products that complement their skin tone, even with all the online resources they have quick access to.

 

 

With swatchcandy, we are revolutionizing the online makeup shopping experience by providing a resource for people of all skin tones. Right now, we have a searchable database of over 50 lipsticks being shown on at least 10 different skin tones per product, so a user can see how it will look on a skin tone similar to their own before deciding to make a purchase. All of our images are unretouched and color corrected to show up to a 98% accurate representation for the makeup being photographed.

 

Since this June, we have started developing a version of swatchcandy that will be compatible with both Android and iOS platforms. Here’s what our prototype currently looks like.

 

 

 

 

We need your help to continue development on the app so that we can provide the best experience for our users and they can purchase makeup with the confidence that they deserve.

Here’s our vision for swatchcandy - when you first download the app, you’ll take a picture of your skin. Now, each time you find a product that you’re interested in, swatchcandy will show you a photo of how that product looks on a skin tone and type similar to your own. You can search for any product in our database by brand or product name, or you can even browse through the popular products we carry. You’ll also be able to buy products directly through swatchcandy, so you don’t have to keep switching between apps to find out how you can get your hands on a product.

After we reach our funding goal, this is what we hope to have developed for the initial launch in December.

 

 

After December, we will continue to grow our swatch library with an even more diverse range of skin tones, as well as products from both popular and small — but amazing — makeup brands.

 

What We Need & What You Get

With your help, we can continue growing the world’s most diverse database of makeup swatches to include hundreds of brands, thousands of swatches, and all (yes, ALL) skin tones so that you never have to add another product to your makeup graveyard again.

Here’s how we will use the funding:

 

Mobile Development Includes: Paying our developers for their contributions

Marketing Includes: Paying for content promotion through social media

Producing Swatches Includes: Hosting swatch parties and using advanced software to produce, crop, and edit photos for maximum skin tone accuracy

Operational Expenses Includes: Maintaining website content, domain, and developer accounts

Legal Includes: Banking and Indiegogo fees

 

The Impact

The lack of diversity in the beauty industry is finally getting the attention it deserves, and swatchcandy is at the forefront of empowering people of all skin tones. Through our design and technology skills, we are creating a solution that tackles our customers’ pain points and helps them gain the trust they need to make the right purchases, despite false advertising and unrealistic industry standards. With your donation, we can make online shopping fun, reliable, and inclusive.


 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t donate to our campaign, here are some other options for you to support swatchcandy:

1. Follow us on Instagram at @swatchcandy

2. Sign up for our newsletter at www.swatchcandy.com

3. Tell your friends about us to build up the excitement!

We’d like to thank all of you for the love, support, and donations towards this project, and we hope to provide you all with the best experience upon swatchcandy’s release!
